Summary Heading: It‚Äôs an OK hotel but if it‚Äôs a Hilton Hotel, it should be excellent, but it‚Äôs not.
Summary: There‚Äôs a parking fee of $25 and they share parking with everything else around their hotel, it‚Äôs not easy to find parking. The room is outdated, carpet needs deep cleaning or changing (it stinks). Bathroom is clean, bed is ok, pillow is so small and blankets have stains. Their housekeeping is by request and even when we requested it, they did not come. So we came back to our room from a tiring day at Disney to see that all trash bins are full, no toilet paper and reused wet hand towels.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have just spent  one night in that Hampton Inn after having used many others. I‚Äôm not sure if we just got lucky but we had a fully renovated room that was absolutely perfect. We had chosen a king bedroom with shower (probably one of the smallest available at that hotel) and it was probably the best room I ever had in an Hampton Inn. The furniture was brand new and selected with taste. It has a very large TV, a fridge and everything you would expect but in pristine condition and absolutely clean. The bathroom didn‚Äôt have a tub as expected but a large modern looking shower that energized us for the entire day.  The person at the reception was very friendly explaining the COVID service limitation. All together, I would not hesitate to come back to this Hampton Inn and select
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for three nights in February. The front desk staff was very helpful and responsive - good customer service there! The room itself was clean and we found the beds to be comfortable! As others have mentioned, there is something going on with the hot water in the hotel - for example when you are taking a shower, the water would just pretty much shut off mid shower and then come back on intermittently.  The other thing I wanted to mention is that there IS a parking charge to park your car ($25/night) so that was a surprise.  The only issue that we had was that the fitness center has 3 treadmills and only 1 of them actually  works. There were no signs on them indicating that they were out of service so my daughter and I came to run one morning and one of them just
Manager Response: none

Summary: We found there was no safety box in the rooms; when they came to clean the rooms, someone took our AirPods and a hat. The hotel didn‚Äôt want to accept that! I called the hotel and they just say oh, I‚Äôm sorry, maybe you lost them somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It is very unfortunate that you had a bad experience in our hotel. We are sorry that our response sounded insincere, but we can assure you that we take these claims seriously. Please contact management to discuss your stay further.

Summary: Hampton Inn Garden Grove was exceptional! They were very responsive to all my needs and took great care of myself and my family. If you're looking for a great place to stay, this is definitely the place!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this wonderful review, cpesse!  We're thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove so much! We strive for excellence, so we're pleased to hear you appreciated our staff and their efforts to take great care of you and your family! Your praise lets us know we're succeeding!  We can't wait to host you again for yet another great experience!

Summary Heading: No HOT water‚Äîsome Luke to  cold with low pressure - for 7 days :(
Summary: We loved the chain but did not realize they / the brand/ was not taking care of this hotel. Staff was great. The was NO HOT water and water pressure issues- Low Pressure  Shower head would stop and start during shower. Call desk many times in our 7 day trip during Christmas/ cold days. We were told not all the boilers (10) were working.  They tried to reset the boilers many times too. This was a great price/ booked thru Costco with Disney travel- So hotel could not Move us. This is a huge deal breaker‚Äî Never again. Staff and breakfast was really good‚Äî so sad Brand does not value their service and the need to fix the plumbing
Room tip:
Book thru Costco
And Disney travel
and go to
Marriott brand
Manager Response: We regret that your time with us was less than ideal as providing our guests with a pleasant visit is very important to us. It's unfortunate that the hot water pressure in your room as well as our overall hotel value and services didn't meet your expectations. We hold ourselves to a higher standard so we'll address your concerns with our team management team so we may rectify these issues and improve moving forward.  Please feel free to contact us if you decide to give us another chance. We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: We checked in for a two might stay. The water pressure in the shower was non existent if you wanted a hot shower. Pressure was great if you needed a cold shower. Talked to the front desk and they said it was a hotel wide issue, but they were working the issue. The next morning I reported the issue to the front desk and I was told they were working the issue. We returned from Disney around midnight to find no hot water pressure.  Notified the front desk the next morning, and was told it was reported as being fixed, but there was no record of my complaint in their computer system. The amount of money charged is horrible for the substandard room. We needed a bed a shower, but at least they had a bed.   Would not recommend this hotel. Embassy Suites is in the same location, go there.
Manager Response: We regret that your time with us was less than ideal as providing our guests with a pleasant experience is very important to us. It's unfortunate our hot water pressure as well as our team members didn't meet your expectations. We hold ourselves to a higher standard so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Great Location - Expect to fix issues in room by yourself
Summary: Great location by Disneyland. Breakfast was decent for free. One issue I had was the toilet in the room was not filling  the tank. We contacted the front desk and they sent someone to the room. The person they sent did not fix the problem rather he told me how to fix it when it happens again. It happened throughout the 3 nights. I had to remove the tank cover and fix it myself.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, victormickyp.  We're disheartened to hear about the challenges you faced during your stay with us. We strive to offer our guests quality service and comfort. It's unfortunate our service was not on par with the high standard we're accustomed to sharing. We'll be addressing your concerns with the appropriate members of our team.  Please consider allowing us another chance to provide you with the excellent service we're capable of providing.

Summary: The minute I check-in, I am treated like ROYALTY!  BevZ & Janelle couldn‚Äôt be kinder!  The rooms are SO clean & I‚Äôm treated great as a Hilton Diamond Member.  The breakfast team headed by now promoted Jenn & Maria & all‚Ä¶. THE BEST!  There are 4 High Schools visiting from Japan‚Ä¶. I‚Äôm enjoying the Miso Soupü•£ü§£ü•∞üôèüèªüôèüèªtoo!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review!  It's excellent you had such an amazing stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove! We're delighted our team made you feel so welcome and valued during your time in our hotel. Thank you for taking the time to name each individual that made you feel like royalty! We endeavor to go above and beyond to ensure our guests have a memorable experience. That's what we like to see!  We can't wait until your next visit so we can share another fantastic experience with you soon!

Summary: I was extremely happy I was able to check in early, did have to pay a fee and had to upgrade the room but so much worth it! Bevz made the process so much easier and so fast! when I arrived I heard phones going crazy and was helping people out in person  she was the only person I had seen but she managed it like a champ! üí™üèº great customer service. my family enjoyed every bit of the stay. The room was clean,spacious, great view. breakfast was perfect maybe adding more options. would definitely come back here!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, Gemma B!  We're delighted to hear that you had an amazing experience at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove! We appreciate your compliments regarding our hard-working team. We will make sure to pass on your kind words to Bevz! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience!  Thank you again for sharing your review. Have a lovely day!

Summary: Customer service was top notch. I was celebrating a birthday that they learned about and brought me gifts which was very nice and unexpected. Rooms and all areas were clean.  Usually stay at a different property when I‚Äôm here. However I think this will be my new one.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review with us!   We're thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable experience at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove! We appreciate your kind words regarding our team. We're pleased to know that you felt valued by each member of our top-notch team. It's great you also appreciated our clean room and overall accommodations. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality and most efficient service, so this is fabulous to hear! Your praise is not only rewarding, but also encouraging.  We'd love to share yet another unforgettable visit with you someday! Happy Birthday again!

Summary: I was very disappointed with the level of cleanliness of the room. Upon check-in we were informed that we were upgraded to a suite since they ran out of king bed rooms. I wasn‚Äôt thrilled that I would have double beds but I was ok with it. When we got to the room we didn‚Äôt see the whole room right away since we had to rush to a wedding. That night we went to sleep and in the morning we noticed what poor condition the room was in. There were nasty stains al over the carpet, chairs in the dining area of the room were crusty, the shower had hairs on the wall still. Even our towels had hairs on them! I was very disappointed and grossed out. I didn‚Äôt bother saying anything to reception since we had a short stay but I definitely will not be staying there again.
Manager Response: We regret that your time with us was less than ideal as providing our guests with a pleasant experience is very important to us. It's unfortunate our room cleanliness didn't meet your expectations. We hold ourselves to a higher standard, so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights in October 2022. The hotel is about a 30 minute walk to Disney. We had a 2 Queen, 1 bedroom suite with balcony (417), the suite was very large, it had everything you could need, sofa, kitchenette and dining table. The only issue we fount with the room was that the bath and toilet were in 1 room and the sink was outside of it, but it was tight if someone was at the sink and you were leaving g the bathroom with the size of the door. The breakfast area is large and there is lots of choice. After a set time at night, you need to use your key card to enter the hotel doors. There are hot drinks available throughout the day. Would definitely return to this hotel it is a very convenient location for Disney.
Manager Response: We're delighted your time at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove was so wonderful! It's fantastic you took advantage of our convenient location in the heart of the city. Thank you for your comments on our very large suites. We endeavor to offer a memorable experience for all of our guests. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!

Summary: Checked in on November 1 and unfortunately I am here a few nights.  The hotel is old and needs a major overhaul. The bathtub is stained and gross.  The towels are stained.  The plus fall out of the outlets because they need replaced.  The refrigerator door handle is cracked and pulling off.  The mattress is old and has springs in it.  Every time you move it creeks.    The only thing positive I can say is the art bus stop is close and it‚Äôs a quick ride to DL.
Manager Response: Your experience is not up to the quality and standard we usually provide for our guests. It's unfortunate you had such challenges with our hotel amenities and condition of our rooms failed to exceed your expectations. We hold ourselves to a much higher caliber of service so we'll be sure to discuss your concerns moving forward.   We do hope you allow us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: Paid private parking is an open lot. No pay as you go. Progressive Hilton styling in cramped NYC like room. Bathroom more spacious. Despite what you may read, no room safe. When room blower cycles, drowns out TV. No guide for TV. Dresser drawers are wire bins. Otherwise, staff was good. Have small but available pool, kids‚Äô pool, hot tub, & gym. Hear have shuttle to theme park. Breakfast OK. Although, found oatmeal to have pasty flavor.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove. We value your business and the time you took to share your experience with future travelers. Please be advised that we do have safes available for our guests at the Front Desk. Thank you for the staff compliment! We would like to opportunity to host you again in the future.

Summary: I have stayed here twice now and it's by far my favorite hotel. Very comfortable and clean rooms! The complimentary breakfast is great with many options to choose from.  The staff were so friendly and accommodating! We will be returning!
Manager Response: Wow, what a beautifully written review! Thank you so much! It's a joy to see how many positive things you have to say about our property. Thank you for the team shout outs, we couldn't do what we do without them!  We look forward to your return visit!

Summary: If Beverly is working than you will be guaranteed a awesome stay. She will make sure you don‚Äôt have any issues. I needed a luggage cart and there were none available, so she sent employees to check the floors and find one for me. She could have easily just said one will be down soon.She will make you feel welcomed and will call you by your name every time she sees you. Best employee ever!!!!!
Manager Response: We are thrilled about your feedback! We pride ourselves on guest service. We have some of the friendliest employees in town. We were excited to hear that Beverly went above and beyond than what was expected! However, we know she always does! We cannot wait to share this comment with her and the rest of our team! Please come back and see us soon!

Summary: The room was spacious and clean. We didn‚Äôt hear any other guests, which we really appreciated! The breakfast was good, with lots of options and varied each day. We just wished the pool hours were longer and that the hot tub was bigger. Staff was very polite
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and experienced our spacious and clean room. Our hot breakfast buffet is one of the main reasons our guests choose our location and we thank you for your nice comment and feedback! Please come back and see us soon!

Summary: I'm glad I have Hamptons Inn in Garden Grove a try (note the Garden Grove, as there's two in Anaheim). While it isn't super walkable to Disney (consider all the walking you'll do there before you have that 25min hike!), there are solid transportation options. The price is fair, has pretty decent amenities such as a pool and a gym, and by far the most important, the staff is great!  If you don't bring a car, you'll have to either take the shuttle bus or an Uber. An Uber will cost about $10 dollars or so a trip, so could be worse. The shuttle is $4 for one way or $6 for a round trip. It's not run by the hotel, so you need to download an app and purchase the ticket ahead of time. Honestly, it's not a great app, it's hard to use, and it's terrible how you need to use it instead of
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove team ‚Äì THANK YOU! In receiving your review, I am thrilled to hear that our staff was great and that you were able to take advantage of our amenities. I will pass along your kind words to our team, as I know they will appreciate your feedback. Thank you again for choosing our hotel, while visiting Disneyland! We look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary: Great staff and clean hotel.  Spent few days at D23 Expo and hotel within walking distance or quick Uber to convention center.  Hotel staff took care of us when we arrived early and provided WiFi and luggage storage.  Great free breakfast before heading out.  Close to theme parks as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of your recent stay here at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove. We were happy to hear that you had a fantastic stay with us during the D23 Expo. It was our absolute pleasure to serve you and we look forward to welcoming you back next year or sooner!

Summary: Love this place, nice rooms, decent breakfast, close to toy story lot. Also has shuttle if you need one. Restaurants and Target nearby too.  We always stay here when we go to Disneyland. Staff is always very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, here at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove! We were thrilled to hear you were pleased again and that you enjoy our convenient location so much!. We wish you the safest travels and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: The Best Front desk staff ever!!!
Summary: I had a question before I checked in, I messaged the hotel in the Hilton honor app. I received a prompt and courteous response from Jenelle. When I checked in the  hotel Jenelle was at the front desk and remembered me & my message, she Also went out of her way to accommodate me with my special needs. Shortly after checking in Bevz checks in on me and make sure everything‚Äòs OK. When I left and came back Bevz still remembered what I needed before I did. These two amazing employees are just the type that I would want to be the face of my business. I stay in many hotels and rarely do I see this type of service.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay! Thank you for complementing our hard-working staff! We cannot wait to share this comment with Janelle, Bevz, and the rest of our team! They take great pride in providing the best customer service to all our guests! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: the hotel was a disappointment from the moment we arrived.  The hotel is poorly managed. The hotel seriously needs to evaluate options for improving general cleanliness. Staff are terrible....front desk people were worst and unprofessional.
Manager Response: I want to personally apologize that the hotel was not as clean as our standards demand.  A clean room that has been prepared for our guests, is basic for a good stay. I am sorry if this was not your experience. We value your feedback and can be confident that we will follow up on your concern, so that others will not be disappointed as you were. Thank you again for your feedback and concern.

Summary: I stay @ this location often.  I feel like royalty the moment I check in!  Clean rooms & warm breakfast!  Every team member makes me feel recognized as a Hilton Diamond Member. I‚Äôm coming back this week!üòÇ
Manager Response: Thank you for this outstanding review, bevb316! As a Diamond member your recommendation is truly a compliment. Thank you and safe travels! We cannot wait to host you and your family again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Self service hotel with a 4 star price
Summary: Beware that this hotel is pretty run down due to heavy Disney traffic. They will only clean your room every 4 days. Our room on the 2nd floor smelled like dead fish. The prices don‚Äôt line up with the quality hotel it is.
Manager Response: We are very appreciative of your feedback. It is unfortunate that you had such a bad experience. This is not typical of our hotel, and we are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay. We will address the issues and hope to improve upon them.

Summary: This hotel was comfortable and clean when we stayed last night. The young man Josue from the front Front Desk was very professional and attentive during our check-in process at the hotel. Would highly recommended saying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful astonishing service feedback! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for recognizing our outstanding employee - Josue! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our stay was wonderful. Service at the front desk and at the morning breakfast was perfect. Everyone was friendly and very helpful. Rooms were very clean and spacious. Transportation was easy accessible.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us, Dmartinez-pr!  We're so glad that you had a fun trip experience at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove, from our very clean  and spacious room to the perfect morning breakfast! It's wonderful to know that our staff treated you so well and made you feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Thank you again for taking the time to leave your feedback!

Summary: Requested for crib or bassinet for my newborn but it did not happened. Thankfully I prepared my own. Make up stains were found on the towel and sink. Not sure if they were even new or used and cleaned. Not my first time at this hotel, but it disappoint me this time. Not sure if I would be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback about your recent stay with us on your trip.  I am terribly sorry to hear about the housekeeping issues you experienced in your room and can assure you that we have addressed these issues so that they do not occur again. I appreciate you letting us know about these concerns as it allows us to improve as a team and address them immediately.  We would love the opportunity to show you the service and experience we do offer at our hotel in the future. If you are ever headed back to Garden Grove area, please contact us before making a reservation.  Thank you for your business and we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Good and clean hotel. Friendly reception staff. Walking distance to the parks. Decent pool. No bar or restaurant. Many rooms facing a loud street and AC units pretty loud. Overall probably still one of the better options near the parks. But no idea why it received so many positive reviews.   Downside: The breakfast situation is really horrible. Breakfast closes at 9:30, which means guests scrambling for food at the last minute, taking kids downstairs in their sleeping gowns, overloading plates etc. Food stopped being replenished by about 9:25 and then at 9:30 sharp the door was closed. Guests treated like cattle. Food also not great. Scrambled eggs cold, maple Sirup the cheapest stuff. You get the picture. That‚Äôs why I wouldn‚Äôt come again.
Manager Response: We are very appreciative of your feedback. It is unfortunate that you had such a bad experience. We have a lot families that choose our hotel because of our location! Plus our complimentary hot breakfast buffet is served daily from 6am-10am. Our staff takes pride in delivering service and our full hot breakfast buffet has received a lot compliments.  We apologize if this was not the case. We will address this with the team to ensure that they follow the hours properly.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: Very clean facility. Right next to ART bus system to easily get you to Disney. Would book again for sure. Breakfast is typical. Nothing to be eager for but it does the job. Target is right down the street which super convenient to walk to ad well as several restaurants within a 5 min walk or so.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review! We enjoyed having you as our guest! Like you most of our guests stay here due to it close location to everything! Thank you for being so kind about us and our property. We hope to host you again in the near future!

Summary: Horrible experience. Party rooms next to us. Staff did nothing to manage the noise, music or screaming. Asked for another room and was told none were available. Would not recommend staying here with family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valued feedback, edyd2010. On behalf of the entire staff, I sincerely apologize for the experience you had with your room. Especially after reporting it to our staff. I have share this with my executive management team to ensure, experiences such as yours do not reoccur. Hope you will consider giving us a second chance in order to restore your confidence in our hotel.  Have a great day!

Summary: We had a great trip and a pleasant stay experience at this hotel during the NAMM Show 2022. The hotel staff was very professional and accommodating. We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves while in Anaheim, CA.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review, P4049Nljasonb! We can't wait to host you and your group again sometime soon. We appreciate you!

Summary: Overall this hotel was comfortable and conveniently located to nearby attractions. Very clean inside rooms. Noise level was very good. Was able to get a good night sleep. Breakfast was your standard faire. You can get pretty much a good variety for hot and cold foods.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, bolt4lifer!  We're delighted your time at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove was so wonderful! It's fantastic you took advantage of our convenient location in the heart of the city. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Please come see us again soon!

Summary: This hotel is my "go to" property for Anaheim. It is clean, comfortable, has a great breakfast and an outstanding staff. Large pool area, and some two room suites for larger families. I would highly recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing review and recommendation!  It's excellent your time at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove was so fantastic! We're thrilled our team took such wonderful care of you. Our breakfast staff works hard to take care of our guest and I am excited to share this with them! Our large pool and suites are some of the main reasons why guests come back every time! Thank you for making us your favorite Anaheim hotel!  That's what we like to see!  We can't wait until your next visit so we can share another amazing experience with you!

Summary: Love this place, nice rooms, great breakfast buffet, close to toy story lot! Variety of food items was back to pre-Covid variety. Elevators were working fine, housekeeping was available on request. One of our favorite places to stay
Manager Response: It's fantastic you had such an excellent experience at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove and that our team took such great care of you. We want you to feel right at home as soon as you walk through our doors! Our team will love to hear they made such a wonderful impression on you.  We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you.

Summary: No complimentary coffee beverages available in Lobby. Bathroom sink overflowed. Shower head too high to reach for adjustment.  Good breakfast buffet but had to wait long periods of time for replacing foods. Long wait for refills on coffee.
Manager Response: We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we are always looking for ways to improve our customer experience. Our lobby coffee station is available 24 hours. It was shocking to hear that we did not have it available during your stay. We will retrain our team to ensure that they are always refreshing our lobby coffee and breakfast buffet. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: BeverlyZ at the front desk was so welcoming, gracious & engaging. She thoroughly explained the amenities offered and answered all of my questions. I didn‚Äôt feel like a customer. She treated me like family!  From the breakfast staff, housekeeping & maintenance, the customer service is Top notch professional & friendly. The amazing breakfast was the best way to start my day! Thank you so much for treating me like Royalty
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review with us, Kamikuku!  We're thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable experience at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim garden Grove! We also appreciate your kind words regarding our team. We're pleased to know that you felt valued by each member of our top-notch team. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality and most efficient service, so this is fabulous to hear! Your praise is not only rewarding, but also encouraging. Beverly will be thrilled to hear and read your comment!  We'd love to share yet another unforgettable visit with you someday!

Summary: Extremely disappointed. Found a hair in shower upon check in. Five minutes later found another hair on the counter behind the coffee maker. While the management claims that they fully sanitize every area in the hotel, it‚Äôs worrisome that the cleaning staff missed two hair in two different spots. Informed front desk and received a scripted reply that cleaning staff will be informed . It sounded pretty insincere. Breakfast was pretty mediocre. Having apprehension about staying at any Hampton inn in future.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience. It's disappointing to read that we failed to meet your very reasonable expectation. Be assured that the feedback you've provided has been shared with the appropriate departments in our effort to continuously improve. Our goal is to exceed expectations, so we will most certainly learn from your feedback.

Summary Heading: Staff needs major work on Customer Service
Summary: Upon arrival, the receptionist (Rachell) was frustrated and not very welcoming. Very disappointed. Shower head in the room did not work, only the handle faucet worked. I put in a trouble call as we went out for the day. When we returned that night. The shower head was not fixed for our stay
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites. Your business and feedback are both greatly appreciated. We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. This is not typical of our hotel and staff. We will share your comments with our team so that incidents like these does not happen again. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay.

Summary: The Front Desk is exceptionally PERFECTüòçüíãüíãüíãüíã!  I‚Äôm recognized as a Hilton Diamond Member immediately & treated as such.  VERY Clean rooms & warm breakfast. Disney Park shuttle available.  I‚Äôm a repeat Patron.  Price is more reasonable than most Disney Resort area Hotels.  Laundry available on floors 2 & 3.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this glowing review, bevb316!  We are delighted to hear about your experience at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove! We truly appreciate your kind words regarding our team. It's wonderful that you felt valued by each member of our top-notch team. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality, very clean rooms, and hot breakfast, so this is fantastic to hear! Your compliments are not only rewarding, but also encouraging.  We'd love to share another positive, fun experience with you in the future.

Summary: I love staying here when we go to Disneyland. I actually prefer this location than the closer hotels since you get more bang for your buck. Plus, the location is a $6-10 Uber/Lyft ride to the drop off location. Or you can take the ART shuttle for $6/day.   Pros:   -Customer service!!!! Beverly and the front desk make you feel like home each time you walk in. Bev always referred to her guests by Mr/Mrs/Ms (Last Name)  Nice customer service is such a lost art. I would definitely come back just because you get treated nicely,  -Breakfast so easy as long as you go early and beat the crowd. Hubby and I went down at 6am and just brought the food upstairs for when our kids woke up.  We had a suite and full kitchen‚Ä¶such a saver when you have so many mouths to feed. -Location is close to
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review jenniferG6331DZ!   It's fantastic you had such a lovely experience at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove. We're thrilled you enjoyed our perfect location with proximity to so many of the city's best attractions and especially with Beverly making you feel at home!  She will be delighted to hear that her hospitality is appreciated and recognized!  We're looking forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon!

Summary Heading: Will stay here again for sure. Just wish there was an onsite restaurant or bar
Summary: Very friendly staff. Needs were comfortable. Pool was heated. Staff were very nice in letting out go use the main seating area in the evenings for group dinners and drinks.  Parking was $20, which is odd since the hotel doesn't own the parking lot and shares with many other hotels and restaurants. Our room has a very powerful stench we think was from disinfecting. Overall, 4/5
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us this fabulous review!  We're so glad you had such an enjoyable time with us at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove! We care deeply about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so it's wonderful you appreciated our central location. We love seeing our guests take advantage of our pool and other amenities.  We look forward to hosting you again for yet another unforgettable stay!

Summary: We arrived at 10pm to check in, the staff was super friendly and the place was really clean. We got a discount on parking because we bundled a disney package. The shuttle picks you up right out front, it was perfect! The room we booked was absolutely incredible! It was a suite with a balcony. Whenever we needed towels or soap the front desk was right on it for us. The breakfast downstairs was delicious! Everyday something a little different but always a waffle bar eggs and toast or a begal, tons of fresh fruit and yogurt, juice and coffee. I was absolutely pleased with our stay and we will be back for another trip soon. 10/10 recommend if yoh are going as a group or family spring for the suite, you wont regret having a full sized kitchen and table there for you.
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful review, Baigo4th!  We're excited to know your time at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove was amazing! We endeavor to offer an excellent experience for all of our guests so we're glad you were able to take advantage of our convenient location in the heart of the city. We are glad you enjoyed our hot breakfast and the variety of offerings! Thank you for the 10/10 recommendation!  We look forward to hosting you again soon for another unforgettable experience!

Summary: We booked through Costco travel as a Disney package. Our flight got changed and we had to stay another night. I was shocked that the charge was almost three times the cost than what is advertised.  Housekeeping was not included. On a 100¬∞ day, the pool area was locked out- meaning the door between the pool area and inside was not working. For over $300 for a single night after a 4 night stay, never again will I stay at a Hilton hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review of our hotel.  As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept our sincere apology for not meeting your expectations. Our outdoor pool door is on a timer and only available during operating hours. Also, housekeeping is available upon request or after the 4th day. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate team to ensure that this was an isolated issue that is corrected moving forward.

Summary: Bev is a wonderful desk clerk!  Very friendly, efficiently processing all requests, following up making sure guests have what we need.  She even remembers my name!  Unbelievable!  She seems like she has year of experience, I couldn't believe it when she said she has only been here a few weeks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind words and for staying at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove! We're so glad you enjoyed your stay as well as our friendly staff! We will pass along your praise to Bev! We would love to host you again sometime soon!

Summary: Cleanliness of hotel was lacking, odors and little  creepy crawlies. Breakfast wasn‚Äôt like it used to be, eggs were watery , oatmeal was gluey, toaster didn‚Äôt work. The kitchen staff was friendly , but quality is down. Not sure if it‚Äôs this location or Hampton Inn in general but they need to go back to the way Hampton Inn used to be
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for staying with us on your trip to Anaheim Garden Grove.  I want to apologize for the experience you had during your stay in Anaheim Garden Grove and can assure you that the issues you made us aware of have been addressed with our housekeeping, engineering, and breakfast teams. We did not meet your-or our own-expectations during your stay. We take pride in our guests' satisfaction and our goal is to address your concerns so that we can ensure you have an exceptional experience on your next visit.

Summary: Great stay! Clean and secure. Staff is awesome and friendly. Convenient location to Disney. Room had all amenities you'd need. Wonderful breakfast. Shuttle picks you up at parking lot and takes you to park. Right to entrance gates!
Manager Response: Thank you for this outstanding review, ChiVegasRoxstar79! We cannot wait to host you again in the near future!

Summary: The fact that you have to pay for parking is ridiculous one of my 2 queen beds made a lot of knob the to the shower faucet was broken when showering the water pressure would drop and rise and they only give you one shampoo and conditioner so be prepared to take your own or ask for more in front counter
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove and providing your honest feedback.  We want our guests to have the best stay possible where everything is in perfect working condition and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations. As a teachable moment, we have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure that preventative maintenance are in place to prevent these issues from occurring in the future.  Also, with parking in the Disneyland resort area being at a premium, our parking rates are competitive with other hotels in the resort district.  Once again, thank you for your valued feedback and we hope to serve you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim Garden Grove - Disneyland resort area.

Summary Heading: I would never stay here they are the rudest people I‚Äôve ever met
Summary: When I checked in the customer service was the unfriendly I‚Äôve ever seen across the country they didn‚Äôt offer me anything that I was supposed to get as a diamond member doesn‚Äôt matter but be a little friendlier cause if they treat me bad who else are they bad or worse cause they don‚Äôt stay at Hilton as much
Manager Response: We are very appreciative of your feedback. We take pride in providing our guests with the best service possible. It is unfortunate that you had such a bad experience. Hopefully, you were able to speak with a manager about your stay. Many of these issues could be addressed immediately. Please give us a call and another chance to refresh your opinion of our lovely hotel.

Summary: Great hotel definitely recommend!  Close to Disneyland and all other food and coffee places! Enjoyed my stay. Definitely recommend the suites very family like and very roomy. Slept like a baby! Check them out
Manager Response: Thank you for this 5 star review parishughes2022! Comments like these give our future guests an idea of our central location! We are located on the main street on Harbor Blvd, where all the restaurants and coffee shops are within walking distance. We cannot wait to host you and your family again in the near future.

Summary: Everything was good for the most part! Beds were very comfy but I did notice a couple hairs in the restroom, on the beds, orange peel on the floor. Everything else was good though. A lot of places near by if you want to go for a walk
Manager Response: We're glad you appreciated our central location and very comfy bed, but we're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. We regret that we failed on the cleanliness of our room. I want to personally apologize that we did not meet the standards for our hotel. We will use this comment as a retraining  tool for our staff.    We hope to have you stay with us again so we can share a more positive experience with you.

Summary: Shower head blew off the wall and the shower door wouldn‚Äôt shut. We notified the front desk and they sent someone to fix it. The next day. They only repaired the shower head but not the shower door. When you would shower the door would roll wide open.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the details of your recent stay, without candid feedback from our guests we cannot strive to continually improve.  My sincere apologies that your experience was anything less than outstanding as this is our commitment to every guest, every stay. Providing genuine hospitality is our #1 priority!  Our maintenance team does  a preventative maintenance in all our rooms at least 3 times per year for each room. I am disappointed to hear that this  happened during your stay. We will definitely use your review as a learn tool moving forward.   Again, thank you so much for providing detailed and timely feedback. Our entire team will seek to improve ourselves and our hotel as a result.

Summary: I‚Äôm a Hilton Diamond Member & have stayed @ many Hilton Properties around the world. I have stayed @ High end & other Hampton Inns.  I have also stayed @ this Inn before.  My husband & I were SO SO SO impressed on the cleanliness of the rooms & lobby & laundry room!!  The Front Desk is very efficient & WELCOMING!!üíò Hot Breakfast in the morning is TERRIFIC with a great staff.  I will be back soon to this location, BETTER than EVER!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review! We enjoyed hosting you and your husband! Thank you for being so kind about us and our property. We hope to host you again in the near future!

Summary: We are here on a family vacation. Last night we came to the hotel and our toilet was not flushing I called downstairs and was offered a plunger  Great thank you. This morning we had no hot water and had to use a different room. Turns out if you let the shower run for 20 min eventually you get hot water. We did laundry tonight I thought ok an hour and a half.Our room key didn't work on the sensored key thing. my husband went down stairs and let receptionist know she reset the sensored key and he came back to the 2nd floor and it still didn't work. He went back down and the receptionist opened door for us using her key. Turns out it's been happening often. 30 min later we can wash. I thought ok prob 1 hour and a half. The washer was about 25 min. Pretty fast and dryer took about 2
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your holiday. We are sorry for the hot water not working, key card reader for the laundry room were not working, and that we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. This has been corrected. This is not typical of our hotel, and we are always looking for ways to improve. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: Super friendly staff, good breakfast, 5 mins away from Disneyland, and the staff are extremely nice. The pool was too cold to get in, but the Jacuzzi was hot and relaxing. They have two pools one for kids I would say ages 1-3 and a regular pool for kids that know how to swim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay! We hope to see you again soon,

Summary: Love the shuttle service that they offer for Disneyland. It comes about every 30 minutes. There‚Äôs a small daily fee to use the shuttle option (for unlimited daily rides) but it's still worth it especially if you‚Äôre like me who needs to wind down and take a break before heading back into the crowd!
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback! We very much appreciate your kind words about the Anaheim Resort shuttle service. Please come stay with us again soon!

Summary: We stay at the hotel for 1 week no room housekeeping, they said housekeeping per request. Requested housekeeping more than 3 times all I got was new towels. I Dropped glass container in the bathroom had requested housekeeping we left the room and when they came in and only put in new towels and left all the broken glass pieces on the floor i went to ask the front desk why they didn‚Äôt pick it up and she gave me a broom and vacuum to clean it myself.
Manager Response: We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. This is not typical of our hotel, and we are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: We were disappointed that this location seemed to be a disappointment compared to other Hampton Inns we have stayed at in the past . Breakfast and pool were closed before hours were over making you feel I welcome
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, While we're happy you appreciated our location, it's unfortunate our services didn't meet your expectations. We regret your challenges and inconvenience so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward. We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Five Stars & A Well Run Hotel
Summary: I stayed at this Hampton on November 17th and I I travel on a regular basis and just don't make the time to write reviews like I intend to.  However when I find a hotel that either meets or disappoints my expectations I push myself to write a review.  First of all this Hampton Well EXCEEDED my expectations.  In my opinion it is well run and the general manager and management team should be proud of their staff and the facility.  The hotel is very clean.  My room was very clean and very comfortable.  The breakfast area was very clean and well stocked.  Any staff members I came in contact with, regardless of their position, made an effort to greet me.  That speaks a lot for their attitude and their realization of what customer service is all about.  Keep up the great job!  I
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay at the  Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove. It's our pleasure to accommodate you and we appreciate your praise. Janelle is an excellent member of our front desk team. She always goes above and beyond for our guests and we are glad to hear that she was able to get your reservation sorted out. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our clean and comfortable rooms during your time with us.  We're looking forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon.

Summary: Pool area was dirty.  Cheese egg Pattie burnt.  Need a scrambled egg option.  Didn‚Äôt offer meat every morning.  Popular beverages like OJ and coffee ran out.  Over all average.  Unfortunately with Covid, everyone is using the pandemic as a reason to increase prices and reduce service.  If you need a decent place to stay for Disneyland, not a bad option if you just need a place to lay your head.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback kalathrower  It's unfortunate to hear you weren't completely satisfied with your recent experience, as we strive to provide all of our guests with a wonderful experience from beginning to end. Please know your feedback regarding our breakfast options will be addressed with the appropriate members of our team so we may improve for the future.  We hope you'll give us another chance to provide you with the quality experience we're truly capable of sharing with our guests.

Summary: Hotel was clean and safe for families. Staff is friendly and helpful. Breakfast if ok. But staff kept all areas clean and well stocked. There‚Äôs also a small store that was well stocked with snacks if you preferred something else for breakfast. I will return again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating comet1974  We're so glad that you've enjoyed your stay, It's wonderful to know that your interactions with our staff have been so positive. We strive to provide each guest with exceptional service, all areas clean and well stocked.  We're so glad that several members of our team were friendly, helpful, and safe for families! We'll be sure to pass your compliments along to our team.  Thanks again for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Have a beautiful day!

Summary: We had a wonderful room that had a lanai patio that had a gate that led right into the pool area. Even though we were on the first floor it was very quiet. The beds were really comfortable. Breakfast had everything from self made waffles to hot omelettes and sausages. The staff were wonderful and welcoming as well. I found this a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing feedback kristinaG5559TC  It's wonderful you enjoyed a great stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our wonderful and welcoming staff,  pool area,  but most of all the  fully stocked breakfast option . Your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience!

Summary Heading: Customer Service, makes me a Loyal Hilton Member
Summary: Janelle went above & beyond to make sure we had the most accomodating connecting rooms with adequate space for our group, she listened to my needs and met them with a smile. Once on the property, Mike D, the Manager made sure we were happy and comfortable. Customer Service is a rarity these days and this property did it exceptionally well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review 522rickg  It's excellent your time at Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove was so fantastic! We're thrilled our team took such wonderful care of you. Janelle is a treasured member of our team so it's not surprising you felt so welcome and comfortable. We take pride on our  superb customer service, so we definitely can agree with your feedback! Thanks for being a Loyal Hilton Member and for leaving us this lovely review.  We can't wait until your next visit so we can share another amazing experience with you!

Summary Heading: Owned by Hilton but not the Hilton experience
Summary: Hotel was located in a convenient location to Disneyland. Rooms were slapped with modern renovations to try & stay up to date but the age of the hotel definitely showed despite their attempt. Shower was rusted & made the bathroom look dirty. Bed sheets were basically sandpaper & pillows were for a twin or full sized bed so it made sleeping in a king sized bed pointless. Biggest plus was the hot breakfast & security measures considering we saw someone snooping through a bed of a truck in the parking lot. No mobile check-in or check out which the staff emphasized greatly so even they recognize the annoyance. Dining staff was nice but front desk staff either wanted you gone or would yell from the chair they were sitting in the office behind the counter if you needed something. Only
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. I am glad you enjoyed our location and the hot breakfast but very sorry to hear about the other issues you experienced with us. I sincerely apologize for those issues and we are always continuing to make improvements to our property and appreciate your feedback. We will share your comments with our staff so that we do not disappoint future guests. Have a great rest of the week!

Summary: My stay was ok . Staff our friendly and nice. The FD agent she‚Äôs awesome and helpful. The only issue was I found some hairs  on the restroom especially at the toilet bowl and elevator 1 carpet dirty and sticky. Breakfast was good, the presentation was good and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your most recent stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim Garden Grove.  We pride ourselves in offering guests a pleasant and memorable stay, so please accept my apology that we fell short with the appearance of the room and elevator 1. I too would be quite disappointed to see such an amazing property with a sub-par bathroom. Rest assured I have shared your concerns with our housekeeping management team to have these issues corrected and isolated incidence.  I'm glad that you enjoyed our staff and the hot breakfast. We have a team who are passionate about serving others and making sure all needs are met. We hope to see you again real soon! Safe travels!

Summary: They are struggling..sanitary and customer services are very limited, if I don‚Äôt know better it feels like they are a one star rating accommodation. It is hard to feel welcoming in this hotel as the door is locked on you as you check in.
Manager Response: We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. This is not typical of our hotel, and we are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: Everyone at the hotel is super helpful and nice. Will definitely stay again üíï room is clean, parking is great. Jessica and Geena deserve a raise because they made my day better by being so gosh darn sweet. Lovely ladies 10/10
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Professional Staff making a Great Stay!
Summary: I stayed here for two weeks in December of 2020. Before going in, due to the pandemic, I knew I had to temper my expectations. The pool, fitness room and hot breakfast were temporarily shut down.  With that being said, I had a very pleasant stay. Everything was up to par. The room and common areas were clean. All my interactions with the staff were professional. I also had occassion to talk the the GM Mike, who gave great recommendations for the surrounding area.  I plan on staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Toilet and elevators were filthy called management and the only other room available was a single bed. Room was not cleaned daily, apparently you have to request it even though we‚Äôre dealing with COVID risk, Elevators carpets were awful
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. It is very unfortunate that you had a bad experience in the room. We hope that you informed our Guest Service Agents of your issues, so they could be rectified. We pride ourselves in the cleanliness of the hotel. We will discuss this with our staff so that others will not have the same disappointment. Please come back and give us another try. We'd love to turn your experience around.

Summary: I have stayed at similar hotels in the past but this Hampton Inn was the worst, not as expected. They advertised free hot breakfast but only 5 out of seven days. They only clean room when you request it  but when requested they said only new towels and garbage collection are provided. They only cleaned the room once during our 7 day stay. Is that normal or good service? You can judge it for yourself. Got the bill on the last day. The charges were wrong!  Overcharged by about $150 on double dip taxes. I had to go to the reception desk to correct the problem before the credit card is actually charged. Review your bills before you check out!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel on your recent trip to the Anaheim Garden Grove area. My apologies regarding your incorrect bill but am happy to hear that the Front Desk was able to resolve it quickly before your departure. We want our guest to have the best experience and it seems like we fell short on a few items. We will be reviewing your comments with the department heads so that others will not have the same experience. Thank you for your valued feedback!

Summary: We have stayed at this property in the past and had a pleasant experience.  This time however the room was not cleaned and when addressing this with the front desk they offered to clean the room the next day - I would expect that UPON our arrival the room would be cleaned especially during a pandemic.  I was very disappointed in this response.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. I apologize that your return visit did not meet your expectations. We are currently offering light service upon request only. We hope to return back to our normal daily cleaning soon. Thank you and we hope to see you again!

Summary: Overall the room was not great. Cleaning was not done properly and smells awful but breakfast was horrible with oranges could not able to peel dry bagel old stock of nature own granola bar and no hot foods served
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and taking the time to post your comments. We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our grab and go breakfast option. Also, cleanliness is one of the top priority for our hotel. We have addressed this issue with our staff. We are pleased to announce that we have hired a new Executive Housekeeping Manager with tons of experience and we have returned to our hot breakfast option!  Thank you again for your comments.

Summary: Hotel room needs to be updated.  Had 2 queen beds but only 1 sink in the bathroom.  Room had no closet nor drawers.  Staff was great and assisted as much as they could. The room being out off date has nothing to do with the staff
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and taking the time to post your comments. We are sorry to hear that you were not pleased with the amenities our hotel room offers. On your next visit please let our Front Desk team know if you need a larger space or second sink. We offer family suites with two sinks. Thank you again for your comments.

Summary: Shower had mildew all around inside and outside of it. Bathroom tiled baseboards don‚Äôt get cleaned. Light switches and door knobs need cleaning. They also need to bring back daily cleaning of the rooms without it being requested.  When charging for parking, they should have ample parking nearby the Hotel for their guests. For the cost of the room they need to bring back the buffet breakfast. The to go boxes are terrible.  I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this Hotel to any of my friends or family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and taking the time to post your comments. We are sorry to hear that you were not pleased with the parking of the hotel. However, our parking lot is shared with a restaurant and two other hotels. We have more than enough parking spaces available. Also, for the safety of our guests and team members (during these unprecedented times), we are only cleaning rooms per request. Lastly, we are excited to announce that we have returned to hot breakfast. Thank you again for your comments.

Summary: Very dissatisfied with the breakfast provided. One of the days they ran out of the bagels which was the main item offered so only had a granola bar and yogurt. All of our neighbors were extremely loud until 2 in the morning, and our shower did not drain properly which cause gross residue to build up.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites. Your business and feedback are both greatly appreciated. We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. We will speak with our staff to ensure that we have the proper order in place, so that we do not run out like that again. We will also revisit our preventative maintenance at our hotel so that items such as the shower drain not working is fixed prior to renting the room. This is not typical of our hotel and staff. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay.

Summary: The bed was comfortable. The grab and go breakfast was ok and had run out before the allotted time for breakfast was up. Need to ask front desk for the room to be cleaned. We had an ok stay. Location was great.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business & your feedback. Thank you for recognizing the comfort of our beds. My apologies as it appears we fell short in your experience due to the inconvenience of housekeeping service during your stay. For the safety of our guests and our staff, we have decided to service the rooms only as requested. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Upgraded to a family suite with balcony, no cooking utensils, only 1 pot, 2 forks, 1 butter knife, they serve bagels with no toaster, I obtained 4-5 big bites on my arm & leg from sleeping on the sofa!!
Manager Response: We were truly sorry to hear that you had a service issue whilst staying here at this property. As we discussed over the phone,  please know that we take this very seriously and will be working with the team so this never happens again. Thank you again for your time and feedback!

Summary Heading: Stayed many times, always excellent customer service, well managed
Summary: I stay at the Garden Grove Hampton Inn once or twice a month for business travel, and have always found the staff to be very welcoming and friendly.  Mike, the GM,  and his team have done a great job on creating a consistently great experience with clean rooms, friendly, attentive staff. I will continue to choose this location when I travel to OC.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Garden Grove as your home away from home!  We do truly care about our guests and hope to provide an excellent customer service experience with clean rooms! We can't wait for your visit! Safe travels!

Summary: We checked in and were given a room that smelled like smoke, switched rooms but only 2 queens were available. Didn‚Äôt seem very clean. It was late and the smoke detector was peeping, hair in the bathroom and under the sheet in one of the beds. Paid $18 for parking in a parking lot that didn‚Äôt seem very secure. Complimentary breakfast was a packaged bagel, yogurt and an orange. I know because of Covid but could have provided better options or given a free night of parking or something. Was disappointed as I have always enjoyed my stays at other Hilton properties.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Bed bugs bites. And bugs around the kitchen sink. Shower head kept falling off.
Summary: Me and my kids all got bites all over our legs. Seems like they have bed bugs in this hotel. Room was good size. We enjoyed staying but was getting bites every night and shower head kept falling off. And bugs around the kitchen sink.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was alright. Could have been better if it didn‚Äôt smell like cigarettes or find hair in the bathtub. The staff was nice though. The receptionist greeted us and made us felt welcomed. She was cool, but I wouldn‚Äôt stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: There‚Äôs room to improve service quality.
Summary: My expectations of service were a lot higher. We‚Äôve become frequent Hilton travelers. I was expecting a hot breakfast and an open pool. We got neither. I was expecting to relax by the pool with the kids before going to Disneyland the next day. It was a huge disappointment that the pool remained closed! We‚Äôve been traveling to Hilton properties in California throughout the pandemic. None has closed pools.   The breakfast was a huge disappointment. It‚Äôs been the worst complimentary breakfast I‚Äôve had. Again cogent Hilton properties have offered excellent breakfast choices during the pandemic. I had to spend an extra $40 per day on buying a proper breakfast from Starbucks.   The reasons I am not giving a 0 rating:  The pool opened the second day.  The pool area was beautiful. The
Manager Response: none

Summary: Needed to give a shout out to Chrisann L. and Josue V. at the front desk for going above and beyond for my girlfriend and I on our mini staycation! 10/10 would recommend and will be back because of them!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrible service. Toilet couldn‚Äôt flush. Shower head wouldn‚Äôt work. Guest services could care less
Summary: Terrible service broken shower head toilet couldn‚Äôt flush. Room smelled. Super noisy. And front desk could care less. Don‚Äôt waste your money and stay here go next-door to the embassy suites in Anaheim they are much better service for the money
Manager Response: none

Summary: We spent our mini honeymoon in Anaheim for the Disney Parks. Our stay at the Hampton Inn was so delightful and memorable! I must mention Ivan & Breanna, staff members, from whom we received top notch service. This review is way over due but the pandemic distracted us.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I usually have good experiences with Hilton brands but not so great here. First room had a tub full of water from dripping faucet, hair all over vanity pull out shelf and a broken lanai gate that wouldn't close. Moved to an upper floor suite that was nicer but still not as clean as it should be and views from back of hotel aren't great. The refrigerator only opened a few inches because of baseboard...poor design. I realize I was in a resort area with well used rooms but for the prices we pay maintaining and keeping the facilities clean is not an option to me. Jesus at the front desk tried to accommodate us but these things were not his fault. He said he comped our parking fee but actually did not because it was part of the room rate we were charged. The hotel is a short drive to
Manager Response: Hello Rcjjest,  I apologize that your experience was less than satisfactory. The issues your experienced in your rooms are unacceptable and I am personally working with the respective departments to have those issues corrected. I am glad that Jesus did his best to assist, but we fell short of your expectations, and for that we do apologize. We look forward to another opportunity to give you a much more satisfactory stay in the near future.

Summary: If you like to be rudely awoken by deliveries at 5am, have the pool make you break out in hives due to chemicals not correct, and have staff that are rude, then this is the hotel for you. For a good experience, go elsewhere! This hotel was the worst!
Manager Response: Hello Kobysgirl,  I apologize that your experience was less than satisfactory. As a team, we have discussed your concerns and will do our best to ensure they  do not occur again. We would love the opportunity ti make this right for you and your family. Should you find yourself in the area again soon, feel free to reach out to the hotel directly so we can provide you with a much more positive stay.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim/ Garden Grove
Summary: I chose this Hotel because i have stayed in this chain of hotel and have always had a pleasant stay. I chose to stay here for a family trip to Disneyland. I had read in the reviews, back in Nov that one of the elevators did not work. Surprisingly 3 months later, the elevator was still not fixed. This is big deal when their are six floors and the hotel is full and their are only 2 elevators. The wait for the one elevator was not so pleasant. The room was very clean, the furniture had some stains, but in overall the room was clean. Their was a connecting door, and we could hear everything that the next room was talking‚Äî and one day, they were arguing at 6am!!! The hallway had a weird smell of nail polish, very unpleasant, when i called the front desk‚Äî they stated that someone else
Manager Response: Hello Compass90777,  I am so sorry to hear about your negative experience with us. It is very upsetting to hear about the issues you had during your stay and I will personally follow up on the concerns with the unwanted guests at breakfast. We do not tolerate that and the team has been advised to politely ask them to leave and to contact the Garden Grove police if necessary. We are working on the parking concern and this has been fixed in the past and keeps reverting back to the old rate on the honors app only. Our team missed the mark on several issues, which is not acceptable. Please accept my apologies and feel free to contact me directly if you would like to give us another chance to make this right for you.

Summary: Don‚Äôt go if the elevator has not been repaired. Very long wait times and crowded.  Lots of noise from both guests and repair men all times of day and night.  This was a very disappointing experience and not typical of Hampton inn.
Manager Response: Hello 123nturner,  I agree this is not typical of Hampton and it is not typical of our hotel either. We apologize that our elevator modernization had such an impact on your stay with us. We are very eager to complete this update in the upcoming weeks and would love for the opportunity to make it up to you after the updates are completed. Please reach out to me directly if you plan to be in the area again soon.

Summary: Hotel price is fair with good breakfast and some options. Staff was friendly. The hall way light little dark. Good location to walk to any restaurant or to the convention center. The room cleaning is okay and make sure change the bed cover.
Manager Response: Hello, rxh0u,  Thank you for your 5 star review! I am so pleased that our location was so well suited for your needs. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Great stay overall excellent staff very polite and helpful one elevator did not work and refrigerator did not work. Replaced fridge very quickly staff was very attrentative and responsive. Would recommend hotel  For family visiting
Manager Response: Hello MichaelM6652,  I am pleased to hear that your stay was excellent and that our staff was attentive to the concerns that you brought to our attention. Should you find yourself in the area again soon, we would love the chance to host you for a flawless experience next time. Come back again soon!

Summary: After searching for a hotel that I could get 3 rooms for our 5 night family Disneyland holiday this worked out to be perfect for what we needed! The hotel was about 25-30 minute walking distance to the park but the shuttle option (cost was $18/person for 3 days - unlimited use per day) saved our feet and was a great inexpensive way to get to & from the park. The complimentary breakfast had an amazing variety with something for everyone including a different hot egg & meat dish every day (this saved us a lot of money & was better than most complimentary breakfasts). We had made some requests for our rooms & the hotel staff did a great job of making sure our rooms were together & that our suite faced the park (we were able to watch the fireworks from the balcony on Sunday night
Manager Response: Hello daneanw,  Thanks for the wonderful and thorough review. of our hotel. It was a pleasure to take care of you and ensure your stay was flawless from start to finish. We look forward to serving you again in the near future!

Summary: We will definitely stay here again. The service was excellent, room was clean & comfy, plus a delicious full breakfast. It's close to Disneyland and easy walking distance to several restaurants. A great value for the price.
Manager Response: Hello Melissa S,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are thrilled to have provided you with a home away from home and cannot wait for the chance to serve you again soon!

Summary: As a Hilton Team Member, I am loyal to Hilton branded hotels. This one does an exceptional job anticipating the needs of their guests and they are great at seeking out solutions if there are questions. The bed was comfortable, the room was very clean and everything was in working order. Thank you for a great stay!
Manager Response: Hello melanielynnmiller75,  We are always so excited to welcome fellow team members and give them a magical experience. It is so pleasing to hear that our staff made such a positive impact on your stay and we cannot wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: A few problems, but all resolved to our satisfaction.
Summary: A/C in our room was loud and leaked, causing staining and a mildew smell. Staff moved us promptly. A few other smaller problems were resolved by the front desk staff. Housekeeping crew threw away my wife‚Äôs expensive bath soap, even though it was in its own container. Staff comp‚Äôed our parking for the trouble.  Nice location of this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Compass55711748232,  I am so sorry to hear that you has a maintenance issue in your room. Unforeseen things may happen, however I am pleased to hear that our team was able to take care if the issue right away. Your experience is of the upmost importance to us and we would love another opportunity to give you a flawless stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We had a great stay in this hotel, the staff was incredibly friendly and the location was perfect for our trip to Disneyland. I would not only recommend this location to other travelers, but we will definitely be back ourselves.
Manager Response: Hello Trip11724544872,  Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! We love making all of our guests Hampton loyal and we cannot wait to welcome you and your family back for another fun filled trip!

Summary Heading: Great choice for business or pleasure
Summary: Wonderful accommodations in a great location.  Staff were friendly and welcoming.  Hotel was clean. Breakfast was very good, with several options.  I would definitely stay at this hotel again for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Hello joannekemmer,  We love to hear that about our business traveler experiences and any way we can make them feel comfortable with the hustle and bustle of the Anaheim area. We look forward to welcoming back again soon!

Summary: The location is about 1.5 miles from Disneyland.  An Uber cost about $6 each way, which is cheaper than taking the hotel shuttle.  We had a suite, which was nice to have with kids. If we go back to Disneland we'll probalby stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Alicia K,  We appreciate you taking time to review our property and provide such great feedback regarding the shuttle and our suite accommodations. We would love a chance to WOW you again during your next visit to the area. Come back again soon!

Summary: I experienced nice, roomy rooms, a friendly and helpful staff, and a great breakfast bar that‚Äôs included.  Good value for the area.  Only surprise was the $18 per night parking fee. But the parking lot was nice and well lit.
Manager Response: Hello diveHawaii,  Thank you for your great 5 star review! I love to hear how the team was so friendly and took care of your during your stay. We hope you will choose Hampton for your future travel needs to the Anaheim area!

Summary: I went on a weekend getaway to Disneyland with my boyfriend and two friends. Kim at the front desk was so friendly and welcoming! She answered all of our questions and was very kind! Kim started off our trip on a great note! I‚Äôm so thankful we go to met her! I highly recommend this hotel to everyone! We felt so welcomed! We definitely will come back again! Thanks again, Kim! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review geeselle!   I am so happy to see that out front desk rockstar Kim was so accommodating and friendly. Her Distinguished Hospitality is what we strive for in all of our team members! We can't wait to serve you and your friends again soon!

Summary: Great hotel, awesome pool, staff was always friendly and the free hot breakfast buffet every morning did not disappoint with 1 picky eater, 1 garburator and 1 with celiac disease; all 3 kids full every morning before hitting the park.  I have sent some of my travel clients to this hotel as well and they also reported back a great option all around.  The shuttle passes are easy to purchase at the desk and the shuttle is there every 30 mins like clockwork.  I have stayed right across the street from Disney Main gates 3 previous trips and although convenient, this budget friendly hotel with the free daily breakfast is an amazing option.  Shuttle ride is fast, direct to Disney; no stops and a welcome sit down after being on the park walking all day.  The only thing I could possibly
Manager Response: Hello wanderlustmommabear,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a detailed review of our hotel. We are glad to hear that we were able to please all members of your family. Hampton caters to all our guests travel needs! We love your feedback and appreciate your recommendation to your clients, and we hope for the opportunity to serve you again soon!

Summary: Had an excellent stay here, the hotel was very close to Disney.  Travelling with a 15 year old and a 9 year old we booked a suite which was really good, the sofa converted into a full size bed which my 15 year old slept in and had his own room and my 8 year old had one of the Queen beds.  Very useful having the kitchenette especially the fridge  The breakfast was very good with plenty of food every day, had a good breakfast before hitting the theme parks. With having the suite we also had more room and a balcony where we could see the Disney Fireworks from.  Would stay here again and recommend to families.
Manager Response: Hello Kristie L,  Thank you for your amazing 5 star review! I am thrilled to hear that your stay was such a success and that our suite suited your needs so well. We would be honored to have you and your family stay with us again for all your future travels to the Anaheim area. Come back again soon!
