Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  It had clearly been recently renovated.  The room was very clean and spacious, with a separate living and kitchen area from the bedroom.  Breakfast was quite good with a variety of options.  The service was great, the staff were very friendly and attentive.  We had a noisy airconditioning unit and within 20 mins it had been replaced at 9pm at night, which was totally unexpected.  It was conveniently located about 25 mins walk to Disneyland.  We would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello John_paul_128,  Thank you for you great 5 star review! I am so happy that our staff were able to resolve your air conditioning issues in such a timely manner and that your enjoyed our breakfast buffet and spacious rooms. We appreciate you recommending our property to others and hope to welcome you and your friends back again soon!

Summary: More like a 21/2.... the Room was dirty with lipstick and lipstick container on chairs and a bottle cap next to the chair. The sheets were either stained or dirty and were not changed after I requested them and had to request a second time. I was never informed that a late check out was on a limited first come first serve basis. So too bad for me and my family, we had to wait in lobby for 3 hours for family to come pick us up.
Manager Response: Hello Teresa P,  I apologize for your less than satisfactory stay. This is unlike us and I have personally spoken to the team members regarding your unacceptable stay. From your check in until your check out, we continually missed the mark on providing the Distinguished Hospitality that we are known for. I hope you may allow us another opportunity to make this up to you in the near future. Please feel free to reach out to me directly, should you find yourself in the area again, and I will personally make sure your experience is up to standard.

Summary: Despite it being a busy weekend, the hotel stay was reasonably quiet. It is located in a good area although parking was challenging due to the restaurant that shares the same parking lot. The hotel staff was friendly, it was very clean, and the breakfast was always very good! Lots of variety and the staff kept it stocked and cleaned. The value was decent and I was overall pleased with this stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Inspire31768875433,  Thanks for the amazing 5 star review! I am so glad that your enjoyed your stay, specifically the breakfast and friendly staff. We cannot wait for another chance to serve you again soon!

Summary: Started our New Year staying at this hotel.Free breakfast doesn't have a lot of options unlike where when we stayed in Hampton Inn and Suites in Texas disappointing but still satisfied, at least they have free breakfast.We love relaxing at their spa .Contented while working out in their gym.Husband and I are surprised because their room doesn't have a full living room in their rooms unlike at Embassy Suites but satisfied with the housekeeping service named Maria Urguello. Our room was cleaned well .We thought that their elevators are broken but you have to swipe your room key to use the elevators and that is clever.You will feel that you are safe that no outsider can use and go up in the elevators and sneak in the rooms.Over all,we are thankful that we are safe and we enjoyed
Manager Response: Hello Yogibelle,  Thank you for your detailed review, however it sounds you are referring our our sister property the Hampton Inn in Anaheim. Either way we are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you at our location next time!

Summary: This hotel did not meet my expectations. It was not kept up at all. Elevator was broken. Rooms were not cleaned properly. Breakfast was served but food was not replenished. Homeless people were sneaking in through a rear open door to partake of the breakfast.  Joined Hilton Honors to get free Wi-Fi. It did not work because the misspelled my name. I was trapped at the hotel because they share a parking lot with a restaurant and the food delivery truck came by and parked right behind me.
Manager Response: Hello charlapierson,  I apologize for your less than satisfactory experience during your stay. We appreciate your feedback and I will personally work with our departments to ensure these areas are corrected. We never want our guests to have a negative experience and we would love the chance to make this up to you, should you find yourself in the area again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites
Summary: Great location, walking distance to many restaurants and shopping . Target is 5 mins walking distance. Jesus at the Front Desk was awesome! He assisted us for the most part and was knowledgeable. Keep up the good work Jesus!
Manager Response: Hello Dreamer49851561500,  Thank you for your recent review of our property. I am thrilled to hear how well Jesus took care of you during your stay. We will be sure to give him a big shout out. Come back again soon!

Summary: This place was a disaster!  Poor staff, bathroom vents in rooms were disgusting.  Microwave in room kitchen had loose bolts, fridge door was so hard to open due to the poor measuring of some poor soul when building the kitchen cabinets.  Breakfast was okay, nothing spectacular except they kept running out of forks!
Manager Response: Hello jb202099,  I apologize for your subpar experience with us during your Christmas celebration. Our staff typically receives very positive comments, so this is disappointing to hear. Please do not hesitate to contact the hotel directly with more details so we can ensure this does not happen again. Again, we apologize for your experience and we hope for the chance to make it up to you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great, clean, friendly and spacious hotel.
Summary: Enjoyed our stay, family friendly, rooms are spacious and staff is friendly.  Breakfast was stocked quickly, it was fresh, warm and tasty. My family enjoyed the stay and the hotel is walking distance to Disney's toy story parking where a shuttle will take you to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello manceralm2,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a great review! Our team was delighted to serve you during your stay with us and we are so glad to hear that our hotel was such a great fit for your needs. We will see you again next time!

Summary: A fantastic hotel, all the staff was great and helpful. We arrived earlier than our check in time and they were kind enough to store our luggage while we visited Disneyland. Breakfast included and delicious. Our daughter enjoyed time in the pool the water temperature was just perfect. If you‚Äôre looking for a affordable hotel with good attention is the best option! We will Definitely come back! 10/10!
Manager Response: Hello carlos13bendana,  Thanks for an amazing 5 star review! I am so pleased to hear the staff took such great care of you upon your arrival to the hotel. We can'y wait to welcome you back again next time!

Summary: Staff was helpful, we were able to check in before the check in time. The staff were able to answer our concerns and questions during our stay. We didn't have any issue during our stay. The biggest hit was the complimentary breakfast!
Manager Response: Hello Roam188864,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We love how much you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast buffet and attentive staff members. We would love the chance to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My family and I were very happy with our stay. Most important for me is always comfort and cleanliness, and this hotel hit the mark. Bathroom was nice and spacious too, which is a plus. Breakfast was great- kids loved making waffles. Banana waffles were delish!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love the suite rooms! We got two of them next to eachother. The view from the balcony was perfect! Breakfast was yummy! You won't regret staying here! Very close to Disneyland also. My family of 15 loved this hotel and decided to be a part of the Honors reward.
Manager Response: Hello Maivangthao,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an amazing review! I am so happy to hear that we took care of you and your family of 15 during your travels to the Anaheim area! I know how stressful planning can be for those special moments with the family, so I love that we made this extra special for you. We hope to welcome you back again next time you are in the area!

Summary: Breakfast is top notch Staff always are helpful Shuttles to anywhere Great bang for your buck We enjoyed out stay for the second year in a row. Room is a good size and beds are comfy. We appreciate the attention to detail this hotel has.
Manager Response: Hello apriltracy,  Thank you for your 5 star review! I love how amazing your stay was! It is our goal to please each and every one of our guests and we hope to have made you a Hampton lover for life. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel If you are going to Disney
Summary: Great staff, clean room, great breakfasts. Consider this hotel on your next trip to Disney. They have a bus that leave every half hour to Disney. Only 15 minutes drive from the park. You won‚Äôt go wrong booking this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello dukeobaob,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to serving you again soon!

Summary: The hotel staff was extremely friendly and one gentleman went above and beyond with a surprise for my daughters bday. We were able to check in early without any issues and even our requests for a high room with fireworks view was accommodated! It was a perfect trip.
Manager Response: Hello xstinkerbellex,  Thank you for an amazing review. I love to hear how our team went above any beyond to take care of your daughter for her birthday. We understand how special those moments are. Come back again soon!

Summary: My bed had hair in it when I got to my room.  a lot of hair - nasty . They had a lot of construction going on which caused the one elevator wait time to be long. I would not stay there again. The bathroom door was a sliding door so it didn‚Äôt close all the way - no privacy in the bathroom.
Manager Response: Hello mackd278,  I apologize for the subpar experience you encountered during your stay with us. The room concerns arr unacceptable and not up to Hampton standards. Thank you for your feedback on our elevator modernization. We are working to improve their overall functionality in order to provide a better experience you our guests. We are slated to finish in the next couple of months with both elevators and we would love to welcome you back then for a better experience. In addition, our suites do have standard doors, so we recommend booking one of those if you do not prefer to have a barn door feature.

Summary: The cleanliness of the facility, the friendliness and commitment of staff to customer service made for a positive experience.  The email communications in advance of the stay and on return home personalized the interaction with the motel staff having a name and contact information to communicate with especially seeking information prior to the trip about location, transportation options, etc.
Manager Response: Hello GDstevenw,  Thank you for your amazing 5 star review! I am so pleased to see that the staff made an incredible impact on your stay. We hope to have made you a forever guest and we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: My family and I enjoyed this hotel. The price was a bargain,  the staff was super friendly and helpful and the location was really good. The breakfast was good. The pool it said heated but I am not sure how heated.  I know when we got there on the 1st day it was steaming and when my daughter went swimming the day we were leaving, I touched the water and it was cold but that didn't stop her, lol.
Manager Response: Hello Global60464462337,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a great review! It was our pleasure serving you and your family during this visit and we look forward to welcoming you back again next time!

Summary: I always choose to stay at a Hilton property. Their awards system is one of the best. Many people over look the complimentary breakfast that can save a family a lot. Their location is walking distance to the happiest place on earth as well.
Manager Response: Hello calairo15,  Thanks for your love for Hilton, we appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton family. We hope our property was a great fit for your needs and we can't wait to serve you again soon!

Summary: Used AAA discount, very good quality for what I paid, usually stay at Embassy Suites but my hubby and kids and I liked the room and suite much better here and also the breakfast was a lot better here. Pool was heated. Close to Disney, shuttle was always on time. My daughter used the business to room to complete her homework on their computers with no problem.  I would definitely recommend this place!
Manager Response: Hello sunnypareja,  Thank for your recent review. We are pleased to hear that our suites suited your needs so well and that our breakfast and business center amenities were to your liking. We look forward to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This is an older building that has been updated.  The staff is friendly, and the decor is tasteful.  Soundproofing is somewhat lacking, as noises from the parking lot and swimming pool can easily be heard in the guest room.  This hotel is within 15-min walk of the Anaheim Convention Center.  It's more appropriate for families with kids, not for business travelers.
Manager Response: Hello jcchen732019,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate the feedback regarding the noise you experience during your stay. It is very rare that we have issues with noise, however we do have quieter areas of the hotel that face away from the pool area that may suit your needs better. Should you find yourself in the area again soon, please feel free to let the front desk know about your concern and they will reserve a quieter area for you. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We booked this hotel for our Disneyland trip. The price was great, the room was perfect! My three children had a blast with the bunk bed and we could all sleep comfortably. The hotel was very clean and the staff was very friendly, especially Ms. Taylor. If you are not afraid of a 1-1/4 mile walk, you can walk to Disney and back, save some parking money and buy more stuff at Disney.  My 7 year old walked back to the hotel without complaining after a long day at Disney. Great find! Will stay again for sure!
Manager Response: Hello RapiroSan,  Thank you for your amazing 5 star review! I am pleased to see that our accommodations suited the needs of your family so well. We cannot wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We arrived on a Tuesday, and the hotel seemed clean and presentable. They didnt alert us when we booked that the elevators would not be in service some of the time, and the rest of the time, only ONE elevator was operating. It was AWFUL. People were waiting upwards of 20 minutes to use the elevator. The breakfast area was constantly dirty and the showers hardly drained. Beds weren't very comfortable and the sofa bed was so squeaky and rock hard. Extremely tiny "gift shop" with some postcards and TV dinners. Staff didn't seem like they knew what they were doing. Had to ask for a blanket three times before they finally delivered one. All in all, not the best experience. You can find much better accommodations and value for your money elsewhere. Shuttle was sort of handy to and
Manager Response: Hello NDee7,  I apologize for your experience at our property. We pride ourselves on the value we give our guests with our complimentary breakfast and competitive pricing based on our location to the Disneyland parks. The elevators are out of our control as we are working to modernize them to create a more efficient experience for our guests. This does result in one elevator being down for the updates to take place. I have addressed all of your concerns with the staff to provide the best service and experience possible, and I apologize that you did not get that same experience. Should you find yourself in the area again soon, please allow us another opportunity to give you the experience that you deserve.

Summary: I was told I did not have reservations after calling hotel because I did not receive confirmation email, was told to make another reservation and then double charged. I called and left message 2 days ago and have not received call back.
Manager Response: Hello KPritchard,  We apologize for your experience with the billing on your reservation. A member of the staff will reach out to you shortly to get this resolved right away.

Summary: Our stay at this hotel was excellent! I'm very picky & hard to impress about the cleanliness of the room (no dust bunnies, no sticky stuff anyplace, yard & pool clean) this place exceeded my expectations!  All of the staff was very friendly & helpful, to the point  they would stop what they were doing to give "high 5" to my 2 yr grandson. My compliments to the general manager for creating a excellent team of hardworking individuals. We were a large group there for 3 days & each night when we got back it was spotless clean! I don't give reviews but this team deserves to have one. Thank you!
Manager Response: Hello familyCAZ,  We very much appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. I am glad that our housekeeping team impressed you and that we were able to exceed your expectations. I will be sure to give a shout out to all the associates for their efforts! We look forward to serving you again soon.

Summary: This place is outstanding. Too bad I just stayed here for 1 night but this was the best stay for me in LA. This place is located near the shopping places, really close to Disney but a little further from Universal. The staff is too friendly and the hotel looks brand new. I wanted to share the name of the staff members but I could'nt get them from the supervisor.
Manager Response: Hello Aseem K,  Thank you for your amazing review! I am so glad that our staff took such great care of you during your staff. I will be sure to recognize their efforts personally. Come back again soon!

Summary: Hotel stay at this property was awesome.  It exceeded our expectations.  Property is well maintained.  Staff was kind and helpful.  We will return to this property.  Breakfast variety was awesome.  Breakfast foods were constantly being replenished.
Manager Response: HI edward821,  Thank you so much for your great 5 star review! We appreciate your kind comments and look forward to serving you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, shuttles to Disneyland every 30minutes
Summary: Rooms clean and spacious.  Staff very friendly.  Breakfast is tasty.   Con: Some staff only spoke Spanish.  I was trying to ask if the eggs for breakfast had milk in them and she didn't understand and kept offering to serve me some eggs.  Annoyance: Only 1 working elevator servicing entire hotel is really the only downside.  Hopefully fixed soon...We heard it has been down for almost a year!
Manager Response: Hello Happiness448567,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for your experience during breakfast. We only have one Spanish only speaking associate who is a rockstar for the department, however we will ensure in future instances, that she seeks out any of the other breakfast attendants that are on duty at any given time to assist. We are currently upgrading our elevators which is timely process, but we are slated to finish in the next couple of months. We hope to welcome you back after the upgrades are completed.

Summary: Great staff very attentive and prompt breakfast was good and area was clean. Parking was available but was costly. One of the elevators was out of order which created backup of guests. Good Ice-cream place next door and fast food across the street.
Manager Response: Hello leeml813Fl,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. I am pleased to hear the positive impact that our hotel had on your stay. We are currently upgrading our elevators in order to improve our guest experience, however we realize the impact this has on your stay during this process. We hope for the chance to provide you with a 5 star experience during your next stay with us!

Summary: Loved this hotel ! The only problem we had is that one of the two elevators was not working. This made for long waits to get up to room. Bed was very comfortable, room was clean, air conditioner worked well.
Manager Response: Hello Sue H,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your kind comments and recognize the delays that the elevator upgrade causes. We are working diligently to push the elevator modernization along as quickly as possible, so our guests can enjoy the upgrades! We hope to welcome you back after the elevator upgrades are completed so we can provide a flawless stay for you and your family. Come back again soon!

Summary: Room was fairly clean, but grossly under equiped.  Please, please, please make some small changes!  Our suite was rated for up to 6 people.  However, the kitchen compliment was not even close to acceptable.  1 spatula as the only cooking utensil.  Couple forks and butter  knives.  1 large knife that was the absolute worst/cheapest knife I have ever used.   Knife couldn't even cut an apple.  No cutting board.  Very disappointing.  We also couldn't look past the simple lack of towel hooks (bathroom and kitchen).  How can you expect guests to reuse towels when there is only 1 hook next to shower.  Suites with kitchens need a larger garbage can.  The pathetic excuse for the can was frustrating at best.  I recommend you take some of your executive management and their families for
Manager Response: Hi Sfd1926,  Thank you for your feedback regarding our suites. All of the items listed other than the cutting board are standard for our suites and must have been removed prior to your check in. We apologize that your items were not replenished prior to your stay, however we will ensure all of them are replaced again. Hampton just launched a new breakfast that has won over several of our regular guests, however we apologize that you did not enjoy the new items served during your stay. We hope for another chance to service you again in the future under better circumstances.

Summary: We loved this Hampton in and will stay again.  Breakfast was good, the housekeeping staff was fabulous.  They would set up our son's stuffed animals in various fun "scenes" everyday.  They rooms were large and our family of 4 was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello lauren s,  I am so pleased to hear that our housekeeping staff personalized your stay for your son. We live for these moments and love to make our guest's feel right at home. Please come back again soon for another great stay!

Summary: I went here to go to Disneyland. The shuttle was convenient. Th breakfast was appreciated to save money on eating breakfast in LA. It was a good experience over all. The staff is very friendly and helpful
Manager Response: Hello haleymeyer43,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased the the breakfast and shuttle accommodated your needs so well and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We planned a last minute trip to Disneyland and found this hotel to have a great rate. I called ahead to let them know we would be arriving very late and the front desk clerk was very helpful.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello mchomas1,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Come back again soon!

Summary: We had a lovely suite with a balcony that faced the fireworks. The room was pristine with two televisions to make everyone happy. The kitchen was adequately stocked (large pan, pot, etc). so that we could easily prepare a hot meal for four people.  Yummy chocolate chip cookies in the evening and scrambled eggs, bacon and specialty juices in the morning made this the best food we have had at a Hampton Inn.  There were friendly, helpful staff and clean facilities at every turn.  Shuttle was easy and we were able to leave our car for the day even after we had checked out.  Best stay in recent history.  They had one elevator under construction, but it was a minor  issue for our Sunday night stay.
Manager Response: Hello Hanmath,  An amazing experience is what we strive for, so we are glad to have provided that to you and your family. We are pleased to hear how great our suite and shuttle service worked for you and we hope you choose Hampton Inn Garden Grove for all your future visits to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Great Room Great Service And Safe Parking
Summary: On a trip to Disneyland 3 weeks ago 9-27-19 I Stayed at this Hampton Inn on Harbor Blvd for the First and it won‚Äôt Be the last .. The suite was facing Disneyland 2 large rooms one with Beds and Bathroom the other with a Couch /Bed kitchen with table ,stove , 2  refrigerators , cooking utensils and Dishwasher ... All Taxes fees and parking came to $151.00 a night . Not bad when a motel 6 in the same area is over a $100.oo a night
Manager Response: Hello garygS3881BG,  Thank you for your wonderful review of our suite accommodations. They are our most requested room type are are great for a family just like yours. We appreciate you taking the time to review us and look forward to your next stay!

Summary: My family and I had a superb experience. Thank you to your kind staff and warm welcome everytime you saw us. Great amenities and a wonderful housekeeping staff, thank you. Your complimentary breakfast was a lifesaver also. Again thank you to all your awesome staff, so grateful
Manager Response: Hello joselinem856,  I am thrilled to hear that you and your family had such a great stay with us! Our team lives for moments like yours and we hope to serve you again during your next travels to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Military Rate and a Digital Key
Summary: We stayed last night at the Hampton Inn in Garden Grove for a weekend of Disneyland excitement.   This Hampton Inn is 7 stories tall with an extremely large breakfast area.  This Hampton sell‚Äôs Disneyland tickets. I stayed in room 700 the furtherest from the elevator. I slept soundly and never heard a peep.  According to my Fit Bit I walked 12 miles in the park, so this could have contributed to my coma-like sleep.  This hotel was extremely clean. Please note that to park on the premises it is $20.00/day. If you park make sure to get the parking pass and display it prominently.   Please note this parking lot is shared between the Hampton Inn, an Embassy Suites ( which I don‚Äôt recommend) and one other property.   Ensure you sign up for Hilton Honors, that is Hilton‚Äôs frequent
Manager Response: Hello Tofu-in-the-Desert,  Thank you so much for your detailed review of our property! We appreciate your comments and feedback and we look forward to another stay with us soon.

Summary: Be advised the shuttle service to a Disneyland is very problematic.  Do not stay at this hotel if you are expecting efficient shuttle service.  Otherwise, the hotel is ok.  However, given the primary reason for staying here is proximity to Disneyland, they need to address the transportation issue.
Manager Response: Hello oldcalifornia,  We apologize for the issues you experienced  with the shuttle service. We work closely with the shuttle company to ensure all issues are resolved with the upmost customer service. Please advise us of the specific concern and we will be sure to address them with PCA Management until the matter is resolved.

Summary Heading: Family friendly, safe location near Disney
Summary: Roomy family suite with balcony, where We got to see fireworks (fri-sun) shuttle to and from for small fee, multi day passes can be bought. Expanded breakfast selection. Comfy Hilton beds and linens. Pool (didn‚Äôt have time to use it). Kitchenette with stove, fridge, cooking Utensils and set ups, although missing parts to sets due to careless previous guests. Walking distance to restaurants, Target, drugstores, and Disney if you Want to get your steps in! Saw mobile scooters to rent from front desk. Staff was friendly and helpful. Stayed 6th floor, and night time street noise was minimal, did hear street noise on departure morning, but probably because we slept in til 0830. Parking is onsite and minimal charge. Taking the hotel shuttle daily to Disney was the same price as
Manager Response: Hello cnthoov333,  I a so pleased that our spacious suites suited your family's needs so well. The fireworks are an added plus that always seem to delight. Our location is great for dining, shopping and of course visiting the Mouse. We appreciate your detailed review of our property and look forward to another chance to serve you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Stayed twice, doubt there will be a third
Summary: We stayed at the Hampton 2 times because we were very happy the first time. This time there were 9 of us and everyone was wondering what we thought was so great the first time. The people are still all very nice that work there but it seems the hotel has gone down hill. The beds were so uncomfortable I had a hard time moving the next day my back was so sore.  Also, there has to be something done about the the chairs in the suites, the scrape the floors and make a terrible noise for the people below. It's vey hard telling small kids they are not allowed to move the chairs.
Manager Response: Hello Denise H,  Thank you so much for your detailed feedback regarding our beds and dining room chairs. I have spoken with my maintenance team to ensure the feet on the chairs are replaced often. It results in a large reduction in noise from the scraping of the chairs. We apologize for your back being sore. We just completed a renovation so all the mattresses have been replaced. Next time, we would be happy to switch one of them out to see if that helps your back pain at all. We hope for another chance to make your stay better next time.

Summary: Upon arrival service was very good as was the communication. Roo. Was very clean and comfortable. The bed was squeaky but comfortable. Breakfast was served promptly at 6:00 the coffee at 5:30 was old, so wait till 6:00 or just before if you decide to go down early or grab a cup after your workout.  As for the shuttle service to Disneyland , you do have to pay but it is in time and very convenient. I would definitely stay again. Great service.
Manager Response: Hello Laraye S  Thank you for your detailed review of our property. We appreciate the kind comments regarding the staff and appreciate the great feedback about our coffee quality. We love our coffee to be a fresh as possible at all times, so I will personally make sure the coffee is changed our more frequently. We look forward to your next stay to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Very happy with the hotel overall. Close to restaurants, Target, and of course Disneyland. Clean and comfortable. Bedroom didn‚Äôt have black out curtains but not a problem for us. Breakfast was good, several options.
Manager Response: Hello koalar2019,  I am pleased to see that our location and accommodations suited your needs. We love making our guests' visits as seamless as possible, so you can enjoy your vacation. We hope you choose Hampton Garden Grove for your future travel needs to the area!

Summary: The hotel was really clean and staff were very friendly. The only negative thing about my stay was that one of the elevators was broken. This causes delays on going up or down with the entire hotel trying to use the 1 working elevator. Otherwise,  great experience.
Manager Response: Hello Kmgill0508,  Thank you for your review of our property. I am pleased to hear how well the staff took care of you during your stay. We are currently in the process of undergoing a full modernization of our elevators, which results in one elevator being down for improvements. We are excited for the end results and overall improvement and we appreciate all of our guests' patience during this process. Hopefully next time you are in the area you can enjoy the new and improved elevators.

Summary: A good Hampton inn hotel with a large sitting area for breakfast to serve guests. Usually hotels in these tourist areas do not have enough sitting area.   A good Hampton, no real issues. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Idwheels,  Thank you for your review. We were happy to serve your during your stay to the Anaheim area and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Loved our suite at Hamptons Inn and Suites.
Summary: We absolutely loved having the convenience of the full kitchen and a bedroom. Our patio overlooked the pool, we enjoyed sitting out there and seeing what was happening. Shuttle service was conveniently and took us right to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi dawn21a,  I am so pleased to hear about how well our suites worked out for you. They are a hot commodity here in Anaheim, so  we are glad that you were able to enjoy the suite during your stay. Come back again soon for another adventure!

Summary: We took three rooms for a family visit to Disneyland, which is just up the street but beyond walking distance.  Rooms were comfortable and clean, staff was friendly and helpful, breakfast area was large enough to handle everyone comfortably.
Manager Response: Hello Richard J,  Thank you for your review of our property. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: NOT MUCH OF A FREE BREAKFAST
Summary: Went to breakfast at 9:20 and found they were out of eggs, potatoes and low on remaining items.  Breakfast hours should end at 10 AM, but this place was slammed by families going to Disneyland.  You would think they would be used to handling the Disney crowds by now and would have lots of food available.  Not so, at least on this day.
Manager Response: Hello Jim J,  I apologize for your less than satisfactory breakfast experience. I assure you this has been taken care of and will remain an isolated incident. We take breakfast seriously here at Hampton considering it is the most important meal of the day! Thank you for you feedback and we hope for another opportunity to show you what Hampton is truly about.

Summary: From the comfort of the bed after each long day at Disneyland, the convenience of the shuttle, to the fantastic breakfast choices and the great staff, we'll definitely stay here again when we return! I was worried about staying 'off property' for a Disney trip and didn't need to. The only ding I could give would be that one of the two guest elevators was down for renovation and that made the waits sometimes long. But it also helped us choose the stairs when we could, and we can definitely use that with our desk jobs.
Manager Response: Hello DayCream630864,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are so excited to hear how much you loved our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back with 2 working elevators again soon!

Summary: Stayed here because the reviews were about the same as others in the area. Have stayed at several Hamptons as well as other Hilton hotels and this was the worst. I wish we would have booked at any other hotel. The one elevator that worked was slower then anything. The floors when you stepped off the elevator had a horrible moldy damp smell. Rooms were dingy with gross old carpets. One day they didn‚Äôt make up the room, the next morning we had no water. When we called they said everyone was told. Maybe if they would have cleaned the room the day before we might have gotten notice???? Our booking was AARP and was supposed to be eligible for a late check out. When asked the night before they said I would need to call the next morning at 7 to find out. So much for sleeping in. The
Manager Response: Hello Alextorismom,  I apologize for your experience with us. Please be assured that we take your feedback serious and I have personally spoken with each department regarding their respective shortcomings. Unfortunately, the maintenance issues you experienced were uncontrollable. We are currently working to modernize the hotel's elevators, so during that time we will be down to one elevator. In addition, the hotel is on the tail end of upgrading the building's boilers, hence the hot water shut down. Again, I apologize for your experience and I hope for the opportunity to show you what Hampton is truly all about. If you happen to stay in the area again, please reach out to the hotel directly and we will be sure to make it up to you and your family.

Summary Heading: Great room! Comfy bed and that SHOWER was AMAZING!
Summary: Ease of check-in and check-out was wonderful. Hit a slight bump in the road with the shuttle accommodation. One elevator during their "revamp" process for the entire hotel was inconvenient. Overall, great stay, great room, and proximity to Disneyland, you can't complain!
Manager Response: Hello 967evelynd,  Thank you for your detailed review about our property. Despite the bumps in your overall experience, we are pleased to see that your stay was so great. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: After a tiring day at Disneyland, this place is where you want to stay to rejuvenate. The rooms are spacious and clean. Although they have a coffee machine in the room, we still went downstairs to their complimentary breakfast. Although the elevator could have worked faster, which is why we took the stars, the breakfast was outstanding.
Manager Response: Hello richardalfaro428,  Thank you for your 5 star review of our property. We are happy to have served you during your stay and we look forward to your next stay with us soon!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Hampton. Breakfast selection was amazing and fresh, especially loved the smoothies. We actually walked to Disneyland, from this hotel it took about 20-25 minutes. We also opted to walk from Toy Story parking to the hotel at the end of the night, which took about 10-15 minutes. Everything was good about this hotel!
Manager Response: Hello jessiejaye20,  That you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear how much you enjoyed our new breakfast experience. It has been a positive change for Hampton loyal guests. Come back again soon!

Summary: Staff are friendly, efficient and all seem to have positive attitudes.  Breakfast consisted of 1 type of citrus cut fruit, waffles(at least 2 types of batter), dry cereals, fruit juices, coffee, various muffins and pastries which changed daily, oatmeal and condiments, 1 type of meat and 1 type of egg dish which was change daily.  Very good for an included breakfast!  AC in the room is noisy but overall room noise was pretty quiet, didn't hear much from the hallway nor above floors or neighboring rooms. Bed and pillows were a little lumpy but I prefer a firm bed and memory foam type of pillow so it might be ok for others.
Manager Response: Hello kmackdaddy2019,  Thank you for your thorough review of our property. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed our new breakfast experience. It was just updated in July and have been a huge hit with our guests. We hope you choose Hampton for your next stay in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a trip to Disney!
Summary: We've stayed at this property 4 times now and each time was excellent.  We've always had everything we needed...friendly staff, shuttle to Disney, outdoor pool, complimentary breakfast and clean rooms.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hello teabridge,  Thank you for your review. We lover welcoming back our regulars and hope to do so time and time again. We appreciate your kind comments and we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: This was my first time at this hotel. I usually stay at Hilton Anaheim. But this time I brought my family for Disneyland and this Hotel couldn't have been more perfect. It was seamless from start to finish! Nice remodeled rooms, great breakfast and a wonderful staff! It was decorated with Disney decor and a magical backdrop of the Disney Castle and even props for and awesome photo shoot!
Manager Response: Hello mtamara81,  Thank you so much for choosing Hampton for your accommodations. It is stories like yours that make our day. We are thrilled to have won you over and we look forward to many more opportunities to wow you again in the future!

Summary: We enjoyed the Hampton Inn very much! The staff was very friendly, the breakfast was delicious, and the hotel was clean. It's a fantastic location if you're visiting Disneyland! We were able to get an Uber to Disneyland for $5-$10.
Manager Response: Hello Amy A,  Thank you for your review of our property. I am pleased to hear how much you enjoyed our friendly staff and clean and fresh location. We hope to welcome you back for your next Disneyland vacation soon!

Summary Heading: feels like a brand new property
Summary: we liked how fresh and clean the property was. check in was super fast and easy. we had an incredible view of Disney Fireworks from the comfort of our private balcony. very enjoyable stay and what seemed liked a brand new property.
Manager Response: Hello james c,  Thank you for taking time to review our property. I love to hear that you enjoyed your firework view from your suite balcony. We completed a full guest room renovation last year and I am pleased to hear how much you enjoyed our fresh new look. Come back again soon!

Summary: The staff was very friendly and polite. The room was clean, spacious and had really comfortable beds. The hotel is right next to a Buca di Beppo which was awesome. The room had a balcony with a great view of the Disney fireworks.
Manager Response: Hello thecrashingeddies,  I am so pleased to hear that our location suited your needs and that our team took great care of you. Our suites with balconies are our most popular rooms and are great for an evening of fireworks. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Reserved a 2 full bed room. Room was on the 5th floor. Easy check-in. Of course they require credit card for deposit hold. Room was clean. A/C wasn't on, and room was hot when I came In, but cooled off quickly.  Sitting chair included, footstool, lots of lamps and mirrors, desk, lots of outlets and USB charging ports. Microwave and mini fridge (with extremely small freezer portion) room 520, very close to elevator and ice machine. No noise problems.   Very comfortable beds, good linens, walk in shower was great.
Manager Response: Hello DHornback,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate your kind comments and look forward to another opportunity to host you again soon!

Summary: Good hotel, the front desk was great. However the staff in the breakfast area were not so friendly and many items were out by 8am. Rooms were roomy and very clean. Only one elevator working for the entire hotel so it took forever to get to your room
Manager Response: Hello jtornero20,  Thank you for your review. I appreciate the feedback regarding breakfast staff and the buffet. We will pass the information on to the appropriate manager for resolution. We hope you choose Hampton again for your future stays!

Summary: Front desk service was inconsistent : some staff friendly and accommodating,  most abrupt and unsmiling.  The wait staff at breakfast  and cleaning staff were more consistently  friendly and helpful. The quality of breakfast was inconsistent.
Manager Response: Hello Peggy D,  I am so sorry to hear that our team did not deliver the service we have become so well known for providing. I will personally speak with the members of our team about your negative experience. I can assure you that this will remain an isolated incident and we hope that you will allow us another opportunity to make it right for you.

Summary: Dont stay here! Charged my credit card $1,038 for a $260 stay! I was told it's a "glitch" they have known about for weeks but are NOT notifying guests. I am beyond angry and have had to take this up with MANY people. Also, elevator broken and issues with room cleanliness upon arriva .
Manager Response: Hello jennifermnye,  We apologize for the major impact this has had on you. It is not acceptable and could have been avoided. I know you have spoken with our Guest Services Manager and he has taken a personal interest in ensuring this is taken care of until the end. Debit cards can be tricky for hotels, but there are definitely ways to avoid impact to you as our guest. We have spoken to the associates to ensure this incident does not happen again. I hope the compensation that was provided will help give you peace of mind. Please allow us another opportunity to make this right for you, should you find yourself in the area again.

Summary: Came there for a conference at the convention center. Rooms were clean, staff was friendly upon arrival. Only issue, I was there 4 days and received 0 housekeeping...so I had an overabundance of dirty towels in my room, took out my own trash, and had to request my towels daily. There was also only one working elevator so for a busy week being on the top floor, that was a huge inconvenience.
Manager Response: Hello jazelletaylor,  Thank for for taking the time to review our hotel. I apologize for yourt experience with our housekeeping department. I will speak with them to determine where the mishap was and ensure it does not happen again. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again and provide you with a better experience.

Summary Heading: Convenient and comfortable stay for Disney trip
Summary: I got a great rate on this hotel via Priceline Express Deals so I wish I could give it a 4.5-"circle" rating on TA because for the price I paid, I feel it was a pretty dang good place for a 2-night stay for 2 adults.    Pros:  - modern, clean rooms - huge (for a hotel), well-equipped fitness area - fridge and microwave in room - friendly front desk staff - comfortable beds (firm mattress, which I prefer) - a fair amount of little extras, like lemon-cucumber water available in the lobby, 24/7 coffee (although when we got it in the evenings, it was luke warm or cold) / tea / hot cocoa, cinnamon rolls and pastries at the front desk in the evening, etc. - standard / adequate hotel breakfast (waffles, eggs, breakfast meat, cereal, yogurt, fruit, bread, etc.) (although the breakfast
Manager Response: Hello HCS,  Thank you for your recent review of our property. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for your Disney trip. We hope you choose Hampton again for your future travel needs to the area!

Summary: Elevators did not work. Complimentary breakfast no space to eat and it was a disaster. We had to wait a long time to get in and out of the elevator. The food was not organized nor was it what I was expecting.
Manager Response: Hello boninsd,  I apologize for your less than satisfactory experience with us. Our elevator modernization can have an impact on our guests' stay and we apologize for that. We are excited for the new and improved product that will come as a result of the upgrade. Please come back again for another chance to make it up to you.

Summary: positive: 1. check in staff was very friendly and would like to go further to satisfy my request on the room location. 2. breakfast quality and choices are above average but not as good as other locations in other states. 3 convenient location with restaurants and shopping place nearby 4. modern decor  negative: 1. room is relatively small which was quiet same as other Hampton in locations 2 bathroom design is not very user friendly without hanging hooks 3 average cleanness
Manager Response: Hello susan I,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am very pleased to hear that the staff took such great care of you during check in and that our breakfast buffet and room decor suited your needs. I apologize that the room size was not to your liking and that the cleanliness was subpar. I will pass the information on to our housekeeping department to ensure improvement. We hope to welcome you back again another time in the near future!

Summary: We love the one bedroom family suite with lounge area, balcony and kitchenette. The lounge has pullout sofa that fits two kids perfectly. 2 queen beds in the main bedroom very comfortable. We had a pack and play for baby. Kids loved the pool. Great breakfast options. 5 minute Uber drive cost 6-7 dollars to Disney drop off pick up then a short 3-4 min walk through shuttle drop off area to the gates. The hotel had coin operated washer and dryers so handy for a family staying several days. We stayed 5 days wish it was longer. It‚Äôs next door to an icecream shop and opposite jack in the box and Italian restaurant. Candy and detergent available from gift kiosk.Also reasonably priced as hotels in area are so expensive!
Manager Response: Hello island d,  Thank you for your 5 star review of our property! I am so happy to hear how well our suite worked out for you and your family. We are so excited that your stay was flawless and we hope you'll choose our property for all your travel needs to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Great location close to Disney. The hotel was clean and bright, the staff was friendly and helpful. Fitness room had all the basics and the complimentary breakfast exceeded expectations. The lobby was spacious with room to gather and there were additional outdoor spaces off the lobby and by the pool to sit and eat or meet your group. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Fitfamilytravelers,  Thank you for your 5 star review of our hotel! Based on your name, I am thrilled to hear that our fitness center was up to your standards and that our new healthier breakfast items suited your family's needs. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Our family of five stayed here while visiting Disney. After being in a couple of houses during our long road trip, we thought we‚Äôd feel cramped here, but that was not the case. Our 1-bedroom suite had a larger-than-expected living room/kitchen area with roomy table seating for four.  The provided breakfast had multiple options and tons of seating. Other reviews have mentioned the breakfast being a ‚Äúzoo‚Äù, but we found that if you went down to breakfast before 8, we practically had the place to ourselves.  We drove to and from Disney each day, and the hotel is close enough to come home for a simple cost-saving! dinner (which we cooked in the room, using the microwave and stovetop), and then drove back to Disney and stayed until close. We never took the shuttle, but saw many other
Manager Response: Hello CincyFamily04,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! I am pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your suite accommodations with us as well as our brand new breakfast experience. We hope to welcome you and the family back again next time for another great experience!

Summary: Hotel was great just staff not well informed on in and outs of parking garage at Disney guy at front wanted to sell the transit pass and big hassle at check out.  Was charge to bank account when they already had my credit card
Manager Response: Hello Mauricio M,  While we do not have a parking garage, nor do we have a designated Disney representative, we appreciate you taking the time to review our property. You may have been staying at the other Hampton down the street with a parking garage on site. Next time, please contact our hotel directly at 714-703-8800, and we will make sure to take great care of you!

Summary: Really liked this hotel.  Service and staff were friendly and accessible.  Complimentary breakfast was good .  Location was great, tour pickups and shuttles easily available.  Pool area was nice and very clean.
Manager Response: Hello Climber815493,  Thank you for your 5 star review! I am happy to see that the staff took such great care of you and that our complimentary hot breakfast buffet, location, and pool area suited your needs. We hope to welcome you back during your next stay in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for volleyball tournament at the Convention Center
Summary: We were in Anaheim for the SCVA Summer Soiree volleyball tournament held at the Anaheim Convention Center.  Our team selected this hotel because it was the cheapest one available.  Even though it was the cheapest, it was a very nice hotel and we enjoyed our 5-night stay.  Check in was quick and easy.  The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  Breakfast was delicious each morning with a great variety.  The breakfast area is large and has enough room for everyone even though it can be busy!!  The pool and hot tub were nice/clean.  The location of the hotel worked great for our team.  There are multiple restaurants within walking distance.  A large Target is within walking distance if you are in need of groceries.  The hotel is within walking distance of the convention
Manager Response: Hello JFlyfish,  Thank you for your amazing review of our property! I am pleased to hear how wonderfully the staff took care your family and the group overall. We enjoyed having the teams stay with us and we look forward to your return stay next year or even sooner!

Summary: This hotel was conveniently located to Disneyland,  angel Stadium, and the beach.  Easy access to IH 5 and hwy 99 to get to Los angelos.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  Only drawback was hotel was working on elevator and water during our stay so only one elevator for 7 floors and no water during day on two days of our 4 night stay.  Breakfast was okay often picked over bu 9 am.
Manager Response: Hi Nancy R,  We apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay and we hope the staff was able to make up for it with there attention to service. We look forward for another chance to serve you under better circumstances in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel with a fantastic fitness center!
Summary: As expected with Hampton Inns, the rooms were well done, mattresses in good condition, shower heads powerful, and a delicious breakfast (which offered smoothies!). What I was not expecting was the excellent fitness center! Along with cardio machines and dumbbells, they had three great weight machines including one for leg extensions and leg curls. I will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Alan H,  Thank you for your review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our renovated rooms and new breakfast experience. We love making our guests happy at Hampton! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I'm a mom of twins and we were staying at this property because of its proximity to Disneyland. The staff was friendly and service-centered (from reception to housekeeping). This is a newly constructed property so the hotel feels new, modern, clean and comfortable. Great breakfast. Overall, the hotel was really nice.  Here's my only complaint...I stayed at 4 hotels in California and everyone had water pressure issues with the shower...I think it's because of water conservation requirements. Instead of taking a 5 minute shower, you're taking a 20 minute shower because the water just trickles out of the shower head. How does that make any sense?   Last comment, there was a piece of plastic covering the fire detector. Perhaps it was left there when the room was being painted, then
Manager Response: Hello pearlsaavedra,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our renovated products as well as our friendly team members. I apologize for the water pressure concerns you addressed. We understand how frustrating that can be for you as our guest. We hope for another opportunity to serve you again in the near future!

Summary: My wife and daughter had a great time staying in your facility!  We are already planning our trip for next year's VidCon event.  We've recommended this facility to our family and friends.  They too are planning their get-away for their next trip!
Manager Response: Hello Ed M,  Thank you so much for choosing Hampton Garden Grove for you accommodations during VidCon! We appreciate your business as well as recommendations to your friends and family. We look forward to seeing you again next year!

Summary Heading: Was ok, but a little far to walk
Summary: We booked this thinking we would walk, but ended up deciding to buy passes for the shuttle that is available.  It's only 2x an hour though so be sure you know when it picks up so you don't miss it.  At the park there are no benches at the pick up/drop off area to wait so we would wait at another zone until more people came.  Hotel was "ok" the breakfast was a madhouse.  Ask for a room towards the park on the 7th floor, you can see the Magic Kingdom fireworks.  Rooms near the pool would have been really loud...  They were down to one elevator, with a big convention in town, which was a giant pain.  Luckily we were on the 7th floor so we were able to go down just fine.  Getting back up was the problem as at night there was often a huge group waiting.  We stayed on points, my
Manager Response: Hello Michelle P,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback regarding the shuttle service pickup / drop off zones. We will be sure to inform the shuttle company of the lack of adequate seating. As far as the elevator is concerned, we are currently upgrading our elevators in order to improve the experience for our guests. We appreciate your understanding and do hope that you will consider us again the next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Clean, breakfast plentiful. Ice machines & 1 elevator not working. Great location, easy access to shuttle. Staff accommodating...restaurants close by. Encouraging clients to go green by offering Hilton points incentive.
Manager Response: Hello 227luzz,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are happy to see that our accommodations suited you so well and we hope to see you again next time!

Summary: I stayed here for 2 nights with my 4 year old child.  Check-in was very pleasant and quick.  The staff at the front desk were very helpful and willing to assist me in purchasing tickets to Disneyland for the next day and also shuttle tickets.  The room was very clean and quiet. I got an upgrade (for an extra cost) to the 5th floor so we could watch the fire works. It was PERFECT!!! Everything else was as expected. Clean room, comfy beds and sheets, clean bathroom and carpet.  The breakfast was good. Omlet, potatoe, turkey sausage, cereal, yogurt, toast, waffles (make your own), fruits and really good coffee.  I will definitely return when we visit Disneyland again in the future.
Manager Response: Hello comet1974,  Thank you for choosing Hampton Inn for your Disneyland trip! I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the view of the Disneyland fireworks from your room! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Grammy goes to Disneyland with the kids and grandkids for granddaughter's fourth birthday. The hotel was so wonderful for a multi-generational family, including an infant and two young children. Having a shuttle available was a godsend although costly for 3 adults and 1 child over 4 years old. The breakfast was great for all ages!
Manager Response: Hello norenef2019,  Thank you for sharing your time with us during your trip to Disneyland! I am thrilled to hear that our accommodations worked out so well for you and your family and we look forward to another chance to serve all of you again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel to stay at when visiting Disneyland!
Summary: I recommend this hotel when visiting Disneyland because of the free hot breakfast, most comfortable beds, and excellent service staff. They also offer a shuttle to the Disneyland park for an additional fee. I have stayed at this hotel twice and it has not disappointed me. I prefer the Hampton Inn & Suites over most other hotels.
Manager Response: Hello Grand Tour,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 star review! We appreciate your great feedback and can not wait to host you for a 3rd time again soon!

Summary: The beds were great the bathrooms had sliding doors that did not secure. The room had no safe and the drawers were metal baskets with large openings that do not hold small items. The buses were poorly marked
Manager Response: Hello,  We apologize for your less than satisfactory experience with us. We understand the new barn doors in the guest rooms and Hampton's "Forever Young" renovation design is not for everyone. It saddens me to hear that your stay was a disappointment and we would love another opportunity to make your experience better, should you find yourself in the area again.

Summary Heading: Great stay at a great location
Summary: My family moved here form the Hilton due to no rooms available.  We were not dissappointed.  We had a great view of the fireworks form Disney.  The location was good, right next to Bucca di Beppa.  I recommend ordering online and picking up, it beat waiting an hour for seating.
Manager Response: Hello moosiko,  I am so pleased to hear that your stay was so great! Those firework view rooms are a nice touch at the end of a long day at Disney, that is if you are not still at the park enjoying the festivities! We hope to welcome you back again soon for another great stay!

Summary: My family enjoyed every single moment when they stayed in your property.  As a Dimond member, Hilton family properties are always home away from home.  Once again, thanks for the hospitality. We will come back next year.
Manager Response: Hello Danny L,  Thank you so much for you wonderful review! I love to hear that we were your home away from home. We love having Diamond members stay with us, especially when we get to see you come back year after year. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Poor accommodation and lack of accountability
Summary: Service here was not accountable. Lack of comminicommun led my children to swim in fesus even though staff was aware they failed to let us know. When staff came out to pool area they still failed to mention poop in the pool for over 5 minutes. While laughing and joking with each other.
Manager Response: Good morning Edward S,  I apologize for this less than acceptable level of service that you received. This is unlike our team members and I will personally make sure that it remains an isolated incident. We value our guests and we fell short from the level of service that we pride ourselves on. Please accept our apologies and we hope for a chance to make it up to you in the future.

Summary: Bed was comfortable. Bathroom did not have a fan or lock on door. Shower was nice; had a second shower head that was handheld. Breakfast was good. Charge for parking unfortunately. A little far to walk for my liking to Disney and Convention Center but doable.
Manager Response: Hello Rob862,  Thank you for your recent review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your renovated room as well as our complimentary breakfast. We understand your concern regarding parking charges. As a reminder, we offer discounted parking to our Hilton Honors members, so if you aren't already a member, be sure to sign up! We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: They are Disney oriented and very clean and AWESOME! They cater to anyone staying but keep in mind that people are close to Disney, rooms are clean, breakfast is great, staff is friendly and help whenever needed!!
Manager Response: Hello houck216,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We definitely love embracing the magic that Disneyland has to offer and we were so happy to share that with you and your family. Please come back again soon!

Summary Heading: First Trip to Disneyland with Kids
Summary: Great Hotel- stayed here for 4 nights - on the 5th floor- slept great was nice and quiet considering there is lots of traffic outside - Nice comfortable beds with lots of pillows- very clean and room service kept our room very clean with plenty of towels.  We booked through Get Away Today and the front desk had lanyards for us and our kids to use at Disneyland very nice perk-  Check in was quick and easy -  the front desk people were very kind and efficient  Breakfast was very good with lots of variety of items to choose from (eggs, cereals, and oatmeal) etc...  Pool was nice - very relaxing after a long day of walking at Disney  with warm towels to use if needed poolside and lots of chairs and tables  Used the Gym once but they had a good variety of machines and it was a good
Manager Response: Hi summerlilacs,  I am so pleased to hear that you chose Hampton for your first trip to Disney with your kids! Those vacations hold so many memories and we are so happy to have been a part of your adventure. Thank you for your wonderful review and look forward to welcoming you back for all your future stays in the Anaheim area!

Summary: Going to California for a family vacation and decided to stay in Cypress. We‚Äôve always been happy with Hampton Inns and chose this one. It ended up being a good choice. The location is tucked away off the main road. It was clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly. The breakfast was good but a couple of the hot items were cool at times. Definitely would choose this hotel again.
Manager Response: Hello DavoPaco,  I love to have Hampton loyal guests staying with us and we are pleased that we delivered the experience you know and love. I have addressed your concerns with our breakfast team to ensure this does not happen again. We are excited for your next visit and we will be sure not to disappoint!

Summary: Unfortunately I arrived, prechecked in, exactly when I said I would and inconvenienced the FD clerk, who had to stop working to do his job and finish checking me in. Trust me, he made me understand was interrupting him with his loud sigh as he stopped counting his drawer, add in his curt tone of voice during our entire interaction, let's just say welcome is NOT how we felt. Then breakfast was cold and sparse whether you came down at 7am or 9am with little to no vegetarian protein choices -- for example, how hard is it to offer a plain cheese omelet next to the pork filled ones? The waffle machines had the last person's waffle stuck to it three times I tried to make one because the nonstick spray was always missing. One last thing about breakfast, I said something about breakfast
Manager Response: Hello Seaside07243107183,  I would like to apologize for you less than satisfactory experience with us. I have addressed your concerns with our department heads for immediate improvement. You experience is the furthest from what we strive for. I assure you that your experience will remain an isolated incident and we hope for the opportunity to serve you a much better experience in the future.

Summary: The hotel shuttle to and from Disney was awesome. The furniture was practical and the sheets were soft and comfortable. The hotel was quiet. We used the ice and the laundry unit. Everything went as expected. Couldn‚Äôt connect to the internet but it wasn‚Äôt much of an issue. We went to breakfast everyday of the week.
Manager Response: Hello Escape61742577538,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are happy to see that you were pleased with your stay, specifically the shuttle and your accommodations. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This hotel is located in a very convenient area.  It provides a great stay in a central location for us. Our family is nearby and of course, disneyland is just up the street.  It is a great value.  We love that it comes with a complimentary breakfast as well.
Manager Response: Hello dencat012001,  I am glad to hear that our location suited your needs. We consider ourselves "Close to the action, without the distraction" Come back again soon!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here along with our two small children for 3 nights.  We were actually in town for medical reasons however since it was also my son‚Äôs birthday we decided to take him to Disneyland. The staff we encountered were all very kind.  We actually had a package sent via Amazon to the hotel during our stay which was a first time for us and the process in retrieving it was painless!  The shuttle service was handy and cost less to use overall then utilizing the Disneyland garage for us.  The breakfast buffet ran from 6-10AM and was a perfect addition to our stay; we took advantage of it before heading out each day.  The room itself was great, my only major complaint was in our room (I believe 411?) the Disney Junior channel did not work.  It may seem like nothing for
Manager Response: Hello jenieceb,  I am trilled to see that your overall stay was a 10 and that they staff took such great care of you and your family. I will pass on the note about the cable television to our maintenance team so that they can follow up with the provider. We apologize that you missed out on the evening cookies. They do go very fast! Thank you for your understanding with the alarm. Safety is of upmost importance to us. I would love to host you and your family again soon if ytou find yourself in the Anaheim area again!

Summary: I wish I could give more than 5 stars.  We came for a 3 night Disneyland adventure.  Although Disneyland was more crowded then I have ever seen it Hampton did not disappoint at all.  The swimming pool felt really nice and warm. Breakfast was ok. Only complaint I had was the meat was very dried out and just not good. Eggs were very watered down. The hotel room was very nice and very clean. We were very happy with the space and room. To Disneyland,  we just called an uber it was 6to7 dollars one way instead of taking the transportation.  I attached a picture of how crowded Disneyland was. Rides were 250 minute wait time. At least our hotel was nice.
Manager Response: Hello Tracy A,  Thank you for your exciting 5 star review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your 3 night stay with us. I will address your concerns with the breakfast staff to ensure that your next experience will be much better. We hope to welcome you back to Hampton again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean room, great service, good location, mobility access shower could use a better design implmentation.
Summary: The Mobility access shower and setup could use a little better design, and the closet design should have been duplicated on the other window.  Everything else about the rooms and service and location (near Disneyland and shuttle) was great.
Manager Response: Hello Cruiser5829758177,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback regarding the mobility showers and accessible closets. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights on a Disneyland trip and it was exactly what we needed! The price was excellent, we loved the breakfast, and the room was clean and modern. I will definitely look to stay here for future Disney trips.
Manager Response: Hello lindsay346,  We are pleased to hear how much you enjoyed our breakfast as well as your renovated guest room. We love when our guests have the best experience while staying with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We have stayed with this hotel chain in the past and have had good experiences. This was once again a good experience. The staff was great at every encounter. The breakfast was substantial and so convenient. We rode the bus back and forth to the park so we just left the car parked.
Manager Response: Hello Paradise62081050535,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I love to hear that you have had great stays with Hampton in the past and that this stay was equally exceptional! We appreciate your comments about our friendly staff and look forward to another chance to host you and your family again!

Summary Heading: Very good value, especially for a family when it includes an impressive breakfast buffet!
Summary: We stayed here as part of a vacation package (flight and hotel), and we were not disappointed.  There were 6 of us in a blended family, and the ages made it a bit tricky to find a suitable place (2 teen girls, 2 teen boys, 2 adults).  This one allowed people to have space.    The full kitchen was great and we got groceries delivered on our arrival.  The front desk accepted the delivery while we were across the road getting a late lunch!    The breakfast, as many have already noted, was perfect.. it offered hot items (eggs, potatoes, sausage/bacon) every day, along with fresh fruit, yogurt, toast, bagels, pastries, oatmeal, cold cereal, and waffles!  Coffee, tea and hot chocolate were offered throughout the day.    The pool area was bright and clean, with lots of place to sit or
Manager Response: Hello mamamoss!  Thank you for your thorough review of our property. We love making our guests Hampton Happy! From our location, to our complimentary breakfast buffet we love to see that we exceeded your expectations. We appreciate the feedback regarding the suite amenities. We will speak with out housekeeping manager to ensure this is improved. We hope to welcome you back again soon for another incredible stay!

Summary: This hotel was awesome! Huge room with separate bedroom, full kitchen, a 24 hour gym, 2 pools and a hot tub. Complete complimentary breakfast with absolutely everything. Amazing customer service and a shuttle to Disneyland....um yes please sign me up. We will be staying here from now on for our Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Hello Vladiikaa,  We are so thrilled to here ho much you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive for an excellent experience for all our guests and we are excited to see that you you enjoyed your guest room and our hotel amenities. Our team was happy to serve you, from the front desk to the breakfast. We are excited to host you again for your future Disneyland trips!

Summary: I'm really picky when it comes to hotels so i reviewed all my sources before booking here. I enjoyed the room itself so much. It has clean beds, a big bathroom, ample mirrors, and great lighting. The breakfast was also a plus, which was really good to eat on the go.
Manager Response: Hi Seaside 03130347211,  Thank you for your 5 star review! I am thrilled to here that you loved our hotel and especially our hot breakfast buffet. We hope we have won you over as our guest and that we will see you again soon!

Summary: Nice hotel, great service all hotel staff was very nice. Paid extra for parking 14 per night as a Hilton member otherwise I think it‚Äôs 18 per night. Walking distance to the civic center was only 10 minutes. The only complaint was the hotel can be a bit noisy with all the groups / families at the hotel for Disney Land
Manager Response: Hello Z2081KKjustinp,  Thank you for your recent review. Our parking discount is exclusive to our valued Hilton Honors members as a token of appreciation for your loyalty. Next time, be sure to ask for a quiet location and we will make sure to place you in a area away from large groups and families. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: BEWARE OF PICKING UP ATHLETE'S FOOT HERE!!!!
Summary: Well, where do I start. I took a shower and it seemed a little slimy in the shower. I remember being worried I was going to slip and fall. The next evening my feet were itchy and started peeling and I had to spend the whole next day at Disneyland in horrible pain I could hardly walk or stand.  When I got home from my trip the next evening, my feet  were bright red, swollen, and puffy. Thanks for the athlete's foot Hampton Inn. I never could have imagined picking this up at a Hilton hotel.  How disgusting. I will never stay here again because they don't properly sanitize the showers. Way to treat a Hilton Honors member.  Yuck!
Manager Response: Hello Pioneer28069740631,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for your less than satisfactory stay with us. We aim for all of our guests to have a Happy stay and we fell short of that. I have it noted that we have issued a refund for your stay to make up for this negative experience, and we hope to have another opportunity to make your experience a much more positive one. We have shared your experience with our housekeeping department and I will personally speak with the team to ensure proper cleaning is conducted.

Summary: Every year my family and I love to go to Disney, and we always stay at other hotels, but this was our first time at this hotel, and we absolutely loved it. The staff was very kind, but I would specifically like to point out Josue. He helped us get the room we wanted and even answered questions we had about Disney.
Manager Response: Hello gabi_schrute,  Thank you for your amazing 5 star review! We love making our guests happy each and every day and I am thrilled to hear that your first experience with us was a success. I will give a shout out to Josue, he is one of our front desk rockstars. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The staff were very helpful and friendly to us. They prepared a hand-written birthday card and snacks/toys for our boy and also took the time to come around the counter and say hi to him while we were checking in. Very clean rooms with a great view of the Disneyland fireworks as well! Hotel is a short $6 Uber ride from the park entrance or a 20 minute walk.
Manager Response: Hi Shane D,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We were delighted to share your son's birthday with you and we hope he had a spectacular stay. Come back again soon!

Summary: Very clean and convienant to Disney.  They offered a shuttle (For an extra cost) which was cheaper than parking at the park everyday. The breakfast had a okay variety the only thing was the drink machine was out of order for a day or two.  They did provide gallons to pour while it was out.
Manager Response: Hello Tekisha W,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed the breakfast and location in proximity to Disneyland. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: Each year we stay here and it never disappoints. We look forward to returning each time. Staff is always so welcoming and helpful. We really enjoy the rooms and the location. Breakfast is always great and they have a wonderful selection of hot and cold items.   Our favorite is the suite and if you can‚Äôt stay at Disney for the fireworks get a room facing the park on a high floor. Great views from the room.
Manager Response: Hello knagata2018,  It is an honor to be called your favorite place to stay! We love making our hotel our guests' home away from home. We appreciate your wonderful review and recommendations. Come back again soon!

Summary: The staff is wonderful! They remembered us from a past stay and offered us free parking for being a returning customer. They asked questions and learned it was my husbands and daughters birthday and they sent beautiful cupcakes and personalized cards to our room to help them celebrate. This hotel rocks!
Manager Response: Hello Tiffany A,  Our team prides themselves on providing an exceptional experience for each and every guest. We were happy to celebrate your husband's and daughter's birthdays with you! Please come back again soon for another wonderful stay!
