Summary: This hotel has a lot of eateries close by. It is only a 10min shuttle ride to Disney- which is NOT included with your stay. The fee breakfast had a great variety of items. Internet was great rooms and pool were clean and updated. Parking is also an additional charge.
Manager Response: Good afternoon OnAir1702857618,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate your comments regarding our internet and updated pool area. We hope to welcome you back for another 5 star stay soon!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Hotel - Close to Disneyland - Newly Remodeled
Summary: This is a fantastic hotel and a quick drive to Disneyland. I can tell that it was newly remodeled. You will especially enjoy this hotel if you are a Hilton Honors member, there is a little extra treat involved! The only bummer is you do have to pay for parking, but the higher your Honors status, the cheaper the parking is. The breakfast was always fully stocked, even when busy and the staff are very friendly!
Manager Response: Hello NiftyTrav,  Thank you for the 5 star review of our property. We did just complete a full guest room renovation last year and our guests absolutely love it! We are pleased that you enjoyed your breakfast as well as our perks for being a loyal Hilton Honors member. We look forward to your next stay with us, come back again soon!

Summary: Our room was awesome. The bed was very comfortable, everything looked clean, and the shower was great. We Would definitely stay here again. The served breakfast here. It was good. The only problem for me was the sticky floors.
Manager Response: Hello Cruiser49538426096,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. Overall, we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We will pass on the note about the sticky floors to our breakfast team. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: For additional price: There is a shuttle that comes to the hotel at a quarter after and a quarter to, and picks up from Disneyland at the top and bottom of the hour.  It was convenient to use. The little pool is freezing, but the main pool was warm.
Manager Response: Hello Apbhinds,  We love to hear that our guests had an excellent stay! We are delighted to have served you during your visit and look forward to the next opportunity to provide another excellent stay.

Summary Heading: Nice Place, but a long walk to Disney
Summary: The property was nice and the rooms comfortable.  The breakfast was good with lots of variety.  I was disappointed to find out that the shuttle to Disneyland is NOT free and costs $12/person/day.  Since the hotel in over a mile away and I had asked prior to booking about the shuttle service, it would have been nice to have been informed of this extra daily cost per person.
Manager Response: Hello Diana Z,  We appreciate you taking the time to review our property. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed our renovated rooms and complimentary hot breakfast buffet. I appreciate your feedback regarding the shuttle. Since it is operated by a 3rd party, we do not have control over pricing. The fee is posted on our website, however we will be certain to advise all guests of the charge at check in. We hope you choose Hampton again for your future travel needs to the Anaheim area!

Summary: The service was great. When we asked front staff questions, they were patient and always smiled. The rooms, and bed were comfortable. We had a small issue with the AC on the first day, and they fixed it right away! I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Tour 28744633376,  Thank you for your 5 star review about our property and hotel staff. They are the true stars of the show and we appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge their efforts. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Booked a suite and when we went to our room we were shocked to see that it was already occupied. We went back down to the lobby and asked why there was already someone in OUR room that we paid for. They explained how they mixed up the names and gave the other person our room. They gave us another room but it did not meet what we paid for. It was a standard room and we paid for a suite. This mistake was on them and they are not professional at all. We wanted to splurge on a good hotel like this and received this?This is the Hamptons and were expecting better from them. Unbelievable!
Manager Response: Hi tzalee,  We apologize for the confusion with your room at check in. This is unlike any experience that we want our guests to have. We aim for service excellence with all our guests and we fell short of that expectation. Please accept our apologies. If you find yourself in the area again, please contact the hotel directly and reference this stay so we can give you the experience you deserve.

Summary: Excellent Family Friendly Hotel for anyone going to Disney. Room was spacious and clean. You can either walk or take the ART bus to Disney. Staff friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay here again for a Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review TBEnjoysTravel. We cannot wait to serve you again soon!

Summary: Hampton Inn Anaheim rocks! Great location, fantastic pool and exercise room. Relaxing outdoor seating for breakfast or lounging. Great staff. Don‚Äôt forget to try chicken and waffles across the street.
Manager Response: Hello NorthStar19394612164,  Thank you for leaving such an amazing review. We were honored to have you as our guest and we look forward to another opportunity to serve you again!

Summary: The rooms were spacious and clean.  The hotel is within walking distance to Target, Starbucks and ice cream shop.  The staff was exceptional.   The complimentary breakfast was the standard eggs, waffles, cereal, etc. but they had 4 waffle makers which made the wait very minimal.
Manager Response: Good morning dbmendoza1027,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate your wonderful comments regarding our location and our complimentary hot breakfast, two things that are so important to each of our guests. Our team would love to serve you again soon!

Summary: Great hotel friendly staff clean rooms and property. Excellent breakfast variations. Awesome Disneyland shuttle available at desk a 3 day adult pass unlimited trips was $18. It starts at 6:15AM until 1Am last one back . Lots of restaurants within walking near this hotel. Parking was $18 night but our car was safe and we didn‚Äôt start it for 4 days. We had a very enjoyable stay at this Hampton!
Manager Response: Good morning Compess,  Thank you for your 5 star review! I am thrilled to see how much you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast as well as our friendly staff. We take pride in making each stay a memorable one and we would love to serve you again for any future visits to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed here because of the proximity to Disney. We may have not stayed here if we knew about the price of the shuttle. I believe it was like 12 dollars a day per adult and 7 dollars a day per child. When you add that to the price to park at the hotel, I believe 18 dollars a day, it really adds up. We could have stayed somewhere a little further but cheaper and just parked at the park and had our vehicle to use.
Manager Response: Hello Tou26570533196,  It is unfortunate to hear that your stay was just ok. We strive for excellent guest experiences, so we apologize that your stay was not exactly that. As far as the shuttle in concerned, the price is set by the 3rd party shuttle company at $7 per day per adult and $4 per child. I apologize if this information was relayed to you incorrectly. Our location is highly convenient, however we understand it comes as a higher cost. If you ever reconsider, we would love to host you and your family again in the future.

Summary: Staff is immature and have no customer service skills! Elevator broke down and we were told that it wouldn‚Äôt be repaired until the next day and I had a wheelchair confined person and toddler! RUDE!!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Trip42698200230,  We deeply apologize for your experience during this incident. The hotel did have a fire alarm that resulted in the grounding of both elevators for guest safety. We apologize for the delay in getting these back up and running in a timely manner. We understand these instances can make a large impact with your stay and if we wish we could have prevented it from happening. Please allow us another change to make this right for you and your family.

Summary: We had a great experience here. The staff was very kind and helpful. Nice, clean rooms and a cool shower. The bedding and linens were clean and comfortable. We felt taken care of and enjoyed our visit.
Manager Response: Hello janello415,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We appreciate your wonderful comments regarding the staff and clean rooms. It is our mission to provide our guests with an exceptional experience each and every time they choose to stay with us. we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We picked this hotels because of my Daughter's Cheer Competition recommended and also I'm I Hilton reward member.  Always very pleased with my Hilton choices.  Like always, very satisfied with our stay. This one was our first time in this particular Hilton Hotel and  for sure if I need to come back to  this area I will be staying here again.   Staff super friendly and very helpful when I had any questions, Complementary Breakfast very good had both cold and hot options.  Great view of the San Gabriel mountains from our bedroom. Super quiet floor and comfy rooms.
Manager Response: Good afternoon olivoross,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. It is great to hear that we came so highly recommended and that we lived up to the Hilton standard you know and love. Exceeding guest expectations is essential to our operation and we were happy that we made that happen. Come back again soon!

Summary: Staff is super friendly the guy at the front desk (I think his name is Joshua) was very nice and the hotel is clean  and comfortableüëèüèºüëèüèºWe did an early check in with no problem we are very close to Disney testaurats etc nothing bad to say thanks for the great experience
Manager Response: Hello annaymax,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate the shout out of our team member Josue. He is a great asset to our team and does a great job taking care of our guests. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This was our first time at this hotel and we‚Äôll definitely be back. Our room was very clean, the Staff were very helpful & friendly, and the free continental breakfast was a plus.  The main purpose of our stay was the convenient location to Disneyland. The shuttle service to & from Disneyland was a short walk from the hotel and Disneyland entrance. The buses were always on time. When we arrived to the hotel, we were pleasantly surprised to see an Italian restaurant 20 steps away from the entrance and an Italian Ice dessert place right next door.
Manager Response: Good morning Camper46236418610,  Thank you so much for your amazing review of our property! It is great to hear that the staff took such great care of you and your family during your stay. The shuttle is our best recommendation for transportation to Disneyland, especially for the convenience. We loved having you here and we cannot wait to welcome you back again!

Summary: This was the hotel with the best shower. Housekeeping should be updated as to which rooms have checked out instead of opening your door at 8am because we forgot the door hanger after checking in at 1am.
Manager Response: Good morning GrandTour44215519834,  I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay, especially our showers. They have been a huge hit with our guests after our recent renovation. We will share your feedback regarding our housekeeping service with the Executive Housekeeper. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Remodel and staff nightmare! Book at another hotel!
Summary: We had a last minute family event in N LA so we thought we would stay in Anaheim becaues hotels are cheaper and it a fun area!  As we left our home I had pulled up great rate on same day check in so called hotel to confirm.  The person answering said no that rate is inposible even though I booked it on my phone as we drove from Arizona to Anaheim.  I asked for a mananger and she left me on hild for 1/2 hour and never picked me back up.  Later that evening we arrived and checked in and we got the rate I booked no issue!  We noticed pool was empty and elevator was closed leaving just one for the weekend?  No mention on there website of remodeling?  Hotel was average, quite and check in was uneventfu.  Room was average bigger size.  Our 1st issue came from the front desk letting us
Manager Response: Hello RollPositive,  Thank you for your detailed review. We apologize for your less than satisfactory experience here at Hampton. We have shared your review with each department to determine all areas for improvement. I can assure you this is unlike the level of service we provide to all of our guests. We hope you will consider giving Hampton another opportunity to make it right for you.

Summary: We came for an anniversary trip and they upgraded our room to a suite with a balcony and even left us a little cupcake and card. It was a great stay and close to Disney. The shuttle was so fast and easy.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Vegas-Aguilars,  We were so happy that you chose to spend your anniversary with us. Our suites are great for families as well as couples who are looking for an enhanced experience. Our team loves to celebrate with our guests, so we are happy to see that you enjoyed your cupcake and card. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Close to everything and great rooms. Must stay here. It took me 5mins to get to Disney. My only complaint playing for parking. I dont believe if you are apart of the loyalty program you should pay for it. Very close to the Honda center and Angel's stadium. Very friendly staff.
Manager Response: Hello 959sammym,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 star review of our property! I am thrilled to see how much you enjoyed your stay and our convenient location. Parking is not included in your Hilton Honors benefits but here at Hampton Garden Grove, we happily offer a discount to our valued Hilton Honors members. Come back again soon for another great stay!

Summary: I had a great experience staying at the Hilton Inn & Suites at Garden Grove, Anaheim, CA. It was clean on the outside and inside. The free breakfast is always a good perk. Check-in was a breeze and check-out was even easier. My wife checked me out from home online. All I had to do was pack up and walk out. No need for a stop at the front desk. Although I liked the front desk personnel. Very helpful and friendly. I always stay at Hampton Inns or Hilton.
Manager Response: Hello Elizabeth P,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 star review! I am so happy to hear how much you enjoyed our property, specifically breakfast and our friendly staff. We appreciate you as a Hilton Honors member and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: good stay.  water pressure was very low and there was only one hook in the bathroom to hang up anything.  Attempted to save water by putting towels on the hook but can only hang up one towel.  Did not save water as much as i would like.
Manager Response: Good morning Patrick C,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for your experience the water pressure and hooks in the bathroom. We will work towards a fix immediately. We appreciate you bringing these items to our attention and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: My family and I stayed here and it was excellent. Will definitely be returning. Hotel staff was friendly, rooms were very clean, and the free breakfast was excellent. I would recommend to anyone looking for a hotel around the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: Hello V2314NEnicoleb,  Thank you the wonderful review and recommendation. We would love to have you back for all your stays in the Anaheim area. See you again soon!

Summary Heading: Published prices don't match call-ins, they charge for incidentals, cannot explain the process, Charged parking w/out .
Summary: Published prices don't match call-ins, they charge for incidentals, cannot explain the specifics properly, found out week after leaving that they charged me for parking & never asked if I had a car.  I was never informed. spaces are VERY Tight
Manager Response: Hello Relax46548758782,  We apologize for any confusion regarding our incidental authorization. All guests must place a credit card on file for any additional charges that they incur while staying with us. I will ensure the team better explains the policy including the parking charges. To avoid this from happening to you again in the future, I would like to inform you that all of the information regarding incidentals and parking fees is provided to you on your confirmation email and as a Gold Hilton Honors member on your account. We hope to welcome you back next time under better circumstances next time.

Summary: Great location for Disney, with shuttle to the parks (for a fee) available, as well as only 5 minute drive. Easy to get to from freeways, rooms were clean and breakfast was a typical Hampton breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello ArchbishopKrejci,  We appreciate your wonderful 5 star review of our hotel. Location is everything, so we are pleased to see that ours worked out so well for you. Come back again soon for some more Disney fun!

Summary: helpful and courteous staff.  Definitely worth the money. sent a text before check in asking if they could do anything for us.  our room was ready on arrival and they went out of their way to be helpful as new to the area. I love that I can always count on a clean pleasant room.
Manager Response: Hello Bernice L,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 star review! We appreciate your positive feedback and we hope to welcome you back to a clean pleasant room again soon. Take care!

Summary Heading: Why it wasn't the perfect fit
Summary: I have been traveling for work for the better half of three years, I need swift and effortless check-in, without having to compensate for accuracy. The wrongly assigned room was the downside. If the error was picked up by management, the stay could have been fixed.
Manager Response: Hello Tourist47314332261,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I did look into your reservation and no changes to your room type were made from the time that you booked your reservation to the time you checked in the next day, so were unable to detect any errors. I apologize for any confusion and we hope to welcome you back under better circumstances next time.

Summary: Very convenient to Disney, but wish the shuttle to resort was either free or built into the room price. Lovely staff and space, would stay again. Room was nice and big, but fairly bright due to the outdoor lights outside the room.
Manager Response: Hello Emily G,  Thank you for you review. We appreciate your comments regarding our renovated rooms and friendly staff. We hope you choose Hampton again for your future travels to the area.

Summary: Very clean room and facilities,  comfortable bed,  great breakfast with lots of variety,  friendly and helpful staff. They went out of their way to make sure we were happy with our stay. And great location for Disneyland. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello scutler12,  Thank you for the 5 star review! Your comments are what we strive for with each of our guests and we could not be happier that we made such a positive impact on your stay. Come back again soon!

Summary: We love the Hampton Inn at Disneyland -- this was our 4th stay on the property.  Hotel staff is friendly and very helpful, had a room ready for us at 9a on day of check-in, which was awesome.  Room was clean and comfortable; breakfast hot and plenty of everything - kids especially liked the flavored waffles.  One elevator was down for maintenance, but it did not inconvenience us at all.    My 4 year old was sick at breakfast, and a very friendly and understanding staff rushed out to help me and get her to a restroom and had things cleaned up before I got back to the table.  They made sure she didn't feel embarrassed for being sick and we really appreciated that!
Manager Response: Hello stowellclan,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review! I am so pleased to hear that our team went above and beyond for your daughter. That is the type of service we strive for each and every day. We are honored to be your go-to hotel for the Anaheim area and we cannot wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Had a great stay, room and property were very nice and the staff friendly and helpful.  Would stay there again. Very convenient to dining options and shuttle service available.  Nice breakfast included.
Manager Response: Hello MarkieRosenthal,  Thank you for the great 5 star review of our staff and property! We would love to welcome you back anytime and appreciate your positive feedback. See you next time!

Summary: Very nice and close to all Anaheim attractions , we stayed there the night before we went to Long Beach to catch our ship for our vacation. It was a very nice hotel in a nice area and it only took us about 1/2 hour to get to our ship
Manager Response: Hello Explore49247140152,  Thank you for leaving a great 5 star review! Our location is great for those heading to and from the Long Beach port and we are happy that you chose to stay with us. Come back again next time for a Disneyland vacation that will be sure to delight you and your family!

Summary: The beds are soo comfortable!We always look forward to the complimentary nightly cookiesüòã Plenty of space for customers during breakfast. Soy milk was available and an extra amenity . Within walking distance of Disney for us moderately physically fit
Manager Response: Hello Pamela P,  Thank you for your 5 star review of our hotel. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed our Serta mattresses, nightly cookies, and best of all, our complimentary breakfast. We hope you choose Hampton again for your travels to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Everything was excellent.  No issues, no fuss.  Hampton usually meets my expectations for quality and service.  That's why I stay at Hilton properties several times per month and am a loyal HHonors member.  Good Job!
Manager Response: Hello Passenger44142742590,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty to Hilton and Hampton as an Honors member and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The park was pretty empty so we got to go on all the rides we wanted to. Some things were closed but it is always a fantasy land.  Our hotel was perfect. there was a shuttle to and from the Park, so very convenient.  The hotel staff were helpful and amazing. and the cookies are a perk!
Manager Response: Hello Anita Mary D,  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and your time spent at Disneyland. It is always a magical time at the parks, even if it is raining! Thank you for your kind comments regarding our staff. They love going the extra mile to make your stay special. Remember Hampton Inn when you plan your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Staff was very helpful and nice.  My son‚Äôs volleyball team stayed at the Hampton also and there were snack baskets in their rooms to welcome them and to wish them luck in the tournament. I thought that was very thoughtful of the hotel. The complimentary breakfast was a great way to start the day while also saving money.
Manager Response: Hello GT808,  Thank you for choosing us for your room accommodations during your son's volleyball tournament. We love rooting on our teams, and what better way than a snack basket full of all the essentials prepares them for game day! We would be honored to host you and your son's team anytime. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Will be lovely once construction completed
Summary: The hotel has newly renovated rooms which are very nice.  We had a suite that was ideal for a family.  The lobby is currently under construction which caused some issues, but I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel once they are complete.  Breakfast was a nice value for our teenagers.  Walkable to convention center.
Manager Response: Hello Lorraine C,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Our lobby was recently impacted by significant water damage, but the repairs have been completed and we hope to have you back to see the finished result. Come back again soon!

Summary: Not impressed...Location was great, walkability good, hotel was under construction (which was an unknown to us, if we knew we would have stayed elsewhere, made the stay unpleasant). Breakfast was not a great experience,ex: sausage not cooked through, had cold spots.
Manager Response: Hello Voyager11796099424,  I apologize for your less than satisfactory experience with us. While we may appear to be under construction, we were actually recovering from some water damage in the lobby area. I understand how this negatively impacted your stay and we wish you did not have to experience it. Please allow us another opportunity to host you under better circumstances. I have notified our breakfast team about the sausage to ensure this does not happen again. Thank you for you review.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a great location
Summary: The Hampton Garden Grove is a perfect distance from Disneyland with lots of easy access to local establishments.  The hotel was well set up for families visiting Disney and the surrounding area.  Two of us did get sick, and our guess would be that it was caused by using the remote in the room, but once that passed, we were able to enjoy our vacation.   We especially enjoyed the way this hotel took care of the breakfast and more.  There was variety, which was very nice, but our favorite was being able to come back from a busy day to huge bowls of apples and oranges in the dining area.  Great staff, very responsive to our needs, especially when we had a few of us not feeling well.
Manager Response: Hello Scott123E,   I am glad to hear that your vacation was enjoyable despite those of you who got sick. Thank you for choosing Hampton for your accommodations. I will pass on your comments regarding our delicious breakfast and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Had an excellent stay at the hampton inn. This is the only hotel I stay at. The room has everything I need in it and the complementary breakfast helps with budgeting. My family and I love this hotel and will be booking it again soon.
Manager Response: Hello Trail22474108906,   An excellent stay is what we strive for! I am pleased to hear that we have made a loyal guest out of you and we love hosting you and your family here at Hampton. We always love to hear how we can make your stay even better, so please feel free to share with us during your next visit!

Summary: If your looking for a hotel close to Disney then this is perfect. Gorgeous renovated rooms and free breakfast made this a very nice stay. There are restaurants in walking distance if you don‚Äôt want to go far after a long day and the staff are exceptional
Manager Response: Hello Gemma P,  I am pleased to see that you enjoyed our renovated rooms and delicious breakfast. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back for your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Great place for family visit to Disneyland
Summary: We had a great visit at Hampton Inn and Suites. Having a kitchen was important for us so we could cook a few meals. The complimentary breakfast was okay, but many items ran out and they seemed short staffed because items weren't replaced in a timely manner. The kitchen in the room could use more utensils,  but I'm sure these are difficult to keep track of at a highly used hotel.  The room was super clean, well-stocked with toiletries and towels, and very spacious. It easily accommodated our family of 5. We had a room with a balcony facing Disneyland and enjoyed the fireworks show each night. There is a very yummy ice cream place next door, many amenities within walking distance and just a block to the ART shuttle to Disney. We wouldn't think twice about staying here again.
Manager Response: Hi ONW_M0m,  Thank you for choosing Hampton for your family of 5. We appreciate your detailed review of our property and are pleased to see that you enjoyed everything from your suite with the balcony to the yummy Italian ice place next door. We hope you choose Hampton again for your next visit!

Summary: We spent 4 nights here with 3 adults and 3 children (12, 8, 6 - all boys) and found the queen suite to have enough room and privacy for my boyfriend and I to sleep on the couch bed and grandma and the boys to sleep on the 2 beds in the room. The bathroom sink is separate from the shower and toilet so everyone could get ready easily. Easy freeway access, walking distance to Target and the Outlets, and great customer service. Waffles for breakfast made everyone happy!
Manager Response: Hello Suzanne V,  We love hearing that we are perfect for families such as yours! Our suites make your stay seamless and are perfect for a family your size. Come back again for some more waffles and we will be sure to take great care you all!

Summary: Despite the unfortunate water damage and construction the front desk staff were very nice. I was happy with their service upon our arrival. The staff handled the chaos very well.Unfortunately we had a  horrific incident in our bed when we turned down our sheets to retire for the night after an 8 hour drive.There was blood on our sheet and one of the pillows..... we were totally disgusted. We called and reported this and asked for clean linen right away and the only response we got, was "oh no." Housekeeping dropped off A sheet, but we had to call for the rest of the bedding so we could do a complete bed change ourselves.  I felt that with something so disgusting that at the least an apology was due, but NOTHING was said. I felt like "oh well, sucks to be you, this happens all
Manager Response: Hello Debbie S,  I am so sorry to hear about the incident you experienced regarding the dirty sheets. This is unacceptable and I will personally speak with our housekeeping department regarding the matter. I assure you that this is an isolated incident and our team should have taken a better approach to resolve this for you. I hope you will allow us another chance to prove to you that we appreciate your loyalty. Feel free to reach out to me directly should you find yourself in the area, and I will ensure your stay is satisfactory.

Summary: This was a family trip to Disneyland, our daughter's first time to vist there. We chose this hotel for value and location, plus the parking option they provided. The staff were very pleasant, friendly and rooms were very nice and spacious. Food was also very good and plenty of it.
Manager Response: Hello Discover9478341082,  Thank you so much for spending your daughter's first trip to Disneyland with us! I am glad to see that the staff took such wonderful care of you and your family and that you enjoyed the amenities we had to offer. Come back to Hampton again soon!

Summary: From the time we walk in the front door we are welcomed and treated like family! The grounds, pool, and rooms are always clean. Breakfast is great! The staff is always friendly and asks us how we are doing, if we need anything, how things are going, what we're doing for the day, etc. They pay attention to the kids and make sure they have snacks ;) lol It's a great place to stay. I choose Hampton Inn over other hotels in the area including Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: Hello navyxman,  Thank you for a wonderful review of our hotel. We love making our guests feel as if they are in their home away from home. I will be sure to pass your notes along to the team a give them all a big high five! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel was a bit of a mess due to a recent fire/sprinkler situation in the hotel lobby. We had a number of situations come up during our stay but management was willing to work to correct the problems and keep us happy. I was most impressed by a single employee at this property by the name of Jordan N, who went above and beyond to help me and my young son deal with our luggage. He helped make up for some of the minor inconveniences we experienced at this property. Thanks Jordan!
Manager Response: Hello breazion,  Thank you for your kind words in this unfortunate situation. Our goal is to ensure your stay is as satisfactory as possible, so I am pleased to see that Jordan did just that for you. We hope to welcome you back under better circumstances next time.

Summary: Room was disgusting, had to clean it myself. Management was careless to the matter. Elevators we're down so had to walk up and down the 3 flights of stairs numerous times with my 2 children. There was a leak from 3rd floor down which made it to where there was tarp all over which made it look like a construction site. It was very loud just bad experience overall
Manager Response: Hello Discover38078569486,  I apologize for your less than satisfactory stay with us. We understand your concerns are are addressing the issues as quickly as possible. Unfortunately, we can only do much much with water damaged areas. Please accept our apologies and we hope you will allow us another opportunity to make it up to you in the future.

Summary: Anaheim/Garden Grove stay was very disappointing. Co structure and repairs in the property were noisy and made maneuvering through the hotel very difficult.I was notified before arriving that the elevator was inoperative but not the other problems.
Manager Response: Hello Freedom51487542755,  I apologize your you disappointing stay with us. We understand your concerns and are working diligently to get the lobby back to its original state, however water damaged areas take time to repair. We hope you visit us again under better circumstances so we cans how you what Hampton is all about.

Summary: Great location for Disneyland! The shuttle for a small fee is Great! After we were picked up, directly to Disney and when coming back first stop to be dropped off. We went back and forth a few times for the 2 days my daughter and I were there. Very clean and staff is wonderful.  Close to restaurants.  We will be staying here next time we go to Disneyland. Enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Hello Odyssey16544,  I am thrilled to see that your stay was so great! The shuttle is so convenient and worth avoiding the hassle of driving and taking the tram into the parks. We would love to welcome you back time and time again for your Disneyland hotel accommodations. See you again soon!

Summary Heading: Came for volleyball tournament, enjoyed the hotel evacuation due to fire.
Summary: We had to stay here as it was an assigned hotel for a local boys volleyball tournament.  Arrived Friday night.  Check-in was easy, and the lady at the front desk was very nice - especially considering she was checking in many families in a row.  Parking was pretty bad - mandatory parking fee, but not enough parking spots (had to circle for a while to find one in the way back).  The beds were a mixed bag - one was okay, but the other felt like it had broken springs (and squeaked a lot).  Here's the best part of the trip - at 4am, the fire alarm goes off and everyone needs to evacuate.  Ultimately we learned some jerk tossed a cigarette butt into their trash can.  I get this is not the hotels fault.  However, we ended up not getting any breakfast from the hotel, and there was
Manager Response: Hello Climber5421391164,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I understand your concerns regarding the parking and fire alarm. I apologize that we were unable to provide breakfast to you and your family as this is an important part of your stay with us. We value all of our guests and would love another chance to make this up to you, under better circumstances of course. Please reach out to myself directly if you ever find yourself in the area, and I will ensure your stay will be much more satisfactory.

Summary Heading: Nice clean room, close to Disneyland
Summary: The rooms here are nice sized with comfortable beds and pillows.  The location is nice and close to Disneyland. There is a shuttle you can pay to take you to and from the park, or you can walk (although after walking around the parks all day it seems a bit far to walk).  The breakfast had quite a few choices and everything was nice and hot.  There was also a To Go bag for those who were in a hurry.  The only thing that annoyed me was paying to park and then having a hard time finding a place to park.  However, that was to be expected when it is near Disneyland. We will stay here again as this is typically our hotel of choice when coming to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Nicole B,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel. We appreciate your feedback regarding our location and breakfast. I am pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and we hope to see you again next time you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary: Checked in. Staff was courteous. Didn‚Äôt know it was next to Disney Land. No issues was quiet clean and friendly  Breakfast bar was stocked. WiFi was fast. Only issue is you can‚Äôt digitally checking so to city ordinances
Manager Response: Hello brandonstrauss,  Thank you for you positive feedback regarding our staff and amenities. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: This is a very nice hotel not too far from Disneyland or Disney California. Very friendly and helpful staff. Whole hotel is very nice, with shuttle service to the them parks and back for a small cost. Nice places too eat within walking distance. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Trip0571688547,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel . We appreciate your comments regarding the amenities and the staff. Come back again soon!

Summary: My stay at the hotel started out with a few issues. The toilet was broke but they sent a maintenance man up immediately to fix the problem. I had a few other issues but the manager made sure our stay was great. I highly recommend everyone who travels to that area to stay there. All of the rooms have been renovated and the new look is awesome!
Manager Response: Hello Robert S,  Thank you for providing such wonderful feedback regarding your stay, including the few hiccups you experienced. We thank you for allowing us the opportunity to make it right for you during your stay. Come back again soon!

Summary: We‚Äôve stayed at this hotel multiple times when visiting Disney. It‚Äôs by far the best priced and has the friendliest staff, even better than the Disney resorts. We were upgraded to the family suite (we are also Hilton Gold members) and informed staff that we were taking our son to Disney for his 3rd Birthday. We came back from the park that night to an amazing, heartfelt birthday gift for our son!   The breakfast spread was amazing as always and breakfast staff was great. We liked the addition of the weekly menu (perhaps we missed it before).   Housekeeping staff was excellent and always left our room neat and clean with an ample supply of towels and toiletries.   The front desk staff was phenomenal, so friendly and welcoming! The weekly activities were great! Our kids loved
Manager Response: Hello U588EBstephanies,  We were so happy to have spent your son's 3rd birthday celebration with you. I am pleased to see that the team took great care of your during your stay from the front desk, to housekeeping as well as the breakfast staff. I will give a special shout out to Danny for his hard work and we look forward to your next stay here soon!

Summary Heading: Great value, excellent staff, clean hotel!
Summary: The hotel is very clean, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The location is great for Disneyland visits, or civic center activities. They feed you a decent breakfast, and have a shuttle to the resort area for a small fee. You can also buy Disney tickets in the lobby.
Manager Response: Hello Michael Y,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your wonderful 5 star review and are happy to see that you enjoyed your overall stay. We hope you choose Hampton for your return stays in the Anaheim area!

Summary: I was blown away at how helpful and accommodating the staff was at this hotel.  They were there for anything and everything we needed... One way they went above and beyond, was when my car battery died because my 6 year old left the dome light on in the car when we parked it, and we didn't discovery this until after we checked out and went to pack up the car to drive home.  Staff members came out and jump started my car and kept my daughter entertained while we got my car back to life, so we could go home. What an amazing group. They really helped make this trip stress free and fun.  The room was very nice and pretty big too. They had a nice size mini fridge and microwave in the room, which was very convenient. They had crayons and coloring pages for my daughter, yummy food for
Manager Response: Hello Heidbr0,  Thank you for the stellar 5 star review! We appreciate you informing us about how wonderful your stay was. We aim to make every guest experience a memorable one, so we are happy to have done just that. I will give a shout out to the team and we would love to make your experience just as amazing next time. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn performs at optimal excellence!!
Summary: Checked in through the app and had 2 top floor adjoining rooms. The decor was bright, fun and whimsical which kept the Disney theme. We had a family suite which included a kitchenette (fridge, sink, dishwasher, flatware) and it seems as if the room was newly renovated because everything looked brand new. Such a nice room and our high floor and odd number room allowed us to see the Disneyland fireworks from our balcony. What a wonderful stay!!
Manager Response: Hi sassafras2018!  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a stellar review of our hotel. We did complete a full guest room renovation earlier this year and we are thrilled that you enjoyed the new decor! We are pleased to have made your stay so great and hope to see you again next time!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a few days while visiting Disney. It‚Äôs a great location, we walked to the park no problem. The hotel is very clean and well maintained. It looks as if it was recently rennovated. They have free breakfast in the lobby in the morning. The price was a great value. I would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello traveler389389389,  Thank you for leaving us a review! We did just complete our renovation earlier this year and our guests seems to love the updates! Next time you come, try the shuttle service that is available for a nominal fee. Most guests love it and it will save your feet from all that walking at Disney all day!

Summary: Loved that the shuttle to Disney went straight to the park with no stops. Room was very clean and tidy. Staff were all amazing! Pool area was nice and clean. Included breakfast had a good variety and was changed daily.
Manager Response: Hello GrandTour00112527912,  Thanks for the 5 star review! The shuttle company we use is great for our guests, especially since it takes your directly to the parks. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed breakfast and that the staff took such great care of you. Come back again next time!

Summary: Very good quality of the breakfast compared than most of the Hampton Inn I have stayed. There are 6 waffle maker to meet the demand of breakfast crowd of Disney visitors. The fruit bowls are actually sliced orange, pineapple and grapefruit which save the diner extra effort to peel them off. The hotel is quite even with the Disney crowd.
Manager Response: Hi Tzoming H,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Our breakfast is one like no other considering the number of guests we have coming throuhg. I am glad that you enjoyed the sliced fruit and ample waffle makers. We hope you choose us again for your next stay!

Summary: Rooms were clean and cozy, Queen beds were super comfortable. I liked the huge shower, even without np tub. Breakfast was great all 3 days, Everyday it was a different selection of food. Staff was super nice and helpful.Hotel was more than we were expecting. Definitely satisfied
Manager Response: Hello Pioneer45620893128,  Satisfaction is what we strive for, so we are delighted that we delivered just during your stay. I am glad you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast and that our staff were so helpful throughout your stay. We hope to welcome you back again for your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: This hotel is not too far from the Disneyland park, so you can walk to and from if you wanted to.  The staff was amazing and it is right next to bucca di peppo, my favorite restaurant. The cost of rooms was great for the location. A friend who just went to Disneyland in September came with us, and she paid more for one room at a lesser hotel than i did for two rooms here.
Manager Response: Hi C883UTwilliams,  I love to hear that our team took care of you during your stay. Buca Di Beppo is great and so convenient being right next door! We appreciate your business and hope to see you again next time!

Summary: A lot of Hampton‚Äôs are more business aimed. This property is both business functional as well as family friendly. The kiddie pool is a great feature for little ones. Great breakfast. This is a good option for anyone trying to go to Disney. It isn‚Äôt too far from the park, and is a clean friendly environment.
Manager Response: Hello Aluebke94,  We pride ourselves on being more family oriented considering we are a mile and half from the Happiest Place on Earth! I am pleased to see that it our hotel was such a great fit for you and your family and we hopoe to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Wonderful time ! Amenities are fantastic! Front desk staff were so awesome especially Celine, Jessica and Kim! Breakfast was fresh and the variety was great! Lots loved the waffles and while cream with sprinkles!
Manager Response: Hi April A,  Thanks for your great 5 star review and your shout out to our front desk team! We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast, especially the delicious waffles. We hope to see you again next time!

Summary: Have stayed two years in a row for annual convention at ACC and really liked this property. Great staff. 10-15 min walk in perfect SoCal weather. Location obviously not as good as hotels immediately adjacent to ACC and parks, but much better value, even if we would have exclusively taken ~$6-8 Lyft rides. Enjoyed Disney fireworks from upgraded north side room on high floor with balcony.  Also made nightly stops to the next door ice cream shop.
Manager Response: Hi JFjapan,  We love to have welcomed you back as our return guest this year! Our value sets us apart from the other hotels in the area, so thank you for choosing Hampton Inn for your accommodations.

Summary Heading: Clean and friendly for a price
Summary: While the place was quite pricey coming at close to 1000$ CAD for 3 nights. It was a lot nicer staying here then some of the other less expensive hotels and inns. My only compaint with the cost is for an extra 150$ i could have stayed right next to the convention centre and there was nothing to make this place stand out compared to the Hilton.
Manager Response: Hello Resort30887841921,  The Anaheim resort area can get a bit pricey, however our location allows us to offer better rates that the convention center properties. We are glad you enjoyed the accommodations and wish to welcome you back again next time.

Summary Heading: Great staff, good breakfast, nice pool area, rooms renovated.
Summary: Great proximity to Disneyland (can just walk to the Toy Story parking lot and catch the bus), nice friendly staff, good breakfast with wide variety of choices.  The room was clean and renovated.  My only complaint was that there was no hot water during our 9 day stay, only lukewarm, would of been nice to take a hot shower at the end of a long day.
Manager Response: Hi Nb17136,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We apologize for your experience with the plumbing during your stay. We would have been happy to taken a look at this and get it resolved during your stay. We are glad to see that you enjoyed the rest of your stay as well as our location. Come back again soon!

Summary: This hotel (Hampton Inn and Suites Anaheim) was more than we had expected,  it was amazing.  The staff were ALL wonderful and the room was fantastic!  As a family of 5 with three children(6,4,2)  we had a 1 bedroom suite, where we spent 7 nights while visiting Disneyland.  This was a perfect size for us and the extra bonus was the kitchen where we had meals everyday(Target is nearby and we grabbed everything we needed)!  We had an issue with the table and they replaced it right away.  The kids all slept amazing and my husband and I enjoyed the bed so much we are trying to find out what type it was so we can purchase one for at home.  The balcony was a bonus and my husband enjoyed the fireworks while enjoying a cold beverage.  He spent every night out there using the free wifi to
Manager Response: Hi skarrletter,  Thank you so much for your thorough 5 star review of our property! You hit every aspect of your stay and we are pleased to see that it was all so wonderful. From the suite to the variety your family received at breakfast, we are grateful to have made your stay one to remember. We are thrilled to be known as one of the best hotels in the area to stay at. We strive for distinguished hospitality and a level of service that cannot be duplicated. Please come back again for your next stay and we will be sure not to disappoint!

Summary: Recently I had the opportunity to stay at the Hampton Inn in Anaheim/Garden Grove.  At first glance I was disappointed because I thought it was too far from the Hilton Convention and Marriott,  but really it is a brisk 15 minutes walking. They have a great FREE breakfast. The staff will text you to check on your arrival and see if there is any specific things you need to make the stay more comfortable. I will book a room here again!
Manager Response: Hello morenikeo478,  Thank you for your review. Our location is great for the convention center, especially for those who do not want to be in the hustle and bustle of the area. We are so glad this worked out for you. I am pleased to see that our team took such great care of you and we would be honored to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: When we visit Disneyland, this is our favorite place to stay. The staff is exceptionally hospitable and helpful. We also love that we can purchase bottled water for $1 each and all proceeds go to charity. Breakfast is consistently delicious.
Manager Response: Hi Getaway04090163795,  We are thrilled to be your go-to hotel in the Disneyland resort area! I love to hear how our team has taken care of you during your stay. They are truly remarkable with creating memorable experiences. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Wow, the staff at this hotel went above and beyond to make our stay an incredibly memorable one! We were there to celebrate an anniversary and birthday and the staff left us a wonderful note and dessert, as well as a fabulous room upgrade. I could not have been more impressed with our experience at this hotel. Nice and clean rooms, comfortable beds, very thorough cleaning staff, convenient shuttle to Disney and incredibly friendly and welcoming staff!!
Manager Response: Good morning Stephanie K,  We are honored to have celebrated both your anniversary and birthday with you during your stay. Your experience is the most important factor of your stay and we are happy to have made a positive impact. We hope you choose Hampton again for your future stays!

Summary: The hotel itself was great, walking distance to many places, pool was good not many people in it, breakfast was ok, need more variety. All in all we had a good stay. Parking and shuttle to theme park were not included.
Manager Response: Hello Trip24490872052,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our location as well as the pool. We hope to welcome you back for future your travel needs to the Anaheim Resort area.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 9 night and couldn't be more happy! Friendly staff, amazing accommodations, clean rooms and a couple minutes away from attractions and restaurants! Won't be disappointed, if your ever in town book here! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Hello Connector19115118377,  We are so excited to be your new go-to hotel! Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We cannot wait to welcome you back again and again!

Summary: The front desk staff was amazing! Quick check in, helpful and friendly. Many hotels to choose from in this area, but I will seek this place out next time I‚Äôm working in the area or if I bring the family to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello F2939CZlisao,  Thank you for your wonderful review of our property! We are thrilled to see that our amazing staff made such a wonderful impact on your stay. Come back again with the whole family for an unforgettable Disneyland vacation, and we will be sure not to disappoint!

Summary Heading: Clean, reasonably priced and great location!
Summary: This hotel is only about 2 blocks from Disney. Easy walk or take the hotel shuttle. Located next to several large hotels. Close to restaurants and shopping. Only a block from the convention center and 3-4 miles from Chapman University. Only negative comment is breakfast but that is because it is my favorite meal. Perfect for kids and those that don't take breakfast seriously. As a comparison, Embassy Suites, IHOP and Cracker Barrell are my kind of breakfast places so take my comment with a grain of salt. Regardless, you will not be disappointed staying here.
Manager Response: Hello TJ S,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are delighted that the location was so great for your needs. We hope to welcome you back for your travel needs again in the future!

Summary: Bed was comfortable, very accommodating stay. Convenience of being able to purchase Disneyland and shuttle tickets at the hotel. Breakfast options were great day one.  Day two was skimpy but the overall stay made up for it.
Manager Response: Hi ConstanceC,  We appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to provide the convenience of ticket sales on property as well as our complimentary hot breakfast buffet. We hope to welcome you back again next time you are in the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: I visit Anaheim frequently because i have family here. We usually stay at the Embassy Suites but choose something different this time. It was amazing!The decor in the room is so modern & fresh! I loced everything about it!!I also did not know they offer a hot breakfast! It was delicious! The staff were friendly, the facilities were gorgeous.I will absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello zzandjj,  Thank you for the 5 star review of our hotel! We are so glad you chose Hampton for your accommodations and could not be happier to have won you over. We would be honored to have you stay here again and again and cannot wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My family of 5 travels quite often. We thought this hotel was one of the best our family has ever stayed in. It was extremely clean. Comfortable seating and beds. They served cookies at night and a delicious breakfast in the morning. We visited Disney three days and took Lyft there and back for $10 (that was for a vehicle large enough to fit our family of five.)  The only negative part was a fire alarm going off around 11:00 pm. There was some confusion as everyone exited the hotel. An ambulance had to come for one lady that fell down the stairs. We never got any apology or information about this false alarm.   Overall, great experience!
Manager Response: Hi Jonesfamilyof5tn,  We are so pleased to be one of the best hotels for your family of 5. From the breakfast to the clean rooms, and even those delicious cookies in the evenings, we are so happy to have made a lasting impact on your vacation. Come back again soon!

Summary: Good location if you visiting Disneyland. Good choice of restaurants nearby. I had to attend a wedding in Yorba Linda and other related events in Long beach, mission Viejo and Irvine, so it was kind of middle somewhere but not really very convenient. Charges for parking $17.00 + tax (per night)
Manager Response: Hello Charudatta B,  Thank you for choosing Hampton Inn for your accommodations. I see that you were very busy during your stay, and we were happy to be in such a convenient location for your needs. We hope you continue to choose Hampton Inn for your hotel stays!

Summary Heading: Wonderful! Close to Disney! Only minor issues
Summary: Wonderful place to stay! Super friendly staff and great hot breakfast daily!  We have a family of six and all fit comfortably. Shuttle for Disney picks up every 30 min (I wish it were every 15 though) and the park is just minutes away which is great!  Super comfy beds, nice kitchen and living room area. We could watch the Disney fireworks from our balcony!!üòÄ My only complaints are that the A/C is loud when it comes on which is a problem during the night for light sleepers. I also didn‚Äôt like that the blankets/comforters had a design on the top that didn‚Äôt have a soft part at the top. So for instance when I pulled the covers up every night, instead of feeling a soft blanket I‚Äôd feel a rough flowery-design instead.  We would def stay here again though and recommend it to others!
Manager Response: Hello F8238PPelizabethc,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed one of our suites, especially the fireworks from your balcony! We hope you choose Hampton again for your future stays. Come back again soon!

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel for a recent adventure to Disneyland. We loved our stay at the Hampton Inn and would strongly recommend it! On the day of our check-in, we received a text from the hotel welcoming us. I was able to respond to this text and see if it were possible to get an early check-in. It was very helpful being able to text with the front desk. The hotel room itself was very clean. It looked recently remodeled and the Mickey and Minnie picture in the room was a nice touch. The microwave and refrigerator came in very handy for late night, after-park snacks.   The included breakfast buffet had hot waffles, fruit, eggs, potatoes, cereal, etc. Everyone in my family found plenty to eat. One of our kiddos has severe food allergies. All of the people working breakfast
Manager Response: Hello Allison C,  We are thrilled to have hosted you and your family as our guest! We love to see that everyone enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast as well as our wonderful breakfast supervisor Anthony! We hope to welcome you all back on your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We haven't stayed at a Hilton property for awhile because my husband travels more with SPG for work, but we decided to try this hotel for a quick trip to Disneyland.  We were welcomed with a fantastic upgrade and welcome gift (cookies and water), which was such an unexpected surprise given that we haven't been Diamond members for some time.  This is the most comfortable and clean Hampton Inn of all I've stayed at.  The breakfast selection was also notably better than most Hampton Inns, though industry average for the hotel class.    The only reason I didn't rate this 5 points is because we were woken up in the middle of the night by a fire alarm and told to evacuate the building.  Of course this isn't the hotel's fault at all.  My only gripe is that we didn't see any staff
Manager Response: Hello Mrs_loves_2_travel,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Despite being woken up by the fire alarm, we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hot breakfast and complimentary upgrade during your stay. We appreciate the feedback regarding the handling of the fire alarm, and we plan to revamp our emergency procedures to include better communication with our guests, in the event of any emergency. We hope you choose Hampton for your next stay and we hope to welcome you back to our property under better circumstances.

Summary: The staff was great especially the gentleman at the front desk Josue. He was helpful and tried to accommodate us. We had no hot water which to say the least is terrible when your trying to get your kids ready for Disney. I understand things like this can happen but it just made our stay memorable for the wrong reasons.
Manager Response: Hello travelmom265,  We apologize for the hot water concern during your stay. We understand the inconvenience this must have caused for you and your family. We would love another opportunity to make your stay memorable for the right reasons. Please feel free to reach out to the hotel directly during your next trip to Anaheim so we can ensure your stay is perfect!

Summary: Love this hotel . Perfect location for Disneyland . This was a return family visit to the same hotel , staff always  helpful, modern refurbished rooms. We had a suite to view the fireworks. Good breakfast ,lots of options for restaurants within walking distance   Disney shuttle 3 minute walk   A super place to stay
Manager Response: Hi Chris M,  Thanks for the great 5 star review! We are delighted to see that this was your 2nd stay at our property in one of our spacious suites. The firework views are high demand, but worth the great view you get from your room. We would love to host you on all your future visits, so when you come back to the area, think of Hampton!

Summary: We stayed 2 nights here and EVERYTHING was wonderful.  The breakfast is always so good and plenty to choose from.  We wanted to stay a 3rd night, but they were sold out so we went to Extended Stay America in Anaheim. DON'T use that hotel...gross, dirty, not enough room supplies.  Hampton Inn is the only way to go... especially for the price.
Manager Response: Hello f0sters4,  We love our Hampton loyal guests and are pleased to hear that everything went so great during your stay. We wished we could have hosted you for your last night and prevented your bad experience at the other property. As we say at Hampton, "We love having you here!"

Summary: Decided to meet my family at Disneyland and was looking for close proximity and fair price.  Was pleased with the presentation of a private Lanai next to pool.  When we arrived, was greeted very nicely, reservation was ready and the room was beautiful ! with Lanai to pool as promised.  Close to restaurants and Disneyland.  Plan to go back.
Manager Response: Hello mom4eternity,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a wonderful review. Our lanai rooms are great for families who plan to spend some extra time at the pool during their stay. We hope to make you Hampton loyal and can't wait for your next stay with us!

Summary: Excellent stay.  Large and clean rooms, Big bathrooms that looked like new, Good complimetary breakfast, Hotel looks like it was recently remodeled. Great location very convenient for the convention center and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello TSIMAN,  Thank you for a wonderful 5 star review! We completed our renovation at the beginning of this year and we are so glad that you enjoyed the modern look. Come back again soon!

Summary: Good points- close to Disneyland, good breakfast including,g hot items daily, clean rooms, comfy beds.Bad point - late night check in front desk was rude upon check in. He didn't seem to care about customer service. Even Hilton customer service reservation representative was treated poorly by this deak person. Would not allow late check out to honors reward member. Poor customer service.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to review. We appreciate your feedback regarding the customer service you have experienced and have addressed it with our front office team. I assure you this is far from the typical service we give and we hope you will allow us another opportunity to prove that to you. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We had a wonderful experience staying at this property.  It was quiet, clean and close to Disneyland.  The rooms are very up-to-date including a microwave and mini refridgerator.   The complimentary breakfast has a excellent selection for everyone.
Manager Response: Hello George A,  Thank you for an all around great review of our property! I am trilled to see how great your experience was, especially our renovated rooms and hot breakfast. We hope you continue to choose Hampton for your future stays. Come back again soon!

Summary: We stay in this hotel on 9/11 and our stay was as we always wanted to be no problems and quiet, smooth check in. Janelle took good care of us and our requests keep up the good work guys. We appreciate the hospitality.
Manager Response: Hello George E,  Thank you for your 5 star review of our hotel. I am thrilled to see that the staff took such wonderful care of you during your stay. Come back again soon!

Summary: I love this hotel. Value is great. Complimentary breakfast is very yummy. Shuttle to Disneyland  (for a small fee) is excellent. Standard rooms are not huge but very well designed for storage. Friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Called these folks early at 6 am for an early check in. We were thankfully able to check in at 10 am.   We chose our room on the 7th floor facing the fireworks. The Disney fireworks were an amazing extra touch. These went off at 9:30 PM on Friday and Saturday.  We stayed here with the intentions of going to Disneyland but opted to only visit Universal Studios. Many friends told us not to stay in Anaheim due to traffic (driving to the city) but it worked in our favor. We drove to the city twice and it was roughly a 45 minute drive. Something we're use to in Hawaii. Living in Honolulu, we understand the craziness of living in a large city. We enjoyed the location due to less traffic, lots of easy access to stores (Target is right down the road), and places to eat with no worries
Manager Response: Hello lainee87,  Thank you for the wonderful review of our property. Our convenient location is ideal for many of our guests, especially those traveling to the LA area and even San Diego. I am thrilled that we were bale to accommodate your early check in and give you some of our most sought out firework view rooms! We hope you choose Hampton again in the future and we thank you for staying with us. Until next time!

Summary Heading: Great stay super close to Disney
Summary: Nice hotel. Clean. Friendly staff. Good breakfast. Has an outdoor pool. Decent gym with free weights. Only a mile from Disney. Lots of restaurants around the area as well. Next door is a fantastic Italian ice/ice cream place called Joe‚Äôs. Buca Di Beppo in parking lot as well. We had a great stay here!
Manager Response: Hi TravelingDad84,  Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review! As a traveling dad, I am sure the pool area and surrounding restaurants are the key to a happy stay. We are happy to have provided both of these to you during your stay. Bring the family back again soon!

Summary: The attention to customer service their friendly disposition and the speediness of our check in. Never moody. Always smiling. Thank you! Will come again if I‚Äôm in the area. There are some places I will never visit again due to LACK of CUSTOMER SERVICE. But here I will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Hello Anna I,  Thank you for your sweet comments regarding our team members! They strive for service excellence and we are always happy here at Hampton. We love to make our guests happy every day and we are excited to welcome you back anytime!

Summary: Comfortable and room was well furnished and decor was updated as expected.  Room came with a nice 50 inch flat screen which was great for watching sports.  Located within a nest of other hotels and restaurants. Family friendly venue as many Disneyland-bounded families stay here.   Breakfast was the usual Hampton menu. Will revisit if we‚Äôre in the area again.
Manager Response: Hello Bill F,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are thankful that you enjoyed our renovated rooms and convenient location. Whether you are coming for Disneyland or another purpose, we would love to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Excellent staff who were helpful and courteous throughout my stay. Kim was a standout, ensuring the trip for myself and my family to be a memorable one. The rooms were comfortable and clean. Well done!
Manager Response: Hello smp188,  Thank you for the 5 star review! Kim is a true asset to our team and I am so happy that she was able to accommodate you and your family during your stay. Please visit again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent and only 0.25 miles away from Disney!
Summary: Although we are not going to Disney it seems everyone else here is!!! Perfect location and just a stones throw away....0.25 miles to be exact. The Hotel has been completely refurbished to an excellent spec. It‚Äôs very clean and modern and room fabulous! Microwave and fridge was perfect for our needs as we bought a microwaveable dinner with us last night and a bottle of wine. Lovely, simple breakfast of eggs, waffles etc, fruits and juices and coffee.
Manager Response: Hello Penelope C,  We are so glad that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms! We love hearing such great feedback from our guests. Even though you were not here for Disneyland, we are honored to have made a positive impact on your stay. Come back again soon and maybe set aside a day to visit Mickey Mouse as well. Until next time!

Summary Heading: Great Location, Close to Disney, Paid Shuttle, Free Breakfast and usual Hampton Inn Quality
Summary: Stayed for 2 nights in order to see Disneyland. 5 minute drive from the Theme Parks and Downtown Disney.  Small pool and Hot-tub/Jacuzzi outside. Usual free Hampton Inn breakfast. Decent size 2 Queen Room with comfortable beds. Very busy hotel but good value for the location. Walking distance to local stores and restaurants.
Manager Response: Hi Dean W,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. It sounds like you have stayed in your fair share of Hampton Inns and we were happy to be a part of your adventure. Please come back again soon!

Summary: overall, it is not bad. The location is good and breakfast is better than other hotels. it is clean. staff is friendly and happy to help. The check in and check out processes are quicker than other hotel. The lobby is clean. Internet is fast and easy to access. I will recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Hello chenjuan525,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. Our team is always willing to lend an extra hand and assist whenever needed. Please come back again soon for another great stay!

Summary: Had a great stay with my family very close to Disneyland so walk wasn‚Äôt bad at all!  Great front desk staff and kitchen knows how to cook up some good meals!  Kind and friendly environment!  Will be returning for my next visit.
Manager Response: Hello MoonKnight94,  Thank you for your 5 star review! I am thrilled to see that our location and staff made a positive impact on your stay with us and we would love an opportunity to host you and your family here again!

Summary: Whenever I go to Disneyland, I try to stay here because of all the things I get here. Their hot breakfast is awesome. Staff is really nice. It's close to the Toy Story parking lot. A lot of the times, this Hilton property is cheaper than the Garden Inn across they way, and they don't have free breakfast!
Manager Response: Hello osmo250,  We love our regulars and thank you for your continued loyalty to our property! Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, especially when heading out for a day at Disneyland. We are happy to have you and welcome you and your family back anytime!

Summary: Our stay was amazing. Hotel was clean and organized every single night we stayed and breakfast was very good as well. Vero helped us with everything we needed! She was the best. Definitely recommend you stay here!
Manager Response: Hello Mauricio J,  Thank you for the wonderful shout out to our breakfast rockstar Veronica! She is a great asset to our team and we are happy to have her. I am so glad she was able to assist you during your stay and we can'y wait for your return visit!

Summary: My room wasn‚Äôt properly cleaned even after leaving a tip . The beds are very comfortable and it‚Äôs a beautiful hotel but too bad the housekeeping sucks . Friendly staff . We stayed here a week to go to Disneyland. If you plan on using the shuttle be warned it‚Äôs in the last parking space for the buses so it‚Äôs a walk if you have small children it was difficult for us .
Manager Response: Hello twinmomma082012,  I apologize for the housekeeping service that you received during your stay. I have already addressed your concerns with my executive housekeeper to ensure this does not happen again. Thank you for the feedback and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Hotel California ... such a LOVELY place!
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights during a high school re-union.  The room I stayed at was a standard double queen which had adequate space and very clean. It had a good sized mini-fridge and microwave and a small wet bar area with a coffee maker. Beds and pillows were super comfy. There was an extra chair besides the desk chair and plenty of outlets for cable & power charges.  Breakfast is served between 6- 10 am which included eggs and either meat or potatoes. They have an array of toast, bagel, muffins, fruit, cereal, juices, milk and coffee. They also have a make your own waffle bar which I used every day. It's not gourmet, but it was very hearty and filling. They do a good job of keeping items stocked and areas clean. Sure will come back and stay here.
Manager Response: Hi 677cynthiav,  Thank you for the detailed review of our property! You nailed in on the head and we are glad that you had an enjoyable experience with us. Come back again and we will have a delicious waffle waiting for you!

Summary: Had a late check-in which was no problem for the staff. Everything was within walking distance including restaurants, grocery shopping and ice cream parlor. Disneyland is within walking distance but they provide a shuttle which makes that irrelevant. Pool was heated, breakfast was well prepared and the staff kept it stocked despite the amount of people at the hotel. Easy access to I-5. Suite had a stove top, microwave, full refrigerator and even a all the dishes needed to eat in or on a budget. You can see the fireworks at Disneyland if you have a room on the right side of the hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Edward C,  We love to cater to our families that stay with us, so thank you for choosing Hampton Inn for your accommodations! Our suites are great for those who need the extra space and have added amenities that worked out great for your family. Breakfast can get busy, but our breakfast champions do a great job keeping the area clean and stocked for every guest that joins us. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Great room comfortable for my family of 6.  Clean! Quiet and safe for my kids.  Pool was very clean. Breakfast was awesome something new each day.  Room was large and confortable pillows.  All the utensils and dishes was a great help for our trip.
Manager Response: Hi leslyeolan,  With a family of 6, you must have enjoyed one of our one bedroom suites! It is wonderful to hear how great your stay was and we would be honored to have you back again soon!

Summary: This is a great hotel.  The rooms are nice.  The pool and hot tub were great.  The hotel staff were awesome especially the evening desk person Celine.  It is located close the Disneyland, but you can purchase a bus ticket to get you there.  The only down side is having to pay for parking, but most hotels in this area charge for parking.
Manager Response: Hi mattwied,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property and our wonderful supervisor Celine! We strive for the best service and Celine is a great example of that. We hope you choose Hampton again for your next stay in the area!

Summary Heading: A great hotel with great value and service near Disneyland
Summary: We have been to Disneyland dozens of times.  We always stay at Hilton or DoubleTree.  This is the first time we stay at this Hampton Inn.  We were amazed by the facilities and services we received, and we pay less for it.  Jesus R in the reservation department is fantastic, making all the arrangement to meet our needs.  This will be our favorite hotel to stay near Disneyland from now on.
Manager Response: Hi S-C W,  Thank you for your 5 star review of our property and team members! We are glad you chose to stay at Hampton for your Disneyland adventure and we would love to become your new go-to hotel for the area. Come back again soon!

Summary: We frequently stay at Hampton Inns and chose this one for a quick visit to Disneyland. The hotel is very close to the park and there are many restaurants in the area as well. We also took in an Angels baseball game which was a very short drive away.  We opted to drive and park at the Toy Story lot rather than taking the shuttle. The price was about the same and we didn‚Äôt want to have to come and go at certain times. The Toy Story lot is very close by and after parking a bus takes you up to the security area for the parks. This area does back up pretty bad so go early to avoid the crowds.  The breakfast was very good and about what you would expect from a Hampton. The room was nice and everything worked well. They do charge for parking but I imagine that is pretty common in this
Manager Response: Hello GoVols79,  It sounds like you and your family have perfected your trips to Disneyland! From Angels baseball games to Disneyland, our location worked out well for you. We were happy to have hosted you in our property and would be honored to see you stay with us again.

Summary: We were in town for our Scentsy Family Reunion.  We stayed at the hotel for a week and loved every second of it!  The room was great, the staff (especially Alex) was fantastic, and the suggestions given were fabulous.  So glad to have stayed here!
Manager Response: Hello randibryantscentsy,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We were happy to have hosted you for the family reunion and appreciate all the wonderful samples! We would be happy to welcome you all back next time and maybe we can even be your host hotel for room accommodations!

Summary: We would definitely recommand this hotel to anyone wanting to visit Disneyland. The free breakfast and convient shuttle made our stay comfortable.
