The only reason I don't give this poperty 5 stars is that it was not luxurious and the pool area was small.   Rooms and common areas were clean and updated. Service was friendly and efficient.   It is located 2 min from a Target, close enough to Disneyland that you could walk but far enough from the noise and crazyness of the parks.
Manager Response: Hello engtech,  We love our Disneyland vacationers who stay with us! It means the world to have families spend their well deserved vacations at the Hampton Inn. Plus, who doesn't love Dinsey? I am glad our renovated rooms and location suited your needs. Next time to come to the area we will be happy to welcome you back!

Summary: I greatly appreciated the breakfast supervisor Anthony's help. He went above and beyond his duties. Rooms were clean and we felt safe. Property is located near restaurants (walking distance.)  I would recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Keron H,  Anthony is a new addition to our team and is doing a wonderful job, so thank you for recognizing all his efforts. I will be sure to pass it along to him. We hope to have made a lasting impact on you and your family and we hope to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay and even better customer service
Summary: Best staff ever! Welcoming, accommodating and excellent staff who went above and beyond at all times for their guests. Clean rooms, comfy beds, excellent breakfast, easy to access property, close proximity to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi Marianne W,  Thank you for the wonderful review! We do our best to give our guests the best experience possible, so we are glad to have done just that. We hope you choose Hampton again for all your future visits to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Absolutely, positively a great experience.  Beyond exceptional.  Is there enough adjectives to satisfy the 200 minimum word review demand placed on this poor, weary traveler?  Could my hotel experience be dampened by squeezing out text?
Manager Response: Hello clinthufft1,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how great your experience was. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here with 2 young kids. Got upgraded to suite since we're Hilton Gold status. Staff was extremely friendly. Breakfast was good (eggs, meat, fruit, bread). Shuttle leaves from the road in front of embassy suites, which is just a quick 2 min walk across the parking lot from Hampton
Manager Response: Hi ms454545,  Thank you for being a valued Gold member. Those perks come in handy when traveling with the family. I am glad you enjoyed your suite upgrade and our hot breakfast each morning. We love welcoming our Hilton Honors members back and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great stay. The staff was very friendly and helpful and instantly made us feel welcome. They helped with information on transportation to Disneyland and purchasing shuttle tickets, and greeted us each time we came in. One manager even helped us with a dead car battery by jumping the battery with his own car. The breakfasts were good with plenty of food and the room was comfortable and clean. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello terill2018,  Thank you for your 5 star review! I am so happy that we were able to make your stay so magical. Come back again soon!

Summary: We are HHonors Gold Members and have stayed at many Hilton brands.  Just two weeks ago we stayed at a horrible location...see previous post.  Anyway, upon check-in, Celine handled our check-in process like a true professional, offering our member drinks and snacks, organized our room upgrade, and gave us an awesome dinner recommendation.  She was cheerful, looked professional and carried herself as such.  Management needs to look at an internal mentor program or consider placing her into a management program.  Hampton needs more dedicated team members like Celine. The room was clean, inviting, smelled good, and was absolutely perfect.  I would recomend this hotel. The secret is out now.  But I must give credit where credit is due.
Manager Response: Hi Felix C!  We are so happy to hear how awesome your stay was! We do everything in our power to make each of our guest's interactions one to remember, so I am thrilled to here that Celine did just that. Thank you for sharing your experience and we are eager for your next stay with us! Take care!

Summary Heading: Overpriced, not welcome me as HHonor member
Summary: While checking in, I wasn‚Äôt welcomed as a Gold Member. I requested a water bottle. The lady at the counter said I must pay for a water bottle. I declined and told her that I didn‚Äôt get the brown bag for a special member.   Joshua/Jordan said he would reduce the rate because a non-profit agency, Goodwill, had invited me to stay there for three nights. I ended up staying there at over $200 per night, which was overpriced for my budget.  Three nights: $771 total    The elevator was slow, and I had to wait a long time to return my room.  There was no meeting room at this hotel.    On the positive side, there are nearby excellent restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello DeafAccessibility,  I apologize for your experience here at the hotel. we value our Hilton Honors members and your treatment was not acceptable. Our rates are higher than normal considering we are in peak season, so the discount was likely the best available rate we had at the time. We appreciate your feedback and hope for the chance to host you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good location. Nice room and good breakfast. We can visit Disneyland that located in the short distance to hotel.
Summary: Good location. Nice room and good breakfast. You can visit Disneyland that located in the short distance to the hotel. You can also access Little Saigon that take 10 minutes from the hotel. Good services and clean room.
Manager Response: Hi martinhntc,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am glad our location was so convenient for you and that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms. If you find yourself in the area again, we hope you choose Hampton for your accommodations!

Summary Heading: great Location if you want to be close to disneyland!
Summary: We were there for a basketball tournament in Irvine,CA.  It was close to our venue and there were a lot of eating places around.  we could walk a few steps out the hotel and eat at buca di beppo, there was also an Itailan Ice/ icecream place with in walking distance that was very nice to have close by.  We never used the pool, but it was busy the whole time we were there.  The Breakfast had a lot to choose from, Im Celiac so I just grabbed the fruit and a hard boiled egg.  They had mini omelettes, sausage, potatoes, waffles, cereal, bagels, toast, oatmeal and fruit!  It was very busy in July, a lot of families heading to disney I imagine.  The rooms were nice, beds comfortable, and the lobby was really nice with cold lemon water available and fresh baked cookies in the
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We were happy to host the multiple teams this past weekend for the tournament. Location is key in getting all the players to the venue on time, plus being so close to Disney is a plus! On behalf of our team here, we appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again in the future!

Summary: We loved this hotel. The rooms were clean with a great sleep. They had three pool areas. Plenty of room for all the kids to play and relax. And the parking was great even with the hotel being fully booked. Loved it and would stay again!!
Manager Response: Hello 4johnson10,  We are thrilled to hear that you LOVED our hotel. It makes our day when we can create rewarding experiences for our guests. During this heat, the pool area is a must, so we are glad you were able to enjoy it while you were here. We love our repeat guests, so come back again soon!!

Summary: This was our second stay at this Hampton Inn and I must say, we have not been disappointed! Being Disney annual pass holders for many years, we have stayed at various hotels in the area. After staying at this Hampton in May and again this week, I think we‚Äôve found our ‚Äúgo-to spot‚Äù. The rooms have been recently updated and are great! We have stayed in a suite both times and it has been perfect for our family. The rooms are spacious, the full kitchen is nice (although we‚Äôve really only used the fridge and sink), the beds are comfy, and the staff has been great. With the heat wave in Southern CA this past week, we utilized the pool area after a busy Disney morning and it was fabulous! Our 2 year old loved the mini-pool in the middle and as a parent I felt safe with him in it
Manager Response: Hi SumKinderTeacher,  Thank you for the amazing review of our property! I think you hit all areas that we strive for excellence in and is exciting to know that you have become one of our many loyal guests. Our suites are the best fit for a family just like yours and the pool area makes for a refreshing break from the hustle and bustle of Disney. I would love to personally meet you during your next stay and get to know you and your family some more. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent service and access to Disney
Summary: Was booked with the Disney package.  Arrival they had all the items needed for park entry, stored luggage until check-in while we were playing at the Magic Kingdom - nice breakfast bar included and staff delivered service excellence!
Manager Response: Hi dpresley2016,  Our Disney packages are the best deal and we're glad it worked out so well for you! We aim for excellence in terms of service and are happy to take your experience to the next level every time. Thank your for staying with us and we hope to see you next time!

Summary: We were very happy with our stay. We were treated in a friendly manner each time we arrived or departed the hotel. The location is easy access to many restaurants. The rooms were comfortable. The Kitchen was great for us to prepare each day for our sporting event. The breakfast was crowded but the staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: Hello Fran D,  Friendly is our middle name and I am happy that our team let that shine through throughout your whole stay. Our location is very convenient and the suite you had is our most sought out room we have on property. We are always happy to serve you and your family anytime and we hope you come back again soon!

Summary: If you don‚Äôt want to pay the high rates in the park, this is a hotel close by which is connected via shuttle bus. A bit outdated but nice, large rooms. Pleasant team with a few exceptions. Lobby bar and restaurant offering pleasant service and excellent food.
Manager Response: Hello Paul T,  Thank you for your review. While we do not have a bar or restaurant, we appreciate you taking the time to review our property. Perhaps your review was for another hotel, but we do hope you choose to stay with Hampton during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: We had a 5 night stay and the experience was incredible.  Alex and Jordyn greeted us and were excellent and make sure our accommodations were perfect.  Very friendly staff and very clean hotel.  This made it comfortable to come home at the end of long days nice and refreshing.  I was very pleased with our stay and experience.  I would definitely recommend staying here and we will continue to do so.  Thanks Alex and Jordyn and to all the staff.
Manager Response: Hi mikecponce,  We strive for excellence and Alex and Jordan truly helped make that possible. I will be sure to pass on the message to them. I love hearing that we made you feel at home since we know the importance of this while traveling. We cannot wait for your next stay. Come back again soon!

Summary: My volleyball team stayed here for a 4 day tournament and really enjoyed ourselves. Their breakfast set up was well organized with lots of variety. Dining area was very spacious to accommodate many. Pool area was nice.
Manager Response: Hi LinC8988,  I am thrilled to hear that you and your volleyball team had such a successful tournament here in Anaheim. we are honored to have hosted your team and welcome you back any time!

Summary: We should have been treated with an (I Can help you attitude)   Instead, we got and attitude, with an (I Can't help you).   Upon arrival, I was treated very poorly by Selene.....Hotel Manager...what a joke that was. The room I received, was NOT WHAT I PAID FOR.   I paid for a king bed suite with balcony and a view of the Disney firework show and received a NON SUITE room...NO Balcony and obstructed view of the fireworks, we could only view the top/tip of the Disney show.  when my wife confronted the Manager, she was treated very poorly and unprofessionally.    We were only able to salvage the last 2 night due to 2 exceptional employees....Kim & Denise.  if you have to stay here....check in with these ladies...NOT Selene.  the rooms were clean, the service by Selene Terrible,
Manager Response: Hello Michael-and-Karrie,  I deeply apologize for the behavior of our staff member. You are 100% correct, you deserve the best service and we fell short of that. I will personally speak with the individual mentioned and ensure this does not happen again. Here at Hampton, we strive for much better than this, and I cannot stress it enough that this is so far from where we aim to be in terms of service. I am happy to see that other team members made up for some of your stay, but based on your review, I understand that this put a tremendous damper on your anniversary celebration. Please feel free to reach out to me directly in order to rectify this matter at ashley.lopez@hilton.com

Summary: Our dance group needed a comfortable place to stay for our Disney performance.  Hampton Inn employees went out of their way for us.  They assisted us with our different group arrival dates and with our many questions.  They also helped us with our costumes the day of our performance.
Manager Response: Hi Monica C,  I am thrilled to see that your dance group had such a successful stay with us! We do our best to make our groups feel at home and have the most seamless visit from check in to check out. We hope to welcome you back again very soon for another exciting stay!

Summary: We have stayed at this Hampton Hotel a few times and they have continued to improve. We love the queen size beds and the complimentary breakfast each morning! The shuttle to Disneyland is very convenient!
Manager Response: Linda M,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We appreciate your loyalty to our hotel and are delighted to see that you enjoy our breakfast and our newly renovated rooms. We can't wait for the next opportunity to host you and your party again!

Summary: The title says it all.  You start with a tune, and end up wondering if it could be any better.   Was in the area for Disneyland.  Good location near the Disney Parks.    Felt that hotel and room was dated.  A new coat of paint, and perhaps new carpeting would enhance the experience.    Parking was $17/night.  No way around that.  A Bucca di Beppo shares the same lot, and there is no distinction of what property owns which spaces. Technically you can park at the restaurant and be okay.  Parking is also tight at night because it gets full and the spaces are smaller than regular parking spaces.   Breakfast was typical for Hampton Inn.    Same as the other Hampton Inn properties....  except that they also sell Disney tickets.   Price is competitive with other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Hi Lentara71,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your feedback regarding the parking lot and the rooms. Considering we just completed our full guest room renovation, I am assuming you are referring to the carpet in the lobby area. We are in the process of replacing the carpet squares on as as needed basis, which will improve the overall look and feel of the lobby. We hope you choose Hampton again for your next trip in the area. Take care!

Summary: We stayed here when we were visiting Disneyland.  Nicely kept facility that is close to Disney properties.  Room was spacious and comfortable.   Breakfast each morning had many options.  They sell shuttle bus tickets at front desk for $7 a person that gets you to/from Disney.
Manager Response: Hello Nancy S,  Thank you for the 5 star review. I see that you enjoyed all areas of the hotel including breakfast, the shuttle and most importantly, your spacious room! We can't wait for you to come back again!

Summary: We booked this hotel based on all the Trip Advisor reviews. We were only staying for one night and we wanted a place that had breakfast. Since I booked using my hilton honors, I was able to pick my room prior to arrival.  I picked a room on the seventh floor that faced Disneyland. We had a great view of the fireworks! It was nice to sit on the bed and just watch. The pool was a decent size and they were great about refilling the towels. The front desk was extremely helpful and friendly. The beds were comfortable. The fridge in the room also had a little freezer. We brought freezable lunch packs (PackIt) and were able to freeze them overnight for use the next day. The breakfast was good and had selections for everyone. They had waffles, bacon, scrambled eggs, hard boiled eggs,
Manager Response: Hi VegasMom99,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and using your Hilton Honors points. We are glad that your stay was superb and that you enjoyed your firework view room! I also see that the breakfast did not disappoint, especially since it was a key factor in choosing our hotel. We are excited to host you again anytime and look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Upon check in, we were give. Our choice of snacks to take with us to he park the next day, or gobble them up ASAP.  The beds were very comfortable with a lot of pillows. The bathroom door was a barn door that didn‚Äôt have a lock, but I guess if you are staying in s hotel room, you are generally staying with someone you know well and don‚Äôt need to worry over locking the door. Nice shower and a well stocked bathroom. There was a shuttle ($7) that took us to and from the park. The shuttle filled up quickly and rather than leave all the passengers stranded for 20 mi. Wait they immediately called another bus. So nice.
Manager Response: Hi sejw,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the shuttle service and our newly renovated rooms! You moms only trip sounds like it was success and we were so happy you chose Hampton Inn for your lodging needs. Come back anytime you feel the need for a mom's getaway again!

Summary: This is a great place to stay during your family Disneyland trip.  We have stayed here twice now and will be back for years to come.  The staff is AMAZING.  Celine and Jessica were such a pleasure to deal with.  They really took care of my family during our stay.  They can help with park tickets as well as shuttle tickets.  It's a easy direct  shuttle ride to the park.  The breakfast is great and always a hit with the kiddos.  Rooms have been updated recently so the stay is always nice.  Can't say enough good things about this property.
Manager Response: Hello Mike M,  Thank you for giving out shout out to two of our star employees. Both of them really take service to the next level, so I am glad you were able to experience their hospitality. We can't wait for the next chance to serve you and your family. Come back again soon!

Summary: Updated and very clean rooms.  Full breakfast included, which makes this hotel a GREAT value!  The hotel provides shuttle service to Disneyland for a small fee.  Super convenient location for a fraction of the cost of a Disney resort hotel.
Manager Response: Hello jamesalbin2018,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed our recently renovated rooms and delicious breakfast! We are excited to welcome you and your family back soon!

Summary: The room and breakfast were worse than stays I have had at Motel 6. The price of the room would have been OK if it lived up to the Hampton Inn name. Too far from Disneyland to charge that much for a sub-par experience.
Manager Response: Hi Jeffery B,  I apologize that your experience was less than satisfactory. Our renovation was just completed in December of 2017 so I apologize that you did not enjoy our new product. We strive for all our guests to leave satisfied, so I'm sorry that you did not enjoy your stay. We have received your survey and will look into the concerns you addressed with the appropriate departments.

Summary Heading: Good Location / Poor service by management
Summary: Upon check-in, phone was broken and lanai door was broken. Management insensitive to the issues. Lanai door never got fixed and phone was fixed one day prior to check out. Upon check out no-one was to be found, had to leave a note at the front desk telling them I was checking out. Was promised a refund of one day and was later told because I had prepaid several months prior for my entire stay with credit card and not with cash they couldn't give me a refund. I will say that the majority of the staff were all pleasant and friendly.
Manager Response: Hello,  I am sorry to hear that your stay was less than satisfactory. We strive for all of our guests to have an enjoyable experience and it appears we fell short of that. We are currently working on a solution for our lanai gates to allow room key access, but it appears it is a much larger task than we anticipated. We thank you for bringing these matters to our attention and we hope to have another chance to make it right for you in the future.

Summary: Very nice hotel with a great staff that was friendly and made the whole process from check in to check out smooth and worry free. Convinient to Disneyland with local shuttle every 30 minutes. Great eperience and will stay here again when in the area.
Manager Response: Hello dyessmartin,  Thank you for your wonderful review. Our staff take pride in making your experience and seamless as possible. We would love the chance to serve you again in the future. Come back again soon!

Summary: The staff went above and beyond to accommodate my needs while I was on crutches. This hotel was a tremendous value for the customer service and quality of the room. I WILL stay again for our next trip to Anaheim. Totally recommend!
Manager Response: Hi lesliecoffey,  We are so grateful to have been able to share your trip with you despite the fact that you were on crutches. We hope we get to spend your next trip with us on both feet and we will be sure to make sure you leave just as satisfied!

Summary: Staff and facility were great. Clean Rooms, bathroom in master bedroom as well as the double queens. Kitchenette was great. I would bring my family of 5 back here without a second thought. Private balcony was great to overlook the kids ( teens ) as they swam.
Manager Response: Hi iddihsman,  We appreciate your wonderful review. For a family of 5, our suites are very comfortable and the balcony is always a plus. I am happy that your stay was well spent and we look forward to seeing you and your family again next time!

Summary: Seems like hotels are all about cookie cutter the same.  But not this one.  We arrived late after a long drive.  The front desk checked us in quickly and helped with the luggage for out party of four.  Since my grandson was along for this trip they did give us a room on a high floor on the north side so we could catch the Disney fireworks. The room was quite comfortable and clean.  We picked the hotel because of its convenience to Disney.  Check.  And its convenience to Angels stadium. Check.    What I didn't expect was the response when I asked for a pencil for my grandson's baseball score book.  They searched high and low but no pencil was to be found.  We had plenty of pens.  As we were loading into the van for the ball field, here comes the front desk staff person with a
Manager Response: Hello Southern_grandpa,  Thank you for the amazing review. These are the moments we live for here at Hampton and I am so glad to have made your stay one to remember! From our location, to your clean and comfortable room, our team was delighted to serve you and your family. We hope to see you again next time and for many years to come!

Summary: Great experience. New and updated amenities. Nice and quite even though it is in close proximity to tourists attractions. Very central to restaurants and local businesses . Would definitely recommend and stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello medinama,  Thank you for your wonderful review of our renovated product! I am happy to see that you enjoyed our location and we are excited to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This Hampton Inn has been our home at Disneyland for nearly 20 years. On occasion I've tried others in the area and we always come back as there's no comparison in value for a large family visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi shaunkelly2018,  Thank you for your loyalty to our property these past 20 years! We love our regular guests and think of you all as a part of our Hampton family. we hope to enjoyed the recent renovations and we hope to welcome you back year after year!

Summary: stayed on trip to Hawaii w/layover to do disney...staff couldn't be more helpful with directions or to provide ride to LAX....has a shuttle to disney thats a plus so you don't drive and pay for parking....sells tickets to disney too if you need them
Manager Response: Hello dotdoctor2002,  Thank you for your 5 star review. Wow Disneyland and Hawaii all in one trip! Sounds like a great vacation and we were happy to be a positive part of your trip!

Summary: Stayed here during a quick weekend getaway. Denise at the front desk was awesome! Actually all the front desk staff was awesome but she checked us in and was super friendly despite a large group checking in at the same time. Had a great room facing Disney so we were able to see some of the fireworks
Manager Response: Hello may0529,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff really go the extra mile to make each guest's stay memorable, so I am glad Denise was able to make your stay one to remember. Come back again soon!

Summary: We had a wonderful experience at Hampton Inn and Suites.  It was our first time at this location and was recommended by multiple friends.  It did not disappoint.  We opted for the Disneyland shuttle, which was such a great investment!
Manager Response: Hi MichelleEbright,  We are so happy to have been referred to by your friends. It is our goal to provide our guests with Distinguished Hospitality, and we are happy to have satisfied you and your family for your trip to Disneyland! We hope to have created loyal guests in you so that we may have the opportunity to serve you again in the future!

Summary: We enjoyed the convenience to the park but would have been nice if it had been a little closer. The breakfast was great and the room was spacious and very clean!  We had to walk or uber to everything so it would have been nice if there was a  free shuttle.
Manager Response: Hi Nancy J,  Thank you for the 5 star review. We are happy to see that you enjoyed the breakfast and our newly renovated rooms. We are sorry that we could not meet your expectations with our transportation, considering the hotels all use a 3rd party service, however we hope this does not deter you from visiting again in the near future. Come back again soon!

Summary: Great hotel.  Will stay here again. Digital Key was convenient.  Area was extremely close to Disneyland.  I will definitely stay at this hotel when I come to Anaheim.  Lots of restaurants and shopping. Loved it!!
Manager Response: Hi robertogerardo,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We love that you loved your stay and we're delighted that your time spent with us was a success. We can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary: Amazing staff! Newly renovated property. Close to Disney and the shuttle to the park is great. Highly recommend both for visits  to Disney or just if you have business in Anaheim. Free breakfast, reasonable parking rate, (all properties by Disney have a fee), and rooms have a microwave and small fridge.
Manager Response: Hi lcampbell431,  Thanks for the 5 star review Lynda! We are happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for a family vacation to Disneyland. It was the perfect stay and we will definitely be back. Rooms are very clean and the free breakfast is great! We also loved that they have a pool, so we could relax after a long day. Bonus, they have a kiddie pool.
Manager Response: Hello nbovasso,  Thank you for allowing us to host you and provide you with a perfect stay! we are glad you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and our special kiddie poll. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: From the minute we walked in the hotel staff were friendly and able to answer all of our questions.  The room was great and my daughter loved the close access to the pool and hot tub from our 1st floor room.
Manager Response: Hello Donna B,  Thanks for the shout out to our wonderful team! We are glad your daughter enjoyed our lanai rooms with direct pool access. Those rooms seem to be a hit for those who plan to use the pool area during their stay!

Summary: We decided to stay at a Hilton hotel this time on our trip to Disney because of a family member that was able to get us their discounted rate. In the past we‚Äôve stayed at closer hotels but this hotel did not disappoint. This hotel is not in walking distance but they do have a shuttle that comes every 30 minutes and the last one leaves the park an hour after it closes. We used the shuttle bc it was cheaper than paying parking.  There‚Äôs a complimentary breakfast every morning that has many options and we ate at the hotel every morning. It‚Äôs so convenient, especially for those early park days. You feel the Disney Magic as soon as you enter. The lobby and rooms are very bright and clean, the bathroom was very spacious. There‚Äôs an outdoor pool and jacuzzi that looks nice but we
Manager Response: Hi Ashley T,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your feedback about our property. We are so happy to see that your stay was enjoyable for you and your family. From the staff to the breakfast and our location, we were so happy to have made your stay one to remember! Come back again soon!

Summary: Wonderful breakfast, very clean, and the staff are very nice and helpful. Never had any issues, would return to this hotel again. The staff where very helpful when asked about beaches and other fun places to visit. It is also nice to have great restaurants only steps away, the convention center is also a 10 min walk away. Great location.
Manager Response: Hello Sara M,  Thank you for the 5 star review! I am pleased to hear about how helpful the staff was during your stay! Location is also key, so I am glad that our central location worked out so well for you. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel and Location to Disneyland
Summary: Had a great  stay. Clean well appointed comfortable room. Lived up to the Hilton brand. Easy access to Disneyland Parks. Shuttle service was great (fee) or uber it.Breakfast in the morning fruit cereal waffles and different hot items buffet. Hot coffee 24/7. Cant beat having Joe's ice cream just steps away!!! A great treat after visiting the parks. Staff were VERY nice. Tons of parking and felt safe in the hotel area.  Great price/valve for Disneyland area. Our room over looked the pool. Pool was very nice
Manager Response: Hello Nancy B R,  We are so happy that your stay was one for the books! From our rooms to the friendly staff, we are glad to have lived up to the Hilton standards that you are so well acquainted with. We hope to see you again for your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Had a great relaxing stay.  Clean well appointed comfortable room.  Lived up to the Hilton brand.  Easy access to Disneyland Parks.  Bus service close or uber it. Half mile to toy story parking lots or a mile all the way to the parks.  Breakfast in the morning fruit cereal waffles and different hot items buffet.  Hot coffee 24/7.  Cant beat having Joe's ice cream just steps away!!!  A great treat before or after visiting the parks.
Manager Response: Hi stephberger,  Thanks for the 5 star review! I am pleased to see that you enjoyed the location and amenities offered here at the Hampton Inn. Come back for some more great service and Joe's Italian Ice soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for business or leisure
Summary: Great value and location with ample parking, easy access to dining, shopping, and entertainment.  The hotel staff were highly professional and efficient even as there were a number of guests checking in at once.
Manager Response: Hi debrahB178ZH,  Thank you for taking time to review our hotel. We know you have many choices when staying in the area, so we are glad to see that you enjoyed our location and professional staff. Come back again soon!

Summary: easy check in  with pre check by HH app, clean room with fridge & microwave, windows open slightly for air in room, parking is $17 per day but plenty available, easy to access Disney shuttle and local restaurants are walking distance, breakfast is included and adequate, gets busy with vacationers at certain times
Manager Response: Hello Will_G_19,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to see that you enjoyed your stay at the Hampton Inn. From the room to the location and even breakfast, we are glad to have pleased you. Come back again next time and we hope to turn your average rating into a spectacular one!

Summary Heading: Overnight Stay for Day at Disney
Summary: Great location, room included a microwave/fridge, was super clean, roomy, and had comfortable beds. We were in room 325, early April, and have no complaints. We checked in early afternoon and enjoyed the pool and walking around the area - lots of restaurants within walking distance and available activities. We only stayed one night, but would highly recommend this hotel, even if staying for multiple days for Disneyland. The kids enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and the staff was great.  Shout out to Kim, Jordan, and the early morning desk guy (sorry I didn‚Äôt catch your name) even if you are a Ravens fan.  ;)
Manager Response: Hi Sandi K!  Thanks for the 5 star review! I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, even if it was just for one night. I will be sure to share with the team members you mentioned including Darnell who is our overnight Ravens Fan! Come back again soon, maybe for more than one night next time!

Summary: The location, staff and cleanliness was excellent. The complementary breakfast was great as well. The only complaints I have are the 17$ per day for parking as well as paying for the shuttle bus to DL. For almost $100 a night, thus should be included or at least the shuttle should be reduced. It was almost $50 per day(daily pass)  for 4 people!!
Manager Response: Hi sbrant21567,  Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed the buffet breakfast, location and our wonderful staff! I apologize for your dissatisfaction with the parking and shuttle. Both of those services are leased out and we do not have control of the prices for them, Just to clarify the shuttle should have only been $7 per day / person for an all day pass. I apologize if there was confusion with the pricing for that service. We hope you choose us again in the future and we will be sure not to disappoint!

Summary: On their web site explains that if debit card used a hold for the total amount would be on hold.  So I used my credit card, and they also put a hold on it and had to wait up to 30 days to release it.  During my trip I had both of my cards on hold until check out.  Also I forgot my keys at the lobby and they did not do anything beyond that saying I am sorry.  I asked for security several times and they did not sound sure about their own security.  They keep asking me to wait until the general manager get on shift. I end up paying a extra key since check out time expired.
Manager Response: Hi Lizethluna,  I apologize for the confusion with our deposit policy. Regardless of which method of payment you choose to use, we do ask for a deposit at check in to be verified prior to issuing keys to a room to avoid non-payment. You should not have had to put both method of payments down, so I will address that with the staff. As far as the key situation, I apologize that we were not able to assist you. We do not have a security team and the only individuals who can gain access to keys in a locked vehicle are the police department or a roadside assistance company. Thank you for taking the time to review our property and should you find yourself in the area again, we hope you give us another chance to serve you.

Summary: We planned our stay for the weekend to celebrate my sons upcoming 11th birthday at Disneyland. We werent expecting such an amazing room or stay! The staff was excellent, very friendly and helpful! we stayed at the Hyatt the night prior and we were not impressed at all and they were overpriced for what they offered.  We plan to stay at the Hampton Inn and Suites for here on out. Thank you again to the staff for their excellent service and for making feel at home.
Manager Response: Hello soniaeloya,  I a so happy that your birthday was such a success at our Hampton Inn! We are glad that you have become a Hampton lover and we hope you continue to return over and over again. See you next time!

Summary: Title says it all. One of the best Hilton‚Äôs I‚Äôve stayed at and I‚Äôve been to at least 30 different Hilton‚Äôs in the last 2 years. Absolutely loved the shower with additional shower wand. Room was VERY clean. Friendly staff. The breakfast wasn‚Äôt on the level of an Embassy Suits but it served its purpose.
Manager Response: Hello Bleek300,  Thank you for the great review! We are so happy to have made your stay and we hope to welcome you back for years to come!

Summary Heading: About the best value in the area
Summary: Clearly a much older property, but renovations make it more than adequate.  AC unit was quite old and loud cycling way too often, so we just left fan set to to on at night.   One of the best breakfast areas of any of the 20+ Hamptons I have visited; many of them are just way too small. The only complaints at all are no fart fan in the bathroom, so humidity builds up quickly in the very modern barn door style shower.  No shuttle, I was really surprised at this.  It is way too far to walk being about 8 blocks away.  Most hotels have their own shuttle, but the rates are very reasonable, so ill take that as a great value.  The 3rd party shuttle that comes to the parking lot is $7/person/day, which just adds up to way too much for a family of 6.
Manager Response: Hi Daniel H,  We appreciate your 5 star review of our renovated property. We apologize or the A/C unit during your stay. Next time simply let us know and we will have someone from our maintenance department take a look at it to make sure you get a great night's sleep.Our breakfast is one of the largest for Hampton's so we are glad you enjoyed it. The hotel does not have any private transportation since the city manages it for the entire resort area. I apologize that it did not work out for you and your family. We hope to see you again soon for some more Hampton fun!

Summary Heading: Love the renovations and friendly staff
Summary: We‚Äôve stayed at this hotel at least 5 times over the past few years, it‚Äôs very clean and the staff have been friendly and helpful. I was excited to see the newly renovated rooms. Loved the new furniture, very comfy. I was especially pleased with the shuttle service this time. After walking Disneyland all day, what a nice treat to be dropped off at the front entrance of your hotel! In the past you were dropped off at the pickup location, across the parking lot. Not a far walk, but far when your feet ache.
Manager Response: Hi Stacey R,  Wow 5 years has gone by fast! We love having you stay year and year and with our brand new renovated rooms, we are happy to see that you love them! The shuttle company does a great job and every once and a while their drivers go above and beyond to drop off at each location. We are glad you experiences this during your stay. We hope to see you again soon Stacey!

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel.  The outside seemed okay but we were greeted by a friendly front desk clerk who provided us with a lot of info about our stay. The room was recently updated so it was clean and comfortable. The decor was nice and had lots of lighting. I really liked the cabinet with pull out storage bins. I think they did an excellent job of remodeling. I would definitely stay again, as long as the price was right. I did not use the exercise room but my son did and he approved. There are a lot of places to eat nearby. We didn't walk to Disneyland but if you're in good shape and don't mind walking a bit, I think it would be at least a 20 minute walk. I believe there is a shuttle but we didn't use it. I'll be back.
Manager Response: Hello weluvtrvln,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We appreciate your feedback and are so glad that you enjoy the renovated rooms. We hope you do choose to stay again soon so we can continue to show you what Hampton is all about!

Summary: As a Hilton Honors member, I always look for Hampton Inns first when traveling with family. And this one is super close to Disneyland, while also being within walking distance to good food options and great ice cream. They have renovated the room and done a very nice job. Good pool and hot tub. Nice breakfast options. One thing to note: the shuttle to Disney is extra, not included in your room rate. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Chip W,  Thank you for your review. We are glad that our location was so great for your needs! The renovated pool and hot tub are always a hit so we are happy to see that you enjoyed both. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Very busy hotel but excellent customer service
Summary: I stayed here 4 days. I don't think I'd stay here again, but not because of the service, only because it was too busy for me personally. But if you're going to Disney and R&R isn't your main objective, then this is a good place. I wasn't going to Disney but something else nearby, so probably should have booked further away. My first night (Saturday) was very loud, I called the front desk and was told that the hotel next door (shared parking lot) was having a large event until midnight and there wasn't much they could do, but they did send someone out to check. Housekeeping is good, everything was very clean. Breakfast was good but very busy and crowded every morning. The street this hotel is on is also very busy with Disney traffic - both foot and car traffic. But after awhile
Manager Response: Hi Ann T,  Thank you for your valued feedback and honest review. I completely understand your need for a quiet environment and our property can get very busy during the spring and summer months! I am glad we were able to resolve some of your concerns and I hope your stay was still enjoyable. Should you find yourself here for a Disney trip, I hope you will choose Hampton Inn for your travel needs!

Summary: We stayed here for our Disneyland trip. It is a good mile hike to the front gates. This was not a big deal for us. You can take bus service at a extra cost. The parking is shared and is also a additional fee. The room was clean, and the bed was ok. The elevators were being worked on so it took forever for a lift. The breakfast was just ok. Not a whole lot of options if you are vegetarian. Our biggest issues was with the management. Due to a family emergency we needed to shorten our trip by 1 day. Hotel management was unsympathetic and NO reimbursement on our room for the day not used. We contacted the Hampton Inn and they apologized but stated that this is up the acting manager at that location. My husband sent couple of emails explaining and still were denied. In my opinion
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer G,  I apologize for your less than satisfactory experience at our hotel. While the elevator situation is out of our control, I apologize on behalf of management for being unable to assist you with your shortened departure. Sometimes we are subject to non-refundable terms that even we cannot override. I assure you that if we had the discretion to offer you a refund for the unused night, we would have gladly done so. We hope for another chance to serve you under better circumstances so we can show you what our true Hamptonality is all about!

Summary: My intention was to stay in an area that was a short distance from Corona Ca and Gardenia  CA. I liked the accommodations however the distance was farther than I had estimated. I was able to get some exercise on this venture without using the car.
Manager Response: Hi laurenabea,  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Considering Gardenia and Corona are very far from each other, Anaheim is likely the best middle point between the two, however I apologize that we were not a great fit for you. We hope to get to see you again soon when your needs bring you back to Anaheim!

Summary: Excellent room with very comfortable bed.  Clean and excellent outside pool.   Pool water was not heated but wasn't bad.  Good morning breakfast.   Staff was great as they texted me about an hour before arrival to see if any special needs and if I needed directions to hotel.   That was a first.   Loved this property.
Manager Response: Hi Timmy Z,  Thank you for the 5 star review! I am pleased to hear how much you loved our property and that our staff took care of you so well. we hope you choose us again in the future!

Summary: Arturo Sanchez was amazing. He knew my group of colleagues every night we came to have a drink. He cared and learned about our reason for being in Anaheim. I can‚Äôt express how critical that is for customer relations. I was sad to hear he wouldn‚Äôt be here the last night of our trip but he deserves his nights off like no one else managing our industry . He‚Äôs a valuable employee to your organization. Thank you for hiring TALENT.
Manager Response: While we do not have anyone by the name of Arturo, we appreciate the wonderful review!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: We had a newly refurbished suite that was lovely.  The breakfast seemed on the better side for a Hampton Inn.  We got in late and did not feel like going far for dinner, so we walked across the parking lot and had a very nice dinner at Buco de Beppo.  (We were with our son and daughter-in-law, so the restaurant's family style approach worked well.)  There was also a great ice cream place right next door.
Manager Response: Hello VeeLee4,  We are so happy to see that your stay was a success! Buca Di Beppo is a great close by option for dining and you were in great hands with our breakfast team! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Stayed for a week and everything was perfect
Summary: We were here for a family Disneyland trip. The hotel is a great location and is close to Disney Parks and lots of restaurants. The room was newly renovated, very clean and comfortable. The staff was helpful and friendly. The breakfast had good rotating options. The pool was clean and comfortable. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Jordan A,  We are so happy to have hosted you for your family trip to the Happiest Place on Earth! I am glad you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms as well as our team members who made your stay more enjoyable. we hope for you to come back for your next family vacation!

Summary: This hotel is close to Disneyland easy 15 minute walk, or just catch the complementary shuttle from the Disneyland resorts. Right next to Buca di Beppo restaurant and Joe‚Äôs Italian ice cream which is awesome awesome awesome. And close walk to other fine restaurants and fast food restaurants. Easy access to the 5 freeway straight down Chapman Avenue or Orangewood which are right there.
Manager Response: Hello somoman7,  We appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel. Our goal is for all our guests to have a GREAT stay! While I am not sure about a complimentary shuttle, we do have a great shuttle offered here at Hampton. We hope to see you again next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Excellent service and close to Disney
Summary: Arrived at theb hotel for business. The hotel is very clean and service is fantastic. The room was a suite and had plenty of space. Overall , good value for the money. Hotel has a shuttle service to  Disney land.
Manager Response: Hi apopnj,  Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review! I am glad you enjoyed one of our premium suites as well as our stellar team who made your stay extra enjoyable. We hope to see you again soon, maybe next time for a leisure trip to Disneyland!

Summary: great location to convention center and Disney.  walking distance to an ATM and Target.  all sorts of restaurants within walking distance.  nice assortment of breakfast items.  everyone very friendly.  liked the decor of the room, however,  the sliding barn door for the bathroom was not to my liking.  also, I don't particularly care for clear shower doors.  no privacy.  there was a hiccup to our check in/out process.  fortunately, my friends checked their bill before we left, to discover we had been charged double for the parking.  it seems like it was resolved.  there was a convention in town and my friends did experience some noise issues.  I did not.  looks like management took care of my friends, just a little frustrating to them.  all in all, a good stay.
Manager Response: Hi Cindy L,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your feedback regarding our recently renovated rooms. I am glad that we were able to quickly resolve your hiccup at check in and in regards to your friends billing concern. We hope this does not deter you from a future stay with us. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Close convention ctr, restaurants, easy shuttle to Disneyland.
Summary: We enjoyed our quick weekend stay while visiting Disney. There was a music convention/NAMM happening at the same time which luckily we didn‚Äôt incur any issues (tho, would‚Äôve been cool to check it out)
Manager Response: Hi cseverin821,  We are happy to see that your short stay was enjoyable and that you were able to visit during the largest NAMM convention to date! Come back again soon for another wonderful stay at the Hampton!

Summary: It was a weekend getaway at Disneyland. First time staying here, and definitely will come back. We loved the location, the staff always friendly, the rooms very clean and lots of places to go around. Nice restaurants at a few steps. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Hello elvian2018,  Thank you for choosing Hampton for your weekend getaway! It was great to host you for your first time and we are pleased to hear that you will choose Hampton for your future stays as well. Come back again soon!

Summary: Wonderful hotel to stay at. It was very clean and everyone was very friendly. It was very family oriented. Large area for breakfast, which was always open for families to gather at.  They served a very nice breakfast and it was included   Very reasonably priced. Nice size rooms and bathrooms, also very clean. Would recommend to everyone. I will be staying again. Oh, also very convenient for Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hi nevadan2017,  Thank you for the 5 star review of our property. We appreciate you kind comments regarding the staff and breakfast. We are so happy to have made your stay one to remember and we look forward to your return stay with us! Bring your friends and family along and we will be sure not to disappoint!

Summary Heading: Amazing staff,comfortable rooms amazing food! This will always be my first choice!!
Summary: So we stayed in a one room suite and it was perfect! I will never go back to a regular room again. The staff was all smiles they made me feel at home very happy. This is the best place to stay! Breakfast variety was amazing!
Manager Response: Hi deanetteh,  I am so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your 1 bedroom suite as well as our eager staff. Our goal is to give you a home away from home, so thank you for allowing us the chance to make your stay. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is such a great value for being so close to Disneyland. They are in the same complex as Embassy Suites and Hilton Garden Inn, taking the shuttle was very convenient, only picked up passengers for complex and straight to DL. Rooms have been redone, very clean, front desk friendly, and free breakfast is tasty.
Manager Response: Hi 824shirleyy,  We are glad to see that you enjoyed our location as well as the convenience of the shuttle service. Our renovated rooms have been the talk of the town lately and we are very pleased with how great they turned out. We hope to welcome you back again soon so we can turn that 3 star stay into a 5 star stay instead!

Summary Heading: Top tier for the price and location.
Summary: Being right down the street from Disney Land and full of rambunctious kids i was expecting to not get much sleep. I was pleasantly surprised it was pretty quiet. Breakfast is a bit of a zoo in the mornings. The serving area is perhaps a bit too small for the amount of family trying to cram into it. Room was very clean, modern with USB ports all over the place. Well taken care of place and the staff were quick, and in tune with their responsibilities. I was staying for business across town. I don't maybe not the best place for meeting with clients over breakfast - but if your a family in town for fun this is your affordable top tier hotel. You wont be disappointed.
Manager Response: Hello M33945LKdavidm,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. While I see you enjoyed the majority of your stay, I understand the congestion in the hotel clearly had a negative impact on your stay. Our business travelers are very important to us, so we appreciate your feedback on the subject. With that said, we are glad you enjoyed your room as well as how quiet you room was. We hope to see you back again soon, maybe next time to visit the happiest place on earth, Disneyland!

Summary: Everything was wonderful except for breakfast.  There was no one to clean the breakfast tables.  Rooms are very nice. Staff are friendly and helpful.  I have been to this place several times and will come back again.  Price is excellent.
Manager Response: Hi Carl P,  Thank you for your feedback regarding breakfast. We will make sure to speak with the staff regarding the condition of the dining room. We are glad to see that you enjoyed the rest of your stay and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our stay couldn‚Äôt have been any better!  The staff was very attentive and amazing!  They went out of their way to make our stay extra special :-) The hotel was very clean, the breakfast was plentiful and delicious and the beds were super comfortable.  The manager Joe was fabulous and the front desk personnel, especially Celine and Kim, were great!  I have never had such a wonderful hotel experience like this before.......hats off to all of you!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Hi Cheechcat!  Thanks for the great comments regarding our staff! We very much appreciate your kind words and wonderful review of our property. We are always happy to create a great guest experiences, so thank you for allowing us the opportunity to make your stay. We anticipate your next stay at our hotel and cannot wait to serve you again!

Summary Heading: Excellent customer service easy check-in and check-out
Summary: The staff was extremely friendly.  It was very easy to check-in and check-out. The  breakfast selection was excellent and hot coffee was available all day.  The rooms we're clean and the beds were comfortable. I look forward to our next stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Juan G,  Our staff were happy to accommodate you and your family throughout your stay! We are happy to see that your stay was a success and we would be honored to host all of you again in the future. See you again soon!

Summary: I stay at Hampton Inns wherever I travel because I know exactly what to expect and this one was no different.  Good location, clean, average price for a 3 star hotel , nice breakfast.  I had requested an upper floor, quiet room, which I got.  One issue: the shower water pressure wasn't great.  I assume it's because I was on the highest floor; small price to pay for the quiet I got. Otherwise, great!
Manager Response: Hi Beher_LA,  Thank you for being so loyal to Hampton Inn! We appreciate you choosing Hampton Inn for your stay in the Anaheim area. Thank you for your feedback about the water pressure, I will address with my engineering department to ensure everything is in working order. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very quiet hotel, quiet room and great full breakfasts. I will defiantly stay again. It`s very close to shopping, meals and attractions. My room and others looks like they were recently remodeled, so very nice and clean.
Manager Response: Hello D1671SRdarrenm,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are happy to see that you enjoyed our recently renovated rooms as well as our complimentary breakfast. Those tend to win over our guests and we are glad to see that they had the same effect on you. Come back again soon!

Summary: We had a great experience at this hotel! Breakfast was great! They had eggs, sausage, waffles, fruit, different types of pastries. My boys enjoyed that they had blueberry and banana waffles to choose from. Rooms were great! Staff was great!
Manager Response: Hello T3826ZHlisah,  Thank for for the 5 star review! Your experience is so important to us and we are glad to have pleased you in all aspects of the hotel. Come back again soon and we will be sure to take great care of you!

Summary: Took my grandson to adventure city for his 2nd birthday. Only 1 complaint, I always ask for an early check in so we can get him down for a nap. I called the same day I made the reservation and asked for a 1 pm check in. I arrived at 2:30 later then I had planned and the room was not ready. They did work hard at getting us checked in and a room change was made. It was a little after before 3 when were made it to the room. Regular check in time is 3 pm, so this was not an early check in other then that I had not issue. The rooms were clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi Kathleen H,  While we always do our best to accommodate early checks in, sometimes there are circumstances that prevent us from fulfilling all early check in requests, especially when the hotel is sold out the night before. We apologize that we were not able to honor an early check in for you and your Grandson. we are glad you enjoyed the cleanliness and comfort of your room and we hope to welcome you back for another visit.

Summary: We made a last minute reservation and the staff were very accommodating. The first room was nice and big with 2 queen beds. We fit all the kids and our stuff. The second room was down at the end of the hall and was a bit smaller with 1 king bed. We extended our stay and had to change rooms. We didn't get the roll-away bed we requested and the staff comp-ed our room for the night. The hotel staff were all very nice, including the breakfast crew! The kids enjoyed the pool. We enjoyed the breakfast and the relaxing atmosphere. And it was close to everything! (including Knott's, Medieval times, Tar pits, Museums, LA, etc)
Manager Response: Hi navyxman,  Thank you for staying with us last minute. Thankfully we were able to accommodate you and your family. We appreciate your kind words towards our breakfast team. We will be sure to inform them of your review. If you find yourself in the area again, we hope you choose Hampton Inn for your accommodations!

Summary: I stayed at the hotel for two nights and three days with my mom as we were going to Disneyland.  The rooms were great, spacious and clean.  Bed and beddings were very comfy and soft.  Continental breakfast had a great variety of items to choose from and plenty of beverages.  Hotel staff walked around to check on folks having breakfast.  Complimentary coffee, tea and fruit infused water was a plus.  Free shuttle to Disneyland made our stay very convenient.  Only "issues" we had were that upon arrival the hotel staff asked if we wanted a higher or lower floor yet couldn't explain the difference between the two.  And I had to ask where the shuttle stop was (in front of another hotel and in its own area), versus being told right away.
Manager Response: Hello Awa_7,  Thank you for the great review of our complimentary breakfast and your spacious rooms. We are glad you enjoyed the Hampton amenities so much. While the staff may not have been the highlight of your stay, I assure you that we will speak to the team about the above mentioned topics. We hope you choose Hampton again in the future!

Summary: From arrival to departure every staff member went above and beyond expectations.  They were always friendly, helpful, and a pleasure to talk with.  If you are going to need a hotel for your Disney park vacation, this is the hotel to stay at.
Manager Response: Hi Shantell G,  We are honored to be called the best Hampton Inn EVER! It is great to hear that our staff went above and beyond each and every interaction. We strive for the best customer service in town and clearly that was achieved during your stay. We welcome you back anytime as well as all your friends and family!

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn-All the Comforts of Home
Summary: Hampton Inn has never failed to satisfy.  Hot breakfast, clean rooms, friendly staff.  We were upgraded to a suite for our 4 night stay.  Such a luxury.  Left early for the airport before bag breakfasts were out but the hotel clerk made us a few bags to take with us.  So close to Disneyland we were able to walk every day.  We would recommend this hotel to anyone who is going to be in the area.
Manager Response: Hi Bridget S,  Thank you so much for staying with us. We are glad to be your home away from home during your travels. We appreciate your wonderful review and welcome all the recommendations to come visit our newly renovated hotel! See you next time!

Summary Heading: Clean hotel close to restaurants and convenience store
Summary: We had an excellent time here. Breakfast has variety of choices. Shuttel to Disney (for a minimal cost) was very convenient for us.Target and Wallgreens are just nearby. Red Robbins, Outback Steakhouse, Joe‚Äôs Italian Ice Cream are also a few steps away.
Manager Response: Hi Bhrenda L,  Thank you for the great review. We are so happy that our prime location as well as the shuttle and breakfast buffet were a highlight during your stay. Oh and you can never forget Joe's Italian Ice. It is one of the best kept secrets in Anaheim! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel has just been renovated and is excellent. Rooms are modern, clean and good amenities. We were a party of 11 and had 2 rooms. A suite and a 2 queen bed room. Both were excellent. The staff are one of the best I've seen. They went out of the way to make our stay pleasant and even did something special for my niece on Her birthday while we were there. We were there for Disneyland and Universal studios. We used the Disney shuttle and I highly recommend it. For nominal fee, you avoid having to drive and find and pay for parking at Disney - from where you would have to walk again anyway. Local Target store was useful as well as local restaurants. We all enjoyed the hot breakfast to start the day.  I had read a few not so good reviews before booking this hotel but I had
Manager Response: Hello 328balkars,  We are so glad to have hosted you and your party of 11 during your niece's birthday. We are happy that our staff made such a positive impact on your stay and that the shuttle and location suited your needs. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: My experience with Hampton inn was really good. I felt very safe. The amenities were very good too. They have a gym and business office where you can use the internet and computers, but guests can use the wifi free of charge. The rooms are great too. The breakfast buffet has a lot of choices and the food tastes pretty good. My favorite part of my stay is that I didn't need to worry about running to the store to buy some necessities like lotion, pads, sewing kit, razors and stuff like that. Hampton inn keeps some in stock and will provide them for you if you request, free of charge. Will definitely stay with them again if I'm in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hello trulytoni93,  We are so glad you enjoyed all aspects of your stay. We do our best to make your stay feel like a home away from home, so anything we can do to make that happen is our goal. We look forward to having you as our guest when you visit the area again!

Summary: Clean and comfortable rooms. Friendly staff. Close drive to Disneyland, and restaurants, gas stations, and Target. Breakfast was ok. Its complementary so can't complain to much. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello isabelsO601UI,  We are happy to have delivered the Hampton service we strive for every day. From the staff to the rooms, we are glad to have exceeded your expectations! Remember us on your next trip to the Anaheim area and we will be happy to serve you again. Until next time, have a great holiday season!

Summary: The beds at the Hampton are very comfortable! Being able to enjoy a complimentary breakfast every morning really helped the vacation budget. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The shuttle was convenient to take to Disneyland. Just line up early! Great hotel at a great price!
Manager Response: Hi Linda M,  Thank you so much for the amazing review! It great to see that the breakfast was so convenient and that our staff made a positive impact on your stay. We would love the chance to host you and your family again soon! See you next time!

Summary: We had a restroom leak in our room, my luggage and clothes got wet and ended in the trash because all the staff didn't care at all. Every person we talked to said they didn't know anything or couldn't do nothing more than allow us to change rooms. We felt so helpless since everything happened close to 1 am. Wouldn't be able to stay here again knowing they don't care at all, they expected me to just change rooms and leave my stuff there  getting wet because they couldn't help. And just like they forgot about everything like nothing happened.
Manager Response: Hello catherinecU9672QO,  I apologize for your less than satisfactory stay with us. Your experience is not acceptable and it is our goal to ensure that you leave satisfied. We clearly missed that objective this time, and for that I apologize. We will be reaching out directly to get this resolved.

Summary: We liked it.  The breakfast was good.  The room was clean.  The AC worked well.  The shower is good.  The parking was good.  The staff were helpful.  The Disneyland shuttle was a bit overpriced. We used Uber, which was more convenient and cheaper.
Manager Response: Hi Russell A,  Thanks for the 5 star review of our property! It's great to see that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay from breakfast, to cleanliness and maintenance of the room, as well as the service you received. We appreciate the feedback regarding the shuttle. While we cannot set the prices since it is ran by a 3rd party, we do take it into consideration for those who may choose Uber an their choice of transportation as well. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: 8 days at Hampton Inn at Disneyland ~
Summary: We stayed at Hampton Inn and suites for our 8 day adventure at Disneyland this past week. The rooms were clean, fresh, well layed out and spacious. Very happy with our entire stay. Breakfast every morning was delicious with lots of variety, we were always greeted whether coming or going and in general thouroughly enjoyed our stay. Will definitely recommend to friends!
Manager Response: Hi Neely C,  Thanks for choosing Hampton for your adventure to the happiest place on earth! I am happy that our accommodations suited your needs and our service made you feel welcome every day. We welcome you back anytime as well as all your friends and family. See you soon!

Summary: The Hampton was the perfect hotel for a hockey tournament and team of 16 year old boys.  close enough to Disney and some restaurants and not far from the arenas.  Great place for a family to stay as we saw many families heading off to Disney daily
Manager Response: Hi Jennifer T,  Thanks for coming to stay with us during your hockey tournament. We enjoyed having a full hotel again after the renovation and we are glad our accomodations worked out so well for you all. Come back again for your next trip and maybe you can enjoy Disneyland as well!

Summary: Very pleased with our recent stay at this hotel  We arrived late after a long drive and very long day at Disneyland.  Staff was very helpful and welcoming.  Recent remodel of the rooms was great. I look forward to staying at this hotel on our next trip.
Manager Response: Hi happymom702,  We are so happy you chose to stay at the Hampton Inn and we are even more excited that we exceeded your expectations! Thanks for a great 5 star review and we will see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Close enough without the hustle and bustle
Summary: Newly updated rooms. Friendly staff.  Close enough to Disneyland without being in the middle of the hustle and bustle of the parks.  They do have shuttle service.  Free breakfast is always good and multiple choices of food.
Manager Response: Hello Wayne H,  Thanks for the positive feedback regarding our brand new rooms! We are happy to have suited your needs for breakfast and location too. Come back again soon!

Summary: Nice hotel and courtyard. They are working hard to bring this location up to date. In the past it was bad.  Staff is friendly. Great location.  Be sure to walk town the street to Joe's Italian Ice.  Always great also.
Manager Response: Hi Shannon H,  Thanks for the feedback regarding our newly renovated product. We are glad to see that you like it compared to previous stays. We hope to see you again for another stay and some more Jo'es Italian Ice!

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights and enjoyed our stay. Close to Disney, we even walked back one night and enjoyed the walk, but there are several buses available and very convenient to take. The hotel was finishing the very last of a complete remodel of the hotel. The staff was right on top of making sure that this work did not disturb the guests. They were replacing the doors to each room, so we were first put in a suite which we had booked on the 2nd floor for first 2 nights and then moved to 6 floor suite on opposite side of building which we requested for last 3 nights. The move was no problem and both suites were spotless and had everything we needed. The pools and pool area are clean and there was plenty of towels. The complimentary breakfast always had plenty of food and the
Manager Response: Hi condos,  We were so happy that you enjoyed your 5 night stay with us! We appreciate your comments regarding the renovation and we are glad to have accommodated you and your family around those needs. We have made it a priority to avoid any renovation disturbances as best as we can. Thanks for the positive feedback for our housekeeping department as well as Jordan at the front desk. Jordan has become a true asset to our team and we appreciate him very much! We hope to be your first choice when coming back to the area and we hope that time comes soon! Have a great day!

Summary: This was a great hotel experience. The room was clean, up to date and comfortable. The check in and out process was smooth and efficient. The only thing to improve would be more fresh cookies at the entrance (they ran out). I would stay at this property again.
Manager Response: Hi TWE801,  A "Great Experience" is what we strive for all our guests! We would be happy to serve you again during your next stay. See you again soon!

Summary Heading: Do not pass up this hotel
Summary: I have not been here in a couple of years. The property recently has been remodeled and I am very impressed. My room was simple, modern, clean and bed was very comfy. They have a microwave and mini frig which easily accomadates your waters and snacks. I haven't mentioned the free breakfast on top of the great rate. Waffles, fruit, bacon, toast, cereal, juices and thats just what I remember. I stayed in room 108 and was pleasantly surprised that our room had an outdoor patio with our very own gate to the pool, kids pool and hot tub only a few feet from the sliding door. I think don't quote me (i tried to figure it out) rooms 100 to maybe 116 give or take all have the pool view with private gate. The check in staff were all pleasant, helpful and friendly.  You do have to pay for
Manager Response: Hello takemeaway50,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are glad you were able to enjoy our wonderful lanai rooms. They have become quite popular after our renovation! It is great to know that you and your family have enjoyed our hotel for so many years and we hope that we continue to be your choice for the Anaheim area!

Summary: Our stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/Disneyland Area/Anaheim was great!  We visited Disneyland and California Adventure during the Veteran's Day weekend and wanted to stay at a Hilton property that was not too far from Disneyland.  This property is conveniently located, the staff is friendly and helpful and the rooms are newly remodeled which was very nice.  There is a shuttle available (for a small fee) that will take you to Disneyland and take you back to the hotel.  The first shuttle leaves from hotel at 8:15 am and the last shuttle leaves Disneyland 1 hour after the park closes.  Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who is visiting the Anaheim Resort area.
Manager Response: Hi Richard M,  Thank you for the stellar review. We were glad to spend the Veteran's day weekend with you and your family. From our location, to the shuttle, and our friendly staff, we are glad to have made a positive impact on your stay. Come back again soon!

Summary: The beds were very comfortable sheets were clean pillows were great. The breakfast was very nice and had several options including hot choices. The staff was friendly helpful knowledgeable of the area. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Hi rebelmama27,  We are happy to have accommodated you during your stay and we hope to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: Anaheim for Business not just THE PARK
Summary: I love Hampton Inn.  This hotel is very clean.  The room was clean and spacious. It is centrally located for business in Santa Ana.  Harbor Drive is great because the street is well lit with pedestrian traffic until late at night.  I feel safe going to and from my car at night.  This Hampton Inn is near a lot of fast food and sit down restaurants.  The lobby is huge.  Not the hotel for people who do not like children.  It can be very busy with families coming and going to Disneyland.  But as a business traveler, it did not affect my stay.  This hotel is extremely clean and I love that.  I would stay here again and would recommend it. The breakfast is just OK.  Overall, a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Hi Marcella,  Thank you for the great 5 star review! We are so glad we were able to meet your needs as a business traveler. We love having our regulars here and we hope you may become one of them! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: This is the hotel you want to stay in!
Summary: My son came in from out of state. We meet at this Hampton inn and suites.  We went to Disneyland. This hotel is located in a nice area, there is security that is present. The hotel doors are locked in the night, and I didn't have to be worried about my safety or my car.  I felt very safe
Manager Response: HI 258janetj,  We are so happy to have hosted you and your family while your son was in town. We appreciate your positive feedback and hope we continue to be your hotel of choice when traveling to this area!

Summary Heading: The Hampton Inn & Suites Experience Anaheim
Summary: I just came back from a two weeks business trip from home and all the time i was there the staff were very helpful and made my time there fell like home.One of the best trips i have had.Will be going back soon.Thank You
Manager Response: Hi wendellw997,  Thanks for coming to see us again Mr. Westman! We are happy to serve you during your stay and we are excited for your next stay with us!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the Hampton Inn. Check in was smooth. The staff were friendly and made us feel ‚Äúat home‚Äù.   We were given a newly renovated room, which was fantastic. Everything was clean and very modern. The bed was so comfortable that oversleeping could be a problem.   The only complaint about the room was the bathroom door. It was a door that slid over the opening to the bathroom instead of closing. It didn‚Äôt fit tightly to the frame. This meant you could hear every sound In the bathroom and you could even see into the bathroom a bit if you tried. Also, the door doesn‚Äôt lock, which might be an issue with some people.   The breakfast was great. A large variety of things to eat: cereal, bread, waffles, bagels, muffins, pastries, fruit, eggs, milk, juices, meat
Manager Response: Hello Sheila V,  Thanks for the stellar 5 star review! We are happy to see that you enjoyed our renovated rooms, with the exception of the new barn doors. We have addressed the gap you refer to and are installing a filler strip to prevent seeing inside the bathrooms. All in all, we are glad you enjoyed all other aspects of the hotel including breakfast and amenities such as the shuttle and location. We hope to be your first choice when traveling to the Anaheim area again!

Summary: Staff seemed genuinely concerned about the quality of your stay, always welcomed me warmly.  I'd hire any of them in an instant.  I work in the industry; I go into a hotel looking for issues (force of habit; I run a high-ranking hotel, and walk into my own rooms looking for issues so other guests won't find them).  For those of you who travel, do try mid-scale hotels rather than the cheapest guy on the block - You'll find the quality far superb and your experience in traveling much warmer.
Manager Response: Hi David C,  I am so glad that the staff went above and beyond for your needs. We strive for the best service and they clearly won you over. I will be sure to recognize each of them for the efforts. Come back again soon for some great service!

Summary: Clean comfortable, quiet rooms.  Over priced, but what isn't in the Disneyland area.  Breakfast was above average, actually had some real food, not just junk food.  Long shuttle ride away from Disneyland.
