Manager Response: Hi douglas w,  We are glad you enjoyed our renovated rooms and scrumptious breakfast! We try hard to stay above the competition as far as our breakfast goes, so we appreciate your kind comments about how much you enjoyed it. Come again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location, great remodel, great staff!
Summary: This is a really nicely remodeled Hampton Inn. We had two of the lanai rooms on the ground floor which had their own entrance to the pool -- fantastic! -- and everything was clean and comfy. I enjoyed the location, and the shuttle to disneyland was very convenient. The staff was also really nice and helpful.  My complaint echoes what I read here before I stayed, which is that something went terribly wrong with the AC units with the remodel. They are unbearably loud, and come on frequently, no matter what temperature you set them to. They were so disruptive the first night that we shut off the thermostat completely and opened the sliding door to our room -- not the safest situation when you're on the ground floor, but we were desperate when no one was sleeping at 2am. If it had
Manager Response: Hi Jennifer H,  Thank you for your comments regarding our renovated rooms! We are so glad you enjoyed our lanai room on the 1st floor. We are working towards a solution for our AC units as they are quite noisy. We apologize that it impacted your stay. We will ensure that this does not occur again. Hopefully your next stay with us is flawless and we can show you what our Hampton is all about!

Summary: We stayed for a week & enjoyed our stay.  The room was comfortable & roomy.  The beds were very nice also.  Breakfast was ok (forget the omelets...yuck! stick to the waffles) They were remodeling and started pounding a little too early, but that would be temporary.  Used the pool as it was freakishly hot for October (105!) The shuttle to Disney was pretty dependable and not too crowded.  Only complaint is it is quite a hike to and from the drop off/pick up point and the park entry.  The front desk staff was friendly and helpful.  The housekeeping staff didn't speak much english so it was difficult to communicate with them and they had a tendency to just come in when they were ready to clean! Buca di Beppo is conveniently located next door and dinner there was very good! I would
Manager Response: Hello vtowngirl,  We are glad you enjoyed our spacious rooms! That heat wave was like one we have not seen since summer time, but we are glad you were able to enjoy our renovated pool deck. We hope you choose Hampton during your next stay in the Disneyland resort area!

Summary: We have had great luck with Hampton Inn and this was no exception.   The room was newly refurbished and the location was not far from Disneyland.   It's safe to say that we will go back to this location in the future.
Manager Response: Hi tiffanyb,  We are happy to hear how loyal you are to Hampton's and that we did not disappoint! We are thankful for our newly renovated rooms and we can't wait for another chance to serve you again in the future.

Summary: We will actually stay here again. But we have to laugh at the lack of quality control happening after the recent upgrade. The light switches in our room barely worked. To turn the lights on you have to almost smack them a couple of times. A bulb in a lamb was burned out, but the piece de resistance was how the inner door handle came off in my daughters hand. Some days we were afraid we wouldn't be able to get out. The upgrades look nice, they just weren't done very well in some cases.   Every staff member we have encountered has been amazing. Friendly and helpful at all times. The free breakfast is good and one of the reasons why we chose this hotel.   Kids say the pool is great a blend we love the balconies
Manager Response: Hello aim04744,  Thank you for the honest feedback regarding our recent renovation. We apologize for the sub-par condition your room was left in. We are currently working with the renovation team to ensure the light switch issues are addressed immediately. I am happy to see the that the staff were so kind and friendly and that our breakfast and pool were a hit for your family! Please come back again soon!

Summary: I know not to expect much from a Days Inn but even this location was underwhelming. First impression....The smell.... what is that? It's in the lobby, the elevator and wise in the room.  Beds are NOT comfortable at all. Not very clean. The breakfast offered is not worth the short walk to check it out, there was one banana and some tiny "cinnamon rolls" from the grocery store,  and warm juice.  It was clean on the outside,  but the rooms need some upgrades.
Manager Response: Hi Shelli H,  Considering we are not the Days Inn, we are unsure if this review was intended for our property. However, we do hope to choose to stay with us during your next stay in the Anaheim area!

Summary: Our room was very clean, it had a small kitchen which works out good when you have little ones as it cost so much money to eat out 3 times a day. This little gem even had a very nice complimentary breakfast every day with oatmeal, cold cereal, muffins, toast bagels English muffins, eggs sausage breakfast potatoes. you can make your own waffles with all different types of stuff to put in them or on them, coffee, tea juices and hot chocolate and milk, as well as different yogurts and fruits. The hotel staff was very friendly and the hotel was very clean. The beds were very comfy. The pools and the hot tub was even clean and nice.
Manager Response: Hello bobbyp377,  Thank you for the 5 star review. We are glad to see we were able to give you 5 star service throughout your stay! Making our guests feel right at home as a member of our Hampton family is what we strive for each and every one of our guests. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Breakfast was amazing staff was very helpful and polite.  The hotel itself was very clean.  The nicest stay at a hotel i have had in a long time.  I would recommend staying here.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi amandafC9639FM,  Thanks for the 5 star review! We are so glad you enojyed all areas of the hotel from the newly renovated rooms to out hot breakfast buffet! We would be honored to have you stay with us again and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Noisy thermostat but nicely remodeled room
Summary: The room was very nicely remodeled although it was surrounded by other rooms still under construction.   The only downside was the noisy thermostat. I recorded the noise from my bed and all the way up to the thermostat itself to show the night manager how loud it was. He offered to call facilities (not sure what they're called) to come by and fix it. Upon returning to my room I figured out that if I turn on the air conditioning, the noise stops. That was great, but the room was then so cold that we still couldn't sleep. So I had to settle for keeping the a/c on, or listen to the noise. I wish I didn't have to stay up all night to make sure the thermostat was at a temperature that wouldn't turn the noise on. Both nights, no sleep. After such a long road trip to get to this hotel,
Manager Response: Hello jacquelinepH4987VZ,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. While it seems you enjoyed your room, the thermostat issues clearly had an impact on your stay. We will work with our maintenance department to get this repaired right away. We apologize that the staff was unable to move you elsewhere as this would have made for an easy solution for you and your family. We will ensure that this does not happen again, we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Toilet did not work. Staff did did not care, room was dirty, not good!! Stayed with family and had to haul water to get the toilet to flush. We told the staff 4 times and they did not care. This is by far the worst Hilton associated experience ever.
Manager Response: Hello Donna M,  We would like to apologize for your less than satisfactory stay with us. Clearly we fell short of your expectations. I understand our supervisor Sarah has reached out to you via email. Please allow us a chance to make this right for you Ms. McWhan.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting Disney
Summary: This hotel was a perfect fit for what we needed.  We did a family vacation to Disney.  There is a shuttle stop nearby that is perfect for getting to and from the park.  The hotel was clean, the daily breakfast was good and the pool facilities were nice.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello lisasY7883IJ,  Thanks for the great review! We are so glad that your family vacation to Disney was a success and that you enjoyed our breakfast and pool area. We cannot wait to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay not too far from Disneyland
Summary: This is such a great place to stay. The suite we had was very comfortable, the beds and pillows made sleeping so easy. Breakfast was included in the price and there was a good range of cereal, hot dishes, fruit and pastries to choose from. Staff were very friendly and efficient and nothing was too hard for them. This will be our hotel of choice the next time we visit Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hello smrskoro,  Thanks for the great review! We are happy to see that you were able to enjoy one of our premium suites as they are hard to come by unless booked in advance. We are glad to see that the staff made a positive impact on your stay and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Except for the A/C Thermostat
Summary: This hotel has been recently renovated and the new look is outstanding. As a Hilton Diamond member, we were upgraded to one of the suites with a balcony and the room was absolutely gorgeous! I especially loved the "Mickey Mouse" ottoman in the living area. Our suite had a separate bedroom with a completely new bathroom and a separate living area with a large balcony and a roomy kitchen area. This would be a fantastic place to stay if you were with your family and planning on visiting Disneyland for several days.  The hotel offers a free breakfast in the morning and they have a Disneyland shuttle (I found it odd that they charge for the shuttle service). You could walk to the Disneyland front gates but it's over a mile -- at least it's a straight shot. The hotel lobby has
Manager Response: Hello moviegal 226,  We apologize that you stay was less than satisfactory and that the choice of thermostat's we use was not up to your standards. Although this is not an easy fix, we take your concerns into consideration when purchasing any new thermostats in the future. As far as the parking goes, we do not own our parking lot, so the fees are an added charge to offset the cost we pay to utilize the lot with the neighboring hotels. The lots are monitored for parking permits as well and those without a pass will be ticketed or towed. I understand this may be frustrating, however in the resort area it is very common to see parking charges. We hope this does not deter you from choosing Hampton again in the future.

Summary: Recently stayed here for a family trip to Disneyland with all my cousins and my 4 month old and it was wonderful! Our rooms were poolside with our own private deck area and pool entrance which was excellent and the morning buffet was delicious! The hotel staff were all very accommodating and the playpen they provided was perfect so the baby and I could both get a good nights sleep. As a bonus being on the ground floor meant the baby monitor still worked when I ran out to grab breakfast in the morning! We were in a recently renovated room and it was very nice! I'd recommend this hotel to anyone, as another bonus it was close to lots of food options and a very yummy Italian ice cream parlour.
Manager Response: Hi Courtney S,  We are so happy to see that you and your family were so pleased with your stay here at Hampton! Our poolside lanai rooms are a great added feature and we are glad that it worked so well for you. We hope our buffet breakfast as well as recently renovated rooms will result in you choosing Hampton again for your next stay!

Summary: Very impressed with the facility which is in the process of being remodeled (bottom 3 floors and top 2 floors are completed).  Our room on the 7th floor was exceptional all new and modern conveniences - plenty of outlets for electronics, etc.  Overall, the facility is extremely clean and well maintained.  Entire staff very helpful and courteous!  Plentiful breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello Kevin K,  Thank you for the awesome review! We are so grateful to hear that the renovation has pleased you during your travels across the country and that that Hampton staff were so helpful to you. We hope to see you again when you are in the area!

Summary: If you're looking for a place to stay, Hampton Inn is your best bet. I loved that breakfast was different every day. The cleanliness, friendly staff members, everything from top to bottom! It was great!!! Oh, and did I mention it's so easy to get to Disneyland! It's walking distant! If you don't want to take the shuttle, walk! :) It was so lovely!!!
Manager Response: Hello brookevi504,  I am so happy to see that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay with us from our breakfast to the staff as well as the location! We love to see our guests leave happy and we hope we get to see your smiling faces again soon!

Summary: Was very impressed by the hotel. The newly rennovated rooms were absolutely great and the breakfast was much better than expected. Can't wait to stay here again for another trip. The only issue was the wifi was nonexistent in our room, which we reported as we left. The hotel staff was very apologetic, and stated they would look into it. Overall, we were very happy, and as stated earlier. We can't wait to stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Hi jonathangW6057UQ,  Thank you for your feedback regarding our newly renovated rooms! I am glad to see that you also enjoyed our buffet breakfast. As far as the wifi is concerned, we are due for our wifi upgrade in October, which will result in a much better connection. We are so excited for your next stay. See you again soon!

Summary: The Hampton Inn Anaheim is a beautiful and newly remodeled hotel just minutes from Disneyland. Staff extremely friendly and accommodating all of our requests and questions. Plenty of restaurant options within the immediate area also. Will definitely stay here again when in the area!
Manager Response: Hi U1474LNrachelb,  Thank you for the awesome 5 star review! I am so happy to see that the staff treated you so well and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We cannot wait for the next opportunity to serve you. Come back again soon!

Summary: We were completely satisfied in all aspects of this hotel they are very friendly and helpful. This hotel is in a great location and I felt safe to leave items in my vehicle. And most important the beds and bedding are very comfortable!
Manager Response: Hello tracyf906,  We are so happy to see that your stay was top notch! Your satisfaction is what we strive for so we are glad to have achieved that with you. Come back again soon for another fabulous stay!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a great price!
Summary: All the staff were extremely warm and courteous, from check in to check out. Everyone had a smile and a friendly greeting, even when passing by in the hallway, be it a front desk assistant, maintenance, breakfast bar worker, or housekeeping. The free breakfast is so wonderful to be included, and has such a great variety. Between that, the clean fresh contemporary rooms, and the staff, I will definitely look here first to stay next time I'm in the area. Well done everyone!
Manager Response: HI nickm0125,  Wow thank you for all the wonderful shout outs to all our departments! I will be sure to pass on to the whole team. We are glad that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and that the price suited your needs. We hope we have created a return guest for years to come! See you next time!

Summary: Hotel is being renovated, we got one of the newer room since I asked to be removed from our original room that smelled really old since it was one of the older rooms. Anyway our new room was awesome , complimentary breakfast was great not over the top and the staff was very pleasant. Will stay again ...
Manager Response: Hi 902shabanam,  Thank you so much for spending your time here at Hampton Inn. I am happy to hear that the staff made sure to move you to a newly remodeled room so you could experience our new product. We can't wait for you to return to a fully renovated hotel in the near future!

Summary: I have stayed in this hotel a couple times and the Hampton Inn, many times. It was a great experience. The hotel is undergoing renovation which seems to be taking a long time. That said --- it was not an inconvenience at all. Construction noise was minimal and I rarely saw the construction folks during our short stay. Staff is great and close to restaurants and - of course - Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi Clifton P,  Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review. We love to see our repeat guests continue to come back time after time. We are ready for the renovation to be over just as much as you are and are excited for the end product! We hope you continue to choose our Hampton for your travels to the area and we will see you again soon!

Summary: Service was great and it was super close to DIsneyland. the room was a good size and we all had enough space for our luggage. i would recommend it to anyone going to Disneyland with a budget. Love it!!
Manager Response: Hi O4853HMrosag,  We are so happy to hear how awesome our stay was! Thanks for the recommendation for others planning their trips to Disneyland. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location - central to many places
Summary: We stayed at this hotel because we were dropping our child off at Chapman University.  We are happy that we stayed here because the hotel was not that far from Chapman. Also, what we loved is that the hotel is close to shopping areas, eating places and Disneyland.  The parking was free which was a plus.  The room size was good.  The staff were polite and courteous and made us feel welcomed. The breakfast was decent.  They had the normal spread of waffles, bagels, muffins, fresh fruit etc.  Even though there is construction going on we could not tell that this was the case.   The gym is of a decent size and has weights and cardio machines.
Manager Response: Hello funtravels13,  Congratulations on your son or daughter for getting into Chapman college. What a great accomplishment! I am so happy you chose to stay with us while dropper him/her off. With our central location, we tend to be a great option for those who need a little bit of everything close by! I am glad the staff made you feel welcome and that the breakfast kept you fueled for the day. Come back again soon!

Summary: This hotel is being renovated, and this can be noisy. When we checked in, we were told that the renovations would be done between the hours of 9 a.m. and 6 p.m. We were also told that the renovations were being done on floors 6 and 7 and, since our room was on floor 3, we shouldn't hear much. However, they were renovating a room or two on floor 3, just a few doors away from us. And the renovations began before 8 a.m. I spoke with a couple on floor 5 who said that the renovation work above them began at 7 a.m.  We stayed in an updated room, which has a modern design. You close the bathroom door by sliding it over the open door frame. This door cannot lock. I didn't like this design; I'm sure I'm old fashioned, but I like a bathroom door that locks.  Also, the shower doors are
Manager Response: Hi Tim B,  We appreciate your honest feedback on our renovated rooms. We apologize that the renovation noise disturbed you throughout your stay. We understand that noise can put a damper on your vacation. While I would like to see you come back, I understand your need for a locking door. However future reference, all our our one bedroom suites do have a locking bathroom door, and half of our rooms have a traditional tub and shower curtain, which would better suit your preference. Again thank you for your feedback, we very much appreciate it.

Summary: Rooms and staff were great during our entire stay! Excellent recommendations for dining and shopping, shuttles were good and on time and helped make trip to Disneyland even better!  Will definitely stay here again on future visits!
Manager Response: Hello chrisbA6946BL,  Thank you for the great 5 star review! I am happy to see that our team was able to refer you to all the best places around town. We are excited for your return trip. come back again soon!

Summary: Staff at reception and breakfast was very friendly. We were traveling with a kid and they were helpful in getting us hot milk. Thank you very much! You made our Disneyland trip memorable with great service
Manager Response: Hello prakashm177,  We are so happy that the staff made such a positive impact on your stay. They work hard to ensure our guests feel right at home. We hope you come back for your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: Can't beat the location and Friendly Staff!
Summary: We recently stayed with a large group for a volleyball tournament and the experience was great! The hotel staff was friendly from check-in to check-out! The hotel is currently being renovated, but once it's finished will be even better! The rooms that were already renovated are great! Very comfortable beds and amenities. The breakfast was delicious and had many options to help start your day, with plenty of seating available. The pool area was nice and clean and very welcomed after a long day of volleyball! The bonus was being able to watch the fireworks at Disneyland from the hotel room in the evening! Joseph Arevalo, the sales manager who helped with our group reservations was the best! He was organized and everything ran smoothly with our large group! Will definitely be back
Manager Response: Hi archermelanie,  Thank you so much for your 5 star review! We are so glad to here that your group had such a great experience and that Joseph was such a great part of making that happen. We will be sure to send your kind words his way. We hope you come back to visit again soon with the group or even for a trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: For the price and service, two thumbs up
Summary: We got a great deal online for our two night stay. Staff was very helpful and friendly. The rooms are "tired", but are being upgraded. We were warned about the work being done beforehand, and we had no problems. We're planning to stay again in a couple months, knowing we will have a newly remodeled room available. Staff was really great and complementary breakfast was good!!
Manager Response: Hello jg3092017,  Thank you for your review. Renovations are underway and we are excited for our new rooms. Thankfully the renovation did not impact your stay with us and we are happy to hear that you will be returning again soon!

Summary: Great location. Friendly Staff. Good Breakfast. Comfortable Suite with a balcony. In the evening we sat on our balcony and watched the entire fireworks display from Disneyland. Look forward to going back!
Manager Response: Hi rochellem733,  We are so happy to hear how much you enjoyed your stay here at Hampton Inn! Disneyland fireworks are a great end to anyone's night and we are glad you were able to enjoy the spectacular show. We hope to forever be your favorite Hampton. Come back again soon!

Summary: Hotel does not belong to Hampton status. Looks like neglected over the years. Need significant upgrade. Stinky hallways and strange lobby layout will leave business travelers dissatisfied. Proximity to highways, park and stadium are beneficial for fun travelers.
Manager Response: Hello Thomas J,  It is unfortunate to see that you did not enjoy your stay here at the Hampton. We understand the need for upgrades and are currently undergoing a full renovation in all our guest rooms and corridors. Should you find yourself in the area again post renovation, please allow us another chance to show you what Hampton is all about.

Summary: Only one elevator working for all guests and the housekeeping. I paid to upgrade to a suite and was very disappointed in the quality of the room. Being part of the Hilton hotels I expected it to be way better. Only thing good is the location being close to disney and the shuttle.
Manager Response: Hello josephH262IX,  I would like to apologize for your less than satisfactory experience. While we cannot change the incidents during your stay, I would like you to know that we are currently undergoing renovations that will improve our overall quality and get us more in line with the Hilton brand you are used to. Please allow us another chance post renovation and we are sure not to disappoint!

Summary: Hampton Inn was very close to the Disneyland Parks, this made it easy to get to the park.  The facility has many restaurants, some stores and gas stations close by to get additional supplies and refuel our car for our stay.
Manager Response: Hi A811BDantoniov,  We are so happy to see that our location was so ideal for you and your family. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: I had a great stay and always enjoy staying with the hamton inn properties! service is always great and rooms are clean internet works very well and that is important for me when communicating is key for me on business trips.
Manager Response: Hi X190QTryang,  Thanks for the 5 star review! We are so happy that you chose Hampton Inn for your business travel needs. I am glad that our staff continue to provide Distinguished Hospitality during your visits and we hope you continue to choose Hampton Inn for your travel needs!

Summary Heading: Great service, family friendly, close to many shops!
Summary: The customer service was great. Location was perfect since it was near many eateries, shops and stores. The hotel was clean, ample room space, and clean room. Minor issue trying to get towels but OK overall.
Manager Response: Hello ramonag778,  We are so glad that our location was ideal for your during your stay! It is nice having so many restaurants and stores so close by. Should you find yourself in the area again, we hope you choose Hampton Inn for your accommodations again!

Summary: I booked this hotel for my wife and I anniversary and wifes birthday back in October 2016 not knowing this hotel was about to undergo reservations. Upon our arrival we discovered this fact. We had even checked on the Hilton website for any known potential renovations which could not be found. Extremely disappointed in the service quality and standard of Hampton Inn.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Currently being renovated - it should be great when it's done, but facilities are currently lacking (torn curtains, chipped paint, frayed carpet. Our door would not reliably open.  Staff is excellent - warm, friendly, and helpful.  Breakfast is typical Hampton Inn- waffles, cereals, juice, coffee, breads, and a few hot options.
Manager Response: Hi Astrid P,  I would like to apologize for the condition of your room. Even though we are undergoing renovation we still have standards that we must meet. I appears we had some shortcomings that should have been avoided during your stay. We are excited for our newly renovated product and we hope you come back to see what Hampton is truly about.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, great breakfast and location.
Summary: The hotel met all expectations.  Great value.  Free breakfast was definitely a plus, especially for a family of 4...the kids are adults.  Location is great, Target is close by so we picked up a case of water to keep in the fridge in our room.  Lots of reasonable restaurants nearby, convenient shuttle to parks.
Manager Response: Hello admcfamily,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are happy to see that breakfast suited you and your family of 4 and that our location was beneficial to you. We hope you come back and have many more happy stays with us!

Summary: The staff were excellent. Rooms are comfortable and the proximity to Disneyland is perfect. The hotel shuttle shared by two other hotels, was very efficient and the drivers extremely helpful. Excellent place for a family to stay when going to Disneyland. Although renovations were happening while we were there it did not hamper the fun that we had and the staff were extremely helpful in pointing out points of interest or places to eat within the area.
Manager Response: Hello I5860FCedwardm,  Thank you for the kind words and the review.  I'm happy to see that you were able to enjoy our amenities and that renovations did not affect your stay!  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: don't stay here   overpriced  and they charge to park your car Breakfast was  so/ so  just the pricing of the rooms   could not beleive the quality compared to price  along with charging for you to park your vehicle  $15.
Manager Response: Hello anthonymM6998KZ,  Thank your for your review although it does dishearten me that your stay was not an enjoyable one.  We are in the process of renovations to increase the quality of the hotel as each room is getting a full make-over.  We hope that if you choose to return, we can better service you on your next stay.

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn near Disneyland for a softball tournament. There are convenient restaurants nearby as well as Downtiwn Disney which is 1.4 mikes away. There's a lot of close parking and a good Italian restaurant, Buca di Beppo, in the parking lot. The breakfast was pretty good. There was confusion on the "block" rate for our team, but they adjusted the price to be fair. The room was nice and clean and the stay was enjoyable.
Manager Response: Hello 384clydeh,  Thank you for the review and I'm glad to read that you were able to enjoy our hotel.  Also glad to see that the confusion was cleared up.  We hope that your team did amazing in the softball tournament! Until next time.

Summary: The attendents were very friendly my problem was upon arrival I booked for two bed Suite recived a very small cramped room and was charged for parking which was told would be included in price.  I was very unhappy, then the service man Darrnell fixed it and moved us to the room I had booked without charging additional charges. Thank you:) The beds were compfy, room was really clean and the breakfeast was great.
Manager Response: Hello Dee W,  We strive for great stays but it seems that there were some errors from the start of your arrival and I wanted to apologize for that.  I'm glad to see that Darnell was able to make things right.  We hope to see you again in the future so that we can be able to get things right from the start.

Summary: The staff at Hampton Inn and Suites Anaheim/Garden Grove were very friendly and ready to accommodate with whatever I needed. Would recommend a stay here because of its accessibility to Disneyland. I know they are in the process of remodeling but my room was very well presented.
Manager Response: Hello hallien2017,  It's great to read about your stay and that you enjoyed one of our pre-renovation rooms. We'd love for you to visit again and hear your thoughts on the new product!

Summary: This hotel exceeded all of our expectations! I was a bit taken by some of the dated decor they're in the process of updating but the customer service we received from the entire staff made it all perfect. We will definitely be returning
Manager Response: Hello I1817ADnatalieg,  We appreciate your kind comments regarding our customer service! We will pass it along to our staff. We are so excited for your next stay in one of our newly renovated rooms. Come back soon!

Summary: Enjoyed my stay at this facility very much. Everything was very good and price was reasonable, except the fee for self parking, which I believe was a little too high. I would stay here whenever I get the chance.
Manager Response: Hello hosseinh966,  We are glad that your stay was pleasant and that you enjoyed our property. We love that we were able to have a positive impact on your stay, and we cannot wait for your next visit!

Summary Heading: Staff was helpful. Great parking in a convenient location
Summary: My wife and I stayed at a busy time and for an entire week. The pool has a perfect kiddie pool area as well as a clean hot tub. Breakfast was included and complete (hot or cold items). Free parking and Disney shuttle right there. Also, this property is surrounded by nice restaurants. The staff were excellent. Helpful and check in was quick and easy. No problems inspite of construction on site
Manager Response: Hi James C,  It sounds like your stay was as great as we had hoped it would be! Thank you for the 5 star review. Come back again for some scrumptious breakfast as well as a dip in the hot tub. See you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for a two-day trip to Disney and my daughter and I had a great time. We only saw some construction on the first level but it didn't impact us in any way. The pool was a great break from Disney and the shuttle was always on time. Joe's Italian Ice next door is perfect on a hot day.
Manager Response: Hi tvpurple,  We are glad to see that our renovation did not effect your stay. With the weather warming up, a nice dip in the pool and some delicious Italian ice are sure to do the trick. Come back again soon!

Summary: We went to Disneyland for the first time, and we arrived late at night, planning to stay at a different hotel.  However, I had a bad feeling about the other hotel, and it smelled really bad, so I suggested the Hampton Inn, as I am a member, and it has been good to us so far.  The minute we arrived, everything felt better - the staff was friendly and helpful, the rooms smelled fresh, and even with the ongoing construction, the breakfasts were great, and it was a great experience overall - we found the shuttle service to Disneyland to be useful (even though it's an added charge from another company), and I would definitely stay here again on another trip.
Manager Response: Hello Vanessa C,  Thank you so much for remembering Hampton and choosing to stay with us during your stay. I am so glad our staff made you feel right at home and our Hamptonality keeps you coming back! We are excited for your return and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Took my family on vacation to Disneyland. The carpet on the 5th floor was dirty. The curtains in our room were dirty and coming apart at the seems. The staff were friendly. They apologized for the dirty curtains and said they would have it resolved through housekeeping.
Manager Response: Hello Norma C,  Thank you for the feedback regarding the condition of the carpeting and curtains. We have spoken with housekeeping and will get both items taken care of. While we are currently in renovation, we understand the need to ensure our current product is in the best condition as possible. Please come visit us post renovation to see our newly renovated rooms and corridors!

Summary: the hotel is being renovated and is in construction. the staff is very friendly and attentive. the location is close to Disney park and other attractions in the area. Hotel is a basic business type location. once construction is complete it should be a nice hotel. please note it is a good basic business hotel.
Manager Response: Hi K1733TDpault,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your business trip. We are just as excited about completing our renovation as you are! Our new modern rooms will suit the needs of business and leisure travelers alike. We hope you continue to choose us for your business needs when traveling to the area.

Summary: This property is not managed like other Hamlton Inns. Heavy marijuana smoke in the hallways, rooms are extremely old and worn and staff doesn't appear to know how to resolve problems or care about the guest experience. Things are "off". If you love Hampton Inn, don't stay here.
Manager Response: Ms. Bell,  We apologize for your less than satisfactory experience here at the hotel. We have received your comments and will work the staff closely on problem resolution. I assure you that we care about each of our guests' experiences and your experience was clearly not what Hampton is all about. Again we apologize that we did not represent the Hampton brand that you know and love so well. Your charges have been fully refunded and we hope we may have another chance to serve you post renovation.

Summary Heading: Very satisfied with all your services all staff are very helpful and kind
Summary: All clean food excellent all staff were very helpful and very kind checked in and checked out no problems at all supplying was excellent my kids were happy and satisfied and relaxed while we were there swimming pool nice and clean no complaints at all thanks again
Manager Response: Hello katiar434,  Thank you for the stellar review!We are so happy to have met and exceeded your expectations during your stay. It's great to see that the kids enjoyed our newly renovated pool and that our staff were able to make your stay a memorable one. Come back again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for two nights for a family event.  The price was quite good for the area.  The hotel was clean and quiet.  The breakfast was nice, included waffles, hot prepared oatmeal, cut fruit, eggs, yogurt, cereal, pastry.  Plentiful and yummy.  There is a smaller parking lot. We never had trouble getting parking,but I can see that it might be crowded late at night.   Staff was friendly. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Hi Risa S,  We are so happy to see that our delicious breakfast suited your needs for you and your family. We take a lot of pride in the most important meal of the day! We are excited to for you to come back again and again!

Summary: Selection of breakfast foods were excellent l. The beds and bathroom were clean and comfortable. The people at the desk were also super nice. The shuttle does cost $7 per day, but was very prompt and convenient.  We stayed to 2 nights and enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Hello jonathansV2752YR,  Thanks for the 5 star review! We are so happy to have provided exceptional service and amenities to your during your stay. We hope you choose Hampton for your next stay!

Summary: Loved it! Will come back! Great breakfast, great service, friendly staff! We slept well and had a great breakfast in the morning. The pool was amazing and so was the hot tub. Close location to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hi anacI177EF,  We are so happy to see how much you loved your Hampton stay! We are glad that the breakfast was such a hit and that our renovated pool area exceeded your expectations (just wait until our new furniture comes in!) We cannot wait to see you next time!

Summary: Great location.  Close to Disneyland.  We used the shuttle service and it was convenient and reliable.  The Friendly staff is friendly.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  We enjoyed the great breakfast.  Gym offered many options.  Both the pool and the hot tub were clean and enjoyable.  The hotel is close to restaurants and shopping.
Manager Response: Hi Mary Jo Y,  We are happy to have made your stay an enjoyable one. Our amenities are great for just about anyone and we are glad that it suited all your needs. We will see you next time!

Summary: Hotel is under going much needed renovations so the current room quality in very poor. Wholes in curtains and sofa, floor boards coming up, very poor. Wasn't mentioned at booking and price did not reflect subpar conditions
Manager Response: Hello matthewmk7294IQ,  We apologize for the condition of your room during your stay. As we are undergoing renovations, we still have a level of quality that we uphold and it is apparent that we fell short of that during your stay. We have placed notices on all booking sites to inform our guests in advance of renovations, so we apologize that this was not relayed to you. We hope to welcome you back post renovation so you can see what Hampton is truly about.

Summary: A group of us (20 families) stayed at this hotel for a kids hockey tournament.  The free breakfast was one of the reasons we chose this hotel and it was very good and convenient.  Rooms were adequate.  Elevators were slow though.  There were lots of tables and chairs in the lobby and the adults were able to gather in the evening for some socializing, which was awesome.  I would highly recommend this hotel for any kind of team trip.  It was close to Disney and there were a lot of restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello lisacR5291KK,  Thank you for the 5 star review on behalf of your group. We were happy to host each of your families during your tournament. Our breakfast does tend to attract hungry sports teams considering they all need the energy they can get before the big game! We hope you choose us again in the future for all your travel needs!

Summary: Cleanliness in the room was not the best, there was trash on the floor upon arrival to the bedroom did not complain all I wanted to do is take a bath and sleep, bathtub was only scrubbed on the bottom half.
Manager Response: Hello jagdlt,  I would like to apologize for the housekeeping issues you experienced during your stay. Here at Hampton we strive for clean and fresh rooms at all times and it is clear that we fell short of that promise. I will speak with the housekeeping team to ensure this remains an isolated incident. Please allow us another chance to show what our true Hamptonality is all about!

Summary: I was skeptical when I received a text message from the hotel, inviting me to text them with any issues or suggestions, but it turned out to be convenient on two occasions.  They reacted quickly and were very accommodating.  The hotel is undergoing renovations, so there may be construction noise.  This coming week, they're expecting reduced water pressure.  I don't know if they're using the renovated rooms yet - ours was still "older".  The breakfast was better than last time, but still seemed lacking.  There were potatoes one day, but that was the only warm vegetarian option.  There was fresh fruit (whole oranges, apples), but no mixed fruit that you might often find.  They occasionally had small bags of freshly popped popcorn, which is always a plus.  As with most Disney-area
Manager Response: Hi UnregisteredUser2013,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad to see that you enjoyed our text messaging service after getting acquainted with it. It is a great tool we use to reach our to our guests and they seem to really enjoy it. We do not have any renovated rooms that are completed quite yet, but we look forward to launching our new product. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location and super helpful staff
Summary: Value for money. They have a free parking and arrange shuttle to Disney land for nominal fee. Plenty of choices in their complimentary hot Breakfast. Staff members were extremely helpful. Overall great value for money.
Manager Response: Hello Prasad,   Thank you for the 5 star review! We are glad you enjoyed your breakfast and that the staff had such a positive impact on your stay. While there is a fee for parking, you were possibly not charged for it, so that's a win for you.  Hopefully we will see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel was under renovation so the pool was closed when we arrived. They had an agreement with a near by hotel to use their pool but my husband said it was very crowded and not very clean.   Location to Disneyland is great! Not too close but not too far. There is a shuttle to the parks and the hotel gives a discount on the fee.  We checked in early so our room wasn't ready. They held our bags so we could go to the park and were supposed to call when the room was done. They never did and when we got back to the hotel a few hours later (after the official check in time) they still had to search for a room to put us in. The room itself is nothing special - small kitchenette (fridge, microwave and coffee maker). It worked for what we needed it for.
Manager Response: I appreciate the time taken to provide us feedback and also apologize for the shortfalls in service provided by our staff and renovations.  We want to exceed your expectations and not be a hotel that just "worked".  You'll be happy to know that our pool is complete, open and will be receiving brand new furniture in the upcoming weeks!  I'd love to opportunity to serve you again so that you may experience our Hamptonality once we are fully complete post summer.  Please feel free to reach out to me if you are in the area again later this year!

Summary: Everything about our stay was perfect. The breakfast was the best. Room was leaned everyday. The kids had stuffed animals with them, the maid arranged them on the kids bed, they were so excited. We appreciated extra effort .
Manager Response: It excites me to read this review and will definitely pass on the commendations to our lovely room attendants.  We hope to serve you, the children and their stuffed companions again in the future!

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a low cost alternative to the Disney resorts. The location is about a mile from the parks. It is walkable(which we did) or you can easily drive. The staff is friendly and very helpful. There are benefits to staying on Disney property, which we did for 5 of the 6 days. However, the Hampton Inn is a cost effective alternative that offers a lot for less. Also, there is a Roscoe's Chicken and Waffles as well as In-N-Out close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words!  It's great to see that you enjoyed the stay and the stroll to the Happiest Place on Earth!  And of course, what kind of trip would it be without some In-N-Out?  Once again, thank you and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay very clean very nice staff who seem to really care.I would
Summary: The staff at the Hampton are always nice and the room very very clean with our 1 year old walking on the floor no dirt on his feet.. excellent! The breakfast is fresh and cooked professionally that's for sure.The front desk staff always around and extremely nice!  It's not the cheapest hotel but not the most expensive either,if you want a nice clean place this is the place!
Manager Response: It's always great to read about staff from a certain department doing great things but even better when they all get mentioned as a whole and we thank you for that.  I will be relaying this great review to our staff and telling them to keep up the good work.   We hope to serve you again when you return!

Summary: Took a quick trip to Disneyland great value.  I was only wanting a place to lay our heads before enjoying Disneyland the next day.  Would recommend staying for a longer visit.  Staff was very professional.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to provide us feedback and it's awesome to see that you enjoyed your stay.  But we feel that Disneyland can't be done in just one day so when you plan an extended trip, let us know and we'll be happy to serve you again!

Summary: Stayed here for the Disney half marathon weekend. Great service, comfortable, clean room. Free shuttle was available to Disneyland for the weekend. Easy drive to and from the park. Good location, Buca de Beppo located in the parking lot and Roscoe's is up the block. What's not to like?
Manager Response: Hello Dean M,   Thank you for the 5 star review! We are glad that your half marathon weekend was a success and that our location suited your needs so well. We can't wait for you to come back!

Summary: stayed here twice for the convenience of staying near Disneyland and not having to pay a lot of money for it.  You can walk to disneyland if you want but it's best to just drive or take the shuttle (there is a fee).   The hotel staffs are great! always greeting me and my family with a smile! i love that they have complimentary breakfast for the guests every morning. The breakfast includes: a variety of cereal, fruits, yogurts, scrambled eggs, hardboiled eggs, bacon / sausage, bagels, breads, muffins and make your own waffles (they have the regular flavor and one special of the day flavor -- we were lucky enough to try chocolate one day, and strawberry the next).  They also have milk and juices.  coffee and water are always available in the lobby for guests.  the hotel rooms are
Manager Response: Hi agbells,  Thank for for taking the time to review our hotel! We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your stay. Our team members are always happy to be a part of your vacation. Breakfast is the most important meal of the day and we are glad you were able to enjoy it as much as you did! We hope to welcome you back so you can see our newly renovated guest rooms and hallways!

Summary: The hotel was undergoing renovations but I didn't even notice it. They kept the construction completely out of view from guests. Although the pool was unavailable due to renovations, they provided access to the hotel pool of the hotel across the parking lot. Staff was very friendly and accomodating. Provided cookies and popcorn each night. Great experience. I'll definately stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello R4548SSdavidf,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that the renovation did not impact your stay. Our goal is to minimize the guest impact as much as possible. We are happy that you enjoyed the popcorn and cookies in the evenings and we hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: The room was clean, spacious and well decorated. The staff was friendly and always available. The hotel was close enough to Disneyland but far enough to avoid the crowd. I would recommend this hotel for a family vacation to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello ninamQ7398GI,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are happy to see that you were so well taken care of and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Made this 5K fun run at Ahaheim stadium a weekend get away to relax and have fun with grand daughter. Took advantage of the free Angel tickets received from 5K and had a family outing at Angel - Blue Jays game. Fireworks and fun.
Manager Response: Hello kashubini6,  We are happy to see that your 5k run at Angel Stadium was followed by a 5 star stay here at the Hampton Inn! Come back for another game soon!

Summary: We had a group of four rooms all suites which was great as the kids and adults had separate sleeping areas. The hotel is older the maintain the Lobby very well and breakfast was good. The rooms seem to be old and tired in a need of a coat of paint. The lighting was not good in the kitchen area, almost like they were hiding the cleanliness.
Manager Response: Hello 7543catorno,  Thank you for spending your family vacation with us. We are happy to see that your suites worked out so well for all of you. We are currently renovating the guest rooms to match our modern lobby that was renovated a couple years back. We hope you come back to enjoy our bright new accommodations on your next vacation!

Summary: Wish I knew the pool or hot tub was not available otherwise I would stay different hotel I walked a lot at Disneyland my legs were very tired I would love go to hot tub but not working it's ok  but this is nice hotel
Manager Response: Hello nancyannv2017,  We apologize that you were not aware of the pool closure prior to arrival. We try our best to inform guests during booking as well upon arrival to avoid any surprises. Our sister property has welcomed our guests to use their pool in the mean time. We are glad you enjoyed the rest of your stay!

Summary Heading: Usually a clean hotel....not this time
Summary: Checked in my room, went to use the restroom and found skid marks in the toilet....a lot of skid marks.  Gross!!! Called front desk and asked for housekeeping to come and clean the bathroom...waited 30 minutes and had to call again. Perhaps I need to travel with more than Lysol.
Manager Response: Hello Stacey R,  We apologize for the cleanliness of your room upon arrival. We have spoken to our housekeeping department to ensure this does not happen again. This is not what Hampton is all about and we hope for another chance to show you what Hampton has to offer.

Summary: Hampton Inn always delivers a consistent experience and comfort and this location was no different.  The pool was under renovation but was offered to use the neighboring Hotel pool area (Embassy Suites).  The breakfast was good and plenty of seating.  The hallways looked could use a refresh but that doesn't matter.  The room was standard with comfortable beds and pillows, clean bathroom.   The ART bus stop is a couple minute walk from this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi MTECvisitor,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are so happy that Hampton has provided such wonderful consistent service to you and your family each and every time. We are excited for our guest room and hallway renovations to be complete and we hope you come back to see the finished results!

Summary Heading: The pool is not available. Otherwise great for family stay
Summary: We had a room that sleeps six and it actually sleeps six! So many times they say that but make you rent an extra bed. There were two TV's so I didn't have to watch what the kids watched. Full fridge, two burners, microwave, and a dishwasher! I didn't realize it had all that. One of the main reasons I booked this hotel was that it had a wading pool besides the regular pool. I was very disappointed to find out that the entire pool was closed for renovation and you had to go to the next hotel over to use their pool. :( I feel like they should have disclosed that in advance. The shuttle to Disney is worth the money! Breakfast was good. Overall very happy with the accommodations.
Manager Response: Hello Becci H,  We are glad that you enjoyed your suite accommodations while staying with us. They are some of our most requested upgrades, so we are happy that the rooms exceeded your expectations. As for the pool, we apologize that you were not informed. We have placed alert banners on our websites as well as with 3rd party companies to ensure that all guests are aware of the closure prior to booking. We hope for the chance to welcome you back after our pool renovation is complete!

Summary: Last minute good room, wonderful free breakfast, staff very friendly. Pool out. Overall good stay. Hotel under renovations we weren't told that until we checked in. This review not relevant making me write a minimum of 200 words, thats insane.
Manager Response: Hello jesusg470,  Thank for the last minute choice to stay with us. We see that the front desk made your reservation for you at the time of check in and informed you about the renovation and pool closure then. It is also posted on our website as well for those who choose to book in advance. We are happy to see that you enjoyed our breakfast and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The expierence of the construction without warning was unacceptable! No where on the site was that ever mentioned. The day we arrived the water was shut down for several hours. When I checked into my room, my bathroom was filthy and had to have someone come up to clean it. There was even dirt in the bathtub. The next afternoon while trying to rest with my kids, the fire alarm goes off saying to evacuate the building. Thankfully it was a false alarm but none the less an inconvenience. Having to walk across the parking lot to use a pool / hot tub was ridiculous.
Manager Response: Hello 596lynseyb,  We apologize that your stay was inconvenienced as a result of our renovation and the condition of your room. While improvements will result in a better product, we understand the impact it had on your stay. We do have the details of our renovation on both of our websites, so we apologize that this was not communicated to you prior to your arrival. I do see that you were compensated for the inconvenience, and we hope that you will give us another chance after our renovation is complete.

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay near Disney!
Summary: Thank you to Nikki and staff! Our stay was amazing. We were welcomed in our room with a card and cupcakes since we were celebrating our Honeymoon. It was such a great surprise! I had requested a room away from the elevators/high floor - and that is exactly what we got. I am glad the staff was very accommodating and helpful. Having a free breakfast and being close to Disney was a big PLUS. I am glad we choose this Hampton Inn to stay at. From walking in late night, to leaving early morning two nights later - everything was amazing! Thank you SO much.   Also, if you are looking to stay near Disney and you are a HH member this is a great place to stay. Price is good, and you are right around the corner from Disney! We took shuttle to Disney, which was $7 per person and were able to
Manager Response: Hello 518fatiman,  We are so happy you chose to spend your honeymoon with us and at the Happiest place on Earth! It's so wonderful to hear how well your trip went and we were happy to be a part of that. Thank you for the 5 star review and we hope to celebrate your anniversary with you next year!

Summary: The hotel was under construction so it was loud during the day while napping with small kids, the pool was closed had to walk to hotel next door to use their pool. Fire salam went off had to exit the hotel but it was a false alarm
Manager Response: Hello W6710HKjenniferd,  We apologize that our renovation caused an inconvenience to you and your family during your stay. Since most of the work is bring completed during that day, I can see how this impacted nap time for the little ones.  I do see that you were compensated for the inconvenience, and we hope for another chance to show you what Hampton is all about after our renovation is complete.

Summary: Hotel was great. Location was good and shuttle service to Disneyland was easy and convenient. Breakfast was great- lots of options including proteins. Hotel room was nice and the beds were very comfortable. Only problem was that the pool was closed.  We were there for spring break and Disneyland and had hoped for lots of pool time. They didn't warn us about the pool at check in. We only found out when we went to use it. They said we could use the Hilton pool across the parking lot but they would have to call and let them know we were coming each time. Definitely not convienient and made to feel like a "poor relation" asking to use the pool next door. Other than that fairly big dissatisfier, great hotel!
Manager Response: Hello Cheryl B,  While having our pool closed was an inconvenience during your stay, we are happy to see that the rest of your stay was satisfactory. We apologize that you were not able to enjoy the pool during your visit. There is never a good time to have our pool closed, however we are confident that the finished product will worth it. We hope you get to enjoy our brand new pool during your next visit!

Summary: Our suite was roomy and clean. We could watch the fireworks at Disneyland from our balcony.  The sofa bed was not comfortable but the beds were great.  The pool was not available, the hotel is being remodeled.
Manager Response: Hello V2786CVmelanieh,  We are glad you enjoyed the fireworks in your room. Disneyland sure does put on a great show. We hope you get another chance to see the hotel after our renovation is complete. Should you find yourself in the area again, please give us another chance to show you our true Hamptonality!

Summary: Hotel staff was great! Property is close to Disney and the convention center. There numerous restaurants in the area within walking distance.  Property needs to be updated. I would stay again in the future.
Manager Response: Hi scds1999,  Thank you for staying with us during your trip to Wonder-con. We acknowledge the need for updates and are excited for the outcome of our current renovation. We hope to welcome you back post renovation for our new and improved guest rooms!

Summary: The booking, check in, service, and check out were super smooth and easy. I felt like every cent was worth it for the business suite and I would not hesitate to book again. Much better than the other hotel I used on the same trip. Very good apartment style suite, nice bath.
Manager Response: Hello 734bonniec,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are so glad to hear that your business travel needs were met during your stay with us. We hope you continue to choose Hampton Inn when your travel brings you to the area!

Summary Heading: Excellent Staff, Breakfast, and Disney Shuttle Recommended Even If You Drive
Summary: Booked Hampton Inn for our 1 week trip to Disneyland, Seaworld, and Legoland California. I've always enjoyed previous stays at Hampton Inn's in Ontario (Canada), NY and PA areas. The hotel is conveniently located close to Disneyland. I wouldn't walk with young children though. May take 30 minutes or so I suppose. It is also little bit away from busy loud area around Disney, which I liked. I had a rental vehicle all the time during our stay. First day, I took the car to Disney and paid for parking. Not worth the hassle and waiting time to park at gigantic indoor parking structure at Disneyland. It took over 30 minutes just to park. Then we had to walk far, then take escalators and elevators downstairs, then had to wait for tram to get to main Disney district. On later days we
Manager Response: Hello sbl36,  Thank you for the amazing review. You hit every aspect of the hotel and we could not appreciate your kind words enough! We are glad to see that your Disneyland vacation was a success and we were grateful to be a part of it all. We are excited for the opportunity to be a part of your next vacation to Disneyland as well!

Summary: The hotel is right near the convention center and walking distance to Disney. Came with a good breafast buffet. The area has a lot of fast food restaurants, so the breakfast was a bonus for good food.
Manager Response: Hello Susiewright9,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are glad you enjoyed Hampton's On the House Breakfast during your stay. We hope your business travel needs bring you to the area often so we can continue to welcome you back!

Summary: It was not too expensive and was overall great ! The rooms were nice and cozy. The breakfast was absolutely delicious! I want to go ahead and thanks Kayla and Niki for assisting me in the lobby. They were awesome. I'm looking forward to coming back.
Manager Response: Hello Joseph T,  We are happy to see that you enjoyed our scrumptious breakfast and cozy rooms. Thanks for the shout out to our team members! They work hard to make every guests stay a memorable one. We can't wait for your return!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, cozy rooms, awesome breakfast!
Summary: We stayed here to go to Disneyland and the hotel worked out perfect and was conveniently located.  Breakfast was better than most continental breakfasts at hotels, which was a nice start to the morning before heading out to Disney.  We had a car so we didn't take advantage of the shuttle but it appeared there was a shuttle to get you to and from Disneyland.  The staff was very friendly.  Renovations are in the works but we never noticed any noise or issues from it.  And our room didn't feel like it was in dire need of updating anyway, so that was nice.  They are definitely on top of things by updating before it is past due.  They were up front about the times of renovations upon check in, which was appreciated.  And the times were very practical.  The staff was great and
Manager Response: Hello Sandra N,  Thank you for your awesome review! It sounds like your Disneyland trip was a success and we are happy to have been a part of that. Our renovations are definitely underway and our goal is to minimize the guest impact as much as possible. We are glad to see that it did not impact you during your stay and we cannot wait for the chance to host you again in one of our renovated rooms!

Summary: Nice place close to Disneyland with a friendly and professional staff.  We enjoyed our stay here, the room was clean, the location was perfect for Disneyland.  The shuttle made it convenient o go back and forth.
Manager Response: Hello Kenneth G,  We are happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us while heading to Disneyland. The shuttle is a great option for transportation to and from the parks! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Just returned home from a two night stay at the Hampton in Garden Grove. We received a welcome text on the morning of our arrival and was asked if there was anything we needed prior to arrival. I asked if there was a room upgrade available as a Hilton Honors member and we were upgraded to a spacious suite. The room was clean and comfortable, we took advantage of breakfast each day, which provided an excellent selection of hot and fresh food. Complimentary cookies were even out in the lobby one night, a nice treat after a long day at Disneyland. All in all we had a great experience and I look forward to coming back to the Hampton for my next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Hello kmed0827,  Thank you for the great review! We are so glad you enjoyed our texting service and that we were able to accommodate you in one of our spacious suites. Our breakfast team are always happy to start our guests' mornings with a delicious, hot breakfast. We are honored to have served you and your family during your stay and we can't wait to host you all for your next Disney trip!

Summary: Hotel was under construction and our family could not use the pool. Parking is charged separately at $15 per day yet there was none when I returned and had to park at a nearby closed restaurant. Front desk employees were not compassionate
Manager Response: Hello Kimberly G,  We apologize that your stay was not exceptional. As we are undergoing renovations, our pool area is closed, however our sister property next door has offered to allow our guests to use their pool. We apologize that our staff were not able to assist you further, but we do hope to have you back post renovation for another chance to show your our true Hamptonality!

Summary: Love this hotel! Stayed at another on the same property last year and had several problems. Smooth visit here! We sleep so comfortable on the beds we even considered buying one for ourselves, the a/c works well and the comforters are cozy.
Manager Response: Hello Loraine S,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are so happy that your stay was exceptional and that you had such a good night's sleep on our beds. We cannot wait for another chance to host you again!

Summary Heading: Lots of things shut down in the hotel and the loudness of the room
Summary: The property had construction equipment all over the laundry room was shut down the pool was shut down. The room we stayed in had power tools going off at 7:45 am not a very great experience for what we paid
Manager Response: Hello Elisa M,  It was unfortunate that your stay was not the experience that you expected. We are undergoing renovations to improve our overall product and I apologize for the impact it had on your stay with us. Our construction team does not start work until 9am every morning to avoid disturbing our guests. I wish we would have known about your noise concerns prior to you checking out and we would have made sure that you, as our guest, did not have to incur any unnecessary disturbance during your stay. Should you choose to come back post renovation, we hope to have another chance to make your stay better.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Disneyland Stay
Summary: Traveled to Anaheim to visit Disneyland with three of our grandchildren two of our children and one spouse.  I booked three rooms at the Hampton as I stayed at them frequently for business,  It was a great choice. Walking distance to Disneyland if we choose to do so, great beds, great breakfast, and incredible friendly staff.  Chocolate cookies in the evening. Family resturants close by and staff always willing to advise you.
Manager Response: Hello mageryj2017,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are very happy to see that you chose Hampton Inn for your family travel needs. From the breakfast your enjoyed in the morning to the cookies at night, and the staff to top it off, we are glad your stay was so great! We would be happy to host you for your next family vacation or your next business trip in the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Much more inexpensive than the others!
Summary: This hotel is an average hotel.  I have stayed in Hampton Inn's that are amazing.  This hotel is very clean but very average.  That being said.....the staff was very nice, the breakfast was up to par, and the price was at least 20.00 cheaper than neighboring hotels.  It is a Disneyland Good Neighbor hotel so you get benefits there!  I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is on a budget and doesn't need the frills and fancy lobby to have a nice stay.
Manager Response: Hi momtks,  Thank you for your comments regarding our staff and breakfast. They truly are what make the difference for our hotel. With our renovation we hop to improve all other aspects of the hotel as well. Should you choose to stay in the area again, we hope to see you back here at Hampton Inn, and we be sure to fall into that amazing Hampton Inn category that you have enjoyed in the past!

Summary: The hotel needed renovation. The lobby was very warm as if AC was broken. We were placed into wrong room so the helpful and kind staff upgraded our room. Parking was limited.  You basically get what you pay for at this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello kimberly119,  We appreciate your comments and we will work with the appropriate departments to ensure your concerns are addressed. Our goal here at Hampton is to be more than average, so we hope to welcome you back post renovation for another chance to show what our true Hamptonality is all about!

Summary: Although its around 20 mins to walk to disney, this hotel was far worth the distance.   There is a shuttle that runs every 30 mins from the multi hotel pick up directly to the disney drop off point just off harbor blvd. I believe it was around 5 dollars a day. Pick up the pass in the lobby.  We had excellent beds which make a difference when you are walking 10K steps everyday.   The breakfast had plenty of choices like cereal, hot breakfast choices like eggs and waffles, yogurt, oatmeal, pastries and toast. It was a fantastic start to your morning.   There is free wifi for checking your disney reservations and wait times, as well as face-timing with family and friends.  There is a target about 10 min walk south across the street. Grab some wine and snacks for the evening.
Manager Response: Hello Mrsbloom19,  We are glad to see that the shuttle suited your needs so well and that the breakfast was such a great start to your day. We can't wait to welcome you back, maybe for Mickey's Halloween Party this time!

Summary: Very friendly staff, clean spacious room, and free breakfast. I was looking for a place with a good value for my family of four to stay during our recent trip to Disneyland. We stayed in a king suite and the pricing was excellent. I won't have to spend time researching next time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Diana H,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are so happy that we were able to provide such great accommodations for you and your family. We hope to welcome you back in a king suite on your next vacation!

Summary: The staff here are great! Helpful to recommend things to do at the parks, find the nearest liquor store, give realistic traffic expectations... breakfast and housekeeping staff were helpful too! It's an easy walk to the park and the price is just right!
Manager Response: Hello chipnbill,  Thank you for your kind words regarding our staff and their recommendations. It was our pleasure serving you during your stay and we can't wait for another opportunity to serve you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Good family hotel for the money.
Summary: I had a two queen bed room. I was able to choose a firework view room for no extra charge 24 hours before actual check-in. Breakfast was nice, and the shuttle to Disneyland was reasonably priced and cheaper than parking at Disney.
Manager Response: Hello kaylasS5026YT,  We are so glad you enjoyed your firework view room and breakfast at our hotel. We always recommend the PCA shuttle service for easy transportation to and from Disneyland. Hopefully we get to host you again during your next stay in Anaheim!

Summary: The hotel is just a mile from the parks so easy to get there.  The staff at the hotel was fabulous and made sure we were taken care of.  Even though this is a bigger Hampton the quality was excellent.  Breakfast was wonderful and just a great stay.
Manager Response: Hello Brad J,  Thank you for your 5 star review. Our staff were happy to take care of you and we hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: If you are looking for the friendliest, cleanness, kindest, look no further.  The Hampton Inn & Suites is an answer to a prayer.  Our group has been staying at the Hampton for the past seven years as we attend the Religious Education Congress in Anaheim.  Everyone in our group raves about the Hampton.
Manager Response: Hello U8163HJrobertr,  Thank you so much for your kind words! We are happy to have hosted you year after year for Religious Education and we hope to continue to be your choice when staying in the Anaheim area!

Summary: This hotel is an excellent value.  An extremely motivated staff that made our Disneyland vacation memorable.  Booked a 2 room suite and asked for a high floor with Disneyland view and they accommodated perfectly.  Breakfast was excellent.  Can't say enough for the staff at this property.  I would highly recommend this hotel for family travel!
Manager Response: Hi magness28,  Thank you for commending our staff so wonderfully. It was an honor to serve you and your family and our team members are always excited to make your stay one to remember. We hope to see you and your family again in the near future!

Summary Heading: What we have come to expect from Hampton
Summary: Beautiful hotel experience. The lobby and staff are welcoming and friendly. The room was what we have come to expect from Hampton Inn and Suites. The breakfasts were the highpoint of the accommodations.
Manager Response: Hi Y4879CEthomasm,  Thank you for your loyalty to Hampton Inn. We are glad that the breakfast was such a delight for you and we hope to exceed your expectations on your next visit!

Summary: This property is very clean and quiet.  This is typical of the quality of the Hilton properties.  Plenty of parking and off the main road. I would recommend this property for overnight or weekend stay in the Cypress areA.
Manager Response: Hello silverius1,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and that parking was such a breeze. Hopefully we can welcome you back for another overnight or weekend stay soon!

Summary: We stayed at Hampton Inn & Suites for five days to visit Disneyland and we did not have any problem at all.  They have shuttle service every 30 minutes to Disneyland which is a bonus.  They staff members are very friendly.    The rooms are clean and they also provide quality complimentary breakfast from 6:00 to 10:00am.  I would recommend this hotel 100%.
Manager Response: Hello Reena C,  We appreciate the 5 star review! We are so happy to have hosted you and your family for your 5 day stay. Here at Hampton we want our guests to be 100% Happy! Thank you for the recommendation and we can't wait to serve you again!

Summary: Nice staff and hotel with easy access to Disneyland, but my room wasn't ready for a guest. Bathroom did not work. I'd stay here again but would make sure room is ready before settling in. The staff was kind and helpful and tried their best to make us happy.
Manager Response: Hello 516saleemf,  We apologize that your stay at the Hampton Inn was sub par. This is not a typical experience for our guests and we strive for an exceptional experience each and every time. It was reported that the water was turned off to your toilet, causing it not to operate. We would have loved the chance resolve this upon check in, rather than when you checked out. I do see that we issued you 20,000 Hilton Honors points for the inconvenience. Should your travels bring you to the area again, we hope to make your next stay top notch!

Summary Heading: Not as nice as last time, but still conveniently located
Summary: Stayed here a year ago, and loved it. This time, our room was a bit noisy and worn. Breakfast was okay, but more limited than what we were used to. Based on our room and breakfast, we'd give this place a 3. However, because of the employees, the location, and the room rate, we're giving it a 4.  The staff was the best part of this hotel - friendly, helpful, and seem genuinely glad to see you. We requested top floor with a quiet room with a view of the fireworks, and we got both. (Unfortunately, we also got a cranky, sleepless toddler next door.) The beds were quite comfortable - we prefer harder mattresses. A TV guide in the room would have been nice, but we called the front desk and apparently they don't have them. Also, the elevators are quite slow, so we took the stairs going
Manager Response: Hello stravinsky57,  We appreciate your comments and are glad to see the staff and location are what made your stay and are glad the shuttle and local restaurants were so convenient for you and your family. We are beginning the process of renovating our guest rooms in a couple weeks, and we hope to have the opportunity to host you and your family once we are complete!

Summary: Checked into our hotel early and they had our room ready, we were a bit surprised about the $15/day parking fee, had not been aware of that expense.    The main reception area is trendy and welcoming.   Staff was more than friendly and welcoming.   It was nice to be able to buy tickets and shuttle passes right at the desk.    We were on the top floor (7), the elevators were not the speediest but they got us up and down!   Our room was clean but well used, I had to remind myself that this location has a lot of families and it takes quite a beating.   The room next door had children and bed time got a bit noisy, we found that turning the fan on helped drown out the next door and outside noises. Pool area was lovely and fitness center was nice.   Morning breakfast was great and all
Manager Response: Hello Donna D,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are glad the staff were able to have a room ready early for you. Thank you for your comments regarding our staff members, specifically Yesenia, our accountant. They are work hard to make every guest's stay memorable. We hope to welcome you back to our newly renovated rooms after we complete our renovation this summer!

Summary Heading: Want a few friends in your room?
Summary: When we arrived back in room near midnight we went to get pillows out of closet and a huge cockroach was in the pillow bag which was not sealed. There was cockroach dirt on shelf in closet.
