Quickly threw pillow bag out into hallway and called front desk to report. Was told "want us to bring more pillows up" only.  Had to call again after checking outside and bag and roach were still in hallway. Second call.. told them wasn't leaving doorway until I knew the roach was dead from housekeeping.  Was told someone would come up yet again and it took forever.  Seemed we were on a floor where no one else was staying.  Staff picked up roach with hand in plastic bag then was going to leave until we said there was roach dirt in closet.  He looked at it and I also showed him massive water
Manager Response: Hello M5867GDjasonk,  We appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback as a Gold Honors Member is very important to us. I would like to apologize for our staff not handling your issues in a timely manner during your stay. I will personally speak with them about this to ensure it does not happen again. On our end, it does show that the room charges and parking were refunded, so if that does not reflect on your bank statement, please let us know right away.  Thank you for your feedback and should you choose to return, please feel free to reach out to myself directly. I would be honored with an opportunity to make it right on your next stay.

Summary Heading: Great location with nice complimentary breakfast
Summary: We have stayed at all 3 of the properties in this parking lot. The Hampton. The Hilton Garden and The Embassy Suites and this one is a close second behind the Embassy suites. They do charge $15 for parking which I don't necessarily agree with but it seem par for the course. The breakfast room is spacious and the food was plentiful. The front desk staff were pleasant and accommodating as we arrived early in the morning and though not all our rooms were available we were able to put our bags in the one that was. I paid the e upgrade for a fireworks view room ( and the fireworks were cancelled that night) and yet my son was put in one next door for no additional charge so I don't know that I would ask ahead for that.
Manager Response: Hi 278krisd,  Thank you for the review. We are glad you enjoyed the staff and our scrumptious breakfast. We are sorry to hear that you missed the Disneyland fireworks. We hope to host you again in the future, hopefully when the fireworks show is not cancelled!

Summary: Having stayed at Hilton chain hotels for over a decade, I realize that the Hampton Inn brand usually means a modest room with some minimum comforts at a very reasonable price. This particular Hampton Inn continues to exceed my expectations. There is reserved parking, for Diamond level, the front staff is very helpful and has accommodated every request. The rooms are clean, water pressure in shower is high and the buffet is exceptional. I know they have shuttle service to the convention center as well. I enjoy staying here and view this Hampton as an excellent example of great management and staff.
Manager Response: Hello eagleoneaviation,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our property during your recent stay. Thank you for your compliments of our staff members and clean rooms. We are glad our breakfast team continues to "wow" you with the buffet as well. We hope you continue to return as our loyal guest!

Summary: This hotel has a good location and offers shuttle to Disneyland which really made my trip in such ease. Barbara, who was our front desk agent, helped us thoroughly in the check in process as well as with the shuttle service.
Manager Response: Hi itdl92,  We are so happy that you had a 5 star stay with us. Barbara is a true asset to our team and we are so glad that she was able to make your stay! We can't wait to host you here at the Hampton Inn again!

Summary: Our stay was great the location suited the needs perfectly. The fitness center had excellent equipment. The gift package for Hilton Honors members included much appreciated items. The 40th anniversary photo the manager provided was an added bonus.
Manager Response: Hello Lorenzo W,  We are so glad that your stay here at the Hampton Inn was great Thank you for spending your 40th anniversary with us!

Summary: all the staff is very nice and the location is very goods recommend this hotel to everybody.  I will visit this hotel again for sure. rooms are very clean and organize and the food is good. i like the lobby.
Manager Response: Hello C6242YDgabriels,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to see that the staff made an impact on your stay and appreciate you recommending us! We look forward to welcoming you and your friends back soon!

Summary: The room was clean and comfortable, the lobby was very spacious and very close to Disneyland, good restaurants within walking distances, only cons where expensive parking fee and shuttle fee, we had a good time there
Manager Response: Hello JHSRG,  Thank you for your review and great comments regarding our guest rooms and lobby. We are glad the location was convenient for you and are excited for your return visit. Come again soon!

Summary: Fairly typical Hampton Inn, which is a good thing.  Access from Harbor Blvd is southbound only, otherwise you will have to make a u turn from northbound.  Room was clean, but ac unit was noisy.  Parking was available but tight, large vehicles will be challenged.  Renovation is ongoing, main impact was to parking.  Breakfast was standard Hampton Inn but area was large.
Manager Response: Hello seadog22,  Thank you for your review. Thank you for your comments regarding your guest room and parking. We have noted your concerns with our renovation team to work on a better solution in regards to our parking area. We hope to welcome you back post renovation should your travel bring you back to the area!

Summary: I stayed at this Hampton Inn during a work Convention and ended up having the flu. They were very accommodating and kept everything extra clean. I would definitely recommend this location. Close to several restaurants and deliveries. Close to Anaheim Convention Center and Disney Land. I would say they need a street sign for the driveway for taxi and uber drivers though. (Turn right directly after Joe's Ice)
Manager Response: Hello DrumNDance,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are sorry to hear that you fell ill during your stay, but we are glad the staff were able to accommodate your needs. Thank you for the suggestion on the signage. We hope to get to host you again, hopefully when you are feeling much better!

Summary: Stayed one night in January 2017. I booked a 2 bed regular room and was upgraded to a 2 bed suite. It was a very nice sized room. Since we only stayed the one night, I didn't need the full kitchen, but now that I know I have a chance at an upgrade, I'll be booking here again.   Breakfast was excellent. Scrambled eggs, bacon, oatmeal, lots of breads, make your own waffles, fruit and yogurt... You could have a full breakfast here with no upcharge. It makes a difference. I saw people going back and forth, eating like 3 meals in one sitting. The staff was always out and on hand to clean and restock stuff. This is a huge contrast from the Homewood Suites down the street. If breakfast is important to you, you want to stay here.  Room was pretty quiet. I saw the housekeeper on the
Manager Response: Hello mohc962,  Thanks for taking the time to review. We are glad you enjoyed your upgraded room and our full breakfast. The breakfast team work very hard to keep the area clean and well stocked. We hope you choose Hampton again for your travel needs!

Summary: Very nice stay. A bit worn down but very clean and comfortable. Good breakfast. Geared towards families. Shuttle to Disneyland is a bit pricey, about $7 per person per day. Otherwise a nice stay. Would return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi ryanjJ4529AN,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed our family oriented hotel, and we hope to welcome you back in our newly renovated rooms later this year!

Summary: This place is close to Disney and California Adventure, very convenient 6 minute drive. The breakfast is wonderful. Cold water and fruit are always available in lobby and sometimes fresh baked chocolate chip cookies. We have no complaints about our stay. Staff was very friendly and welcoming.
Manager Response: Hi Chariza S,  We are so happy to see that you enjoyed our breakfast and lobby amenities. The cookies are a hot commodity and tend to go quick. We are glad the staff made your stay great and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: This hotel offered the amenities and style of the Hampton brand of which you may be accustomed.  The elevator worked, the front desk staff were courteous, and the breakfast was well done.  This hotel was better than some Hampton's I've stayed, but not as good as others.  I would note that the hotel is due for some serious maintenance or a renovations.  My only concerns were that the bathtub was rusting, the elevator control panel was held in place with black electrical tape, my commode made a high pitched squealing sound every 10 minutes or so, and I had a long haul from the parking lot to the hotel due to limited parking, of which I was still charged to park.  However, my room was clean, my bed and pillows were comfortable, and I was able to get a fair night's rest.  For the
Manager Response: Hi Nolann192,  We appreciate your honest review and are happy to see that you enjoyed the front desk staff and our delicious breakfast. We are very excited to begin our renovations in the next couple of weeks. All guest rooms will be completely renovated and we hope to welcome you back after we are complete.

Summary: We recently spent 5 nights at this hotel. There were 10 of us and we rented three rooms. To be honest we were a bit disappointed. This hotel is showing its age. Our tub surround was discoloured, hallways needed painting, a tap in one of our rooms wouldn't shut off and had to be fixed, maintenance doors inside the elevator were kept in place with tape. Little things but collectively they suggest that this hotel is not being maintained as well as it should be. Now, to be fair, we understand that the hotel is in the process of upgrading rooms so if you are thinking of staying at this hotel you might want to ask for one of these rooms. Then there is the $15 per day parking fee which added another $150 to our bill because we had two rental vans. Not sure why the hotel thinks it is
Manager Response: Hello DMacIntyre,  We are so happy to have hosted you and your family for your 5 night stay. We apologize for not meeting your expectations in your accommodations. I will address your concerns with our maintenance team and ensure they are resolved. We are glad the staff were able to make a positive impact on your stay and we really hope to get the chance to host your and your family once again.

Summary Heading: OK but read the fine print!
Summary: Good staff very hospitible.  However the cleanliness left something to be desired.  Some rooms have been abused.  Sinks clogged .  Maintenance was slow to respond.  Hidden charges for parking and deposits .
Manager Response: Hello tgem67,  We are glad you enjoyed the staff during your stay. Thank you for your comments regarding our guest rooms and cleanliness. We will reach our to the appropriate departments and inform them of your concerns. On another note, we are set to begin our guest room renovations in just a few weeks so we hope you give us another opportunity to serve you again in our newly renovated rooms!

Summary: This hotel is extremely clean.  The staff were very professional Hotel is within 2 miles of Disneyland, used the shuttle to get there with a fee.  There is also a parking fee per day if you plan on leaving your car there.  I loved the complimentary Internet and breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello cathleened,  Thank you for your 5 star review and great comments! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the staff and location. We hope to have the chance to host you and your family again should you find yourself in the area!

Summary: Had a good experience while our stay at this hotel. The hotel was a mile away, and although a mile is fairly close it seemed far away when walking back to the hotel at night. Staff is friendly, rooms are clean.
Manager Response: Hi Lisseth821,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you had a great time and enjoyed the staff and cleanliness of the rooms! The shuttle service in the area is a great option for going to and from Disneyland. Should you find yourself in the area again, we hope to see you here again!

Summary: Enjoyed the location of the hotel in respect to Disneyland. Great Italian restaurant in Parking lot. Easy access to freeways. Great a Breakfast with make yourself waffles and good variety of breakfast items.
Manager Response: Hi Katherine L,  Thank you for the great review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our Hampton breakfast and our convenient location. Thanks for staying with us during your trip to Disneyland. We hope to see you again next time!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights, throughout it was an awesome experience. We got into a kitchen suite room that was almost in term for renovation, Erica from the management team was quickly able to understand the issue and make changes to accommodate our concerns. The kids loved the hospitality. The breakfast spread was too good and special care was taken to manage the crowd movements. Buying tickets at the front desk was an added convenience.The shuttle service to Disney park was prompt & courteous. It was a family vacation, it was a really pleasant experience to stay here. I would love to come back.
Manager Response: Hi SreeKaimal,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We love to hear about your wonderful experience and so happy you enjoyed your suite! Erica is a true asset to our team and I am so happy to hear that she made your stay even better. We would love to host you and your family again and we look forward to the opportunity to do so!

Summary: Stayed here for five nights in early December.  Definitely walkable to Disney main gate but there's a shuttle you can take - 3 day pass is $18.00 and is good for unlimited use for going back and forth.  Ample parking but there is a daily rate.  Excellent daily breakfast - good selection and changes daily.  Wi-fi is good unless there's a big group on the weekend which happened to us and then the wi-fi is spotty and slow.  Front desk staff are super helpful and really friendly.  Helped up arrange shuttle and passes for Universal and gave really great dining options including K-Town.  I would have given the rooms five stars but the A/C units are really loud.  Would definitely stay here again when the new Star Wars attraction opens in a couple of years.
Manager Response: Hi Sonya071,  Thank you for the review! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed the shuttle and breakfast here at the Hampton Inn. We are happy to hear that the staff was able to assist with dining and tickets to Universal. We can't wait for you to come back for Star Wars!

Summary Heading: Nice Way to End a Disneyland Visit
Summary: This was a Day-Before-Christmas visit to Disneyland.  We started our day at 8:30am and headed to the hotel around 9:30pm.  A close drive and easy find made our retreat at Hampton Inn a nice reward to our tired feet and bodies.  Online check in also enabled us to grab a room facing the fireworks at Disneyland, and  the room rates were a good deal for the location.  Perfect and unique way to celebrate 2016 Christmas.
Manager Response: Hello gr8-s-cape,  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your Day-Before-Christmas stay with us. We hope your 2016 Christmas was one to remember! Hopefully we will see you again in 2017!

Summary: Typical Hampton Inn. You get what you expect. We reserved a suite which was absolutely lovely and worth the extra money. The suite provides A LOT of room including a small kitchenette area and a pull up couch with a tv. The second room included 2 beds and the bathroom. Ample amount of room. It was nice returning to a decent sized room after a long day in Disney. The breakfast was nice and a huge plus for a Disney trip! Over the Christmas holiday it never seemed to crowded.   It would be quite a walk to the entrance of Disney. Would suggest buying a shuttle pass for $6 a day. Pick up is right in the hotel parking lot and takes you the to Disney entrance. Runs every half hour while starting early and servicing until after midnight.   Hampton is a good place to stay for a decent
Manager Response: Hello utahsmashley,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed your spacious suite as well as our complimentary breakfast! We are glad your stay was so enjoyable and we hope to see you again in 2017!

Summary Heading: Walkable to Disneyland, but we took the hotel shuttle for 6 bucks per day per person
Summary: The hotel was basic Hampton amenities, spacious room, desk, TV on top of chest of drawers.  Free wifi included in a moderate price.  We took the hotel shuttle to/from Disneyland and California Adventure - it runs every half hour on the quarter hour mark from the hotel, and at the top and bottom of the hour from the hotel.  Very convenient - if you have a 3 or 5 day park hopper pass, get rid of your rental car and use the bus, it's so much easier and cheaper.  Or better yet - it's only a 1.5 mile walk from hotel to the Disney gate - get your steps in!  You'll be walking much further than that in the park! If you prefer a king bed (instead of two queens), reserve the room early; one of our party wanted a king standard room and had to settle for a king accessible (handicapped) room
Manager Response: Hello Steve B,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are glad you had a great time at Disneyland and we hope you choose us again when you are back in the area!

Summary: Always a wonderful stay. Safe and clean.  Courteous Staff. Only suggestion is gluten free choices for breakfast,  bread, pastries.  Shuttle bus to Disneyland.  Courteous water bottles. Fruit, coffee and hot tea always ready. Small store in lobby
Manager Response: Hello paulatate,  Thank you for commending our staff and for the 5 star review! We enjoy making our guests feel like family when they stay with us. We see you suggestion for gluten free options, and we would like to mention that we do have these available upon request. If you choose to come back to the area again, we look forward to serving you!

Summary Heading: A great place to stay when visiting Disneyland.
Summary: This hotel is a great place to stay when visiting Disneyland with kids.  We had a quite with 2 queens and a hide-a-bed.  The large suite is nice with the added room and kitchen.  The free breakfast is a HUGE added bonus you need to figure in when shopping price.  Very friendly staff.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello David W,  Thanks for your 5 star review! We are glad you enjoyed your suite with the extra space and kitchen as well as our complimentary breakfast! Should you choose to come to the area again, we look forward to serving you and your family.

Summary: helpful staff breakfast was great room was very clean has microwave and fridge only. What I've is you have to pay for self parking and parking lot not secured anybody can just drive in but other than that love staying here
Manager Response: Hello Mauricio M,  Thank you for your great review. We are happy to hear your comments regarding our staff. They work hard to make sure our guests are well taken care of. We acknowledge your parking concern, and would like to ensure you that we do have security patrolling the lot daily. Thank you for kind words and we look forward to seeing you again in 2017!

Summary: Stayed 4 days, staff very friendly n helpful. Very caring n willing to help. Make sure no valuables are left in your vehicle, my daughters car was broken into but police came right away and staff assisted in answering questions and helping police.
Manager Response: Hello jov82,  We are glad to see our staff make a positive impact on your stay. We apologize for your vehicle break-in, and are glad that the Garden grove police department were able to assist you so quickly. Should you come to the area again, we will be happy to serve you.

Summary: Great breakfast and staff.  Good location for visiting the "OC" or Disneyland.  Hampton Inn is always a great value for your travel dollar.  Suite size rooms very adequate and roomy.  Was not informed of $15 parking charge until check out.
Manager Response: Hello ghh3,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you loved your stay in OC for Disneyland! We are happy to see that the suite worked out so well for you. Our apologies regarding the parking communication. If you come to the area again, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back.

Summary: Hotel was a good deal otherwise.  Pretty clean area and close to Disney if you're going.  Hotel felt a bit "used" and out of date in the room.  Overall a good experience, just really peeved about paying for parking, something that I've never done at any other HIAS locations.
Manager Response: Hello 993chada,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for not meeting your expectations regarding the parking. The majority of hotels charge for parking in the resort area as a deterrent for non-guests filling all the spots in the lot. We do have our renovation planned to be completed this next year, so we hope to welcome you back to our new and improved product!

Summary: Had a very good time and experience during our stay. Would recommend to anyone who is looking for a hotel that is close to all the attractions in Anaheim area for both pleasure or business. A good value.
Manager Response: Hello Dennis W,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear about your great experience with us and we hope to welcome you back, should your travel needs bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Top notch service and close to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is awesome and location is ideal.  You can walk to the park, but the shuttle service is the way to go.  Breakfast is included and makes for a stress free start to the day.  Will definitely stay here again for and recommend it highly.
Manager Response: Hello Randy P,  Thank you for your review, we are glad your stay was exceptional. Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, so we are glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as the start to your day. We excited for your return and look forwards to serving you again!

Summary: I was on business trip and stayed here. The breakfast was very lousy and that is one thing thing you really need on a business trip. The rooms was just ok and there was some noise from the road outside. This could be a good choice for family on vacation because of proximity to Disney. I won't recommend for a business traveller.
Manager Response: Hello,  We apologize for not meeting your expectations as a business traveler. If you have any suggestions on how we may better serve our business travelers, especially in regards to our breakfast, please contact feel free to contact me directly at 714-703-8800. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again, should your travel needs bring you to the area.

Summary: Had the best experience at this hotel! All staff memebers super friendly and treat you like you're the only one there and your needs matter the most. Breakfast was great! So delicious! Hotel was very clean all around. Will definitely stay here again in the future!
Manager Response: Hello lilianav821,  Thank you for your wonderful comments regarding our staff. We are so happy to see that your experience was so great and we look forward to your return stay!

Summary: Location and service was perfect. We switched room type because of separate reservations. The second room was better. Rooms were clean and the breakfast offerings were good. We'd return and recommend. Ashley was great!
Manager Response: Dear AnelaWings,  Thank you for writing us a review!  It's always great to see a guest enjoy our property but makes it extra special when an associate is directly acknowledged.  I know Ashley takes great pride in everything that she does and will definitely pass the compliments on to her.  Thank you once again and hope to see you soon!

Summary: 1. The house keeper left the exchanged linen in my room. I brought it your front desk. 2. I missed my slipper after house keeping. I asked the front  desk to find it, And the house keeper brought back it me from somewhere ( It was not from my room. He brought back it from out of my room.).  3. The bed was broken when I sit on the bed. And The broken bed hit my legs.  Front manager told me a lots of excuse.
Manager Response: Dear kokit305,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review!    These were very unfortunate circumstances and I am sorry that you felt the problem was not resolved correctly.  I hope that my email afterwards found you well.  Please don't hesitate to reach back out to me if you have any further questions or concerns.

Summary: The staff was welcoming and always helpful.  The room was well maintained and very clean.  The attention in the breakfast area was good.  I felt comfortable here. The parking fees and shuttle fees added to the cost, but were competitive with surrounding facilities.
Manager Response: Dear Rick P,  Thank you for your kind review!  Being comfortable should always be a requirement of a hotel and I'm happy to see that you were able to feel that while staying with us.  And thank you for noticing that we do try to stay competitive with the surround facilities in regard to our fee structure.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Not up to Hampton Inn standards
Summary: I do a lot of traveling and I stay in Hampton inns 95% of the time. I chose this Hampton Inn as I thought it was going to be similar to the others. It is not. The rooms are OK  but the hotel itself seems crowded. When there was a large spell in the elevator no one could understand English to help‚Ä¶ And the breakfast in the morning, which I've always looked forward to was extremely poor quality.  Instead of the usual bacon or sausage they offered a thinly slice post guy that was not in that great quality. The little cheese omelettes pasted off. The only fruit that was offered was a bitter great fruit or a hard not quite right green melon. The oatmeal was extremely lumpy and dry. such a disappointing breakfast for all! I won't stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear caselaw,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to write us a review!  I have quickly become fond of the Hampton Inn brand and am glad that you choose Hamptons as your preferred lodging 95% of the time.  It does disappoint me that we weren't able to meet the standards though, especially for our breakfast which I know our staff take great pride in.  If it's possible, I would love to get some information from you about your stay and the dates that you were with us so that I can investigate as to why the quality of our breakfast was subpar.  I hope that after we resolve these issues, you will allow us to serve you once more to prove that this is not a common occurrence.

Summary: Hampton Inn & Suites is really a great value and met all our expectations and beyond! The beds are super comfortable, room is clean and nicely decorated. Breakfast was generous and easy to get in and out! I loved that they played Disney cartoons for the kids! We can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Dear Brian S,  Thank you for your kind review!  So glad that you enjoyed our property and that the little ones were able to enjoy some toons in the morning!  Even more exciting that there's another trip already in the works.  Thank you once again and we will patiently await your return!

Summary: Had a great stay.  This hotel is close to great food and easy to get to a lot of local destination experiences.  The breakfast had a good variety, even for picky kids.  We upgraded our view to watch Disney's fireworks and the kids loved it.
Manager Response: Dear Q6368KIericw,  Thank you for writing us a kind review!  A lot of our guests frequent Disneyland but it's still awesome to see our guests visit some of the other attractions such as Knotts as well!  I hope that you were able to enjoy the fireworks display as much as I do!

Summary: We were not surprised by the condition of the Hampton Inn, having stayed at other locations.  Everything was exactly what we expected and we were very pleased.  Beds were comfy and relaxing.  Bathrooms cleaned and well maintained.  Breakfast was yummy with lots of options too.
Manager Response: Dear Margie B,  Thank you for writing us a kind review!  It's exciting to work for the Hampton Inn brand and serves me proud that we were able to meet Hampton Inn standard for you.  Thank you once again and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Comfortable room. BEST features - nice cooking facilities and balcony with a view of Disney Land fire works in the evening. Absolute fairytale! Short distance to Disney Land. Great shopping nearby. great for a family stay.
Manager Response: Dear gymjun,  Thank you for writing us a review!  How awesome, I'm glad you were able to enjoy the fireworks show from your balcony!  Enjoying a fairytale from the Happiest Place on Earth is an amazing feeling and it elates me that you were able to experience it while staying with us.  We hope that you were able to enjoy the rest of the area and perhaps see you soon!

Summary: The walk to Disneyland was nice and not that long, 20 minutes or so. The breakfasts are a bit different everyday and there is always plenty and its yummy! The staff make sure of that :) Our room was very clean although it could use a bit of updating. The outsides of the windows could use a good washing so that you could be able to see the fireworks.  The staff was wonderful !! Anything needed was taken care of right away . We would stay there again for sure !!
Manager Response: Dear familyfuntime2012016,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review!  An update is indeed needed and is actually in plans for the start of the new year!  We'll have to plan some window scrubbing time as well.  Happy to see that you enjoyed the stroll to Disneyland and our amazing breakfast + staff. Should you return, let us know so that we can receive your feedback after our rooms are refreshed!

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and does the job!
Summary: We reached a bit late since we were doing a road trip. The front desk treated us well and was quick enough to complete the check in process. We were sent to our room pretty fast. The breakfast was well laid out and full of choices. Rooms were ok and clean. The toilets were clean. We enjoyed the pool and the Jacuzzi. If you get a room on the higher floors you can catch a glimpse of the fireworks from Disneyland at night. Overall it is a value for money.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful time with daughter and grandkiddos!! Close to Disneyland, lots of food choices!! Breakfasts were great!! Lots of choices, even for our pickiest eaters!! Our hallways were quiet. We were greeted warmly each time we passed the desk!!
Manager Response: Dear 493stevene,  Thank you for your kind review!  It's awesome to see that we had the pleasure to serve 3 generations of your family!  It's even more awesome that everybody was able to enjoy the breakfast.  I'll pass along the kudos and hope that the rest of the trip was relaxing as well.

Summary Heading: An excellent value for a Disney visit!
Summary: This hotel is an excellent value for a Disney visit.  It's about a mile away so you could walk if you wanted to but there's also a shuttle that leaves every half-hour for only $6 per person all day so you can take multiple back-and-forth trips.  The free breakfast has a nice selection of food and beverages.  Get a room on a high floor facing Disneyland and you can see the fireworks!
Manager Response: Dear Andrew P,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review!  We're happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and utilize some of our great amenities!  I'll definitely agree on the fireworks show as not only is it beautiful but it's free.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Close to Disney by car. The same room at a Disney hotel would be 4 to 5 times higher. Though the rooms appear a bit worn, the hotel is clean, the staff great, and the breakfast is a step above other Hampton Inns in this country. In fact, it looked like they had two staffers working full time to keep the breakfast going. In addition to things like waffles, they had omelets, sliced grapefruit, melon and excellent pastries.
Manager Response: Dear Glen H,  Thank you for great review!  Being a fan of the Hampton Inn breakfast, I'm positive that our staff is proud that you believe we're able to offer beyond such an already amazing service.  I'll pass the kudos onto the breakfast lead and her staff!  Also, at the start of the new year we will be getting a makeover.  So, we hope to see you next year and would love to hear your feedback/thoughts after we get refreshed.

Summary: the breakfast was excellent, they were was a grrstbedtions of hot, fresh, and well prepared food. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. The rooms we're fine, it's close to target. The pool and hot tub were also fine.
Manager Response: Dear Cob120,  Thank you for writing us a review!  I am a fan of our breakfast as well!  Hampton Inn does a great job with their offerings and we are proud to serve it.  We hope to serve you again when you return to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: Staff was excellent, great place, easy access great breakfast. Everyone was very attentive ensuring you have a great stay. Definitely would recommend, kids enjoyed the facilities, the were able to take advantage of the business center for studies.
Manager Response: Dear 624miguelq,  Thank you for writing us a review!  I'm glad to see that your children were able to utilize the business center but hope they weren't studying too hard and was able to enjoy the attractions around the area.  We hope to serve you again soon!

Summary: Hampton Inn/Garden Grove was a little tired and worn looking. Mattresses and pillows weren't great. Staff was pleasant and helpful! We checked in early and they were very helpful with this which was greatly appreciated. We purchased upgraded internet and had trouble still getting good Wifi.
Manager Response: Dear debbym713,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review!  It's great to see that the staff was accommodating but saddens me that the rest of the services and amenities were lackluster.  It excites me to let you know that the mattresses, pillows and wi-fi are part of our refresh at the turn of the year.  So, let us know when you'll be returning to the area and we'll offer you not only the great service again but great sleeping arrangements as well!

Summary: My sister and I come every couple of month to spend the night. This was the first time staying at the Hampton Inn, and we will use this as our go to Hotel in the future. The ease of check in digitally and parking along with the shuttle to take us to  Disneyland . Everything was convenient and we enjoyed our complementary breakfast. We are looking forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy W,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review!  I am grateful to be your go to hotel and and am excited to be able to offer you and your sister the type of Hamptonality you deserve!  Digital Check-in definitely seems cool and very convenient for a lot of the gusts.

Summary: I'm a Hampton Inn regular, and this hotel was nice, with a decent price for the level and area of this hotel.  It would be a good place for Disney, it wasn't far from Orange County Airport, and there were plenty of other amenities in the area.
Manager Response: Hello tarmonster - Thank you for taking the time to write to us and review our hotel.  I was thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay.   We do like to think of ourselves as a great hotel value when you travel to our area, and you are absolutely correct that the drive from Orange County Airport is a short (25 minutes) and pleasant drive when flying into our area.  We do love our guests, and being a Hampton regular, you probably understand "Hamptonality" best as it is an important part of our culture. We expect our associates to share their friendly and attentive service with our guests to help to ensure that they have a wonderful stay.  I hope you will return again soon to visit with us.  Please let us know if we can help you the next time you are planning your trip to our fabulous city.  By the way - I love your TripAdvisor name, so you must have a little bit of Hamptonality in you as well!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: The staff was very friendly. Everyone we encountered welcomed us back to the hotel. The quality and the selection of the free breakfast was very good. Everyday there was make it yourself waffles, a nice selection of bread for toast, muffins, yogurt, fresh fruit and cereal, plus oatmeal. Day one also had ham and cheese omelets, sausage links and country potatoes. Day two was scrambled eggs, sausage patties and french toast. Day three was cheese omelets and turkey sausage. The room was very nice. The shower head was actually higher up the wall than anyplace else I have ever stayed. Usually I have to duck down to get my head wet but the head here was probably 6'6" up the wall. We had a room on the ground floor right by the pool. Had a sliding glass door that opened out to the patio
Manager Response: Hello Robert - Thank you for taking the time out of your travels to write.    I was very glad to read that you found our staff to be friendly, as we are very proud of all of the service efforts in each of our departments.  They all work very hard, and try their best to keep our guests happy, and feeling like they are at their second home.   I also was glad to read that you enjoyed our breakfast, as we are very proud of the quality, presentation and consistency each and every day.  The breakfast team takes a lot of pride in their work.  By the way we are about to start a "Hampton room refresh" which will be a complete renovation of the current room package.  This should allow us to lower the shower head that you mentioned.  I fully understand your comment and I have brought it to our team's attention for review.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write, and we all look forward to your return in the very near future.  Have a wonderful day and please keep in touch and let us know if you need anything in your travels.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Staff was very friendly the location was clean and close to Disney. I didn't eat there but the breakfast look good I can't complain about our stay as over all it was great. I was told I had to many Texas things
Manager Response: Dear fernandoh230,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review!  We appreciate the kind words and hope that you were able to enjoy some sort of breakfast or as I call it, morning fuel.  And is there such a thing as too many Texas things?  We hope to serve you again soon!

Summary Heading: Best Costumer Service I've Seen in a Long Time
Summary: We will continue to come to this hotel as we visit Disneyland twice a year.  The coffee here is the best coffee I've had at any hotel.  The breakfast is also above par for a complementary hotel breakfast.  There's lots of options and everything was nice and clean and fully stocked.  The location is great, because they provide a shuttle to the park and it's a quick and easy trip.  The best part is the cleanliness and I can't wait to see how their renovations come out when we come next year.  Also the staff is amazing; along with their General Manager who really understand customer service and what it's like to exceed guests expectations.
Manager Response: Dear 130reannam,  Thank you for writing us such a kind review!  It's great to see that you come visit the Happiest Place on Earth twice a year and that you're able to enjoy our hotel as well!  I will pass the commendations onto the previous General Manager and the whole staff as it's what this hotel strives to do.    We can't wait for your return and would love to hear what you think about the refresh after it's complete.

Summary: Hampton Inns in my opinion are some of the most quality consistent brands out there.  Whether you are in Mitchell, SD or Chicago, IL - expectations are always met.  The hotels are always clean and comfortable.  We are loyal to Hampton's and used our points for three nights.  This hotel was showing it age and had some inconsistencies that bothered me a bit.   The GOOD.  We came back from the park the first night and they had fresh baked cookies.  The second night, there was no fresh baked cookies.  I cracked a joke to the front desk person about the lack of cookies as we walked past and he tossed me a bag of Oreos to fix it.  Thanks!  The breakfast was great.  The dining area was large, no problem finding a place to sit.  We used the pool one night and it was just fine.  Very
Manager Response: Dear grach821,  Thank you for writing us such an in depth review!  Being new to the property, I appreciate the candidness as it allows me to learn on where the focus needs to be.  While we are excited to announce a room makeover at the turn of the year, it seems that there were issues beyond the condition of the room and I apologize for that.  If you ever have a moment, I would appreciate if you could reach out to me so that we can get these items fixed.  I'm happy to see that the service was there though and we'll have to get more cookies for your next visit! From a fellow Coloradoan, thanks for visiting and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Very nice. Staff is extremely friendly and helpful.
Summary: I enjoyed my stay here. The hotel is just right not big or small. The free breakfast was also an added benefit. The proximity to Disneyland was very convenient especially with he shuttle service available.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a great place to stay.  It's less than a 10 min walk to the CON, and there were no disruptions at night. Also, the breakfast was a great start of the day, and it looked as if many families were going to disney world.
Manager Response: Dear michaelhL8603MC,  Thank you for writing us a review!  Being new to the area, it's great to see that the walk to Blizzcon is short.  We're glad to see you enjoyed your stay and perhaps next year you'll be able to enjoy both BlizzCon and Disney!

Summary Heading: Good Hotel for a Disney Visit
Summary: Older Hotel but kept clean.  Beds were comfortable, rooms were clean.  Hot breakfast choices changed daily. Nice size pool with spa.  Plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby.  Rooms were quiet and staff was very friendly and helpful. Located on Harbor about a 1/2 mile from Disney Toy Story parking lot
Manager Response: Dear lindabG3812GG,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to write us a review!  It's great to see that you were able to enjoy our hotel.  And while we are an older hotel, I hope you're excited as we are when we get our refresh at the turn of the year.  We hope that you have another Disney visit in the plans soon so that you can let us know your thoughts on the new rooms.

Summary: I usually stay in a Hampton inn whenever I can either for business or pleasure. I find the rooms clean and bathrooms large.  The breakfast and internet are both free, can't ask for more than that.  Everything is consistent.  I recommend staying in a Hampton inn.
Manager Response: Dear pamperedtraveler720,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to write us a review!  It's awesome to see that our hotel was able to provide you with the service and amenities that live up to the Hampton Inn brand.  We hope that your business or leisure travels bring you back to the area soon as at the turn of year we will beginning a refresh for our property!

Summary: Was a great place for a family trip. I've never been disappointed in Hampton Inn. The staff were so helpful and pleasant. Always great locations. Good value for the price. I would definitely come back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Missy1946,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to write us a review!  Being new to the Hampton Inn brand, it was still easy to see why people would love the brand so much.  It makes me happy and proud to have been able to meet that level of expectations for you.  We hope you plan a return visit to the Anaheim/Garden Grove area soon!

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel the last two times that I have been to the Blizzard Convention.  This is convention is more important to me than my anniversary date, so to have a staff that is so friendly, willing to help us out, and nice room/hottub after a long day of walking around and experiencing all the sights and sounds of Blizz...  Priceless.  Love this place!
Manager Response: Dear Lucy H,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to write us a review!  BlizzConn is definitely a unique experience and it's awesome to see that you're a regular and choose us as your lodging preference.  With so much to do, I hope you enjoyed the announcements of new patches for their games such as the release of the necromancer.  We look forward to seeing you again next year!

Summary: It was a decent hotel.  But for the price, not so much.  Since we are really only there for the convention it was deemed "good enough"  Found pillows to be of poor quality and maybe a bit outdated. Two elevators for such a large hotel can take some time.  Windows were filthy and one day no one even cleaned our room.  Want decent internet? You'll pay for it.  However the staff was quite friendly and professional.  Decent breakfast. no real noise issues.  Had a view of the fireworks.  Overall however. Still Average.  Theres worse places out there to be sure.
Manager Response: Stephen P,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to fill out a review.  It's great to see that the staff was accommodating but let down that you found some aspects of the hotel to be lacking.    Being new to the property, these concerns will help direct me in what areas of the hotel I should focus on.  We hope to better serve you upon your return to the Garden Grove area

Summary: Love Disneyland. Great hotel within walking distance, but on the farther end, maybe mile and a half. They have a shuttle there but you have to pay, $7 per person. We just drove. Great breakfast. Easy.
Manager Response: Hello Aaron  - I hope that you and your family are all doing great as always.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I am glad that you enjoyed our breakfast as I really feel that it is one of the best in the Hampton chain.  Our team takes a lot of pride and ownership in the breakfast experience and I really think that it shows.  It is hard to determine as whether to drive to take the shuttle, parking at Disney can be a savings if you have enough people verses the shuttle, but if you do not it is truly a great value with all day back and forth privileges.   Many of our guests choose the shuttle so they can come back during the afternoon, rest up, and head back to see the fireworks so in those cases I think the shuttle makes sense.  Either way, I am glad you had a great stay and I hope that you and your family will return shortly.  Please call me direct should you ever need anything in all of your travels to our fabulous city.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: This is a good hotel to stay at.  The quality is good.  We have stayed here many times.  The value is great considering a hot breakfast is included. This has been a deciding factor for us on many occasions.
Manager Response: Hello Dencat - Thank you for taking the time to write to us.  It means alot to us, as we all know how busy you can be even while on vacation or simply just returning back home.  I was glad to read that you enjoyed our hot breakfast and especially experiencing the great value of it.  I hear that from so many guests' and I know that when I go out for breakfast I can spend at least $20 on myself alone.  You will have to come back and visit with us again soon.  Please let me know if there is ever anything I can ever do for you and your family in the very near future.  Take care - Mitchell

Summary: Ok hotel near Disney with complimentary breakfast and Internet. Good cleanliness. Stayed here before checking into Disney hotel. Had long drive coming to socal and stayed here first before staying at Disney hotel. Hotel charges for parking which seemed excessive and was for self parking. Parking fee of $15 daily is hidden and was not mentioned as part of initial reservation.
Manager Response: Hello Hallgay - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review. I personally appreciate your feedback.  I do hope that overall you enjoyed your stay and you will have to come back again to visit with us in the very near future.  We will also be conducting a Hampton Room Refresh and I would love your opinion on the new rooms.   I am sorry about the Parking Fees.  We are priced as one of the lowest, if not the lowest in the area, and I will double check and make sure that this cost is properly visible on our websites, and in other areas so it is not a surprise to our future guests as well.  Thank you for bringing this to my attention.  Please let me know if there is ever anything that I can do for you and your family and please keep in touch.  Thank you and have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary: It was my first experience to check in in Hampton Inn and Suites. I have been traveling a lot and checked in other hotels and I am impressed and. satisfied with the services and accommodation that I got. I got no complaint at all. I am longing to check in next time during my future travels.
Manager Response: Hello 411elvirat:  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  Our team works very hard here to make sure that our guests have an excellent stay, and I was thrilled to read that you enjoyed your visit so much.  We have a philosophy and culture of "Hamptonality" here, and it sounds to me like you may have a little bit of "Hamptonality as well!  Please let me know the next time you are coming back into our city as I hope you will decide to stay with us again as you noted.  Let me know if you need anything for you or your family and friends, and thank you again for choosing our hotel for your stay.  Mitchell

Summary: The hotel was in great location, and great service. We stayed here because of the location near Disneyland, and we where able to leave the car parked at this location. The gym is nice and overall the hotel is clean.
Manager Response: Hello Carlos - Thank you for taking the time to write to us!  We all appreciate the great feedback, as I continually say - the team works very hard here to do all we can to ensure that you have a great experience.  I am so glad to read that you found our service to be great.  I have to agree with you about our fitness room.  Honestly I have worked in both large full service hotels and mid-size select service hotels and I have never seen a fitness room as large as ours is and as well maintained.   Thank you so much for mentioning that and I will also remind my team as to the value of it to all our customers, and the positive impact it can have on their overall experience as well!  Please call me if you need anything and I (we) hope to see you again real soon,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: The last of the family vacations.
Summary: To help celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary, my wife and I brought our now adult children to California for one last family vacation before they are off to College, etc.  The staff could not do enough for us to make this the perfect stay and we will only be too happy to recommend this hotel to others if staying near Disneyland and the other attractions in Orange County.  The hotel staff helped to arrange transportation and tickets to local attractions from out arrival from LAX to out departure one week later back to the airport.  Their recommended restaurants were spot on and the rooms we had were comfy, quiet and clean.  Complementary breakfasts add the cherry to the top of a vacation we will never forget.  I hope we can to it again, with grandkids in tow, for our 50th
Manager Response: Hello Todd - I hope that you and your family are all doing great as always.  Thank you so much for everything.  It was an absolute pleasure to serve you and your family, and I cannot tell you how excited we all were to both read and appreciate your comments on your stay.    We enjoy providing our guests with great service, and I can assure you that the team looks forward to taking part in celebrations and helping our guests along the way.  Hopefully we wont have to wait until your 30th Anniversary celebration, but please keep us on your list!!  We are also going to start a room refresh next month, so we would love to have you come back earlier and experience the new rooms!!  Maybe you can make your 26th anniversary a special occasion for us as well, as it would be great to see you and your wife again.  Thank you so much for everything and it was a pleasure to share our "Hamptonality" with you.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Thank you for having us. Summary: Family friendly, great breakfast selection, staff was friendly, courteous.  Rooms are well equipped. Transportation was easily accessible. Plenty of choices available for dining. Overall a great experience for our fun family trip
Manager Response: none

Summary: Close to Disneyland.  Got there after midnight and had to park in back of the building, but there was a door nearby.  We also asked for a late check out since we arrived so late and it was not a problem. Clean and comfy after a long day of park hopping!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very professional staff when dealing with reservations. The gentleman I spoke to named Jesus was very attentive , polite and proactive. I travel very often for business and stay in many Hiltons and never leave reviews, however credit is certainly due in this case. I am looking forward to the stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: very satisfied and plan ed to stay at the same hotel everytime if i have a chance..i highly recommend to my family and friends. excellent service great hotel and location.  everything you want to do in onestop shoppinngmall bank recreations etc.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed in a Suite that included a small kitchen; however did not use it much.  Did use the Frig for water and leftovers.  Room was spacious, nice and clean.  Sofabed was uncomfortable and mattress was stained.   Requested a rollaway bed which was complimentary.  Breakfast is included which is a great option when you are traveling with teenagers.  Staff is friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This is NOT a quality Hampton Inn experience!
Summary: Very dingy room and hotel overall.  Breakfast was late starting and Oatmeal was very watery.  Furniture in guest room had obvious dings and they painted the wood brown to cover the color difference.  Parking lot was difficult to enter and very hard to find an open space.  They do have a shuttle to Disney.  Front Desk staff was nice when approached.  Not the typical Hampton Inn experience.  I stay at Hampton's because I travel often and usually very much enjoy Hampton Inn's and other Hilton Honor's locations.  I would very much discourage anyone from staying at this location.
Manager Response: Hello Melissa - I hope that you and your family are all doing well.  Please accept my sincere apology for the long delay in responding.    I want you to know that the items you have brought to my attention have been addressed with our team.  It is very unusual for our breakfast to receive poor comments, as tardiness is never an issue for us and I also addressed your comments on the oatmeal.  Even oatmeal has a brand recipe that has to be followed, so we reviewed it with the team to be sure it is not only quality in taste, but also in presentation and consistency as well.  I also appreciate your comments on the furnishings in your room, and although we do have a rooms preventative maintenance program, sometimes items should just simply be replaced.   We are about to start a complete rooms refresh, which will allow us to have a new product in all of our rooms, which includes all furnishings, wall coverings, draperies, carpet and bathrooms.  Although we do receive many compliments on our current rooms, it is also important that we keep our hotel fresh and contemporary in style for our guests to enjoy.  We are very proud of our staff, so the new product will only compliment their efforts towards providing great service.  Thank you again for your comments and we hope that you will allow us another chance in the very near future.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Good Room, Great Breakfast, Great Location, Exceptional Service!  Hotel Staff was friendly, courteous, helpful and really good at their jobs.  Clean Room, good room cleaning service, did not have to ask for anything.  Breakfast staff kept plenty of fresh food out, and was friendly. Highly recommend this Hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We came to Disneyland with over forty individuals. Upon arrival the staff was simply accommodating, friendly and willing to assist in making sure we were taken care of.  The breakfast every morning was great, and they kept it open until 10:00, not many hotels keep breakfast open this long.  The room was clean and house keeping was exceptionally friendly ensured we had what we needed.   The workout room was huge and all the equipment new.  Loved the workout facility.   Thank you for making this stay fabulous!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms are outdated for the price paid.  Breakfast was substandard and plain.  Eating on foam plates and paper bowls with plastic silverware was very cheesy. No greens or actual healthy food available.  Too many carbs, processed  meats and lowest grade cheese.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Family  vacation was a great hotel we would stay again
Summary: Only bad thing I can say is the shuttle you have to pay for to the park.  Complementary breakfast was delicious rooms were very clean location was great!!!!!!!  Over all great place to stay!!  Great price
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel with excellent staff.  Staff was very accommodating. Rooms were very clean and well maintained.  Great value.  Breakfast was good and had something for everyone.  Hotel is less than half a mile to Disney Land, Next door to Joe's crab shack.  Great location with plenty of restaurants near by.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This staff is amazing. I worked in a Hampton for nearly four years, so I know the hard work and dedication that goes into keeping the guests happy.   The breakfast staff was on their "A Game" every morning. The food was always stocked and they were very helpful with everyone the encountered. I think people take for granted how hard of a job that is.  The front desk was very helpful and cheerful. I had asked if there were extra Lightning McQueen coloring pictures printed out that I could take, and the girl at the desk went and printed extras for me. Whenever I asked a question they knew the answer. I was told when I called about 6 months back that there wasn't a parking fee. When we arrived we were told it was $15 a day charge. It was altered after the concern we had to $5 a day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall great room service, just a few blocks from Disneyland maybe 25 min walk. If you choose to drive maybe 5 min. Great breakfast simple bit good enough. Front desk/staff friendly. Felt safe during my stay and food areas across the street from the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location, Great Features, Parking is a Nightmare
Summary: This hotel was great from the front desk staff, the fitness center is outstanding, breakfast was good and the rooms were comfortable.  There were a few things that didn't sit well with me, one was that my room was on the first floor and right beside the pool.  There were noisy children outside until 10 p.m. so just be mindful when you are selecting a room.  Also, parking in the area is a nightmare.  If you are out later at night, you will end up parking in the back where it is dark and the spaces all over are extremely tight so leave your Hummer at home.  I drive a Honda and it was very tight for me.  Otherwise I really can't complain.  The stay was great and everything else was fine.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel looked like any other Hampton Inn in the lobby.  That is where the similarity ended.  The room was dingy and dated with dirty matted carpet and a Motel 6 quality bathroom.  I would not recommend staying here.  The saving grace was a decent breakfast and clean secure parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights for our Disneyland vacation. We prefer to stay at Hampton Inn when we travel as a family because we know we always have a great place to stay with great service. This property was no exception. The lobby has been renovated and has a nice modern look to it. I read reviews that say the hotel is old, and it is in some aspects in the rooms (particularly bathrooms). However, when you're basically using the hotel as a place to sleep between long days at Disney, who cares if it's not the latest and greatest? Clean, comfortable and safe are the top of our priority list and Hampton never disappoints. I was pleasantly surprised to find a good sized mini fridge in the room AND a microwave! There was also a small cupboard above the microwave which was perfect for
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 2 nights when we went to Disneyland. There were a few issues with the bathroom, but were fixed as soon as we told staff. Breakfast was good. Pool was too cold. Staff was awesome. Comfy beds.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Once again, a wonderful stay at this hotel!!
Summary: This is probably our 4th or 5th time staying here while our group of developmentally disabled adults visit Disneyland.  We keep coming back because each time we stay here its even better than the last time!  There were 33 of us in our group this past weekend.  Upon arrival, our rooms and keys were ready immediately.  Easiest group check in I've ever experienced I might add!  Our Shuttle tickets had been printed up and were also ready for us.  Friendly and knowledgeable staff always!  Rooms were exactly as I had requested and that is no easy feat when dealing with 18 rooms for adults with special needs!  Breakfast was better than ever, rooms were clean and the staff..the staff were so polite and courteous to our entire group!  Highly recommend this hotel!  Special thanks to
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family of 4 stayed here three days in October had zero complaints about the property. Hampton has been a good consistent way to stay anywhere. If you need airport transportation this location does not serve lax.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very professional and courteous staff during our stay, Restaurants in the area were very good, cleanliness of facility was good. security was a non-issue. We will stay again when returning to the Anaheim area
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was super clean. Staff is so wonderful and has excellent customer service. Pool area was nice and well stocked with towels. Rooms are a very good size and have a microwave and very large portable fridge. Breakfast in the morning was decent too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everyday we left for Disneyland park and returned to a freshened up room, the beds were made, stuffed animals propped up on pillow, thw dishes washed, fresh towels.  Convenient shuttle service. Felt safe.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff at this hotel are very friendly and helpful. From the moment I called for early check in, to the complimentary breakfast, to my late check out request, the staff was always friendly and helpful. Great hotel. Good breakfast and good location.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location and price were excellent.  Disneyland was walking distance.  Hotel staff was excellent and friendly.  Room was clean.  Parking was excellent. Places to eat were close by.  Breakfast was awesome.  Checkout was fast and quick
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had just arrived to the hotel after travelling non stop for 36 hours. We were exhausted. The checkin was quick and the staff friendly. Unfortunately, I had to phone for toilet paper as the housekeeping staff had overlooked providing it in the bathroom. The bar fridge had been set on defrost and the carpet was sopping wet. We tried phoning the housekeeping direct dial number which went to voicemail. Eventually got someone at the front desk who sent a maintenance person who identified the problem. To fix the situation, they kept giving us bath towels to place on the wet carpet. This didn't fix the mould smell throughout the room as the carpet was constantly wet. No one offered to change rooms or offer a better solution than to place towels everywhere. Staff although friendly,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Dated and musty smell in room
Summary: Stayed here on our recent visit to LA. This was our get over jet lag hotel before moving onto San Diego. The first night our fridge leaked as a room attendant had left it on defrost when cleaning the afternoon of check in. This then created a musty carpet smell for the balance of our stay. The rooms are dated and very dusty which aggravated our alergies. The towels were also thin, scratchy and in bad need of replacement. Breakfast was included and adequate for most people's taste. Packet eggs will take a bit of getting used to though. The hotel is conveniently located near many food options within walking distance. Overall an okay stay but would probably try somewhere else next time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Me and a couple of my family members went out for 5 nights at the Hampton Inn & Suites for a California/Disney vacation.  The staff was so helpful everyday in making our stay great.  With the central location to everything and the comp amenities, you won't find a better value or a better hotel and staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: When around the Disneyland area, we like this Hampton Inn. This property sits right on Harbor Blvd Garden Grove, CA. I don't know why it's called Los Angeles? I'm a flight attendant LAX based. This property is a good 1 hour drive from LA. This Hampton Inn is always clean & has a nice complimentary breakfast. Refrigerators & microwave in room is very convenient!! Many restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room and hotel were great to stay. I'd recommend this place to anyone and plan on staying here in the future. Great breakfast and service. The front desk clerks were very helpful before, during and departure
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is the only one we stay at when we come to Disneyland. You can walk back and forth to the park. It's about 3/4 mile. The only thing that irritates me is they charge you 15 dollars a day to park your car there.  I really feel like if your going to stay at one of their hotels you should be able to park for free
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our ground base for our disney vacation! We went with a few friends and this hotel was the perfect spot. It was just down the street about a mile to a mile and a half. There is a shuttle that stops in the parking lot but we didn't use it. We preferred to drive to the park, it ended up being slightly cheaper then the shuttle since there were four of us. The staff at the hotel were super helpful. The breakfast was amazing! There was lots of space for sitting and tons of options. By far the biggest breakfast area of any Hampton I have stayed at. The hotel itself was nicely updated and the room was very roomy! 10/10 would stay again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Went to Disneyland with a friend. Great hotel, great location. Breakfast was really good! Good variety of choices to choose from. Hotel parking was convenient and close to hotel. Wish we could have stayed longer!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Safe area, staff were very nice and helpful, bathroom was a bit outdated, but clean. Breakfast was good each morning, nice snack store inside. Great location for Angels games, Disney and convention center.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hampton Inns are conveniently located, exceptionally clean and well maintained, and staffed by efficient, friendly people.  We try to stay at a Hampton whenever we travel and are never disappointed in the facilities and staff.  I can't recommend Hampton Inn and Suites highly enough.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From the moment you step in the staff are friendly and helpful making every moment in the hotel extra special.  After telling the male receptionist that we don't have certain food products in the UK he directed me where to go.

Summary: The hotel had a distinctive musty smell but was ok for our Disneyland stay. I hear they are going to renovate it soon. I would consider coming back there if they do but other wise I would probably stay somewhere else.

Summary Heading: Horrible stay!! The staff are rude and not helpful!!
Summary: This was my 3 year old daughters first trip to Disneyland and not once was she ever even acknowledged!! The breakfast was cold and the staff are extremely rude! We will never stay here again! Not worth the so called discount I received! Pay a little more and stay somewhere nice!!
Manager Response: Good Afternoon H986DHnicoleb;  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write to us, and I appreciate your feedback.    I want to first apologize for your experience at my hotel as we take pride in the outstanding customer service that we do pride to our guests, and even if we fail to do so, there will never be a reason for us to be rude, as we address any situation that may come up with an attempt to provide our guests with 100% guest satisfaction.    In this particular event I think we got off on the wrong foot to start off your trip, as we do not accept pre-paid green dot credit cards.  I was involved with the decision to accept it, so that you would not be further inconvenienced, so we made the exception, but I can never speak towards what another hotel accepts or not as to their method of payment, which was brought to my attention as well.  I want to personally apologize for us not recognizing your daughter's first time to Disney as we love to acknowledge and also celebrate along with you, and I wish we would have not failed to do so during your visit.  I also have reviewed your breakfast comment with my team, as we normally receive very high marks on our breakfast, so again, it is something to make sure that is strictly monitored, as we always try to do.  If there is anything else I can ever do for you, or your family and friends, please do not hesitate to contact me direct at 714-620-2401, as I hope to meet you and your family in person in the near future.  Again, please accept our apology and thank you for your comments.  Best  regards,  Mitchell  Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim/Garden Grove

Summary: Welcoming and helpful staff, amazing service at anywhere in hotel, breakfast associates  working hard , cleaning after adults and kids mess)) reception friendly  clean rooms, thank you guys. hope see you guys soon.

Summary: I want to thank the staff of Hampton Anaheim Garden Grove !!! The service here was amazing. I took a trip to Long Beach and Disneyland this weekend from San Diego and the staff here just made my stay so much better ! Jesus helped me check in Saturday night around 11pm and he was amazingly nice and a sweetheart. Alvin was terrific too he gave us waters instead of having us pay so Thanks for that! My shower head was not  functioning correctly and told Sarah at the front desk shout out to her and the maintenance team because they took care of it ! The free breakfast was GREAT no complain and huge shout out to the breakfast Staff because they keep it clean and well stocked. I will definitely be back just because the staff is the best !

Summary: Spent one night at this hotel while visiting Disneyland. Too bad I could not stay longer as this was the perfect hotel for us. The staff at the breakfast area was extremely helpful, very nice people to talk with.

Summary: Not a favorite.  You can tell this is a high traffic hotel by Disney. Everything is well worn, but clean. Our room had view of park fireworks which was a surprise. Disappointed no transportation to park included. It was an added fee and very limited times.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hampton Inn at Garden Grove.  Our suite had a kitchen area (very nice).  The staff was friendly.  Sanjay and Mitchell went out of their way to make it enjoyable.  The breakfast was delicious and we had a terrific variety to choose from.  I would stay there again.

Summary Heading: A small hotel with big heart
Summary: I live far from Anaheim so I stayed at the Hampton because I was working a double shift and didn't want to drive tired. I was so impressed by how spacious the room was and how luxurious it felt! There were extra towels without having to ask and everything was clean and comfortable! The staff was very friendly and welcoming. A young woman in her 20s with dark hair working September 2nd at 1:00pm was amazing! I wish I remember her name but she helped me beyond measure by allowing an early check in so I could get a couple hours of sleep before my second shift of the day! What a lifesaver! Breakfast was fantastic as well! I would definitely stay here again!

Summary Heading: Extra fees, room closer to budget hotel
Summary: I love Hampton Inn's, but this particular location was a bit of a let down. The parking lot is a mess, as its shares with a resterant and at least one other hotel. There is also a $15 parking fee, which I thought was outrageous. I don't know if it's because it's close to Disneyland, but I've never had to pay to park at any other Hampton Inn before. I'm giving 3 out of 5 stars/dots because the staff was very (authentically) friendly. We had an issue with our toilet not flushing and maintenance was quick to respond. However, the problem persisted and it was a pain. Not sure if it's an issue with maitenance or management, but it's obvious something needed to be replaced. I expect more from Hampton Inn, especially for the price!

Summary: Good value; would be better to stay on property.  Shuttle service less than "timely"; however, all drivers were very kind.  Having to make this 200 characters long is annoying!!!!!  Not a lot of drug/grocery/etc. stores in the area.  Got bad directions from Grey Line tours - do NOT do business with them.

Summary: Well maintained hotel, close to most attractions, walking distance to several good resturants. Great view of Disneyland fireworks from room. Fully equiped kitchen to supplement the great free breakfast

Summary: I can't say enough good about the staff at this hotel.  Everyone was unfailingly cheerful, helpful and all around awesome.  There was a fire alarm at 530 am on one morning of our 5 night stay, and the staff was organized, calm and worked through everything perfectly.  (It was a faulty smoke detector, so there was no danger)  The pool was perfect for our needs, the shuttle to and from disney worked great for our family, and the hotel was within easy walking distance to target, walgreens, and 5-6 restaurants, from fast food to sit down.     the hotel even upgraded us to a suite with a kitchen and full sized fridge.     the complementary breakfast was also great, with one hot egg dish, one meat (usually sausage), fresh fruit and pastry, and four wafffle makers so there was no wait

Summary: Positives Value Breakfast Spacious and clean suite. Good vibe and great staff Internet  Facilities inc free good coffee  Negatives A little noisy form late guests but could happen anywhere Parking charges and bad parking Horrible expensive Italian opposite, very expensive

Summary: At first hotel was ok we were given a room next to the elevator was not great for me very,light sleeper  but overall room was clean and nice I would like to see refrigerator in room not happy with the front desk . but the manager Sean and the nices guy ever in the kitchen who got me milk for my dinner are the best  .we will stay again Sean truly cares about the people who stay in his hotel and wants to make it right appreciate his time talking to me and making sure to have me happy to come back  nice place to stay quiet and clean great breakfast too

Summary: I stayed at this Hampton Inn last month on my first visit to Disneyland. Overall, I was very impressed. Everyone I encountered at the front desk was lovely. We arrived early in the AM, way before check-in time, and they not only graciously stored our bags for us so we didn't have to leave them in the hot car, they asked if we'd like to purchase our Disneyland tickets there so we didn't have to wait in line at the park. That was great! We also purchased shuttle passes to go to and from Disney. The park is only about a mile from the hotel, but it's further than it seems, and when you're on your feet all day at the park the $6 pp per day is definitely worth it. The shuttle meets in the parking lot in between the 3 hotels located right next door, so it's very convenient. And Greg

Summary: I have stayed at this location 3 times so far for business. The first stay I was upgraded to a suite (Diamond status) on the Disney side and it was fantastic. The digital map is frustrating (with all Hiltons), I ended up calling to ask if it was odd or even rooms that faced the busy street and Disneyland. The parking is awful - the spaces are very narrow and their is another Hilton brand right beside them along with a very popular restaurant so parking is always difficult (during busy season). The breakfast bar is one of my favorites only because that sweet lady takes the time to section out the grapefruit pieces!  I always grab a coffee cup

The parking is shared with another Hotel, as well as a restaurant but we still managed to  find parking at the end of the day. They do have a parking fee. Heading to Disneyland? Summary Heading: Decent Hampton Inn for convention center stay

The hotel is decent, it gets a lot of use from Disneyland tourist, so its not as nicely maintained as other HI's do to heavy family usage. An alternative HI that is better maintained and close to Disney, approx. 5-6 miles, is the Cypress HI.  I like it better.
