Summary: Not up to the quality of the Hampton brand. The front office staff handed me room keys that did not work, had to go back to the front desk. I used the Do Not Disturb placard on my door, set my thermostat at 68, seven hours later upon my return the thermostat had been changed to 75 - it appeared someone had been in my room.
Manager Response: Hello Rick - I first want to thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.    I was very disappointed to hear how your experience went, as I want to say that I agree with you as this is not OUR quality and not Hampton's quality as a top brand.  Although we expect our room keys to work, should they fail, I hope that we at the very extended our apology to you for any inconvenience.   I normally prefer that we check up on any guest to see how they are doing and that they are in the room, and it also sounds like we failed to do what we do best, and that is provide our guests with execeptional service and most important - great follow-up when there are problems.  I am further checking on your room statis during your stay as DND's are well respected and strcikly observed as a housekeeping procedure.  I don't know why your thermostat would have been changed, and being a traveler myself, I like a cold or cooler room.  I hope you will allow me the opportunity to make your next reservations in the near future, as I would like to meet with you in person.  Again, please accept my apology for any inconvenience to you and your family.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Direct - (714) 620-2401

Summary Heading: Adequate Room one mile walk to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here on Hhonors points. I arrived around 11am and my room was ready. The room was a little beat up, but that is typical for family places in the area. I don't know what people do in the rooms that make the furniture look dingy, but that's what it was. Small refridgerator and microwave were very clean. I had a parking lot view (I think all rooms are parking lot view).   They charge $15/per day for parking which is a bit ridiculous. The parking lot wasn't close to being full and most people didn't display a parking permit. I don't think they keep track of the cars at all. There was a shuttle for a fee to Disneyland, but it was only a one mile walk and we opted to walk. The walk back at 11:00pm seemed really long, but it was still only one mile.  The breakfast was typical

Summary: Although the staff was very welcoming, professional, and kind - I was unhappy with my room. My air conditioner (which cooled the room very effectively) was so loud that I was forced to get up to turn it on and off during the night. The elevators at this property were also temperamental at best. At one point the doors shut so forcefully while three of us were getting on (we entered immediately) that one member of our party was unable to get on with us. At other points, you would spend several minutes waiting to get an elevator even though there did not seem to be unusually heavy traffic using it. Overall, I will not be coming back and I cannot recommend this hotel to my coworkers.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Cassidy - First I want to thank you for taking my call.  It was a pleasure to talk to you and I again want to apologize for the quality of your recent stay.    It was unacceptable to have a problem with your AC, as a noisy unit obviously prevented you from enjoying your stay, and it was critical that you had a great night's sleep, especially since you were here on business and your working days were exceptionally long.   This unit should have been changed out, as part of our room inspection.     I will also look further into the elevator issue that you mentioned, to see what can be done about this.   That is an area where I like to have the professionals review, so that should adjustments be made they are done with safety in mind, and I also appreciate that you have brought this to my attention.  We are doing a refresh to our elevators as part of our upcoming room renovation, so possibly this can also be addressed at that time.  Thank you so much for you compliments in regards to our staff, as I always say to my customers - they work hard and extend their "Hamptonality" to our guests.  We always listen to our customers and we always look for ways to improve our guest experiences - in other words "we listen".  I do hope you will come visit us again (and we earn your recommendation once again).  We love our convention and business travelers and you are extremely important to us.  Please call me direct the next time I can be of service to you or anyone within your organization (your family and friends too), as I would like to personally make your reservations, and meet you in person.  Thank you again and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Great Hotel a Mile From Disneyland
Summary: A nice, clean, safe, family friendly hotel.  The shuttle to and from Disneyland was GREAT.  Get to the pickup point at least 10 minutes early at peak times to ensure you get a seat. I highly recommend this hotel if you are going to Disneyland and want to save a little cash compared to the hotels that are closer.

Summary: Clean rooms.  Upgrade of lobby; hallways are depresseing; rooms are old and need refreshing.  Staff was pleasant enough but not sure they have actually seen the rooms.  Breakfast was rather disgusting.  Hotel as a whole needs some investment.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was even better than we expected as we travel a lot, but this was our first time to this area to visit family and Disney.  Great staff, we really enjoyed the breakfast as it had everything that we needed and more.  Hotel was clean and well appointed.  Our check-in was very efficient and they made time to help us with our transportation needs. Our room was nice and clean, and the hotel was perfect and had easy access to all of the local spots.  We will be back for sure.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms are clean, staff is kind and helpful, food is okay, lobby is not very pretty, parking lot is a bit dirty. Location is great. It is perfect for a stay over when you are not spending much time in the hotel, the pools are popular (especially in a hot summer day) but so much traffic leaves them a bit "cloudy" oh and a pool view room is more of a parking lot view with a splash of water
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It's time for this hotel to upgrade.
Summary: 1. Check-in time 20 minutes  2. Rooms and Toilets are just ok 3. Its looks like a old property 4. And they can keep this property more cleaner especially the luggage storage room, dining area, lifts etc.. 5. No exhaust in the toilet, so please give time after every useüò∑  6. Breakfast average, only basics  7.  This hotel sells Disney tickets for its guest but unfortunately they were out of stock üòî, so it's better you buy them at Disney or Online. 8. Around 8-10 minutes drive to Disney 9. Staff in this property are helpful. 10. Paid parking 11. Check-out time 5 minutes
Manager Response: Hello BJRAM99 - First I want to thank you for taking the time to write to us and review your recent stay.    We obviously failed on all counts to provide you with all that you needed to have a wonderful stay, and I want to personally apologize to you.   We know how important your trip is, and it is always our goal to provide you with 100% guest satisfaction, and that is something that all of us at the Hampton Inn & Suites live by.  We (I) always listen to our guests thoughts both positive and negative should they arise.  It sounds like we immediately got off on the wrong foot with a 20 minute check-in which is concerning to me, as it is not our style of "Hamptonality that we like to provide, as this is a first impression and can set the full tone for the remainder of the stay.  Our hotel should always be clean (I hear very positive feedback from our guests on this subject) and whether your hotel is older or brand new, it still has to be clean.   We are doing an upgrade to our rooms in the late fall, which is exciting, but it does not take the place of cleanliness to the eyes of our guests.  I was also glad to read that you found our team to be helpful, as I always receive great comments on our service.  In reading your review, it sounds like we were simply unprepared for your visit, as I do not like to run out of tickets, as this can be great disappointment to our guests.  They love to have the hard copies of their tickets, verses on-line versions.     I would love to talk to you as well so please give me a call when you can at the hotel, especially if we had not already met in person.   I always walk our hotel and especially visit with our guests in the breakfast room each morning, and I would love to talk to you to review your stay.  Feel free to email me as well, with a phone number that I can reach you at, and I would be glad to call you as well.  In closing; I will also review your comments with my team during our daily huddle, and I want to thank you for your candidness.  It can only help to make us an even better hotel for our future returning guests.  I hope you will give us another opportunity to do it right in the very near future.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: My family and I visited Disneyland this summer. The rooms are very spacious and clean and the beds are very comfortable. There's a shuttle that takes you to the Disney parks that runs every 30 minutes, which is very convenient and cheap ($5 per person per day). The daily breakfast spread is very good. Every staff member is friendly and helpful. The general manager, Mitchell Hirschman, creates a very welcoming environment and interacts with all his guests. I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed with a group reservation.  Hotel was clean, with a friendly staff and conveniently located. Free parking and within walking distance to the convention center.  Restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Z1580CNsarag;  Thank you so much for taking the time to write to us.  We are all so happy to read that you enjoyed your visit, and I hope you not only come back during another tournament, but that also you visit us with your family and friends on your own "leisure" time.  We love our groups and I cannot think of a better compliment to our team when our guests visit us again to simply "come back home".  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and that you found the hotel clean, staff friendly and also a great location for you.  I hope the tournament went well, as from what I heard from others that it was a tough tournament and everyone had great competition, but overall a great time.   We hope to see you again soon, and please let me know if there is anything I can ever do for you or your family and friends.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: Nobody comes to the Anaheim area for the hotel rooms :)   This was a quiet, well-located basic hotel.  The staff was friendly and efficient.  Other reviews suggested asking for a room with a view of the Disney fireworks.  We did that, and they accommodated the request (see photo).  The only downsides were that parking is an extra fee (typical of the area, but sad), and the breakfast was underpowered (typical of Hilton's management of Hampton Inns, from what I've experienced and been told).
Manager Response: Dear UnregisteredUser2013;  Thank you for taking the time to write to us, as I greatly appreciate your thoughts  and your review.    I was glad to read that you found our staff to be friendly and efficient, as this is very critical towards becoming a great hotel.  Even when you have the product, you still have to have the staff to take excellent care of our customers and I am very proud of our team.   I read your thoughts on our parking fees, and although we do charge for parking you will probably find that it is the most affordable in the Anaheim/Garden Grove market, although I do understand that there is still nothing better than complimentary.   I am glad that we accommodated you on the Disney Fireworks view, and we also have a room renovation planned towards the end of the year, so hopefully when you return to our area you will choose us again, so you can enjoy a new room and a fireworks view as well.  I cannot say that we are typical, if we failed to provide good breakfast coverage, as we take pride in our breakfast, and being properly staffed as business levels change is always a critical element.  I will look into this further to make sure that we are always meeting our customers' needs.  Again.....Thank you so much for writing, and I hope that you will call me direct if there is anything else that I can do for you in all of your travels.  Have a great day and I hope to see you again soon,  Mitchell

Summary: Visited Disney and knotts berry farm.  Great hotel, staff was great.  Manager went out of her way to correct a problem with the shuttle to Disney.  Great continental breakfast, eggs, waffles, fresh fruit, etc.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Azphotogirl;  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay and I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay.    We all work very hard to try to exceed our guests expectations and I seem to always say that I am very proud of our staff, which I am.  We always listen to our customers and it is always important that we all strive to get even better with each and every guest stay.     I am glad that you enjoyed breakfast as the breakfast team is really proud of their day to day service accomplishments and we all love to talk to our guests!!  We hope that you will be visiting with us again and please let me know if there is anything that I can do for you and your family in all of your travels.  Have a wonderful day!  Mitchell

Summary Heading: 5 night stay on a trip to Disneyland
Summary: My 18-year old son and I spend 5 nights at the Hampton Inn & Suites for his senior trip after graduating high school.  When we arrived, I was greeted warmly and was quickly given my room information and keys.  I was even asked if I was good to go with Disney tickets and transportation.  The front desk clerk that assisted me was very friendly and helpful.  After my son and I had hauled our stuff up to our room, the phone rang - it was the same front desk clerk asking if everything was OK and if we needed anything.  What more could I ask for?  Our room was spacious - two queen beds, and a nice clean bathroom.  Breakfast was more than adequate with waffles, eggs, sausage, potatoes, a selection of cereals and fruit, muffins, juice, etc.    The only complaint we had was that couldn't
Manager Response: Dear Michael;  Thank you so much for writing a review for our hotel.  I am very happy to read that you had a great stay, and there is nothing better to us than seeing a guest rate us as A+!!!  I am glad that you also enjoyed your breakfast (the waffles are pretty darn good), and we try hard to offer a selection and good value as part of your room costs.   I also will look into the timing of the cleaning of your room.  As a traveler myself, I feel the same way, and at times I will plan my afternoon activities as to when my room might be cleaned and finished so I can rest or do a little work.  I appreciate the feedback.    I hope we will see you again soon, and thank you so much for staying with us and showing a little bit of your "Hamptonality" in your review.   It was a pleasure to serve you and please contact me direct prior to your return.  Have a wonderful day and please send our very best to your Son.  Mitchell

Summary: Very enjoyable stay. The hotel was nicely decorated and clean. The room was spacious and accommodating for a large family. The general manager was very personable and helpful and the hot breakfast was delicious.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family vacation started w/my niece's graduation from UCLA & we just drove all the way from Fresno. By the time we arrived @ the Hampton Inn to celebrate @ Disneyland we were exhausted but, we were met w/a friendly smile & greeting from Jesus who was so helpful! :) All off them were from Jesus, Alvin, Lori & even the General Manager Mitchell! Superb customer service. If you needed anything they were always there on hand to help! The complimentary breakfast for both days were yummooo & delish!!! Loved it! A vast variety of items to choose from. Cleaning staff Nayet, Alicia & Antonio were also helpful & very polite & helpful keeping the rooms clean, pool area clean as well! We enjoyed our hotel stay so very much we plan on staying @ the Hampton Inn again for our next family
Manager Response: none

Summary: Got a great rate booking direct through Hilton Honors. The room was super spacious and the staff was very friendly and helpful.   This is a great place to stay when visiting the Disney Parks. $6 all day shuttle to the parks make it super easy after a full day of walking.   The breakfast buffet was good! Plenty to eat and choose from.   Room had a view of the park to watch the fireworks at night.   Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the first time that we stay at this hotel and can not believe how much we enjoy there.  It made our vacation not have to worry little things.  The price is very reasonable/affordable.  We will stay there againe 100%
Manager Response: none

Summary: The manager, Mitch, and his staff at the Anaheim Hampton Inn & Suites made sure our trip was top notch after a rough start - cancelled and delayed flights and a compact "midsize" rental.  They ensured they found us a room that was just right after another guest smoked in our first one prior to us arriving, I told them of my sensitivity to cigarette smoke and they went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable.  The breakfast each morning was great and the staff worked hard to keep everything full.  Everyone smiled and greeted you, we felt really special.  Thank you for making our family vacation memorable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice and clean, quiet and easy access to parks and stopping. Clean bedding, decent view. Car park spaces are a little small for any car really.  Would recommend as they're cheap,basic accommodation and we're fairly fussy.  No complaints so far :) (haven't tried breakfast yet ).
Manager Response: none

Summary: When around the Disneyland area, we like this Hampton Inn. This property sits right on Harbor Blvd Garden Grove, CA. I don't know why it's called Los Angeles? I'm a flight attendant LAX based. This property is a good 1 hour drive from LA. This Hampton Inn is always clean & has a nice complimentary breakfast. Refrigerators & microwave in room is very convenient!! Many restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for access to Disneyland
Summary: Im a Hilton Honours Membrane prefer to stay at Hampton Inn's were possible.  This one is in a great location.  Walking distance (15 mins) to Disneyland.  Walking distance (30 mins) to the Outlets at Orange, plenty of choice right by the hotel for meals and a Super Target right across the highway make this Hampton in an easy choice.  The hotel itself isn't as nice as some of the Hamptons i've stayed in but its clean and the staff are friendly.  I stayed here with my adult daughter for 3 nights and we were very happy.  We were upgraded to a King Suite which was nice but the reality was we really only slept in the room as were were sightseeing and visiting Disney all the time.   One thing I will say is that the hotel have some good contact that you should consider using regarding
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here to attend a business meeting in the area, breakfast in the morning was wonderful. Warm cookies in the evening and the bottle of water when I returned from a long day of work was a nice touch. The hotel is in a great location and the beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is close to Disney and the convention center, but not walking distance.  There are a couple of restaurants close by, but you really do need a vehicle if you plan to stay here.  The hotel is a bit dated, but overall not bad for the price.  They do charge for parking which is understandable since some people might want to park here and try to walk to Disneyland.  When I arrived at this hotel and checked in I was impressed with Jesus Raya working at the frontdesk.  He has a great personality and a willingness to make sure my stay was to my satisfaction.  He even made sure that he put me in a room that faced Disneyland so I could see the fireworks at night.  The breakfast buffet is average, but since it's free I won't complain.  I would definitely recommend this hotel if
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you're looking for a no hassle great service hotel, then Hampton Inn & Suites is the place.  I was treated with respect and each service person smiled and gave great conversation. Oh, and the beds are a dream
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is close to Disney and the convention center. We got a good rate for this area and was pleased with our room. It was a little dated, and not quite as nice as you would expect for a Hampton. It stated there was a fee for parking but we were not charged? Staff were very friendly and helpful. Truthfully, the main advantage of this hotel for us was a very competitive price compared to other local hotels.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay. In walking distance to Disney.  Joes Italian ice next door is a must do.  The breakfast buffet is great.  Something different each morning.  You can also enjoy the Disney fireworks from the hotel. We will stay here again. Anaheim is a clean family oriented area on California.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: good hotel if heading to disneyland
Summary: nice older hotel, has a good breakfast in the morning before you leave for disney.  Also have a shuttle that runs throughout the day if needed.  It is a paid shuttle i would suggest using if you are first timers or don't want to pay for parking at the park. you can also walk but it is kinda far after a long day.  The beds are nice and the hotel is very quite. I think most families go across the way to embassy suites for the bigger rooms. That place is loud all night.  Overall i would suggest this hotel if honors member or $100+ rooms don't hit your wallet hard.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We came here to celebrate our anniversary and go to Disneyland. Was a great value, great rooms and the best breakfast we have had at any hotel. Staff was very nice and courteous. I would book a room here again when we return to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was very nice but extremely unhappy to find that they tried to change my rate when I arrived.  Their explanation was that it was a standard policy of Hampton and the Hilton chain due to increased need.  The fact that I precooked did not matter.  To me this is like selling out a movie and then going back to everyone that bought tickets and requesting an additional charge. I believe the dollar amount was minimal but it's the printable.  A very poor policy if you are trying to build loyalty with your customers, great if you are trying to upset them.
Manager Response: Hello Paul - Thank you for taking the time to write to us in regards to your recent stay. I always appreciate the feedback as I want your experience to always be perfect, and that includes how you start off your visit!  I see that the concern was that you pre-booked or pre-purchased your room, and possibly the pricing had changed prior to your arrival.   Again, I am trying to put the pieces together on your concern, as I can 100% assure you and all of our wonderful customers which includes families and business accounts, that we would not project any image that is not displaying integrity, as that is how I conduct business, and that is also how Hampton conduct business.     If your rate had been found to be lower (as the market can change), and if the pre-booked package or room does not apply to it, then the rate may not be able to be changed.   What our guests sometimes have to keep in mind that in most of the cases in a very busy leisure or business hotel environment, most of the times rates go way up, and we do not take that pre-booked or advance purchase program rate and then raise the rate as well to the selling rate. Which again is one of the benefits of a pre-purchased room program.   I hope this helps a little bit and I really appreciate that you found the hotel to be nice, as we always want you to have an exceptional experience, and again, I am sorry that it did not start out that way.  Please call me if there is any else I can ever do for you, and your family in all of your visits to our hotel and our fabulous area.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Hampton is a chain of hotels that prides itself on friendly employees and clean, comfortable rooms.  We have never found it to be different.  Breakfast is free and has something for every diet persuasion.
Manager Response: Hello Quin - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your travels to write.    All of us at the Hampton Inn & Suites really appreciate your review as the team works very hard to take care of our guests.   I also am glad that you enjoyed our breakfast as it is a mainstay of the Hampton brand, and ours always tries to be consistent each day, and I have to admit, that the waffles are pretty darn good!  The price value for our hotel is excellent and the free breakfast is really a cost savings for our guests and especially for a family.  I will relay your comments to our breakfast team and all of our staff members as well.  Thank you so much and please call me direct should there be anything I can ever do for you, and your family and friends.  Best regards and keep that "Hamptonality" flowing!!  Mitchell

Summary: This hotel was clean and neat with in walking distance of Disneyland.  I was impressed with the staff.  The breakfast was ok....the eggs did not seem fresh and their was only one choice for meat.  The waffles were great.
Manager Response: Dear Edward B. F:  First let me say thank you for writing, and again please accept my apology for taking so long to write back.    I was very glad to read that our location to Disney fit your immediate needs for you and your family and I was also glad to read that you found our hotel clean and to your satisfaction.    I also want you to know that I review your concern with our breakfast team, as it is important that we stay on top of our product throughout the morning breakfast, and make sure that it stays hot and fresh according to the product needs, and that our presentation and product always exceeds our customer's expectations.     The waffles are pretty darn good though, so I am thrilled that you enjoyed them, and we do try to show some variety with our meats throughout the week, although we present one each day.  Either way, I am glad you brought your concerns to my attention as I always listen to our guests.  Please let me know if there is ever anything I can do for you and your family in all of your travels to our area.  Best regards and have a wonderful day  Mitchell

Summary: I stick with the Hilton because the quality of the hotel staying with children. The breakfast options are always great as well. My kids also enjoyed the poolside room with access to the pool. Hsmpton is the bet
Manager Response: Hello 878timothys:      Thank you so much for taking the time out of your holiday travel weekend to write.  I cannot tell you enough as to how much I (We) appreciate your business and for choosing our hotel to enjoy a stay with your family.   Our staff works very hard to take great care of our customers and I am very proud of them.   I am glad you enjoyed our breakfast options and from what it sounds like......the kids had a great time (we know how important that is to the Moms and Dads).    We love our families that visit, and we try to whatever we can to make their stay wonderful, so they can enjoy either their visit to Disney or the beaches, or just to simply hang around the pool.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you and I hope you will be returning to visit us soon!  Best regards to your family and have a great day!!  Mithcell

Summary: Clean room, great customer service, and convenient location. Breakfast was good and had variety from cereals to fruit. Coffee was good and there was bottle water available for guests at the front desk and in the room.
Manager Response: Good Morning J3979EGkareng:    Thank you so much for your stellar review.  Everyone at the hotel works so hard to keep our service and standards high, and to read what you wrote, only makes us all want to work even harder for our customers.   We truly have what we call "Hamptonality" here and it sounds like you caught it too!   It is funny that you mentioned the coffee too, as I do hear that alot from our guests and I am a coffee drinker too.  Please come back and visit us soon, and let me know if you need anything prior to your return visit or in all of your travels.     Have a wonderful day and my very best to your family!  Mitchell

Summary: The staff could not of been nicer or more accomodating. The breakfast had more to offer than I had expected. The beds are very comfortable. Overall we had a very nice stay and would recommend anyone to stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Good Morning Roy:    Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write.  I am very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  As I seem to mention often, our staff works hard to take care of our guests, and we learn so much from our customer's experiences.   I am glad you enjoyed our breakfast, and I hear so many great comments about our beds.  The funny thing is that we are expecting brand new beds when we renovate our rooms in September, and I hear they will be even better from our Hampton suppliers.  Please let me know if there is anything I can ever do for you and your family and we all hope to see you again soon.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: I stayed here as I was attending a conference at Disneyland and this hotel is just a short bus ride or taxi away.   The hotel is an older Hampton but it looks like the lobby has been refurbished and and the hotel is kept clean. The rooms have comfy beds but are showing the ware of age and may not be up to the standard people expect of a hampton if they have stayed at newer properties.  The staff are friendly and a Filipino guy who checked me in was very welcoming which was nice.   The hotel has a small pool but I didn't see anyone use it. Free drinks in the lobby are standard and a great perk of Hampton as they have a great coffee and you can pick one up to go. The breakfast was busy and not great as one day they had grated cheese in a box which was full of green mould. I stuck
Manager Response: Good Afternoon DlrowTraveler:  Thank you for taking the time to write to us.  I appreciate your comments greatly and I have already taken your review back to my team.   I am glad you found great value in our hotel as it is part of what we strongly feel we are in the Disney Market.  As you already know providing great value does not mean that you also do not provide great service and product.  I was glad to read that overall you enjoyed yourself and the hotel.  We have a beautiful room renovation planned for early September, which may take the "older" Hampton out of your thoughts during your next visit, as this renovation will update our room package for you.     I am glad you enjoyed your front desk arrival (they are all really good at our desk), and also your waffles!   I also reviewed our process for holding shredded cheese on our breakfast bar, and we made sure that this will never happen again.  It is very unusual for us to fail at this as we have very strict requirements, and we take your comments seriously.  Again; I was glad to read your overall recommendation for our hotel and that you would return to us again.   It really is a nice walk to a Super Target for additional food supplies, and all of our rooms have nice size refrigerators verses the little box opnes that you find in most hotels.  We all look forward to your return and please call me direct if I can help you with your next reservation or if there is anything else I can ever do for you and your family.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: This hotel is wonderful.  Great location, fantastic staff, great rooms and breakfast to boot.  We arrived early in the morning and without asking were put into our suite right away.  WE never walked by the front desk with out being greeted.  Everyone was great.  The kids loved the pool and hot tub.  We enjoy having a full sized fridge so we can have snacks and make lunches to take to the park each day.  The breakfast changed each day and had something for everyone.  We will be back and highly recommend this hotel to anyone.  Thank you for making our stay great
Manager Response: Hello Cyndi:     Thank you so much for writing to us in regards to your recent stay.  I was thrilled to read that you had such a wonderful stay, and I hope you will be back to visit with us soon.   The team at our hotel really loves providing guest service in all departments, and works hard to achieve our service goals with each and ever guest visit.   The Fridge does make a difference in the room, especially when traveling with a family. It is a great convenience and at times can also be a cost savings for a family's food budget which we hear often from our guests while visiting Disney.  It sounds like to me you have a little bit of "Hamptonality" in your own voice, and I am very glad that the kids had a great stay and enjoyed the pool.     Again; thank you so much and we all hope to see you and your family again real soon.  I will always be at your service.  Have a wonderful Holiday weekend,  Mitchell

Summary: Hampton Inn and Suites, Garden Grove/Anaheim and its staff always surpass our expectations.      This was particularly important to us in December 2015, because our family anticipated a wonderful vacation in Anaheim and stayed at the Hampton Inn.  After a few days there, while out enjoying our planned activities, one family member broke her leg.  Suddenly, we were strangers in a strange world full of problems and questions.  We couldn't have felt more alone.  However, the Hampton staff sprang into action and was there for us in so many ways.  They were like family.  We are so grateful and will never forget their support and kindnesses.    We returned to Anaheim in April 2016 for a few days stay.  The staff was so friendly and attentive.  As always, it was a pleasure to talk with
Manager Response: Hello DesertRoses:   Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write to us.  I usually write long responses to our guests.....but in this case I can sum it up in one word....WOW!  I have never been so proud of my staff before, and although we are fortunate enough to hear many wonderful comments.....your comments and story has to be one of the best.   We share guest comments at our daily huddles, and this was wonderful to read back to the team.   Thank you so much for recognizing so many of them individually, they are so "jazzed" to read your thoughts and all remembered your visit.     We hope you will return to your "home away from home" soon.  I personally look forward to your next visit, and please let me know if you need anything in all of your travels!  Best regards and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: My mom and sisters decided to come to Anaheim for the weekend. We went to Disneyland one of the days and missed our shuttle:(. Mitchell, the manager at the Hampton personally dropped us off at the park!  He was so kind and helpful, the breakfast and service at breakfast was wonderful, the beds were super comfy and we had a wonderful weekend!  Thanks Hampton, we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Hello Ashley:    Thank you so much for writing.   I did not expect this, and I am thrilled that you had a wonderful stay.  You have a fabulous family, and you are all very lucky to have each other, and I think everyone should do what you, your Mom and Sisters did.    I was so glad to read that you enjoyed our breakfast and our "comfy" beds, and I hope that all of you will visit again real soon, and maybe even plan a family reunion with us.  I think I can come up with a few creative Disney Pins for everyone!!!   Please call me the next time everyone is coming into town so we can do something even more special for you.  Best regards and again thank you for staying with us - You truly have Hamptonality!!  Mitchell

Summary: Nice clean room. Friendly staff. Great continental breakfast!  Wish there was a shuttle stop right infront of the hotel for Disney but at least it's in the same parking lot!   Pool was warm and clean.  Could see the fireworks every evening from our window.
Manager Response: Hello Melissa -   Thank you so much for writing.  I always great appreciate the feedback and I was thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay.     The 60th Disney Fireworks are pretty spectacular and I was glad to read that you enjoyed them from your room.  I hope you also had a chance to see and hear them at the park, as I have been very impressed with the whole anniversary celebration.  I was also glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and our staff as they enjoy providing great customer service, and I am very lucky to be surrounded with "Hamptonality".  Please let me know if there is ever anything I can do for you and your family and I hope you will be back to visit with us again soon.  Have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary: excellent customer service provided by staff but Sanjay at the front desk was exceptional!  We would recommend this hotel, they have a shuttle that takes you to Disneyland for a reasonable price.  Very clean
Manager Response: Hello shaunas306:     Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write to us.   I was so glad to read about your thoughts on our service, and especially happy to read that you enjoyed the service provided by Sanjay.  I receive a considerable amount of compliments in regards to his service and guest satisfaction skills, and we are all very proud of him.   I will pass this wonderful review on to him and make sure he is recognized for your comments.  Thank you so much for your recommendation and I hope that you will be returning soon.  Please let me know if there is anything else that you need in all of your travels.  Have a fantastic day,  Mitchell

Summary: They charge extra for everything: parking, bus ride to the amusement park, water etc. Prepare to pay 5 dollars per elevator ride, that is just around the corner. Breakfast is typical processed fast food plastic. Rooms are tiny any outdated. Carpets are so sticky that if you leave your shoes in one place for a couple of days they might not come off. Not much nice to say about this stay... Pay pay pay. Welcome to the world of Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is very clean and rooms very comfortable. I was especially impressed with the breakfast and Maria and Cynthia who put breakfast out. Very tasty, lots of variety, and kept very well cleaned. My only complaint, which has been mentioned by many, is the elevators are very slow. There are only two for the entire hotel, so they become very cramped very quickly, and they are pretty slow. Overall, fantastic place, great location to Disney, and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Megan - Thank you for taking the time to write and for staying at our hotel.   I am very happy to read your comments in regards to Cinthia and Maria.  They are both incredibly valued associates, and they are a big reason as to why our breakfast is so well received by our guests.   They love providing great quality and customer service and I am very proud of them.   I will let them know about your review and make sure they are acknowledged at our monthly associate appreciation luncheon.  I also am sorry that we do not have more than two elevators, as they can become slow when the hotel is running high occupancy in a seven story building, and I wish that was one area of your concern that I could easily fix.  I do appreciate that you mentioned that in your review though, and I will make sure that it is noted in any future customer feedback regading this subject.      I am glad that your overall experience was great, and that you found our hotel clean and comfortable, and I do hope that you will be returning very soon.  We love the words "fanastic place" and "great location" and this means alot to all of us at the Hampton.  Thank you so much and please call me direct should there be anything else I can do for you and your family in all of your travels to our fabulous city.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: We wanted a hotel close to Disneyland for our five night stay. We found this property through the Disneyland site under the "good neighbour hotel" program.   It ended up being a great choice. Location was great. Suite was great. Great variety at breakfast which is important when you're there 5 mornings in a row. Very clean and well maintained in spite of not being the newest location.   Staff was very friendly and conscientious. A minor bit at check in with our room not being ready but they found another one. Even could see the nightly fireworks from Disney.   Didn't take the shuttle as had rental car. $12 a day for parking seems expensive for off season.    Didn't book it as a package through Disney as cheaper to do so separately.   Also tickets were cheaper at the gate than
Manager Response: Hello Darryl:  Thank you for taking the time to write to us.  I am so thrilled to read that you had thought of us as "a great choice" as our partnership with Disney under the "Good Neighbor Hotel" program, means an awful lot to our guests and our hotel.    I am glad you found our hotel to be clean and well maintained, as these are two very important areas for our hotel to try to be very consistent in.   Our staff works very hard to make sure that our service has a little bit more "Hamptonality" in their day to day greetings with our customers, and I do hope that we exceeded your expectations.  I see your point in regards to tickets, as we do not offer a discount, but we offer them at face value, and when we can participate in a special Disney program that has dicounts we try to do that as well.   Many of our guests simply look at us a avoiding any box office lines, so I am glad we can help them in this way at the very least.  I am also glad you enjoyed your suite, and we will also be doing a room renovation to them in September, so you will have to come back to see the difference!!   Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you in all of your travels and thank you for writing such an extensive review.   It means alot to the team!!  Best regards and I do hope to see you and your family again soon,  Mitchell

Summary: We found this hotel for a good price and were so very satisfied with our stay there. The staff were very helpful and friendly, the room was clean and had all the amenities you would want or expect, and the breakfast was phenomenal! Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Leighton B:  Thank you so much for taking the time to write.     I am thrilled to read that you had a great stay and that you also felt that the hotel was a great price value in the Anaheim/Garden Grove market.    The breakfast is a big part of our concept and can also be a great savings to our guests as going out for breakfast these days for a family of 4 can easily be $50-$60 per day at a breakfast restaurant and we love the word phenomenal!!  I look forward to your return visit and please let me know if there is ever anything that I can do for you and your family in all of your travels to our fabulous city.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Stand alone sink, no vanity for toiletries
Summary: We booked through Expedia and were downgraded to an ADA room with a stand alone sink and no vanity. There was no place for my toiletries, deodorant, toothpaste, vitamins... We did not book a handicapped room online but we're told by staff at the front desk all regular rooms were booked and Expedia guests get what is left! Unacceptable. We called Expedia and transferred to a different hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice room, friendly service and an excellent free hot breadkast and a very reasonalbe price.    We have stayed at this hotel several times and love it.  The bed is so comfortable (we will order this mattress the next time we buy one for our home).  The only negative for some (not us) is that it is a mile+ away from Disneyland.  We don't mind.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay a a lot of hotels around the world and have experienced both good and not so good visits.  We always stay at this hotel when we visit Disneyland or are in the area for business. We love the mattresses and the bedding. The prices are competitive with other high-end hotels and, thanks to the staff, we feel that we get good value for the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place for relaxing, front desk staff friendly and professional , breakfast included !!!
Summary: We had nice family vacation and spend some quality time at the Hampton , we were upgraded for rooms for free , had nice breakfasts and very helpful staff in kitchen always smiling and ready to help , overall can not wait to visit them again and feel relaxed like first time ...WAY TO GO GUYS
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great time at the Hampton. Sarah at the front desk was sweet and helpful during check in and check out. You go girl!!
Summary: We will return to this Hampton for sure! Although the rooms were not very updated everyone and everything else made up for it! We didn't even notice after a while and had a blast! The kids had so much fun at the pool and very convenient shuttle service! All the staff was amazing including maintenance and housekeepers!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Check-in was easy, room was what we expected based off pictures online, complimentary breakfast was adequate, rooms were clean, large parking lot, hot coffee/tea and hot chocolate in the lobby, friendly staff. There were a couple of noisy guests drinking/smoking on the balcony that we were able to hear in our room with doors and windows closed but that's not the hotel's fault.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great price and friendly staff. Was a short stay but close to shopping, Roscoes and the park.  If going to LA need to leave at least 1.5 hours if in morning or at rush hour. Extremely horrible traffic.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A very nice place to stay
Summary: My hubby attended  conference and we chose this hotel,because of our previous experience with Hampton Inn. The hotel is not far from the convention center. Our room was overlooking the parking lot which we liked so we can look at our car. The room was clean and they provide amenities. There's a microwave n fridge in d room which was awesome. The free breakfast was great! They have different kinds of eggs everyday for 4 days. The bacon was crispy and they have 4 waffle makers, so there's no long lines like other hotels. We extended another day coz we wanna explore Anaheim more. I would have given a 5 star but one day I wanted to have our room clean n it took a long tym. I had to go back to d lobby to wait for another hour. I will recommend this hotel n will go back there with my
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for 5 days/6 nights on business.  Included hot breakfast buffet, great wafle station.  Room was clean and roomy.  Ask for a view of Disney, you can see the firework display at the park everynight.   Lobby staff were very helpful, always smiling and greeting you.  Lobby and eating area very clean.  My onlly recommendation is both elevators needs major cleaning, some graffiti on the doors when i stayed there. Great eating areas in walking distances i.e Morton's, Joe's Italian ice cream.  A pretty good healthy walk to Disneyland if that's what your there for...., not a problem for me...I like walking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is really well kept. Everything is clean and in good order. The breakfast is always great and the outdoor dining area is a nice plus. The hotel is in a great location with plenty of dining, shopping and entertainment very close by. Just wish the elevators were a little quicker.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My stay at the hampton hotels has always been a pleasant stay and the breakfast provided are great! The rooms are all very clean and well supplied. The staff is very friendly and ready to help in any way possible.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Second time at this hotel. Booked the hotel well in advance very close to Disney. Wife, daughter and 2 grandkids. Room was big enough to keep out of each other's way when there. Front desk was a help had crib in room on arrival put the youngest in and he slept while we got settled. Clean room! Pool for kids great. Breakfast the usual, close to restaurants. Good stay will go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was very clean! Bed was large and very comfy! I felt safe! Staff was very friendly! Complimentary breakfast was not just a muffin or bagel, they had full on breakfast! Shuttle was convenient. Disneyland was close!! The pool was nice!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great experience!  Clean, friendly, and very comfortable!  Highly recommend!  The rooms are extremely clean and the beds make for a great night's sleep. The breakfast was fresh and hot and different each morning for a little variety.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you expect this hotel to be like other Hampton Inns, don't. We checked into our room and there was a footprint on the desk/table, we kept our shoes on because the carpet felt strange, and the sheets and pillow cases were dingy and stained. I would rather be camping and sleeping on dirt than stay in that hotel. We checked out after the first night (scheduled for three) and found another room in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Playballagain - Thank you for taking the time to write a review and I first want to apologize again for the experience that you had at our hotel.  It was obvious to me that you never should have received this room, as it should not have been released to you or to any of our guests.   This was a mistake on our part, and I hope that you will accept my apology and allow us to have another chance to service you and your family again in the very near future.  This is not what we ever want a guest to experience at my hotel and when I travel I expect the room I am staying in to be ready for occupancy and clean in all areas, so again please accept my apology.  I do hope you will allow us another chance in the very near future, and that you will contact me direct to make your reservations as I would like to meet you and your family in person, and I will make sure you have an exceptional stay.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: They welcome you in and when checking out and cover all of your needs through out your stay, from the housekeeping to the breakfast staff and the folks at the front desk. Great that they do not restrict hours of operation on the Gym and the Gym has more then just a bike and tread mill. Very nice ammenaties and open 24 hours
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location and option to staying at Disneyland.  Hampton Inn is always our go-to hotel. The interior is a little dated, but everything else (location, friendliness, etc) make up for it.  I also think the shuttle could be complimentary as it is in other cities.  Yes, it's a shuttle to Disneyland and Disney=$$ opportunity, but it would really be a nice touch for their guests.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 1 night to go to Disneyland. We had a delay getting our room (HHonors app said we were checked in but hotel wasn't ready) but after that it was all smooth. The staff are friendly and welcoming. I asked a special request at breakfast and was quickly served and satisfied. We will recommend and stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: bed really comfy, and clean, staff really nice, had a basket sent to the hotel and they were really nice and placed it in the room before i got their, close to Disneyland, will be staying at this place now every time we go
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at many Hamptin Inns the last few years and though they all look alike this one stands out for having such great customer service, pleasant and helpful font desk staff (Jesus), and extended breakfast hours. We slept well in our two queen suite. Comfy beds, quiet room and nice distant balcony view of Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very clean rooms and awesome staff!
Summary: We stayed here 2 nights and were very pleased with the staff and how nice they were. We had a small issue our first night and they comped our room which was very nice. The breakfast was very good and the rooms were very clean
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good, clean and comfortable accomodation ideally situated for Disney. Parking was reasonably priced at $16 a day which is slightly cheaper than others on the strip. Courtesy shuttle was $5 a day for unlimited use and was very reliable, would definately recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for two nights in the King suite with our young children for a trip to Disney land. The room has a great layout, but the refrigerator was so loud it kept my kids up at night. We had a room facing the fireworks so that was a great. Buca di peppo is conveniently located within parking lot. Breakfast buffet was amazing as usual! Love the coffee also! Our room unfortunately was not stocked with an extra roll of toilet paper, so we had to call to get some more. The water was hot for bathing. The hotel itself was not loud at all. Major downfall is having to pay for parking. The pull out bed was very uncomfortable, needs better mattresses. Paying for a shuttle is also a downfall.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I want to start by thanking Sanjay at the front desk! He is truly an amazing employee and asset to the hotel! He was very helpful and very friendly! My check in process was very smooth and fast even though I expected to have some difficulties. My family and I were traveling from Modesto, CA and went to Disneyland. We arrived to the hotel around 12:30am right after we left the park and my 1 year old was very fussy and was crying in the car along with my 6, 8, &10  year old. I couldn't find my employee passport after looking through all my luggage. I was worried that I was going to have a difficult time checking in to my room with out it. I went to the front desk and Sanjay was very understanding and helpful. He probably seen the frustration on my face. His first priority was to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great staff. Check in and check out process was a breeze. Rooms were clean. Bathroom could use some updating. Kids loved the pool. Great shuttle service to and from Disneyland with very reasonable fees. We will definitely be back since we got annual Disneyland passes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were just over a mile away from Disneyland, would have been walking distance except I have two toddlers who would have been exhausted at the end of the day and I didn't feel like carrying them back a mile.  :)  The hotel was very clean, staff was very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Totally enjoyed our stay at Hampton Inn.  The hotel staff is very helpful.  The complimentary breakfast was yummy.  The hotel lobby was nicely decorated and the shuttle service to Disneyland was convenient and prompt.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was just perfect,  Check in was friendly and helpful with our park tickets and shuttle.  The suite with kitchen was exactly what we needed for our group (including a 10 month old baby) And lastly the breakfast had an assortment to satisfy our party.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My room was clean and the breakfast bar/coffee was good. The pool/hot tub area was nice too. They offer a shuttle to Disney for $6 day which was convenient. While this hotel is nothing to write home about about it served my needs well. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon!    Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel.  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and the convenience of the Disney Shuttle and more.   You will have to come back and  visit with us again, as I cannot wait for your to experience our new rooms after our renovation starting in September.  We are all very excited about it as it is a beautiful Hampton "room upgrade and design" concept.  Our staff works very hard here to make sure you have an excellent stay and I am very proud of them as well.  We have a great team here.  Again; thank you for writing and please let me know if there is every anything I can do for you and your family!  We all hope you will visit us again soon!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Plenty of room for a family of 5 or 6 in the Suite The location worked great to go to the "Angles " BALL GAMES AND ALSO TO DISNEY..   The Pool area was very inviting and great to relax at. Parking spots were narrow but plenty of them
Manager Response: Hello Tom - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write and review your recent stay with us.    I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay and that you found your suite to be spacious and the location to Angels Stadium great and very accommodating to you and your family.   We love being close to the stadium, Disney and of course the Honda Center where the playoff bound Anaheim Ducks play.    I cannot disagree with you on the narrow parking spots and when we do the next resurfacing I will see what we can do about that, but the one trade out that I want to avoid is shrinking the amount of space if at all possible, so I really appreciated what you had to say.  Please let me know the next time you come into our city as I would like to meet you and your in person and make your arrangements for your Suite in advance.  Thank you again and have a "Hamptonality" kind of day,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Very old and in need of repairs
Summary: We needed a place to stay the night before getting on the road. This Hampton was convienently located close to Disney, the room was large and the staff was friendly.  However the hotel is in need of repairs -- the carpets were old and smelled, the walls (in both the hallways and the room) were marred, scuffed and dirty, the bathroom had broken tiles, the toilet seat was old and bubbled (like old paint), the tub floor was soft and bouncy etc etc -- Overall we were less than impressed with this particular location.
Manager Response: Hello David - Thank you for taking the time to write and I really appreciate your comments.  First let me say thank you for recognizing our staff.  As I say in many of our TripAdvisor reviews, they are top notch and all work very hard to take care of our customers.   I hear great things about them constantly and all the things that they do or try to do for our guests.    In regards to your thoughts on your room.  I am not a firm believer that it takes a room renovation to get the place to be clean and well maintained, because that should happen whether it is a new hotel, old hotel or one that is about to be renovated.  Repairs and replacements of items should happen and I apologize for that not taking place prior to your arrival, such as that toilet seat and anything else that we could easily fix or replace.  I hope you will give me a call the next time you are coming into our fabulous city, as I would like to personally make your reservation.  We are planning a beautiful renovation to our sleeping rooms to take place in September, which should last about twenty weeks and we are all very excited about it.  I think you will see the difference in product that you noted, but in the end you have to have the people to take care of your customers which is already a big part of our foundation of true guest "Hamptonality".   I do hope you will return and again I want to thank you for your business!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: We stayed here on our family trip to Disneyland.  The entire staff was as helpful and friendly as I have ever experienced.  The general manager was even clearing tables at the breakfast.  Rooms are nice and clean.  We had a view of the fireworks which was nice.  Shuttle to Disneyland can be paid for at the front desk and was very convenient.  Breakfast good.
Manager Response: Hello Peggy - Thank you for taking the time to write and review your experience at our Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim / Garden Grove.  I love to read about our staff as they all work very hard to take great care of our guests, and all of them take great pride in hearing your feedback.  I am very lucky to have a team like this as they all exemplify what we call "Hamptonality".    I am also glad that you enjoyed our breakfast as it is a major focus for our hotel, and I have to say one of the best in the brand according to my customers.    Our housekeeping department works hard to keep our rooms clean and well manicured, and although we are expecting a great room renovation in September, no matter what you have to keep your hotel clean and presentable to our guests.  Thank you again, and please let me know if there is anything I can ever do for you and your family in all of your travels to our fabulous city.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: First time at this hotel. Stayed for 4 nights during Spring Break. Pros: parking wasn't a pain despite the area being full, front desk staff were nice, and there were daily treats for the kids. Cons: the beds were spongy and left us all with kinks and the morning, breakfast while appealing at first, left us all with stomach issues throughout the day. If we return, we will definitely avoid the freebie breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello Bandden - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent stay.   I was glad to read that you enjoyed our staff as it is one of the focus points for our hotel, especially when working with our fabulous families and their kids.     We normally receive very high marks on our breakfast, and I am sorry that our products did not agree with you, as we take considerable care and pride in our cooking, and presentation.   I do hope that you will continue to visit with us and give our breakfast another try.  Although comments about our beds have been overall good (a few have said the opposite that they were hard), we are getting brand new beds as part of our room renovation later this year.   We are all very excited about this and looking forward to the overall room product improvements.  I hope you found your room to clean, and acceptable overall, and I want to apologize for any uncomfortable nights sleep that you had.  That is a critical part of our guests stay, so next time you are visiting our hotel please call me direct to make your reservation, as I would like to make sure you have the perfect stay.  Again,  Thank you for writing and have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary: Very friendly staff and comfortable bed with good complementary breakfast and convenient shuttle service.Breakfast had scrambled eggs and fresh fruit with juices and Oatmeal . Good free and reliable internet access.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not what you come to expect from a Hampton
Summary: Quick stay with the family for spring break. This Hampton really needs to have a deep clean of the carpets and a good check to fix misc items in the rooms. We had an issue with a broken drain the first night, got that fix. Then my son was getting out of bed and had something cut his leg. There was a huge metal part of the bed sticking out you could not see because it was hidden by the dust ruffle. My husband and I both hit it.. Hurt pretty bad and drew blood. Told Barbra at the front desk about it and showed her pics. She offered no apologies, really did not seem to even care. I told her she should get it fixed before renting the room next time. She was not companionate at all. You know when you sleep in a bed you dont expect to have it leave bruises. Dont stay in room 308!
Manager Response: Dear Snowinutah - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write and review your hotel stay.    I first want to apologize for how we handled this situation and from what I am reading, was a lack of responsiveness on our part, which for my hotel team is both usual and very disappointing.  I personally would have contacted you during your stay, and one thing I am very proud of is our follow-up on any items such as this as they are reported to us, with the update being both swift and with empathy, as we all know as to why you are visiting with us and how important a great stay is.  There are too many hotel choices in our market for any of our guests to not have a great stay and from what I see here we may have failed in our guest focus.  I did have the room reviewed, addressed and corrected by my leadership team, and again, please accept my personal apology.   Please also contact me direct the next time you are in our city, as I would like to have the opportunity to make your stay "perfect" and do something very special for you and your family.  I hope your family is doing much better, and again, I will always be at your service.    Thank you -   Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: I stayed here 3 nights.  The bed was so hard I had to take a motrin to alleviate the leg pain.  Maids stood outside my door for an hour in the morning and talked on the phone while I was trying to sleep.  OJ at breakfast was water.  Wi-Fi cannot stream video on tablet.  Room was very clean, as was bathroom.  Front desk personnel were very nice.  Woman checking on breakfast buffet was a sweetheart.  Great location for Disneyland and places to eat.  Parking fee is high, but it is the standard rate for Disneyland area parking.  Breakfast eggs were not very good. Loved the to go breakfast bag. Laundry facilities were clean and easy to use.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My girlfriends birthday get away was just what we needed we chose the Hampton Inn and Suites in Garden Grove as we planned to go to Disneyland. The service was great and the hotel staff very friendly. I have stayed there before and have always felt comfortable and safe. We will always stay there on our trips to Disneyland so we don't have to drive 2 hours home. Well worth it.....
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was in town for a wedding. I was checked in early by Barbara. She was really nice. I got to my room and it was a bit dated to be honest but it was all very clean and that's what really matters. I love the Neutrogena(sp***) bath products that Hampton Inns have. The TV I had issues with during my stay but it was quickly fixed which was really great. All of the agents were really nice and attentive as well as the maintenance staff that kept fixing my TV. The hotel food was good. It was free and they had variety. Overall a great stay. I would definitely come and stay here again. There were a lot of restaurants walk-able and it was on the cusp between Garden Grove and Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our new fave hotel. The rates are the very reasonable and the breakfast is satisfying. Enough to energize us for our day at Disneyland. The shuttle gets cheaper as you buy multi-day passes. It is always on time as well.  Overall, this hotel is the best bang for your buck!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is perfect for a trip to Disneyland. They offer a fantastic breakfast and staff are very friendly and helpful. There is a shuttle service to the parks which are a short ride away. Rooms are clean and spacious. Great value for money.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located near Disneyland and restaurants. They have a sales desk for tickets and shuttle tickets in the lobby which was super convenient. This helped us avoid massive lines to get tickets at the park. The shuttle leaves from a stop in the parking lot of the next door hotel. The hotel lives up to the Hampton Inn expectations. It is clean and  decorated nicely. It has a great staff.  Sanjay at the front desk gave us excellent directions to San Diego and recommendations for places to visit. Breakfast was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had a great experience at this hotel. I'm a travel agent who booked a high school band group of 60+ students & adults. I also took my own family. We stayed 2 nights.  I have to start by saying every staff member that we came across was extremely nice & helpful. They made sure we were well taken care of & answered all our questions. The lobby/breakfast are was big enough to hold us all. Their breakfast wasn't a basic continental. There was plenty of choices & food for all of us. The rooms had plenty of space & the beds were comfortable.  I will continue to book groups & my personal travel arrangements at Hampton in Garden Grove.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a mix up in the beginning of our stay but the manager really accommodate our family and worked everything out. My family would definitely stay again the service was amazing. The breakfast was very good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just spent 4 nights at this property. Had prebooked a room for 4 nights. 3 nights were a cheaper rate but the 4th was more expensive. Upon arrival the front desk person (Jesus) gave us the cheaper rate for the 4th night. This was very much appreciated!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Decent hotel close to Disneyland and convention center
Summary: I used this hotel during business conference meeting at Anaheim. It is about 20 mins from Santa Ana(Orange County) airport and 5 mins from convention center. Deleux Room is just decent three star but complimentary breakfast is  better than other three star hotels in same regions. I may use this hotel again for business purpose.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not overly fond of the parking situation but that is the only real complaint I have. Staff is very friendly and helpful. The room was very spacious and my favorite feature is that one room can be at 70 degrees while the other is at 85. I was in the 2 queen bed suite and it was just fabulous. Can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Hello Joy - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review for us.  I personally greatly appreciate your input, and I always share it with my fabulous team.   I tend to agree that the parking situation could be better, as sometimes other events in the area tend to overflow into our lot.  I am in the process of improving the signage, and to make sure that our hotel guests are always given "priority one" availability all day long when it is busy within our cluster of hotels.     Again, I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and our staff.  By the way, we are starting a room renovation in September which will be a very nice "update" for our guests, so I hope you will return soon after that so you can enjoy our room product even more.  Best regards and have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary: My family stayed at Hampton Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove, CA to go to Disneyland.  The hotel lobby/dining area were nice.  Well kept with all the guests going through daily.  The room was clean and comfortable.  The internet in the room worked fine the whole time.  The breakfast was good.  Just wish there were other choices of meat besides sausages.  The hotel staff were very helpful and pleasant.  It was nice to have the option to purchase theme park tickets (in our case Disneyland) and daily shuttle passes.  It made it less stressful having to drive to the theme park and come back late to the hotel and not be able to find parking in the lot.  Overall, we had a nice time.
Manager Response: Hello Rob - Thank you for taking the time out of your travel schedule to write back to us.  I can honesty say your comments make us a better hotel and we listen to you.  I am glad to see that one of our common threads is our service as our staff works very hard to take care of our customers.  I always tell them that we are in the repeat visit business, and not the one time customer business and I am very proud of our efforts.  I am also glad you enjoyed our breakfast as it is a very important part of the guest experience here, and I love to read the positives of it.  When you look at how much it costs to feed a family of four breakfast today at an outside restaurant, our breakfast is simply an amazing value with a focus on quality.  It also sounds like you enjoyed our location to Disney, which is another great amenity, plus we do sell park tickets as you mentioned, along with shuttle tickets too.  Being a "Good Neighbor Disney Hotel" is very important to us and it makes it very simple for our guests to make arrangements while they are with us, without as much hassle and expense.  I am glad you and your family enjoyed your stay, and please remember that I am always at your service and we all look forward to your next visit!  Have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Great location for a Disney trip
Summary: This was a great hotel for our quick trip to Disneyland.  It is not close enough to walk to the parks, but they have plenty of parking and you can grab a shuttle just out front.  There are plenty of restaurants within walking distance and Target is across the street.  The beds were very comfortable and the rooms were clean.  The complimentary breakfast was good and had a decent variety of foods.  This was our first stay at the Hampton, but we will be back.
Manager Response: Hello Ute4lyf - Thank you for taking the time to write a review as they mean a lot to all of us at the hotel.     I am glad you had a great trip, and your review of the area was also a big help to our other guests who visit our hotel and the area.  It is nice to have a few stores and restaurants within walking distance and Buca Di Bepo within our own parking lot, as well as well know franchise or local restaurant choices nearby.    Our breakfast is very important to us, so we take a lot of pride in our product choices, presentation, and service, especially with how busy it can be in the morning, and how much our guests look forward to it each day.  I am also glad you enjoyed your bed, as I hear that alot and a comfortable night's sleep is very important as we both know.    In September we are doing a room renovation and we are still expecting new beds at that time, so I love complements on our present bedding, as out housekeeping department works very hard to make sure your room is ready for you and that includes your bedding.  Please let me know when you are coming back to our city, and I will do all that I can to make sure your next stay is just as, or even more enjoyable than your last stay was for you and your family.   Have a wonderful day and thank you for choosing Hampton!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: staff was friendly and the location was great for our business at the convention center. The convention center had a shuttle to pick us up at the hotel which was really nice. This hotel was clean and a nice comp. breakfast. Would stay again
Manager Response: Hello Michelle - I hope that you and your family are all doing well.   Thank you for taking the time to write to us.    I am very glad to read that you enjoyed your stay, and that you found the Convention Shuttle service to your liking as we always hope that this service allows you to fully enjoy your stay with us by making transportation to and from the event, even easier and economical.    Our business travelers opinions are also extremely important to us, and I hope that you are a Hilton Honors member as well.  Like our Leisure guests, I am sure you have many choices in accommodations when you travel, so it is important that we take exceptional care of you as you attend conventions.   Many of our convention attendees are in sales, so I know first hand that it is important that you get a great nights sleep, a clean and comfortable room. and start out the day with a great breakfast.  It sounds like we met your needs during your visit.  Please let me know the next time you are coming into our city whether on business or pleasure, and I will make sure you have the perfect accommodations during your trip.  Again, thank you for staying with us, and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: This wasn't my first choice.  I almost always stay at a Hilton though.  The staff was friendly and very accommodating.  The morning breakfast was good, plenty to eat.  I wasn't sure if the transportation to and from Disneyland would be worth the $5.  However, the bus was on time and the drivers were friendly.  If I had a need to I'd most definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello DeeDee - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy travel day to write.  When I respond to my guests in TripAdvisor, I am always so proud of my staff and their efforts to provide excellent customer service.  I am so glad that we succeeded to meet your needs and especially being accommodating to you and your family.     We try very hard to have the same "Hamptonality" culture in every department here, and as I always tell the customers that I meet in person - "We do listen to you and we always try to get better!"  I am glad you also enjoyed our breakfast, and that there was plenty to eat.  It is a very important part of our hotel concept, and guests look forward to it each day.   I hope you managed to find the time each day to try one of our waffles too.  (They are pretty darn good, if I must say so myself).     I am glad you like the Disney transportation, I always like feedback on the drivers and how they acknowledge our guests, as they have to be an extension of our service, so I will let them know your comments as well.  Thank you again for choosing Hampton and we all look forward to your return visit.  Let me know when you are coming back, and if there is anything I can ever do for you or your family in the very near future.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn while on our softball trip at the end of February.  The desk personnel were courteous, and the GM, Mitchell, was personable, engaging, and visible to hotel guests.  I created the bacon waffle during our stay, and if you need a little bacon for your waffle, just ask Mitchell to hook you up; tell him Coach sent you.
Manager Response: Hello Coach - Please forgive me for the long delay in responding to you, I think it was the creation of the "Bacon Waffle" that caused me to delay in getting back to you.  It was a monumental event, and I was trying to give it the proper attention that it needed.  So far it stirred up a few new ideas from my team, so since we all "Feel the Hamptonality" here, and you obviously do as well, we may have to invest some "Think Tank" time to do this right.  I can promise you one thing, you won't see me on the show Shark Tank trying to get their team to invest in this idea going public......!!
