I will leave that to the Hampton powers to be to decide that my friend.  Seriously, it was great to have you and the team staying at our hotel.  You were a great group, and you should be proud of everyone one of your athletes and coaches. I hope you do decide to come back in the near future.   Please stay in touch and continue to "Feel The Hamptonality",  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: My family and I had stayed at Hampton Inn for 2 days and our experience was Great. We had gone to another city to visit relatives and had made a resevation at another Hotel chain, When we got there they CHANGED our reservation from a 2 Bed Non-smoking to a 1 Bed Smoking room and didn't feel the need to tell us at arrival (Our room was out of service for maintainance per the Hotel staff). Needless to say my grandaughter who has Asthma couldn't stay in that room as it REALLY had a strong smoke odor. When I asked the front office staff there reply was " you can stay in that room or go some where else." Without an apology or anything. We chose to leave and could not find another Hotel for over 40 miles. We called the Hampton Inn we had stay at previously (at Midnight) and explained
Manager Response: Hello Debra - Thank you for taking the time to write to us.  I am so happy to read that we took care of you and your granddaughter.  I know it is critical that we communicate any room changes prior to arrival on a guest request and how important it is to our customers. Your experience was a perfect training example for all hotels to follow, as you never know what the customers needs truly are unless you talk to them.   We are a non-smoking hotel, and a great choice for people traveling who need to try to avoid the full smoking environment.  I am so proud of our front desk team as they  do all that they can to not only accommodate our customers, but to also make them feel a part of our "Hamptonality" culture from beginning to end.    It sound like we accomplished that with you and your granddaughter.  I don't know if I met you during the breakfast time, but either way please contact me direct the next time you are coming to Disney and are in need of accommodations.  I will also let my Front Office team know about your stay and comments.  Thank you so much and have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: It would be a nice hotel if it was clean
Summary: The staff at the hotel is wonderful.  But my room was less than clean and the elevator is nasty.  Also the larger king rooms come with a twin bed and not a couch.  Useless unless you are traveling with a child then wouldn't you get 2 queens?
Manager Response: Good Morning Shelly - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write to me.    I want you to know that what you experienced is not the norm for our hotel, and I am truly sorry that you experienced a room that was truly not up to both your standards and mine.  We take a considerable amount of pride in our facility, and our housekeeping staff works very hard to make sure that each room is ready to be released to our guests so that they can have a very enjoyable stay, and it sounds like we failed to do so in your case which is unacceptable, plus the elevators which are also a first impression item should always be clean in appearance.  Please accept my apology for this, as your comments will always keep us focused on preventing issues for all of our future guests.   I also appreciated the 5 star rating for our service team, and we do shoot for 5 stars in all areas as well.   I do look forward to your next visit to our hotel as I hope you will continue to stay with us.  Please contact me direct to make your reservations.  Best regards and again thank you.  Mitchell

Summary: Booking my room was the easiest and the rep was not pushy about choosing their hotel.  Hotel is very clean, staff were helpful and pleasant. Breakfast is great, I have stayed at expensive rooms and their breakfast menu came out to be the same.
Manager Response: Hello Josephine - I hope that you and your family are all having a wonderful day.   Thank you for taking the time to write to us and I am so glad you enjoyed your stay.    Our staff and leadership team works very hard here to keep our property clean, and our staff "listens" to our customers, and as I like to say often......"We are not in the one time visit business, we are in the repeat customer business", and that is my message to our team.    I am also glad you enjoyed our breakfast, as we agree with you, as it is a great added price-value to be included with your stay.  It is a big part of the Hampton concept so it must stay consistent each and every day along with our service.  Please let me know if there is ever anything I can do for you or your family in all of your travels to our fabulous city.   I will always be at your service!  Best regards and thank you again for staying with us,  Mitchell

Summary: The General Manager went to great lengths to help us positively resolve a transportation issue in getting to and from Disneyland and the hotel. He greatly exceeded our expectations - his commitment to be of great service was embedded in the staff. This was our first stay at this location but when we come back to Anaheim we will definitely return to this hotel. Great Job and Thanks!
Manager Response: none

Summary: A great place to stay while visiting Disneyland. The staff at this hotel were excellent and very helpful. There is a transport to Disneyland that leaves every 30 minutes that I would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello stravinsky57;  Thank you for taking the time to write, as I value your comments greatly.  I am so glad that you enjoyed your stay, and I can tell you first hand that all of us at the Hampton Inn & Suites appreciate your business and your recommendation.   As I continue to mention in most of my responses I am very proud of our staff, as we listen to our customers and we are always trying to improve our services to our customers.  We love our "Disney families", and being part of the Good Neighbor Program, so we feel that we not only represent Hampton, but Disney as well.  I hope you will be stopping in again soon whether on a pleasure trip or possibly even on business to Anaheim, but either way, we look forward to your next stay.  Have a wonderful day, and thank you for choosing Hampton and experiencing our Hamptonality!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Excellent! Will return on next trip.  Morning shuttle driver was outstanding,and super friendly with everyone his name was Greg. Breakfast was just what we needed before we stated our fun filled day. Room and bed were nice and clean. View was great, could watch the fireworks from our window.
Manager Response: Hello Mary D - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write.  I cannot tell you enough as to how much all of us at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim / Garden Grove appreciate your kind words,  I am thrilled that you had such a great stay, and enjoyed our facilities.  I look forward to your return and we will make your next stay even more memorable.   ( I will let Greg know what you said too, it will make his day).  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: This hotel is wonderful and the staff is so friendly.  You can tell they really do care about your experience that you have while you are staying in the hotel.  And that makes a big difference.  The hotel location is ideal as it is close to a lot of great restaurants within walking distance, of course Disney Land is within walking distance.  The best part was my room had a wonderful balcony and I was pleasantly surprised at 9PM I had a front row seat to the firework display that was happening at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Judy B - Thank you for writing a review of our hotel and your experience here.  I am extremely proud of our staff, as I am blessed to have so many outstanding associates, who understand the importance of providing excellent customer service.  They all work very hard, and do their very best each and every day.  I am glad you enjoyed your Balcony view as the fireworks can be pretty spectacular at times.  Please let me know if there is ever anything I can do for you and your family and friends, and we all look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: This hotel is a nice place to stay after your long day at Disneyland.  It's clean and the staff are very accommodating. The complimentary breakfast is really good. There's inside pool, gym, business center. My stay overall is really good!
Manager Response: Hello eterna2015;  Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at our Hampton Inn & Suites.   I am thrilled to read that you had a great stay, and it sounds like you really enjoyed our facilities.   Our staff works very hard to try to exceed your expectations, and our breakfast team is top notch.  I am very proud of them and what they accomplish with our guests each and every day.     I was hoping to hear that you enjoy our Gym, as it has to be one of the best in the Hampton Inn & Suites brand.     Please let me know if there is anything else we can do for you, and I hope we see you on a return visit in the very near future.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Had a great experience and Hampton Inn & Suites is an awesome place to stay.  The employees/staff were very efficient and very kind to their guests.  I loved that warm breakfast is available in the mornings and the rooms are roomy and very comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello Elizabeth C - First let me thank you for taking the time to write a review.   I would like to express the same response to you and your fellow convention attendees - What a fantastic group you were, and it was an absolute pleasure to serve you and everyone staying at our hotel.    I am so happy you enjoyed our breakfast, and as I seem to say often, our staff works very hard to try to keep all of our guests happy and coming back again and again.  I will pass on your compliments to our staff in all departments, and we all look forward to seeing you again next year (or sooner).  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Great property run by great staff
Summary: This was just an overnighter and I've always enjoyed Hampton properties.  They're fun, relaxed, and provide a great value for a quality stay. Alvin at the front desk took great care of us.  He was friendly, welcoming, and got us checked in quickly.  He also made sure to credit my HHonors account.  Win!  I understand this property is schedule for a remodel so I'm excited to see what the new and improved property looks like!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very convenient, affordable family hotel for Disneyland
Summary: We spent a very efficient Saturday night at the Hampton Inn as part of a Sunday trip to Disneyland.  I don‚Äôt think we could‚Äôve done better for the price ($135).  After staying there I can‚Äôt imagine spending much more than that to stay near Disneyland with the family unless I was spending $450-600/night at the Grand Californian or Great Wolf Lodge where there‚Äôs a huge trade-off in terms of location and on-site activities (my kids begged me to turn left when we drove past the massive indoor water park at the Great Wolf on Harbor).  There was plenty to like at the Hampton Inn in addition to the price.  Big modern lobby with lots of seating, morning breakfast which was on par with other free breakfasts at similar hotels, pool/hot tub for the kids, shuttle to Disneyland ($5 adults/$2
Manager Response: Hello HarryfromLA - First let me say thank you for taking the time to review us, and I especially appreciated the details of the review, as well as the wonderful comments about our staff, location, overall price-value and product quality.  The staff works very hard here to achieve excellent customer satisfaction and we do listen to our guests, which helps us to improve our services and facilities daily.    Wait until you see the newly renovated Hampton rooms we will be working on sometime in late September.  We are all excited about it, and we hope it will truly compliment our service efforts.  I am glad you found our facility clean, and the breakfast to your liking, our Housekeeping, Breakfast and maintenance team works hard, and our front Desk team, works on making sure all of your needs are handled.  I hope you will be back again soon, so that you can try out one of our newly renovated rooms upon completion.  Give me a call any time and I will keep you posted on our   progress, "but don't wait too long, we would love to see you back even sooner"!  Again; Thank you and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell

Summary: If you are one of those people that doesn't like to eat out this be the place, because they offer kitchen in some of the rooms. If you want a really relaxing place with your family this is the place....... they offer pool & spa, gym and then of course they were about mile or two to Disneyland and California Adventures. Lots of places to eat around the hotel. Very close to Target. We gotten a room for a family of five with the kitchen. Already has all your cooking tools. That came in handy. Also offers you little patio we enjoyed that. Staffs are really nice. They do offer breakfast in the lounge.
Manager Response: Hello moonnstar3 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write.   We take our reviews seriously and I am thrilled to read that you had a wonderful stay.  We love our families, and many of our business and convention travelers come back with their families to relax and enjoy Disney on future visits.  It sounds like you had one of our Suites, and for a family staying a few days it is nice to have the ability to have a few of the conveniences of home, so I am glad you enjoyed having our kitchen cooking tools.   We receive a lot of compliments on our staff and they enjoy providing great customer service, and your reviews make us even better as we listen to our customers feedback.  Again, Thank you and I hope to see you again soon to share in our Hamptonality!  Have a wonderful day!  Mitchell

Summary: We decided to stay here for December 30th and 31st this past year for New Years Eve.  This was the most reasonably priced hotel in the area around Disneyland.  The front staff was very nice and the room was great. It included a microwave and mini-fridge. They have a $5 shuttle that goes directly into Disneyland so we were able to go to Downtown Disney and have a drink or two without having to worry about a very expensive Uber or taxi on New Years Night.  The breakfast was complimentary and was pretty decent.  For a boutique hotel, this was definitely one of the best I've been to.
Manager Response: Hello Killakelzo - First let me thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to send us a review.    I am very glad to read that you enjoyed your visit and that you found the staff and amenities to be more to your liking.  We (I) am very proud of our staff and leadership team, as they all work very hard to try to keep our guests happy and our product clean and maintained year round.  We just finished up the construction of a new shuttle waiting area to Disney, and I hope you will find it just as easy and comfortable as before.    As you mentioned having a microwave and mini-fridge is a big plus for our guests, as these amenities are available in all of our rooms and not just our suites, and the guest room refrigerators are not the typical "tiny" ones, which is also great.  Thank you again for your feedback!!  We all hope that you will return shortly to visit with us again,  Best regards and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: Stayed at the Hampton Inn for two nights while in town in business. The staff was friendly and the rooms were very spacious with large fridges and a balcony. Nothing really stands out as terrible but personally, I didn't like this hotel. It seemed to need a little TLC. Also, the complimentary breakfast was what one would expect for that price: runny eggs, bacon, and sad-looking fruits served up on paper plates. If I return to Anaheim I will likely try another hotel. I will say, however, that is seems like a good value for families.
Manager Response: Hello Catchatorre - Thank you so much for taking the time to write, as I value your comments greatly.  I first want to say thank you for acknowledging the staff.  They all work hard, and look for ways to improve their services.  Our breakfast crew takes a lot of pride in their food and presentation, and I shared your observations with them.   I personally do not like runny eggs, or poorly looking fruits, so just being a guest would not allow me to accept this presentation moving forward.  I usually get great comments on our food and presentation, so it is unacceptable that we failed to meet the quality that we are known for.     As for the TLC, we are doing a room renovation to an exciting new Hampton room package starting in September, and we are all excited about our future as I hope we can earn a positive room memory from you, which is what we strive for.   I think you will like this update as it exceeds the needs of our business traveler, as well as our leisure customers, as we have a pretty good mix of both traveler segments in the hotel year round.  Again, thank you for your comments as they do make us better, as we do listen and learn from them.  I will always be at your service, so please let me know if there is anything I can do for you, your family and friends, and I hope to see you again.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Very nice hotel, excellent staff, especially Alvin and Lila! Close by Disney, with convenient shuttle.  Hampton is definitely working to up its game.  Although we were only there for one night, it looked like a good choice for families doing Disney with limited budget.
Manager Response: Hello wwhawkeye - First let me say Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write.   I cannot tell you enough how much I (We) appreciate your review.  We take great pride ion our service and we listen to our guests, as we try hard to have each guest experience a perfect stay.   As I mentioned in a previous response we do love our families, and we also like to celebrate birthdays, and anniversaries or any occasion we can discover during or prior to arrival, so next time you come into our city, please let us know if you are celebrating any special occasions too. I will also share your comments with Lyla and Alvin, I know they will be excited to hear they were mentioned as they work hard on their guest satisfaction skills.  I am glad you liked the shuttle service, as it is pretty convenient and also cost effective for the family. I appreciate the thumbs up you are giving us in your review, and I hope you will visit us again soon.   Best regards and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Very friendly and helpful staff.Breakfast was excellent.
Summary: Wonderful to have the shuttle run so efficiently to Disneyland. The breakfast was excellent and the staff working at this time was superb.....especially Griselda! We would recommend this hotel to others interested in a family setting!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just stayed at the Hampton inn in February. We stayed in the two room suite. Our room was fine. It was spacious and clean. The a/c unit was very loud when it ran. The beds were a bit hard but fine. The best thing was there were a lot of outlets in the room which is a nice change for hotel rooms. The breakfasts were good for a continental breakfast. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We took a pile of high school kids, the hotel took great care of us, clean rooms, great breakfast, very nice pool, tons of parking!  Walk or shuttle to the parks.  Staff all professional and helpful!  One of the best hampton hotels I have stayed in!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stay here 3 nights. rooms are clean and comfortable, hotel staff is very accommdating they have a very good breakfast with very good coffee. my only complaint is that you have to pay 12$ a day to park your car
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lobby was clean and fresh upon our arrival.  Staff was excellent.  They were able to accommodate us with rooms close together, bus tickets, and lots of excellent information.  We had mobility scooter and they allowed us to keep them on charge in the lobby for the duration of our stay.  The rooms were large and very clean.  A breakfast buffet was provided and is one of the best I have been offered at a hotel.  Fresh eggs of differing variety, breakfast meats, waffles, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal and a variety of drinks were offered. We will definitely consider staying again on a future vacation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for two nights at least he Hampton Inn and had a wonderful stay. We were 1 mile from Disneyland. The room was exceptionally comfortable and roomy. The maid service was perfect and the he hotel staff very kind and helpful. I'd highly recommend this hotel for the price, location and comfort. Even though we were just a couple there was a great little book with a twin bed, bean bag and TV. I'd imagine this would be a great family friendly hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very Clean and Comfortable room.  The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating.  Good breakfast to start your day. Just a few minutes away from Disneyland.  The shuttle ride is just long enough to give you a few minutes to settle down after an eventful day at "The Land".
Manager Response: none

Summary: Convenient location to visit Disney parks, shuttle service also very convenient, less expensive than the Disney parking lot and less walking distance. Coffee was excellent too, specially the Robust one. Only disadvantage is  that they charge you for parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great family hotel. Lori on the front desk was absolutely wonderful. She went above and beyond to ensure we had a great 7 night stay. We spent 5 days in the  Parks and took a bus tour suggested by Lori that we loved. The hotel offers a delicious breakfast bar and make your own waffle station, a 24 hour coffe station was a bonus! The hotel was clean and the staff friendly. They offer a shuttle to and from the parks for a small fee but it was worth it(20p\week per adult). Fast food and sit down restaurants all within walking distance. We were in a suite on the third floor and could see the fireworks at the park which my children really enjoyed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in order to be close to Disneyland.  We were able to purchase our Disneyland Tickets here as well as a semi private shuttle to the Park.  The shuttle services only the Hampton Inn and the Embassy Suites.  There is what I would call a full service breakfast including fresh fruit, yogurt, hot and cold cereal, waffles, muffins and the egg selection is different each day...one day scrambled eggs with sausage, one day an omelet with peppers and ham another day a sort of egg mcmuffin.  There is plenty of room to sit for breakfast....tons of room.....The service is excellent and the rooms are large.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family has stayed here a handful of times and we have never had any issues. The staff is friendly and very accommodating. We stay in the room with the kitchenette and everything has always been clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There are a ton of hotel options near Disneyland, and not every one would receive Walt's approval. This Hampton surely would, based on its great customer service, clean rooms and free WiFi. The fitness center is also a nice plus.  The hotel is located just minutes from Disneyland and the Convention Center on Harbor, and it's close to restaurants and a huge Target. The only negative here is the parking. Like many hotels on Harbor, they charge a fee, which is understandable. However, the Hampton shares the parking lot with the nearby Embassy Suites and we had trouble finding a space on a weekday when Embassy was hosting a fairly large event. Other than that, however, we had a fantastic stay.  The breakfast staff was great and there were plenty of options. Best of all, there was
Manager Response: none

Summary: I chose the hotel based on proximity to Disneyland, access to a shuttle, and a breakfast included option. I was able to check in early which was great since I had 5 kids with me. I wasn't disappointed and the hotel was very clean and organized.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel because we were going to visit Disneyland/California Adventure. It is a reasonably priced hotel, which offers free breakfast. It is one mile from the Disney resort so it is very convenient location-wise. However, there are no frills/no ambiance. The rooms are smallish and the beds are OK. The pillows are not the best. Hot breakfast consists of eggs, bacon, waffles, bagels/breads/muffins. There is extra fee to park. We will probably stay here again, only because it is near the Disney parks and the price is right (using AAA discount). For a family of 4 I would rather spend my money at the amusement parks and not the hotel. The front desk staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff at this hotel really made the stay effortless. The hotel was very clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and courteous, knowledgeable of the area, and answered all needs with ease. The distance from the theme park was not a factor, between the hotel shuttle, taxis, and even walking it really had no effect and was just as easy as staying across the street. Well Done Hampton!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Conveniently located a block away from Roscoe's Chicken and Waffles! (You could walk there no problem). Shuttle takes you right to Disneyland in less than 10 minutes. Internet in room worked just fine. Would stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn & Suite by Hilton - Anaheim
Summary: Nice hotel, friendly staff, close to everything (including Disneyland, great restaurants, Target, John Wayne SNA airport). So glad they have lemon/lime water in lobby! They give you cookies everyday. Both the suites and regular rooms are nice. Housekeeping staff is very nice, friendly, and helpful. The BEST parts are the great free breakfast buffet and you can see the Disneyland fireworks from most rooms. I will rack up my Hilton Honors points by staying here for my next visit to Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose to have some out of town family stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Garden Grove.  Our family told us that the hotel was excellent, easy access, clean rooms and enjoyed the breakfast.  we were very pleased with our decision
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great staff, clean hotel. Close To Disney
Summary: We had a good stay here. The room was very clean. We did have some trouble with the AC/heating unit a couple of times, but they were always prompt in fixing it and offered to let us change rooms if we wanted. We, unfortunately, had someone scratch our rental in the parking lot one day, but there are "park at your own risk" signs everywhere so it must be a common problem with drivers there. So be careful of that if you plan on renting a car or bringing your own. They offer Disney tickets and shuttle buses at the front desk. The shuttle was great. It ran fairly often throughout the day/night and only cost $5 per person for an all day ticket. Maybe that's not such great savings for a larger family when parking at Disney is $25 per day but we were just two so we went for that. Grant
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for the perfect rating. We are glad to read you loved your accommodations, the breakfast we served and our shuttle services. We are also happy you were impressed with the facilities that we have to offer and our friendly associates who took great care of you. However, we are sorry for the issues you experienced during your stay and we regret for any inconvenience caused. I have shared your concerns with my team, so that necessary corrective actions can be taken. Thank you for recommending our hotel to fellow online reviewers, and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: hotel staff was great. check in/out was a breeze. I need more towels and did not have to wait more then 5 minutes to get them delivered. the location was perfect. the breakfast was great. Valet was perfect. the cleanness of the hotel was on point. I would recommend this hotel for family stay
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad you loved our clean property, central location and the delicious breakfast we served. It was nice of you to recognize our associates and the excellent service you received. I will pass along your kind comments to my entire team. We appreciate you for recommending us and look forward to hosting you and your family again the next time you visit Anaheim.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Jesus Raya was the absolute BEST!
Summary: My boyfriend & I decided to make the trip down to Disneyland over New Years weekend. We had prior reservations at another hotel down the way and it was a horrible experience. We came to the Hampton in and was greeted by amazing staff who went above and beyond to make sure our stay was nothing more than enjoyable. Jesus in particular. He was dealing with a lot from phone calls to emails, and regular tasks that would normally frustrate a normal person. But he did not he remained profession and just an all around good guy. Being in the customer service industry I appreciate when I come intact with others who take there job as seriously as I do. So, thank you Jesus for making our horrible day into a better one!   Katlyn, Mike & Stephanie
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to review your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim. We are delighted to read that your stay was enjoyable on every front. It was especially nice of you to recognize our associates and the excellent service you received. I will share your kind comments with my team. This is exactly what we strive to do every day, so thank you again for acknowledging their efforts. We hope to welcome you again the next time you visit Anaheim.     Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: We spent 2 nights at this hotel the beginning of December 2015 and found it to be a very nice and comfortable hotel.  The check in process was taken care of swiftly and politely and the room we had was nice sized and the beds were comfortable.  It could use a little sprucing up, but, that being said, it was very clean even though it furnishings are a little dated.  The breakfast was very good, well stocked and we had plenty of room.  I am sure that with larger parties, this could become an issue.  We purchased Disney shuttle passes when we checked in for the time we were there and had no problems getting on a bus right away or within just a few minutes. Pickup and drop off were both at very convenient locations.  Overall, I would recommend this hotel and would stay here again,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad you loved your clean accommodations, our front desk service and the facilities we have to offer. However, we agree with you that some of our rooms may need an update. We are happy to let you know that we are finalizing plans now and will be renovating our rooms and suites very soon. We appreciate you for recommending us and look forward to accommodating you and your family again soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager  Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Clean, quiet and kids friendly. Offers outdoor pool and breakfast. We used the business center to pay for and print our Disney tickets, it was nice and easy and free of extra charge. We also used the shuttle to the park, it was a bit pricey but worked well. Also pricey is the parking. Hotel located good close to restaurants, Walgreen's etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim for your stay. We are glad that you and your family enjoyed your time with us, and we appreciate you highlighting our convenient location, our pool and breakfast facility in your review. It is also nice to learn that our shuttle and business center facility worked well for you. It was our pleasure to host you and your family, and we would love to be of your service again the next time you visit Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Rooms are typical. Very clean. The breakfast area gets crazy in the morning. Get there early to avoid the lines.  Floors in the breakfast area are sticky and messy.  Had to wait for someone to bring out more waffle batter.  They have this crazy sauce I've never seen before... mango sauce to put on your waffles.  Tried it and it was yummy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us.  I am sorry that you were inconvenienced by the breakfast area being crowded during your visit. During the busy vacation/holiday seasons, the breakfast area can be packed and a bit boisterous, especially during the last hour as guests are trying to make sure they don‚Äôt miss out. We do our very best to facilitate a good flow and keep everything well stocked to prevent delays. Thank you for your feedback and I assure you that we are always looking for ways to improve.  We hope that you will return on a future visit to Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles - Anaheim- Garden Grove.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: It was a wonderful stay for us. The staff are very friendly and helpful. We were lucky to be given two rooms with a view of Disneyland fireworks even though it was not the highest floor. The aircon was a little noisy too. The complimentary breakfast was really good! Hot drinks are available round the clock. Sometimes, there are complimentary cookies in the evening or free bottle drinks, or fruits. It's really a good gesture! The room was clean and spacious. We appreciate the space since there are four of us. Thank you for a wondeful stay! Will definitely be back the next time I visit again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad our clean accommodations suited well for your family needs, and you enjoyed the views. It is great to read you were impressed with our friendly associates and breakfast offerings. We thank you for highlighting the complimentary features we offered. However, please accept our apology for the noisy air conditioning unit. We have shared your concerns with our Engineering department to resolve the problem. We appreciate you planning to stay with us again and look forward to hosting you and your family back soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: lovely stay - staffs are extremely friendly and helpful. we were lucky to get a room on the top floor with view of disneyland fireworks. the a/con could be a bit noisy but wasn't a major issue as we spent most of our time outside anyway  free breakfast, which was excellent. shuttle service to Disneyland too within a walking distance.   upon check-out I saw that they had a box of snacks in their reception counter so I just casually threw a remark whether they sell that raisins snack there and he just gave me one!  would definitely be back if we are visiting Disneyland again in the near future :)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so glad that we were able to meet all of your needs, and that you were impressed with the quality of our service and facilities. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed the fireworks and the breakfast we served. Our goal is for you to enjoy every aspect of your stay, and we are so glad you did. However, we are sorry for the inconvenience you had with our HVAC unit. We appreciate your recognition of our efforts and will be waiting to welcome you back to the Hampton Inn & Suites on your next trip to Disneyland.      Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: The staff was extremely polite and kind.  They were friendly and available.  The hotel gets a lot of use obviously being so close to Disneyland and appears well used.  Everything was clean, but could use a little spruce job -- particularly hallways and doors which are very old fashion.  I was surprised that the shuttle service to Disney was an additional charge.  Not sure what as we were just here for one night until we checked in at Disney.  Things have certainly changed in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that you loved our convenient location, clean property as well as our outstanding guest service. However, we are sorry to hear that you were inconvenienced by the nominal fee we charge for our shuttle service. We are happy to let you know that we are finalizing plans and will be renovating our hotel very soon. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel again soon.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: As usual while visting Disneyland we stayed at the Hampton inn and suites, we have stayed there everytime we go there. I made my reservations about a month in advance and requested a king suite and a queen suite for my son. We arrived about 4pm and all looked great the rooms are large and very clean, full kitchen. This is where things went a bit downhill, our suite was not a king but 2 so called queens, i have asked for kings everytime and never got one, the other suite was also not queens. I paid for 1 queen suite and 1 king suite and got 2 suites with full beds, i could not sleep with my husband we slept in separate beds as did my son and his wife. I think i will after all this time of staying there be looking for a new place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us for your stay once again. We are glad that you were pleased with the size and cleanliness of your well-equipped room. Despite booking your room in advance, we are sincerely sorry that we failed to acknowledge your request. As part of the Hampton family, our brand sets very high standards with regards to service that we strive to uphold. Your review highlights where we need to refocus our efforts and we assure you that we will.   You are a valued customer and everything we do is aimed at providing you with an excellent hotel experience, so once again please accept our sincerest apologies for all the inconvenience endured by you and your family. We appreciate your loyalty and hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to regain your trust. Thank you again for your candid feedback.    Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Was good for the price during our trip to Disneyland.  Liked the free breakfast and Disneyland shuttle offered (not free).  Since we only slept there it was fine, but not the most comfortable pillows.  Was pretty busy for breakfast and the shuttles in December, I'm sure it is packed during the summer.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim for your recent stay and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that you enjoyed the great value we offer, the delicious breakfast we serve as well as our shuttle service. We appreciate your observations and hope to welcome you and your family back to our hotel on your next trip to Anaheim.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: This Hampton Inn is always clean, fresh and friendly. Most of the people staying here are Disneyland visitors.  Lots of kids and families.  The staff are friendly and courteous and patient with little ones.  The shuttle is convenient.  The prices are always reasonable for the area.  This is the hotel of choice for your Anaheim stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim. We are glad that you loved our convenient location, the cleanliness of our hotel and our helpful associates. It is also nice to hear how much you enjoyed our shuttle service and the great value we offer. We appreciate you for recommending us to others and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Our first time staying at this hotel.  Great proximity (walking distance) to Disneyland, Target, and many restaurants.  Continental breakfast could use more variety on hot items, but overall good.  Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim for your recent stay and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that you loved our central location and outstanding guest service. Your observations regarding our breakfast is much appreciated, and we look forward to accommodating you again on your next trip to Anaheim.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: The staff was friendly and very helpful; providing maps and information on activities that weren't Disney. Breakfast was fresh, well-prepared/supplied. The room was sparkling clean and well-appointed. We were in the 1st room on the 1st floor and could NOT hear the hullabaloo of breakfast; that was very much appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the variety of items on our Complimentary On the House hot breakfast buffet and that you loved your well-kept accommodations. It is also pleasing to read that our staff were informative and took such good care of you. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you and your friends back soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: From check in to check out this Hampton Inn was FABULOUS!  After staying in many different places here in the Anaheim Resort Area, this is truly one of the best facilities in the area!  Love the Hampton Inn Staff, Room, breakfast, everything.  Forgot to include a necessary special request, it was available, so the front desk was able to accommodate.  This was an overnight stay due to business.  When you are tired, the need for comfort and courtesy is very important.  Love, love, love it!
Manager Response: We are delighted to read about your experience at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim while on a business visit, and couldn't be happier to hear that you enjoyed your stay on every front. We are extremely happy to read that you loved our accommodations, friendly hospitality, and breakfast offerings. Thank you for your compliments and we look forward to hosting you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Most of us take a vacation to relax and get away from it all and spend time with family, you end up driving or flying all day and when you arrive at your destination you just want to relax. Upon our arrival at check-in we were greeted with a smile I think it was the manager at the front desk but I didn't catch his name he welcomed us he told us to enjoy our stay and if there was anything we need it just ask. The front lobby was very colorful and inviting, the Christmas tree was beautifully decorated. Jesus assisted with r check in, he was very helpful. We wer upgraded to a suite with a balcony. We wer able to have  an awesome view of the Disneyland  fireworks that night. We walked over to r favorite Italian ice spot, Joe's. Yummy yummy, show ur room key to get 10% discount.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim for your recent visit. Our goal is for you to enjoy every aspect of your stay and we are so glad you did. We are happy to read that you were impressed with our beautiful lobby and the decorated Christmas tree. It is also great to know that you loved the room upgrade and enjoyed the fireworks overlooking from your accommodations.   It was especially nice of you to recognize our associates for their welcoming hospitality and excellent service. I will convey your kind comments to them, especially to Jesus. We appreciate you mentioning our ideal location a perfect place for families. Thank you once again for this great feedback and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.   Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: we were able to check in to our room early as we were going to spend the day at Disneyland the room was very big with a surprise as it had a extra little room with a twin bed a tv and a bean bag chair just perfect for our great grandson we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend it to anyone
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to give us a feedback of your wonderful experience. We are glad that you loved your comfortable accommodations, our excellent guest service and the in-room amenities we offer. We appreciate you for recommending us to others and look forward to welcoming you and your family back to our hotel on your next trip to Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Located close to Disneyland, but more than walking distance.  Had very efficient and well priced shuttle service.  Will stay there again when we go back to Anaheim. Very clean and breakfast area is well set up for large groups of people to eat quickly in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that you loved our central location, clean property as well as our convenient shuttle service. We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed our quick service at the breakfast area and that you will return to stay with us the next time you are in our area. We hope to see you and your family again soon.      Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: As far as a family orientated hotel for a quick trip to Disneyland, Hampton Inn has you covered.  Was there for Thanksgiving as I wrongly assumed it would not be busy.  The hotel was very busy (as I am sure it almost always is).  My only legitimate gripe is with the Shuttle service to the park.   They hay a private shuttle company that picks up on the half hour and leaving the park at closing was a bit of a mess.  Too Many people, not enough shuttle.  Oh well, Uber to the rescue!  On a more positive note, Mitchell was superb.  The Continental Breakfast was bananas with all the kids and families headed to the park and Mitchell and crew handled the rush and chaos whit professionalism and grace.   Give those guys and gals a raise!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for sharing your experience online. We are glad to read that you enjoyed your time staying with us. Also, we are happy that you were impressed with our associates, especially Mitchell who took great care of you. Thank you for recognizing them for a job well done. However, we are sorry for the issues you encountered with regards to the shuttle service and we regret for any inconvenience caused. We hope to welcome you and your family back soon on your next trip to Anaheim.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary Heading: We will stay here again when we come back to Disneyland!!!
Summary: We loved everything about our hotel experience. Best part was the clean rooms, pool and hot tub. The staff was super friendly and always seemed to be cleaning something. The hot breakfast had a large variety of food. Great hotel to stay with children. We will definitely stay here again when we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: WOW, what a fantastic review!  We are pleased to hear that your stay was so enjoyable and that we exceeded your expectations.  We are extremely delighted to read that you liked our immaculate property, hospitality of our team and the breakfast we served.  Our team works hard to ensure your total satisfaction, so your comments are especially rewarding to read.  We look forward to sharing your review with them.  Thanks again for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  The Hampton Inn & Suites team will be eagerly waiting to serve you and your family the next time you visit Anaheim.    Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: The hotel was great.  Rooms were clean, comfortable, quiet and amenities were great.  Breakfasts were wonderful. The staff was friendly and very helpful.  Would recommend this hotel and will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for the perfect rating. We are glad to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us and that you loved our quiet, clean accommodations along with the amenities we offer. We are also delighted to read that you enjoyed our outstanding guest service as well as the variety of items on our complimentary On the House breakfast buffet. We appreciate you for recommending us and we are eagerly waiting for you and your family to return to our hotel again soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: the staff are very courteous and helpful.  the rooms and facility are clean.  breakfast is nice and well-staffed so seats open up when it's crowded.  good location.  I would recommend this property to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review and for recommending us to future travelers. We are glad that you loved our convenient location, clean accommodations as well as our friendly staff. It is also pleasing to read that you enjoyed our well-organized breakfast area along with the food we served. We are delighted that you had a successful trip and we hope to see you again the next time you are in our area.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel with super friendly staff, we would definetly recommend this hotel.
Summary: We stayed in a suite at the Hampton Inn for a week and really enjoyed it. It's an older hotel but it's clean and the staff is excellent. The suite we had was huge with all the comforts of home plus great views of the fireworks at Disneyland. It is also a very quiet hotel other than on a Monday morning when we were all woken up very early by the garbage truck, None of us got back to sleep so lack of sleep basically ruined our day.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at the Hampton Inn & Suites. We are glad to read that we were able to make you feel right at home with our excellent guest service, as well as, our clean and spacious accommodations. Also, it was a pleasure to learn that you were blown away by the exquisite view from your room. However, we are sorry for the noise issues you experienced due to the garbage truck and for the inconvenience it caused. Thank you again for recommending us online and we hope to provide you with a peaceful stay on your next visit.  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Very good location for Disneyland however this Hampton could use some updating. I always stay at a Hampton and this one was average. Needs a makeover. Carpets were worn and stained in the lobby/common areas. fitness room was nice. Considering the competition all around Hampton needs to remodel this facility
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We are glad that you liked our convenient location as well as our workout facilities. I apologize that your recent stay was not completely satisfactory and for the inconvenience this caused.  You are a very valued customer and all that we do is aimed at providing you with an outstanding experience. We appreciate your observations and hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: An All round generally good hotel
Summary: For family or business, this is an All round generally good hotel. Good staff, good location and very clean. We had a good experience again with this hotel. When the bathroom updates are done it will be even better
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad to learn that you enjoyed your stay, and that you loved our immaculate property, courteous associates, as well as, our central location. Thank you again for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: We stayed at Hampton Inn & Suites as part of a Disneyland package.  It has an excellent shuttle service to the park, the staff are terrific and helpful, the included breakfast a timesaver and moneysaver, wifi included, wonderful pool, lemon water and chocolate cookies by the front desk!  I highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are delighted to read that we were able to provide you with an exceptional stay. It was a pleasure to learn that you loved our timely shuttle service, courteous and welcoming associates, delicious breakfast that we served, as well as, all the facilities and the amenities that we have to offer. Thank you again for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Even though I had to work most of the time I was in the Anaheim area, I was looking forward to a better experience from a Disney area hotel with this price. I found a worn out and dated hotel. You can tell that the property is due for a remodel but probably can't becasue of the high volume of guests. The bathrooms need the most attention.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review as we sincerely value your feedback.  Our guests consistently give us high marks for the cleanliness of our rooms and for keeping everything in good working order.  However, we agree with you that some of our rooms need an update.  We are happy to let you know that we are finalizing plans now and will be renovating our rooms and suites very soon.    You are a very valued customer and all that we do is aimed at providing you with an outstanding experience.  Your observations and concerns are much appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you back again to our renovated property in the near future, so that we can provide you with a better stay experience.    Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: The "boys trip" I took with my son to Anaheim was only made better by this hotel.  Great location very near the convention center, Disney, and a number of other attractions.  A cab ride is pretty inexpensive (less than 20) to get to the rink to see the Ducks and is also within 20 or so minutes from the airport.  If you brave "The 5" on your own, it is easy on and off from the highway.  Overall, a great place to stay, quiet, very attentive staff (we asked for an extra blanket at one point and they brought two!) and clean rooms.  The morning breakfast was the typical Hampton breakfast, though they seemed to have more fresh fruit than most Hampton Inns I have been to.  I really cannot say enough good things about the place.  The staff at the front desk was able to hail us a cab,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback of your recent stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites. Our guests love how accessible we are to the airport and so many great venues, and of course being so close to Disneyland and Convention Center is a huge plus. We are glad to read that you loved our clean and comfortable accommodations, attentive staff, as well as, the breakfast we served. It was great to have you stay with us and we look forward to hosting you and your family again on your next trip.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Excellent value, had a group of 16 the staff did everything they could to accommodate us such as putting us within proximity.  Courteous and strove to do better as their managers would consistently walk around during breakfast asking if there was anything they could do and engaged their tenants.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent group stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites.  We are delighted to read that your stay was enjoyable on every front.  It was especially nice of you to recognize our associates and the excellent service you received.  This is exactly what we strive to do every day so I thank you for acknowledging their efforts.  I will pass along your kind comments to my team.  We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed the great value we have to offer.  We look forward to hosting you and your friends again the next time you visit Anaheim.     Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: The staff is always very welcoming and accommodating and the breakfast is always GOOD!  We have stayed here about 10 times and we've never had a bad experience. They even let you take water, fruit, and pastries with you to Disneyland.  This will always be a go to for us. :)
Manager Response: We appreciate you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim repeatedly, this tells us we are on the right track!  We also thank you for your wonderful feedback regarding your recent stay and for giving us a high rating.  We are pleased to hear that you were impressed with the hospitality of our associates, the delicious On the House hot breakfast buffet we served, as well as, the special touches and the exceptional service that our associates provided.  I will definitely share your kind words with my team.  We are delighted to read that you and your family will be staying with us on all your future trips to our area!  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Halloween at Disney, family purchased tickets for Disney's Halloween Party.  We live 2 hours away.  I am a Hilton honors member.  This hotel was the perfect place to sleep. Hotel was clean, staff friendly and perfectly located, even decorated for Halloween.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim and for the perfect rating. We are glad to read that you loved our comfortable accommodation, convenient location, as well as, our friendly associates who took great care of you. We appreciate you for being our loyal guest. It was a pleasure serving you and we hope to welcome you and your family back soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this Hampton suites.  The beds were really comfortable, the room was nicely clean and the kitchen  was really useful.  The breakfast with eggs every day really started our days well.    The best part about our stay was the staff.  We arrived early and they went above and beyond to take care of our frozen food and luggage.  Alvin specifically took great care of us.    We are looking forward to coming back next year.  Thanks!
Manager Response: We appreciate you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites for your recent visit to Anaheim and for the excellent feedback.  We know that a good breakfast is the perfect start of the day, so we are elated to hear that you enjoyed our Complimentary On the House hot breakfast buffet.  We are delighted to read that our associates, especially Alvin helped to make your stay a memorable one.  I will definitely pass along your compliments and can ensure you they will be thrilled to be recognized for a job well done.    It is also pleasing to hear that you enjoyed all other facilities as well.  We will be waiting to serve you and your family back the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim.  Hope you had a wonderful vacation!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Great value, helpful staff, clean and very nice complimentary hot breakfast. shuttle to disneyland every half hour each way. I will definitely stay here again. Beds nice with 4 pillows each, actual thermostat for the A/C.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful remarks of our hotel, and we are delighted to read that you were impressed with the quality of our service and that we exceeded your expectations.  We are especially glad to hear that you enjoyed our Complimentary On the House hot breakfast buffet, our accommodations and the great value we offer.  We appreciate the recognition of our efforts and we will be waiting to welcome you back to the Hampton Inn & Suites on your next trip to Anaheim.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton for 4 nights on a recent  trip to Disneyland.  We are a family of 5, with 3 young children. We had a suite which worked very well for our large family.  The hotel was clean and the staff helpful. The best part is the complimentary  breakfast!! I found the hotel to be tired and in need of some up dating, plus there aren't  many amenities  on site. There was a shuttle to disney which was convenient,  but extra. If you have a young family it would be better to stay within  walking  distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to evaluate our hotel when traveling with your family. We are delighted to read that you were impressed with the impeccability of our property, perfect accommodations, relishing breakfast offerings, courteous associates and convenient shuttle service. Our goal is for you to enjoy every aspect of your stay and we are so glad you did. Thank you once again for choosing Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim. We look forward to hosting you and your family again on your next trip.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Room is clean, breakfast is good. Staff is friendly, great location and close to many restaruants. Parking is easy to access and available.  Lighting is good and air flow is good in the room. Will return to stay in Hampton in the future. Bathroom shower is great.
Manager Response: We are delighted to read that we were able to provide you with an exceptional stay. It was a pleasure to learn that you loved our clean accommodations, courteous associates, as well as, the delicious breakfast that we served. We also want to thank you for mentioning our close proximity to a variety of restaurants. Thank you again for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: This hotel is fantastic! Not only are the rooms beautiful and well kept,but the staff is amazing. I cannot say enough about how friendly everyone was! Devon (works the front desk) is one of the most friendly people Ive ever met. To say he went above and beyond to make our stay memorable would be an understatement. The breakfast is also really, really good. If you're planning a trip on a budget and want something well worth it, stay here! You won't regret it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review and for recommending us to future travelers.  We are delighted to read that our friendly associates helped to make your stay a memorable one, especially Devon.  I will definitely pass along your compliments and can assure you that they will be thrilled to be recognized for a job well done.  We are glad that you enjoyed our well-maintained accommodations, the breakfast we served, as well as, the great value we have to offer.  We would love to have you stay with us again the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: The staff were all polite and helpful. The room was quiet, clean, comfortable with a very nice view of the Disney fireworks every night. The complimentary breakfast was more than you could ask for. Coffee and tea available 24/7 with freshly baked cookies at 18:00 at the front desk. Service de lux.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to evaluate our hotel.  We are delighted to read that you were impressed with our spaciousness suite and the beautiful view from there.  We are glad that you enjoyed the hospitality of our team, the complimentary On the House hot breakfast buffet and the array of generous amenities we have to offer.  Thanks again for choosing Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and it was pleasing to hear that you enjoyed the fireworks as well.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next trip.    We are happy that we were the fortunate ones who were privileged to host you!   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Great Value and Accommodations for Families
Summary: This hotel was fantastic for the family group I traveled with. The complimentary breakfast was great for feeding a group of picky eaters before a day at Disneyland. The rooms had plenty of space and were well maintained. The maid even took special care with our personal blankets, pillows and stuffed toys for the kids. While some minor things were not in *perfect* condition the hotel was well maintained and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with family at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim.  It is so nice to hear that our team made you feel welcome and that you enjoyed the variety of items on our Complimentary On the House hot breakfast buffet.  We are also delighted to read that you loved our well-appointed, spacious accommodations as well.  We make every effort to go that extra mile for our guests so feedback such as yours lets us know that we are succeeding.  We look forward to sharing your kind comments with my team.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you and your family again the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: We had our grandchildren with us for a short trip to Disneyland. We were pleased with the quality of the hotel - location - and service. The kids enjoyed making their own breakfast and swimming - when we weren't at the Park. The manager sought out many guests - which is a nice touch. Although this is a good facility - he told us that it is due for renovation next year - which should make it even nicer. Overall - a very good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim. We are glad that you had such a wonderful time with us and that you loved our excellent location as well as outstanding guest service. It is also nice to hear that your children enjoyed our pool facility. We look forward to welcoming you back again and showing you our new look.   Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager  Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: The staff here were great.  I had an issue with my A/C waking me up all night and the staff was very responsive!  The location was close to Disney Land so getting to the hotel after a long day at Disney was not an issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim and for sharing about your stay experience. We are glad that you loved our close proximity to Disneyland and that you enjoyed our friendly and attentive service. Thank you again, and we hope that you are already planning another trip our way.   Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager  Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: The hotel was clean and the staff was very friendly.  I liked the shuttle service to Disneyland.   There were several places to eat within walking distance.  My husband and I were easily meet friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim. We are glad that you loved our convenient location, clean property as well as our helpful service. It is also nice to hear that you liked our shuttle facility. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you and your family  back again soon.  Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager  Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary Heading: Excellent use of Hilton points for Disney visit
Summary: This was an excellent place to use points if you have them.  Stayed 4 nights, very quiet, no problem parking, and a very cheap shuttle pass to and from Disney which ran more than the every 30 minutes advertised during our stay.  Plus a free breakfast with 4 or 5 waffle stations, fresh fruit and yogurt, cereal bar, and the standard eggs and meat selection.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your positive feedback regarding your multiple night‚Äôs stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim. We are glad that you loved our quiet property, easy parking facility as well as our convenient shuttle service. It is also nice to hear that you enjoyed the variety of items on our complimentary On the House hot and cold breakfast buffet. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you and your family again the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager  Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: We arrived very tired from 23 hours of travel. Front office staff so very friendly and happy. Could not do enough for us. Booked us in quickly and had our room ready early. Room looked and smelled clean. Beds and pillows very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to review our hotel. We are delighted to read that your stay was enjoyable on each and every front. We are also glad that you were impressed with the cleanliness of your room and that you loved our comfortable bedding. It was especially nice of you to recognize our associates and the excellent service you received. Thank you again for choosing Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and we look forward to hosting you and your family again on your next trip.   Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager  Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Stay here for a 3 day weekend trip to Disneyland.  Check in on a Friday evening was quick.  Plenty of parking as there are three Hilton properties that share the common lot.   Round trip shuttle to Disneyland available for $5 daily.  Rooms-- Clean, comfortable temperature wise.  Bed was not super comfortable, but acceptable.  Shower was typical tub/shower combo with curved shower rod.  Water pressure was average.  Breakfast-  Complimentary hot breakfast.  Scrambled eggs, bacon, waffles, etc.  Usual hotel stuff.  Overall, hotel is good in a pinch or if price is comparably cheaper
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim. We are glad that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim and to our hotel and that you loved our immaculate accommodations. It is also pleasing to hear that you liked our convenient parking facility and the breakfast we offered. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope to welcome you and your family back the next time you are in our area.  Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager  Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Just went to Disneyland for three days and stayed at the Hampton Inn and Suites in Garden Grove.  Very clean!!! And the staff was very hospitable and friendly. It's about 3 miles from Disneyland so we paid to take the shuttle back and forth. We've been to Disneyland many many many many times and this is our new favorite place to stay.  It has a fantastic free breakfast!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim and for posting such a wonderful review. We are glad that we were able to impress you with our immaculate property, outstanding guest service as well as our complimentary breakfast servings. We are also delighted to hear that you loved our close proximity to Disneyland and appreciate you mentioning about our convenient shuttle service. We are eagerly awaiting your return to Disneyland and to our hotel.  Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager  Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Booked my room by phone at the last minute. Staff was very polite, friendly, and helpful. Hotel was clean. Had a good variety of breakfast items to choose from (not just carbs). The pool and hot tub were clean. This hotel is close to Disneyland, so the other guests were a bit enthusiastic. I wasn't there to go to Disneyland but I will definitely stay here when I do in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review! We are thrilled to hear that you had such a wonderful stay with us at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim. It is very pleasing to read that you loved our spotless property, attentive service, clean facilities as well as our breakfast servings. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you the next time you are in our area.  Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager  Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: This hotel in a very convenient location for Disneyland.  Hotel staff was wonderful during check in, check out, and even when we were bought postcards from the sundries shop.  The breakfast was better than other Hampton Inns I've stayed at.  Having 6 waffle stations instead of 1 or 2 made it very easy to get a quick breakfast.  My only quibble was that the rooms are a bit on the worn-down side, with chips, rubbed down edges, and in need of some refreshing.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for writing a review regarding your stay at our hotel. We are absolutely delighted that you loved our close proximity to Disneyland. Our team works hard to ensure your total satisfaction, so your comments are very rewarding to read. We appreciate you mentioning about our fast service at the breakfast area and we are glad that you enjoyed staying here. However, we understand that some of our rooms may need an update. We are happy to let you know that we are finalizing plans now and will be renovating our rooms and suites very soon. We look forward to welcoming you back again and showing you our new look.   Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: We stayed here for one night prior to checking in to a hotel on Disney property.  We enjoyed our stay.  The room was spacious and the beds (queen size - yea!) were comfortable - although feather pillows would have been a nice addition.  The room had a fairly large mini-fridge and a microwave.  There was a flat screen TV, although I thought it was a bit small for the room.  The desk space was fairly good and there was a very comfortable adjustable desk chair.  The only other chair in the room was a small side chair - a more comfy arm chair would have been nicer.  The room was fairly quiet - we did not hear much noise from the hallway or the other rooms,  However, the A/C was a bit loud when it came on, and we did hear the garbage trucks pretty early in the morning below our
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback of your overnight stay with us. We are delighted to read that you liked our spacious, comfortable, quiet and well-equipped accommodations and that you enjoyed the variety of hot and cold items on our Complimentary On the House hot breakfast buffet. Also, we are glad that you were impressed with our convenient location, especially our close proximity to area restaurants and the Disney World along with the facilities that we have to offer.  However, we sincerely apologize for the issues you encountered with regards to your room, internet connection and the elevator. We do regret for the inconvenience caused to you during your stay. We truly appreciate all your observations and concerns and have also alerted our respective teams regarding the issues. Thank you once again for bringing this to our notice. We hope to see you and your family back again the next time that you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: This hotel was great for our family of 4 with two older teenages. We had a suite with 2 queens plus a sofa bed. Checking in was easy with a very helpfull staff member making it possible for us to have a room with a view of the nightly foreworks from disney. Breakfast had everything you needed with outdoor seating. They also supplied breakfast to go bags when leaving early for the theme park. I would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad to hear that you loved the exquisite views from your room, as well as, the breakfast that we served. It was nice of you to recognize our associates and the excellent service you received from them. We look forward to hosting you and your family again the next time you visit Anaheim.     Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary Heading: An amazing place for families to stay
Summary: We stayed at the Hampton for 1 week on our visit to the USA from Australia. The staff were very friendly and helpful would highly recommend their buffet breakfast. Our room was perfect we had a shuttle bus from our hotel to Disney will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your week long stay at our hotel and for rating us so high. We are delighted to read that you were impressed with our accommodations, courteous associates, as well as, the delicious breakfast that we served.
