Thank you again for choosing Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim and we look forward to having you and your family stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/ Anaheim - Garden Grove

Summary: Great experience starting with booking.  Front desk staff is amazing and helpful.  Shuttle to DL is awesome!!!  Clean hotel and wonderful hot breakfast with lots of choices changing daily.  Pool is nice as well.  The staff even left my daughter a birthday present in our room!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim and for rating us so high! We are pleased to read that we were able to provide you with an exceptional stay and that you were highly impressed with the delicious breakfast we served, wonderful shuttle service as well as the exceptional service provided by our associates. I will definitely pass on your gracious words to them, especially the front desk staff. We appreciate your gracious words and hope to have the opportunity to host you and your family back soon!  Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager

Summary: Hotel is good value and has a good location. However, the rooms were on the smaller size and the amenities were average. We stayed at the Hyatt Place previously and had a better experience and liked their rooms better.  Pros: Complimentary breakfast, shuttle service to Disneyland (fee per person), Internet service  Cons: Room amenities are average, loud ac unit, shuttle service is shared with neighboring hotels (limited seating per shuttle)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your honest feedback. We are glad to read that your overall stay with us was to your satisfaction and that you liked our location, breakfast we served, as well as the good value we offer. However, we are sorry that we were not able to impress you with our accommodations and for any inconvenience this caused. Your observations and concerns are much appreciated. Thank you again and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you and your family back so that we can provide you with a much better stay experience.  Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager

Summary: Check in was fast and very friendly.  We had a huge suite that had a living area with wet bar and another tv in there as well. The bathroom was huge. Everything was very clean and bed very comfortable.  We were on 5th floor.  It had a great breakfast ,  it tasted great and they had IT ALL, all breakfast food hot and cold and plenty of it, no skimping there.  We had a great stay even though  it was for only one night cause we were passing  through on our way to San Diego.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a fabulous feedback regarding your overnight stay with us and for rating us so high! We are extremely happy to read that you cherished your time with us and that you loved our location, and also our seamless check-in service. We are also glad to hear that you were impressed with our spacious accommodation, especially the plush beds as well as the delicious breakfast we served with different varieties to choose from. Thank you for your gracious comments and we look forward to the opportunity to host you and your family back soon in the near future.  Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager

Summary Heading: What a great and friendly stay
Summary: I needed a place to stay for a conference being held in Anaheim, and after checking around, found this hotel.  It's within walking distance of the conference center as as a few other helpful places (Such as Disney and Target) although some are a bit of a distance and not fun if it's really hot.  It's located in an area filled with hotels (logical being that it's bot the Disney and the conference and the arena area), but stands out as a quiet, family orientated hotel.  The staff is extremely friendly at all hours, all my requests were always met with smiles, the manager is accommodating beyond what you would expect.  I spent 7 nights and 8 days, was given a late checkout with no extra charge. My room was comfy, the AC worked perfectly (It was hot weather so that's important). Was
Manager Response: Thank you for your fantastic comments regarding your multiple night‚Äôs stay with us at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim. It was a pleasure to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your time staying here and that our wonderful location was convenient for your needs. We are extremely happy to hear that you loved our amazing accommodations, especially the plush beds, delicious breakfast we served as well as our attentive staff. We appreciate your great feedback and will be eagerly waiting to host you back soon!   Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager

Summary: The Staff was super nice, we were able to check in early and they were always helpful. Their shuttle service to Disneyland was great! always on time and super nice drivers. The breakfast was great! always full of food and drinks. The room was always clean with fresh towels everyday! After a long day at Disneyland it was nice to come back to a clean room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Anaheim and for the perfect rating! We are delighted to read that your stay with us was a memorable one and that you loved our freshest accommodations, courteous associates, their exceptional service as well as the delicious breakfast we served. We appreciate your great comments and hope to welcome you and your friends back on all your future visits to our area!   Sincerely,   Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel close to ALL the Anaheim California Attractions
Summary: highly recommend this Hampton Hotel for anyone visiting the Anaheim area. First trip to California we stayed there to attend a MLB series against the LA Angels. Liked it so much  (staff and accommodations) that we booked three suites for a upcoming family vacation to Disneyland. My grand children ages 2 to 12 (6) my adult children (2) and their spouses (2) all enjoyed the morning breakfast to start the day. For families check out a one bedroom suite with a pull out next to a two bedroom lock off adjoining bedroom and bathroom. Lots of room with a kitchen. Very nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for a week while visiting Disneyland. Great family hotel, good free breakfast before hitting the parks. We got a family suite with a kitchen and balcony and it was perfect and we had room to spread out and wasn't so crammed. A quick shuttle ride that drops off right in front of the main gate, I think it was $5 per day. Free cookies and popcorn in the lobby in afternoon/evening. I would recommend this for families traveling to Disney...Great find!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ok let me tell you why I gave this hotel an excellent rating...the staff. Yes the room was clean which is a biggie for me. But the staff was superb. We hand an issue upon checking into our first room. With in minutes they had someone up to our room with keys to a new room. The person stayed with me until I chacked out the new room and made sure it was satisfactory. Then the next morning the Gen. Manger was walking about introducing himself. We had a very nice chat with him and commended him on his staff. I highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: the hotel is located about 1 mile from Disneyland - an easy walk to the park. It is a seven story hotel.  Nice lobby area.  They have a complimentary breakfast - the usual foods.  Nice area to eat both indoors and outside near the pool.   the exercise room is adequate (3 treadmills, bikes, etc).  The room was roomy with a small refrigerator and microwave.  In the late afternoon.early evening they had freshly baked cookies gratis. Parking was easy ($12 per night). The room was clean and well maintained and the front desk staff was helpful. The room rate was reasonable for the area - and with the free breakfast is especially nice if you have a family (probably save $25 if you ate breakfast out).  They have a business center with computers and wi-fi and printer which is free. The
Manager Response: none

Summary: A very clean location with a friendly and courteous staff.  The breakfast service area is spacious and clean. My family and Zi enjoyed the quality food served; on this day it was cheese omelette sand Kilbasa sausage.  I would recommend that they update the thermostats in the room for more efficient climate control.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We usually stay at Hampton Inns due to the consistent quality of the hotels.  Rooms are always clean and fresh.  There could be some improvements in the complimentary breakfast as the omelets were cold and tough. Other breakfast selections were good. We will continue to search out Hampton Inns as we travel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very Decent Place for Disneyland Access
Summary: I have to say that the Hampton Inns are my go-to place when traveling for business so it only makes sense to stay there while on vacation.  I would have preferred the Embassy Suites next door but by the time I booked, the prices were outrageous.  The Hampton Inn rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff rocked. The only area I would like to see improvement in the Hampton line is the breakfast. It is horrible.  I often complain to them that if they raise the price of the room by $3 they could greatly improve the breakfast.  Overall I recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the feedback and for taking the time to fill out a survey of your stay with u.  We will share your feedback on food and beverage with the Hilton and keep you up to date on any changes made. Thank you for staying with us and for the valued feedback, we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: I took a group of adults and high school students.  Check in was very efficient.  All of the rooms were very nice and it was great to start the day with the complimentary breakfast.  We had a great stay.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback. We really appreciate you staying with us and hope to see you again should the travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Room on 4th floor overlooking pool. Basic room but neat and tidy. No in room safe here which I was surprised at! Busy at breakfast time with lots of people in the smallish food area. Loads of restaurant chains close buy, if your first time USA visitors check out Bubba Gumps and The Cheesecake Factory. Back to the hotel, it's a good stay and ideally located.  Have stayed before and most defiantly will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We wills hare the review with the staff and keep you up to date on any property changes as we are expecting to go through a renovation in the upcoming year. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again should the travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: good hotel for family. good break fast.  will recommend. rate bit high....will good if they reduce the hotel room rate.......good front desk..very welcomming. reasonable parking rate. walkable distance to disney
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out a review of  your stay with us.  We will shar ethe rate concern with the management team and keep you up to date if we modify any rates for our traveling guests. Thank you so much for staying with us as we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: I used this hotel for a family get away to Disneyland.  The cost was better than the surrounding hotels of the same quality.  The shuttle service was easy to use and inexpensive compared to disneyland daily parking.  The provided internet was like home but i am a Hilton Honors Gold member so I did have free access to the premium internet.  Overall feel of the hotel was small, in that getting off the elevator and going to the last room doesn't feel like a never ending walk.  everything seems accessible and convenient.  The room was big and clean, all the amenities worked well and the housekeepers kept everything tidy. Front line workers handled all my questions fast and very professional.  I will be back to Disneyland and this is my goto spot for now on, point blank you can save
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great feedback and for staying with us while visiting the resort area of Garden Grove.   We love hearing feedback such as this as we share this with the entire staff. We truly appreciate you staying with us and hope to see you again int eh future.

Summary: The hotel was a real find in Anaheim.  It's value far exceeded the price.  The manager and all staff were friendly and welcoming.  The small touches were excellent, especially for the kids.  They enjoyed the crayons and coloring pages, the Disney movie in the lobby, the cookies, popcorn and lollipops - all of it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome feedback as we wills hare this with the staff. Hope to see you again should you be visiting the area in the future.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay and about a mile from Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights in August and the property has very large rooms for a Hampton Inn though the decor it is out of date for a Hampton Inn.  The breakfast area is huge with plenty of seating and is always being fully stocked.  There was also popcorn and cookies at the front desk every day.  The staff was very friendly and there is a Target across the street and a Walmart about 15 minutes away.   Lots of food choices in this area along with a popular Joe's ice cream store next door but not cheap.   If you have a car and are going to Disney I would recommend skipping the shuttle bus and just driving on your own.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great feedback and for filing out a review of your stay. We are due for a renovation and promise to keep you up to date if we hear of any news. Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: I don't like leaving negative reviews but...
Summary: This is the first time that I have walked into a hotel room and wanted to walk out just as fast. To say we were under impressed is an understatement.This Hampton is definitely not up to the standards that I am used to with other Hilton brands. While the lobby is bright and airy, I found the rooms were not. We arrived at our room and found it to be dark and dated. The stove was partially not working, the sofa was dirty and visibly worn and not comfortable for our family of four, also, I was wondering if there was a piece of furniture missing because there were impressions in the carpet that left evidence of perhaps a chair. My husband left to have our room changed, hoping for the best, I started looking into other hotels. We were given a different room, which was not better than
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We apologize for the experience you had staying with us and promise to rectify everything mentioned in your review. Our lobby was just completed in a renovation and our rooms are the next step. We promise to keep you up to date on any changes or dates that our announced.  We have shared this review with the management staff and food and beverage. We will make sure that our breakfast is up to the Hilton standard.  Thank you once gain for your feedbcak as this is how we learn and grow to improve our product. We hope you decide to give us a second chance in hopes we can win back your loyalty.

Summary Heading: Not fully up to Hampton Inn expectations and a $12/day parking charge not mentioned until final bill
Summary: We spent 2 days here at the end of an 11 day trip to the area to visit Disneyland and LEGOLAND. It was reasonably convenient for getting in to Los Angeles for a day and for getting to the Orange County airport for our flight home on the last day. It was attractively priced when we thought that parking was included. At the beginning of the trip we stayed at the Howard Johnson which was an easy walk to Disneyland. It was more expensive but a better choice for Disneyland.  The cleaning staff at the Hampton was not very thorough and the hotel itself shows its age. The breakfast buffet was fine and the managers were interacting with the customers and being helpful in getting items from the buffet. The front desk personnel was also very friendly. Finding out that there was a $12/day
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share this valued feedback with our staff  and bring to light everything that is mentioned in order to improve our overall product.  We hope this experience does not deter you from choosing our location in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: Everything was excellent about our stay at the Anaheim Hampton and that's why we keep coming back for our annual 3 day trip to Disneyland!  The 2 room suite was clean, the staff was friendly and the complementary breakfast was yummy!  We could even see the fireworks from our balcony!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share the great news with the staff and on behalf of all of us thank you for staying with us. We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: We love this hotel, the room was great, pool was fantastic, breakfast was good. We were upgraded to a suite which was so nice. We were just here for one night, but it was awesome.   The beds are incredibly comfortable and we wished we could have stayed longer.  Thanks Hampton Suites!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome feedback as we promise to share this with the entire staff. Thank you from all of us for staying with us and we hope to see you again next time you are in the area.

Summary: Great for families, close to restaurants and Disney.  Seems a little cheap to charge for parking. Shuttles to the park. The staff was very friendly and knew the area quite well.  They went above and beyond what they needed to supply us with information.  The room we had was great if I wanted to stay in and cook a meal.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share this experience with the staff and hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: We arrived here on a Thursday and checked in around 3. They upgraded us to a suite and also gave us a gift of a dozen chocolate covered strawberries and a park view so we could see the Disney fireworks from our balcony. Transportation from the hotel to the park and back was easy to use. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The staff was very friendly and happily answered any questions we had. The breakfast was good, and if you arrived in the dining area around 7 or so there wasn't many guests there yet and you didn't have to wait for anything. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review and great feedback. We love to hear experience like this as we promise to share this with the entire staff. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Beds are great, breakfast is ample and tasty, and the staff answers all the questions you ask about Disneyland and the surrounding area. Our rooms were quiet and blackout drapes made it possible to sleep in comfort. Location is good, too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome feedback and for filing out a review of your stay. We will share this review wit the the team and from all of us thank you for staying with us. We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Stayed here for 1 night and had a very pleasant experience. The rooms are huge and are great for families or couples.The staff is friendly and helpful. Also the shuttle to Disney is an added bonus and breakfast was really good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We really appreciate the great feedback and we promise to share this with our entire staff. From all of us thank you for choosing our location and we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Stayed here on 2 occasions for business travel.  Staff was helpful, food typical, clean accommodations.  My only complaint would be that the parking spots were VERY tight and I had a small car.  Lots of tourist in the area naturally.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback. We love to hear back from our guest who have stayed with us. We will share the review wit the staff and hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Nice hotel to stay near Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center.  The only thing I experience of the people next store were talking loud and you could hear the conversation from the walls.  No respect for others to sleep at 1:00 a.m. But the hotel was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. On behalf of the hotel we apologize for having to experience the loud noise during your stay. We always welcome any feedback whether that will be good or bad because its through the guests voice is how we can improve our overall product. We will share your experience with our staff and put in place better measures to see that our guests have a quiet stay every time. Thank you for filing out a review of your stay and we hope this experience does not hinder you from choosing our location in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: Very nice staff makes you feel welcome. Make your own waffles is a ways a hit for breakfast. Other food to choose from.  Staff does a great job of keeping it stocked and clean. Rooms are spacious. Near a lot of restaurant options. Can see the fireworks from Disneyland on the higher/odd #rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We really can't thank you enough for the wonderful review and thank you for staying with us. We will share this with the team and we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: I usually stay elsewhere in Anaheim, but had Hilton points so we stayed here for a recent 3 night Disney visit.  The front desk staff was very nice and helpful.  They have a pantry where you can buy food or amenities you might have forgot.  The room was a standard Hampton Inn room with enough room for 3 of us.  Bathroom and linen were clean and there were plenty of towels.  If you are a Hilton Hhonors member you get free wifi in the room.  There was a microwave and a fridge which we both used.  The breakfast has the standard Hampton Inn faire and was well stocked with plenty of seats.  Workers kept all the food loaded and ready to go.  The hotel offers a shuttle service to the Disney parks for $5 a person ($2 for kids) with a multi-day discount.  The shuttle services three
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review of your stay with us. We will share the great comments and feedback with the entire staff. We always enjoy hearing back from folks who have stayed with us. We will share you comments also with the housekeeping staff and make sure that all of our pillow are up to the Hilton standard. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Hampton the best place to stay!
Summary: We were welcome and treated as special guest. The daily breakfast was great! Fresh fruit, waffles, cereal, toast, eggs, sausage, coffee, & juice. The beds were very comfortable, tons on pillows to choose from. Big room!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback and for filing out a review of your stay with us. We truly appreciate the great words and will share this with the staff. Thank you from all of us for choosing our location as your home away from home. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This particular Hampton Inn (near Disneyworld) was one of the better experiences I've had at hotels in its price-point. Very helpful staff, and I even did my laundry in their guest laundry room.  The public space was also pleasantly decorated and had a good feel to it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback. We know most folks these days have a very busy schedule and often don't get time to lets us hear how the stay went. we really appreciate the kind feedback and for you choosing our location. We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: We have stayed at this property several times in the past few years and continue to be pleased with the accommodations.  It's not the most spectacular Hampton, but the rooms are clean and always quiet.  This time around, the breakfast area was a bit of a zoo, but judging from the lines at Disneyland, that was to be expected.  We have simple tastes for breakfast (yogurt, muffins), but my daughter always enjoys the waffles.  Customer service, as always, was excellent and the front desk staff is extremely cordial and courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. Also, thank you so much for being a return guest! we love to see repeat guests as they walk through our door. We will share the wonderful review with the entire staff and we all thank you for staying with us time and time again. We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: Though this, as all Hampton Inns, provides comfortable accommodations its Front Desk staff appears to be taken from the passed over selections for a hourly motel.  If you enjoy being condescended to during required interactions during a hotel stay then this is your place!  If you want an enjoyable experience with friendly staff go somewhere else...almost anywhere else.  Maybe even that hourly motel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We always appreciate the feedback whether it be good or bad as its through the guests experience that we can improve our overall product. on behalf of the hotel we apologize for the experience you had while staying at our hotel. We promise t reach out to the team and learn and grow from your experience, so that in turn we can improve our service and regain your loyalty should you decide to give us a second chance.

Summary: This hotel is not the newest property in the Anaheim / Disneyland area, but the excellent service and cleanliness makes this property an excellent location.  I was her on a business trip in the Anaheim area, although most visitors to this area in the summertime are in the area going to the Disneyland Resort.  The rooms are modern, all lights and fixtures are in good working order, as noted above, excellent customer service from all staff, and the property is extremely clean.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful comments and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We share the reviews always with the staff and it's always great to get wonderful feedback from folks who enjoyed their time here. Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to see you again should you travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Not that exciting of a stay...
Summary: Breakfast was the same everyday.  Cooked kielbasa.  The floor in the breakfast area should be cleaned more often.  Lots of waffle mix on the floor.  Yuck.   Parking area is shared by three hotels, so parking was not convenient.   If you call and ask why there is a parking fee, they'll tell you because the hotel is a "spa".  It's NOT a spa.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the feedback and for choosing our location to stay at while visiting the area. We always appreciate the feedback whether it would be good or bad as its through the guest experiences we can learn and grow to improve our product.  We will share your experience with the management staff and apologize for the experience you had when booking. We promise to keep you up to date on any changes to the property that occur and hope this experience does not deter you from choosing our location in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary Heading: Another great stay at this property
Summary: This was our second time staying at the Hampton Inn and Suites Garden Grove. For those who haven't been to Garden Grove, it is about  2 miles from Disneyland. We usually stay in this area when going to Disneyland, it is a nice location with a lot of solid hotel choices. We usually stay at a Hilton property, there are many in this area. Our visit to the Hampton Inn this trip was for 9 nights in May, staying in a suite. We had a great price on it for the time period.  One of the downsides of the Hampton Inn is that the Disneyland Express does not stop there. We were dropped off at the Hyatt, which was an unexpected walk. If you are taking the Disneyland Express, just be prepared for a 5 or so minute walk with luggage. It wasn't as big a deal on the way back, since we knew to set
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind and very nice review of your stay. We will share the comments with the management staff and keep you updated on any shuttle changes that occur. We thank you very much for choosing our location and for being a repeat guest. We hope to see you again when you decide to revisit the area.

Summary: We stayed here two nights and have stayed here on three different occasions. I still have not been disappointed.  Great rooms and a good breakfast. Hotel staff is always helpful. Great family hotel and has a toddler pool and regular pool. Shuttle service is great.
Manager Response: thank you for the awesome feedback from the review and for staying with us. We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: A person named Abigal S. helped when my son got burned during the complementary breakfast. The room was very fancy however it was slightly on the small side if you use the room to it's full potential all beds bunk beds and roll away bed.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback and for sharing your experience. We will share this with the entire team. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with plenty of tourists
Summary: The hotel was clean and the staff were friendly. There were many tourists (for Disney Land I assume) so the common breakfast area was very dirty and filled with people. Although following breakfast, it was promptly cleaned. This hotel isn't fancy, but it's well kept. They had a very nice gym which was much larger than most hotel gyms I've been to. The area surrounding the hotel wasn't too nice, but we were simply there for a conference so we didn't mind.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We appreciate the feedback and will share the experience will the staff.  We hope to see you again next time should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Checked out with a $300 a night bill....no room service, just room charges.  Not worth it.  This was my disappointment!  We were charged a $50.00 a night upgrade when the web site told me $40.00 a night upgrade.  Just felt ripped off.  I don't complain to staff, I just don't go back.
Manager Response: Thank you you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We appreciate the feedback because whether it will be  good or bad as this is how we improve our overall product. We will share your experience with the team and bring the review to light. We want to make sure our guest experience  is always satisfying and enjoyable. We will keep you up to date of any changes. Thank you for staying with us as we hope this doesn't hinder you from choosing our location in the future.

Summary Heading: Excellent Staff, nice location, needs a little up dating
Summary: We stayed here for a trip to California.  The check in was easy and we were placed in a room where we could see the fireworks  from Disney.  The beds were excellent.  Our AC was not working, BUT!!!!, after informing the front desk, maintenance arrived and literally, but in a new one.  After, cool sailing.   Breakfast was busy, however, just 1 block was CoCo's with a great breakfast deal.  Parking was a little tight.  However, the staff was always cleaning and it was good.  A little updating in decor, would set this place above the others.  Excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful comments and the great review. We apologize for the troubles you had with the AC however we are happy to hear it was rectify and fixed. Hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary: Moved here after a flood at another hotel.  So arrived a bit grumpy.  However staff on desk really good.  Rooms clean comfortable and quiet.  Wifi worked well.  Breakfast quite comprehensive and not too busy. Think we picked a quietiish Disney day.
Manager Response: Thank for the wonderful for review. We are always happy to accommodate our neighbors when they are having some maintenance issues. We are very happy to hear you enjoyed the rest of your stay and was able to have a great vacation. Hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: This hotel is one of the older ones of the chain. It is still in basically good shape, clean, friendly helpful staff, there were a lot off children there so the breakfast area tends to get crowded. The rooms are large and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review of your stay as we will share this with the entire staff. Thank you for choosing our location and we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: A good place for families and business travelers.
Summary: The hot breakfast has good things for adults and kids. The coffee is available all day long. Great staff in breakfast area. The suits need an update but that's the only negative. We had a suit and my brother had the connecting room next door. It was perfect or us. The ART shuttle picks you up a short walk to the embassy suits.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we promise to keep you up to date if we have any room renovations. Thank you for choosing our location while you visited the area and we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back.

Summary: I'm a Hilton Honors Gold Member & needed this property near our Hospital in Orange County. My husband had spine surgery. My husband just was discharged from the hospital & had a neck brace on. Mitchell @ the front desk(manager) was so... accomidating!!! I have stayed @ this location for Disneyland Park fun-this time a bit different circumstances. Mitchell let us have additional check out time... Really accomidating!! Mitchell asked how my husband was doing..so KIND!!! The breakfast is so plentiful @ this location & the servers are efficient!! The rooms were clean like I remember... Perfect!!!! Thank you so very much!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for wonderful comments as we will share this with the staff. We hope you were able to see the town a little even though you had different reasons for visiting us. We are very happy everything worked out for us and we truly hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the Anaheim/garden Grove Area.

Summary: While our room was very clean and comfortable, I was disappointed with the check in service.  The young lady at the front desk was not very welcoming, did not smile once, and did not have her name badge visible to guests.  She was put off that I questioned her about the extra fees the hotel holds on your checking account for using a debit visa card instead of a regular credit card.  Normally customer service is not a priority need for me, but I was quite surprised due to the fact that the Hampton Inn is usually my first choice when I am needing a hotel to stay at and have never experienced bad customer service prior to this time, that I can think of. On the final bill, I was very disappointed to see that they charged us an undisclosed "resort fee" on top of the room fee.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. On behalf of the hotel we apologize for the experience you had and will share your feedback with the entire staff. We look at every experience as a chance to learn and grow to improve our overall product. We hope this experience does not hinder you from choosing our location in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: We enjoyed the stay at this hotel. Stayed for 6 consecutive days. It was close to Disney parks within 5 min drive. Breakfast was very good and the rooms were clean. Would surely recommend this hotel to any looking for a descent hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and for a great review. We will share the comments with the staff as we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Stayed at this Hampton Inn Garden Grove location several times and it's always been pleasant and enjoyable. There are  plenty parking spaces directly in front, the staff are friendly and attentive, room was comfy and morning breakfast was an added delight.   The seating area in the hotel lobby is huge with plenty of tables and comfy chairs to accommodate 100 guests.  By the way, Disneyland is only 4 blocks.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the wonderful feedback and for filing out a review of your stay. We truly love the feedback as it helps greatly with future travelers to our area. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary: Best Staff and Hotel, they all go above and beyond to take care of you. The location to downtown Orange, Santa Anna and Anaheim make this hotel a great location.  I would recommend this hotel and staff if you are looking to have a great stay to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We always enjoy our guest who are frequent travelers of Hilton hotels and stay for a lengthy period of stay at our location.  We love to hear the feedback as we make a promise to share all your great tips/comments with the staff. We hope to see you again should your travels find you back in the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: I've stayed at this location multiple times.  The room is always clean and the staff is always friendly.  It is convenient to the freeways and has a shuttle service (pay) to Disneyland park area.  I will definitely stay at this location when I return to california
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!! We also hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area. Its always great to get feedback from a returning guest of ours. Thank you for choosing our location as we will share the review with the entire staff.

Summary: We stayed 7 nights in total- 5 in a suite and 2 in a two queen room. All of our rooms were clean, and everything worked. Breakfast variety was great, I don't remember anything we didn't like. The front desk had fruit infused ice water, crayons and Disney colouring pages, and even popcorn available on the last day of our stay.   The pool was nice and the pool area was clean. The water had a greenish tinge that was off putting to one member of my party, but it was clean and a comfortable temperature. The wading pool was a fantastic touch while travelling with three kids.   We used the Disneyland shuttle for an additional fee, less than parking at Disneyland. Shuttle service was prompt, the bud drivers willingly helped with our strollers and bags, and the buses were air
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great feedback. We will share the comments to the staff and bring to light everything you mentioned. We want to make sure everything is up to the Hilton standard.  Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We love the feedback as we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Stayed here for 3 days while in Disneyland. Overall, excellent stay.  Regular Hampton Inn. Clean, comfortable, decent breakfast.  Room was great.  Staff was very friendly.  Nice pool and spa.  Not close enough to Disneyland to walk in our opinion. Its possible though. But a short drive. Close to tons of restaurants. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful comments!!  We are very happy you enjoyed the whole area during your stay with us. We love feedback like this because we always share all the feedback with the staff. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel is a standard Hampton Inn, inside corridors, breakfast, pool, exercise room, etc. However, being close to Disneyland, there were more kids than any Hampton that I‚Äôve stayed at. Of course, it‚Äôs very close to Disneyland. A bus ($5 per day for adults with a discount for children) leaves the hotel every half hour and arrives at the park 10 to 15 minutes later depending on traffic. When we visit the parks, we like to get there early, take and afternoon break and go back for the evening shows. The bus made that easy to do. We‚Äôve stayed on site at Disney World (Florida) and it took us longer to get from the on site Disney World hotel to the park. Despite all the parents and kids, the hotel staff did a great job of keeping the breakfast bar full and the dining area clean. I
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback.  We will share the comments with the entire staff as we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the Garden Grove Area.

Summary: I spent one quick night at this hotel but is was a very enjoyable stay nonetheless. The lobby renovations are very nice, my night was quiet and comfortable and the breakfast in the morning was delicious despite the crowds most of the morning. Michael and Yessenia at the front desk went out of their way to make me feel incredibly welcome and answered the questions I had about the hotel and area. I look forward to returning to the hotel again after the room renovations are complete to enjoy yet another great visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful comments and for staying with us. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again should the travels bring you back to the Disney Area. Hope to see you again!!

Summary: Clean, free parking, complimentary breakfast, free internet access, quiet, convienent location for what I needed, friendly staff, available to assit w/any questions, had smiles on their face, warm & welcoming, bed comfortable, shower good!!!  Loved it!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great and wonderful feedback as we promise to share this with the staff. Thank you for choosing us as we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the Anaheim/Garden Grove resort Area.

Summary Heading: Midnight trip to get to Disneyland...
Summary: My son and I arrived at 330 in the morning to the Hampton Inn & Suites. Devin was very welcoming at this time in the morning and took care of us like we are family. The breakfast was great at the hotel decent. Breakfast time is busy but the staff at the hotel is very attentive and take care of everything. They were working diligently at this hotel, to please everybody you could tell, it showed and it is very much appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome feedback!!!!! We will share this with the entire staff and on behalf of the hotel thank you for choosing our location. Hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Close to Disneyland. It is a mile walk but shuttle is only $5 all day per person with unlimited trips. Shuttle comes frequently and on schedule. Rooms are very clean and well stocked daily. Great place to stay! Only issue we had was front desk person did not know how to sell Disney tickets even though there was a large sign saying buy Disney tickets here on front desk. She wound up putting $1800 5 times on our charge card which caused our credit card to be denied for fraudulent use. She then sent us next door to the Embassy Suites to get Disney tickets. The girl there left us call our credit card company and it was immediately cleared up.No biggie! Will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We apologize for the credit card issues experienced at our hotel. We promise to share this feedback with the Front Office staff and make sure we are up to the standard on our delivery to get folks the tickets they desire. We appreciate the feedback because its through these comments we can learn and grow as a team to improve our overall product.

Summary: Room was very comfortable and clean. Decent breakfast however staff needs to clean and refill the waffle area more as this hotel gets a lot of people and kids making waffles. Ran out of the waffle mix both days and mix all over the counter top.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful comments and feedback. We will share your concerns with the Kitchen team and work closely to make sure everything we do is up to the Hampton standard. We appreciate you staying with us and hope the experience does warrant a second visit so that we can have a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn overpriced as parking/shuttle extra
Summary: Beds comfortable.....NO exhaust fan in bath....not clean to my standards upon arrival. Internet was fine, complimentary breakfast was excellent and overall service was excellent. Great location to Disneyland but a bit far to walk but they charge for shuttle which was crowded during peak hours to and from the park. When you add parking and shuttle fees this hotel is around $200 per night which makes it an average value....
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your valued feedback. We will share your experience with the team. On behalf of the hotel we thank you for choosing our location and we promise to keep you up to date on any changes to the property. Hope to see you again should you find yourself in the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel May 25-28, 2015 with two teen girls.  Everything about the stay was perfect.  This hotel is close enough to the beach, tons of food choices, and walkable to Disney.  We slept well, and housekeeping was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a returned guest and for staying with us!! we will share the comments to our team and hope to see you next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Very nice breakfast, and free internet
Summary: Check in easy, room clean, very nice breakfast with many items and fresh fruit, and free internet - we were very satisfied with our stay.  A little too far to walk to Disneyland, but a $5 shuttle bus and the city bus ran on the street in front of the hotel, so transportation to Disneyland was not a problem.  Free parking for cars.  Had a swimming pool, but we did not use it.  Breakfast on the patio (when it wasn't raining) was very pleasant in the morning.  Free newspaper if you got there early enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback, we appreciated you being our guest and hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Myself, and daughters 19, 18(grad), and 9(birthday) stayed here May 24-29.  When we entered the staff was very friendly and welcoming.  Checkin went smoothly, and quickly we were in our 7th floor room which was very clean and comfortable.    Target is across the street and restraunts close by are great. We did run over to grab a few things we had forgotten. Ordered take out from Bucca de Beppos, which was right in the parking lot which was very delicious!  We bought shuttle passes for Disneyland at the front desk, the pickup is right in front of a neighboring hotel which was great.  We had a grocery delivery which I let the front desk know about and they sent them straight to my room when they arrived.  We had an early morning breakfast reservation which was before the shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback as we will share it with the entire staff. We really appreciate the feedback from our guest because this always shows us how we are viewed from our guest who stayed with us. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again should you travels bring you back to the Garden grove /Anaheim Area.

Summary: I can't speak for all the rooms, but room 306 has the worst musty ordor throughout the room. The smell seems to come from the bathroom but it resonates throughout the entire room. We 'lysoled' the room (including the carpet) and sprayed peppermint oil to mask the smell. We will not be staying at this hotel again and we will definetly be letting Hilton Honors know the condition thus property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay at our property. We always appreciate the feedback, whether it be good or bad because its through your experience we can learn and grow as a team. I know we spoke before, however on behalf of the hotel;  we apologize again for the experience. We have shared the comments to the General Manager and the Management team. We were able to get in the room and make sure everything is back up to the Hilton standard. Once again we do apologize and hope that one day you decide to give us a second chance, maybe then we can win back your loyalty.

Summary: The staff were welcoming upon arrival.  The room was just what you would expect from a Hampton property.  Everything was in good condition in the room. The dining room is quite large with many options for breakfast.  The hotel room was quiet however if you turn in early you may want to request a room on the opposite side of the hotel from the pool.  Folks were enjoying the pool until it closed each night.  Overall good experience at this property.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great comments and and for taking the tiem to fill out a review of your stay. We will share this with the entire staff and work on as whole better ways to suite our guest who turn in early if the pool noise turns out to be a tad but. Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Nice reception and breakfast area, and good staff.   Location excellent. Our one annoyance was having air conditioner beside bed - but thermostat essentially one room away.  Ended up useful as an ON/OFF switch only.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback on the review as we will look over that room and make sure everything is up to the Hilton standard. We really appreciate you staying with us and hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Staff, Great rooms, Lots of space in the Suite
Summary: We booked this hotel though our travel agent, with a West Jet flight and hotel package, and we were quite pleased with the hotel. The staff there are friendly and very accommodating.   Upon our arrival, my husband and I arrived with our 3 children early, around 11:30am. Check in isn't until 4pm I believe, immediately the front desk was able to find us a room and check us in early. Which was great, we had 3 very excited children wanting nothing more than to change into swim suits and go jump into the pool before a busy Disneyland filled week!   Our room was quite large, we had booked a suite that came with a Kitchen and separate living room. the room was great, comfortable beds, clean, and spacious. We were able to get the 7th floor. We found it quiet.. however wish it was facing
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great comments as we promise to share this with the staff. We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights, family of four, for a trip to Disneyland.  Overall this hotel was a great value. Room and bathroom was clean and the service was great and included acomplimentary full breakfast.  Pool and spa were clean.  Front desk personnel were polite and attentive.  I also always appreciate a noon checkout time vs an 11 am checkout time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Great Value, Quiet Stay - Will come again
Summary: We've been making the rounds in Anaheim/Garden Grove and we've found another great Hilton property at the Hampton Inn. We chose a 7th floor room because they tend to be quieter. This was a good choice as the only noise I heard was other guests talking in the hallway going to and from their rooms. I think it never hurts to remind people with a sign that there should be no talking in hallways as this disturbs other guests. The room was clean. No gunk in the corners or smudges on the walls. Our beds were very comfortable. The shower was a little light on pressure but the temperature remained constant (a plus in my book). Rooms come with a microwave, mini fridge and coffee maker. We never turned on the TV, used the pool or exercise room (standard hotel exercise room with free
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove resort area.

Summary Heading: Nice accommodations but needs customer service
Summary: Very nice rooms, spacious, just check balcony sliding door, we had one lock us out for a few hours.  They do have everything needed in kitchenette for cooking if you chose. Breakfast is good. Near to shopping and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your recent stay with us. We will share the comments with the staff and bring to light our service aspect. We will analyze everything that we can do for the guest and make sure we are up to the Hilton standard. Thank you for the feedback because its through this feedback we can learn and grow to improve our product. We hope to see you again should your travels send you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Lower your expectations and have a great stay!!
Summary: I really want to write a glowing review for this hotel, I really do.   I stayed here for three nights with my family while on business in the Anaheim area.   I picked this hotel mainly because my company booking site listed it as preferred.   It also seemed relatively close to Disney on the map.  It is also important to know that I stay at a lot of Hampton Inn's while on business travel as I am loyal to the Hilton brand and these hotels offer great value and great locations.  The staff at this hotel works hard given the heavy traffic of families visiting Disney.   There is no doubt this hotel serves A LOT of people, and it does so pretty well.      The good:   Breakfast was very good and the staff did a great job of keeping up with the demand.    There are lots of kids and lots
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with with us. We will share the feedback with the management team and make sure we get in that room, just to assure ourselves that its is up to the Hilton standard. We apologize for having to experience such as that however we promise to bring to light everything that is mentioned. We hope this does not deter you from choosing our location in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary Heading: Clean hotel at a great value
Summary: Location, cleanliness, breakfast and exercise facility all a true benefit to this hotel.  Staff was very accommodating and pleasant.  Although the hotel is busy with lots of family and kids it was a fun place to stay.  I would recommend it to those travelling to Disneyland or other surrounding parks.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for filing out a review of your stay with us. We will share all of the kind comments with the entire team as we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Came here on June 1st for business and pleasure. We had a suite, room 515. BIG rooms! Separate bedroom with a ceiling fan, which was a great plus! Big closet in bedroom too. Spacious bathroom, lots of counter space. Kitchenette with Medium size fridge, microwave, dishes, coffee maker, stove stop. Big kitchen table too would easily fit 4-5 adults. Good size balcony with 2 chairs and a small table. Very clean with the exception of the balcony, could use a good washing, but with the drought in CA right now, I can see why this isn't done regularly. Great water pressure in shower. Quiet rooms.  This particular room faces Disneyland Resort and at 9:30 pm, saw the great fireworks show from out balcony, that went on for about 15-20 minutes! Just beautiful! The breakfast spread was
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback on your review of your stay. We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: We are family of 9 pax and booked 2 suites and had a wonderul Hampton Experience in Anaheim for 4 nights.  We thought the transfer to the Disneyland was complimentary, but no so!  It is not within walking distance as shown in the map!  All fine otherwise!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We really appreciate the wonderful comments as we will share this with the staff. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: 1 Day trip to Disneyland for Memorial Day
Summary: This is was our first stay in this hotel, and I was not disappointed at all.  I am familiar with the shuttle situation as we have stayed in the same area before, and the parking fee of $12 is to be expected at hotels in this area.  Almost all of them charge for parking.  I like the fact that they open breakfast at 6, and not later like some other hotels.  I had no problems with this hotel and would have no problem going back there.  Unlike the hotel we stayed at in San Diego the night before, this hotel had great wifi.  The staff was very friendly and helpful and the room was perfectly good.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the valued feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share this with the staff as we look forward to seeing you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: I stayed here during a recent business trip. This was my first stay at this hotel. Overall, this was an excellent hotel. All areas were extremely clean. Very helpful, nice staff. Wonderful breakfast, excellent quality. The maid service was impeccable, I really felt that whomever was cleaning my room, really went above and beyond what was needed and took pride in their work.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome feedback!!! Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay and close to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is clean and the staff is first rate.  The complimentary breakfast was one of the best as far as number of items you could have.  I highly recommend the Hampton for couples or families.  Very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback as we will share this with the entire team. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: I decided to save some money seeing I was going to be here for five days. Big mistake in my opinion, not for business travelers at all. Spend the money, the Marriott and Hilton up the road a mile may cost twice as much but you get so much more for the money, including the ability to get a nights sleep. Too many transients here.
Manager Response: Thank you for filing out a review of your stay. We apologize for your experience you had at our hotels. We don't often hear experiences such as this however we will share the information with all the managers and make sure we address every concern mentioned. Thank you for staying with us and we Hope to see you again if you do choose to give us a second chance.

Summary: Welcoming staff, friendly and helpful!  We brought in sandwiches and forgot paper plates -  The front desk quickly accommodated us and gave us plates, napkins and utensils.  They suggested alternative besides Disneyland for day trips.  Looked like they enjoyed their jobs.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful comments as we will share this with the entire staff. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: This Hampton Inn is close to Disneyland, so expect a lot of families and children. I had a really bad day, so when I arrived, the friendliness and effiency of the staff was greatly appreciated. The property could stand a little freshening up, but it is
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments and hope all your days are better. We thank you for choosing our location and hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel as part of a school trip to Disneyland.  We had over 150 kids staying at this hotel and it was great for it's purpose.  The rooms were spacious, clean albeit a little tired.  I found the bed and linens to be extremely comfortable.  The sofa in the living area was a pullout, but there was something wrong with the sofa as it slanted downwards and once in the seat it was hard to get yourself out of it.  Like another reviewer said, it was 5-star service from the lobby to housekeeping to the breakfast staff.  My son was ill and they were so accommodating without question which made my life so much easier.  Since we were traveling as a family, having Buca Di Beppo across the parking lot was great and using the shuttle to Disneyland highly convenient as it's too
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments as we will share this with our team. We really appreciate hearing back from our guest who stay with us. We use it to refine and improve our product.  We hope to see you again next time you are in the area.

Summary: Stayed here because my child was playing with her school band in Disneyland. My husband and I had a very good experience. Our room was clean and the bed very comfortable. Breakfast buffet had enough selections. We went down to breakfast after all the kids had already left for Disneyland or else it would have been pretty busy. Good thing they serve breakfast from 6am to 10am. Like the fact that they sell Disney tickets at the reception desk and that there is a shuttle bus that leaves every half hour to drop you off at Disneyland but there is a fee of $5 a person for the shuttle. The hotel is located to nearby restaurants. For dinner, my husband and I just walked across the parking lot and ate Buca di Beppo. And for breakfast on our last day, walked a block on the main road, to
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback as we will share this with the entire staff. We really appreciate you staying with us and hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: My girlfriends and I have done an annual weekend trip for the Tinker Bell half marathon for the last 4 years. This hotel has been our go to for 2 of those trips. Our recent stay was awesome! The rooms were clean, breakfast was great and the hotel staff are always friendly and helpful. The housekeeping staff made sure to say a nice hello if we walked by. I know that doesn't seem like it would be a big deal, but its refreshing to be greeted and acknowledged. Everyone at the front desk was so nice too, especially Devon. That guy has so much personality and is so kind, he made our trip much more memorable. He was always working hard with a smile. It's nice to see someone take pride in their job and genuinly care about us, the hotel guests. Your front office staff deserves a big
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments as we hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: The $12 parking fee is unnecessary since rooms are  paid for. Hampton should consider removing this parking fee. We have stayed at nearby hotels, and there was no parking fee. The staff who maintained the breakfast area were courteous and friendly. There was mold in the bathroom in certain areas. Kitchen was clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your recent stay with us. We will share your comments with the Management team and keep you up to date on any changes. Thank you for your most valued feedback as we always use it to refine our operations. Thank you for staying with us as we hope that you give us a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary Heading: 5 star service but 3 star hotel in need for renovation
Summary: We stayed here for a trip to Disneyland and had a great experience with the staff who were all wonderful but the hotel is definitely in need of renovations.  There was a musty smell down the hallway and the rooms were old and some furniture's had stains the cushions.   Pros: Great staff who took care of upgrades for Hilton honors  members Where very pleasant when asked to change rooms and immediately took action Two queen beds in the room Very powerful shower was great water flow The suites were very roomy Neutrogena bath products  Cons: Odors in the hallway Stained furniture Beds were roomy but if one person move the other person move too Air conditioning wall unit which was very loud at night in the bedroom - turn on the heater and had a very bad smell as well as the wall unit
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We will share the experience with the staff and bring to light the feedback to help learn and grow to improve our product. We hope you decide to give us a second chance as we would love to win back your loyalty.

Summary: The Hampton Inn was wonderful! Close to Disneyland and the room was nice and clean. The linens were good & breakfast fantastic! Although paying for parking is a bummer...all & all thanks for a great night!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback and for staying with us. We will share your comments on the parking and keep you up to date if anything changes. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Pretty Good Hotel for the Price
Summary: My husband and I stayed here in mid-April during the Star Wars Celebration convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. We thought the staff did a great job of greeting you, whether you were coming in or heading out. The cleaning staff was also very friendly. The breakfast options varied, and there was quite a selection everyday. For what you pay, it's definitely worth the price. I would only say that the hotel is probably ready for a updates, but other than that, I wouldn't mind staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback and for staying with us. We wills hare the comments with the staff and hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the Anaheim/Garden Grove resort area.

Summary: Exceptional Front Desk Service. Clean room with comfortable beds. Enjoyed the complementary breakfast. Convenient location, especially if you are coming in to visit Disneyland and other local  attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review of your stay. We will share your feedback with the staff as we hope to see you again should the travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Nice hotel, wonderful staff, good complimentary breakfast, quiet rooms with views of Disneyland and the Anaheim skyline.   My family and I had a nice stay and would stay here again for the value and proximity to Disneyland and restaurants outside of the park.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful comments and for staying with us. We always appreciate hearing back from our guest who filled out a review of their recent stay. We will share this with the team and hope to see you again next time you are in the area.

Summary: I chose this hotel for my trip to Star Wars Celebration in April 2015. The service and the hotel facilities were great! The only downside is that it is a little further from the Convention Center than I thought. However, if you are staying for Disney, they offer a free shuttle! I cannot say enough about the staff! They are thoughtful and friendly. When a guest in our room suffered a knee injury, they offered the use of the hotel's wheelchair so that he would not miss a day at the convention.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful comments on your review of the stay. We are sorry to hear about having to use our wheel chair however at least you still enjoyed the convention in light of the event. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again if your travels find you back in the area.

Summary: Loved the suite we stayed in. Plenty of room and was able to watch the fireworks from our balcony. The staff was friendly and helpful. Cheaper than the other suite hotel in the same parking lot. I plan to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome comments as we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: First time staying at this property.  The staff interactions were very nice and they all made us feel welcomed.  The rooms were nice and clean and maintained.   The continental breakfast they served was good, but they could use a few more toasters, for the convenience of their guests and to avoid long lines for one toaster.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out a review of your recent stay with us. We always appreciate hearing back from our guest because this is how we learn and grow to improve our over all product. We appreciate the kind feedback and will share this with the team. We will reach out to the kitchen staff and make sure the toaster oven is up to the Hilton standard. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This was our second stay here at this Hampton Inn.   Once again, we were not disappointed!  We travel with a large group of disabled adults to Disneyland about twice a year.  This will now definitely be our hotel of choice.  Upon arrival all of our room keys were labeled and ready along with a complete rooming list.  This makes our job soooo much easier when we have that pre-made rooming list, let me tell youÔÅä‚Ä¶Knowledgeable and friendly staff‚Ä¶always smiling and ready with an answer to any of our questions or requests!  LOVED being on bottom floor..it sure made it easy for our clients to get to and from the breakfast area each day.  And what  a wonderful breakfast area with plenty of seating!  LOVE this hotel!  Special thanks to Lori Herrera for arranging our stay at this
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful comments and feedback as we promise to share this with the entire staff. We love having your group in house and look forward to seeing you next next year.

Summary: We stayed for 5 days and it was terrific. Alicia was the example of what customer service should be. There housekeepers even did funny things with my daughters suffer Disney toys making it even more magical. My daughter just got braces and the women who ran the kitchen cut up apples for her to take to the park in a ziplock bag. We visit Disneyland every year and normally stay at the Embassy behind this hotel, this time they had no room. It worked out better because I liked the low key Hampton better. Their suite had plenty of room for all four of us, much more space then what we normally get. We will be back. In this case the small things really matter and they got it right.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments as we will share this with the entire staff. We thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Great location, close to Disney :). Fast check-in, room was spotless and pretty good breakfast. Nice size rooms! The location is great a few eating places within a 2 minute walk. We frequent Disney a lot, this one of our first choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback and for staying with us as we hope to see you again next time you find your self in the area.

Summary: Although the distance from Disneyland and the continental breakfast made this an appealing choice, I wish I would've spent more to stay elsewhere. The beds were very uncomfortable and the breakfast was poor quality. I will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your recent stay at our property. we enjoy hearing back from our guest because good or bad its through your experience is how we learn and grow as a team to improve our overall product.    On behalf of the hotel we apologize for having to hear you had didn't enjoy your time while staying with us. We will have our team check out the room you were in and make sure it is up to the Hilton standard. Also, We will share this with the breakfast team and see if we can add any additional items or steps to make sure we are completely up to the Hilton standard of quality. We hope this experience does not stop you from choosing our location in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: Mattresses are not similar to other Hampton Inn that I have stayed in.  Parking lot is horrible and parking is scarce and tight.  Don't park a nice car there.  You will get door dings.  Don't stay there if you want a sound nights sleep.  It is extremely noisy due to the location.
