Summary: We stayed the night to be close to a company party held at the Disneyland Resort and glad we did.  The cab ride wasn't long, the property was pretty busy but well kept, the room was clean and the bed comfortable. Our 17 year old son was supposed to stay with us so we choose the King suite room which had a separate twin bed separated from the main bed area(very nice) the fitness center was well kept and the complimentary breakfast was very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments and for filing out a review of your stay. We hope to see you again next time you are back in town.

Summary: It was great. No complaints here. The staff was great. Location is good. I really liked complimentary coffee, tea and hot cocoa available in the lobby 24/7.  The breakfast had a variety of food. Front desk staff was very helpful. They provide with driving directions to the beaches and etc. Housekeeping was very accommodating. If we need to have the room cleaned during particular time, they would do that.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for the great feedback. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary Heading: Quiet, proficient, just all around excellent
Summary: We had a really great stay.  The room was quiet, clean and amenities were wonderful. We went with a class of band and choir members who were performing at Disney Land.  The complementary breakfast was outstanding.  The students and my husband and I were impressed with the quality and selection of food available for breakfast.  The coffee was totally outstanding.  I recommend anyone who wants to experience Disney do so by staying at the Hampton.
Manager Response: Again! Thank you for the wonderful feedback and the kind words. We hope all of our fellow TripAdvisor folks find all that is mentioned useful and have the similar experiences. We truly are grateful for having you stay with us and hope to see you again next time you are in the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: The staff was very friendly, professional, helpful. We were going through a tough time as we were in town for a funeral of a family member. The front desk crew had us smiling ever time we came back! The breakfast was great and again the staff very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments and for filing out a review of your stay. We will share the feedback with the staff and hope to see you again next time you are in the area. Hopefully, under better circumstances and a chance to enjoy the Resort. Thank you once again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: A Great Hampton Inn Near Disneyland
Summary: Our 11-day stay at the Hampton Inn, Garden Grove/Anaheim was worth celebrating.  From the moment you arrive, you notice that location is important.  With a traffic light to enter/exit the hotel complex, it's safe and easy; many "near Disneyland" hotels can't claim that.  Being 10 minutes from Disneyland means you spend less of your precious vacation time in transport and traffic.  Once inside the Hampton Inn, we were greeted by a smiling, welcoming staff.  It felt like a friendly neighborhood.  That's comforting because if any questions or problems should arise, you see a staff dedicated to making your stay exemplary.  This includes the pleasure of seeing people whose kindnesses and help and we always appreciate as they earn our return visit year after year!  The lobby is
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review of your stay with us, We will share the feedback with the entire staff and hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Resort Area.

Summary: Close to Disneyland. Inexpensive shuttle service to and from the park with great hours.  The breakfast is great with a wide selection of food choices.  Only issues were with the beds/pillows but that is personal preference on my part.  Would definitely stay here again if I was unable to stay on property.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback and for filing out a review of your stay, We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: While attending the Religious Education Congress in Anaheim, CA, our group chose the Hampton Inn and Suites.  We have  been returning now for the past seven years, because we have declared the the Hampton is the BEST CHOICE.  Service and facilities and the best!  One morning while running a bit late, we were given a "to go bag".  What service indeed!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome comments and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We always hear folks really enjoy having those "to go " bags as they are running out the door. Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: My wife and I had an excellent stay at this Hampton. We were allowed to check in early because the desk clerk checked if a room was available while we were having casual conversation. She anticipated our needs which made the stay effortless. I even saw complimentary snack bags at the counter for guests that could not stop to eat the free breakfast buffet. Very smart!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback and for staying with us. We will share the comments with the staff. we are very happy to hear we were able to accommodate your needs for an early check in. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Spent six days here during our Disneyland trip.  Staff very good, never came back in the evening without being greated. Rooms were clean, beds comfy & good linens.  Morning breakfast was decent quality & everything served at the appropriate temperature.  Again the staff was very friendly & eager to help. The walk to Disneyland is a bit of a hike, not the 15 minutes as advertised but around 25 so with little ones it might be too long, but they do have a shuttle that goes about every 15 minutes. A very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the wonderful feedback and for staying with us. We will share the review of your stay with the entire staff. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove resort area.

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful, the room was clean, orderly and quiet.  The food for morning breakfast had variety.  I loved that there was ice cold fruit/cucumber infused water available in the lobby.  The pool and hot tub were clean and inviting.  I had a great stay and would recommend this hotel for meeting and exceeding all one's basic requirements for a clean and comfortable stay.
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire staff thank you for the kind feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We love to hear back from our guest and we hope to see you again if your travels find you in the area again.

Summary: I was really happy with our stay at this hotel! Really!  I had a few business trips to neighboring hotels in the past few weeks, and this was by far, a much better experience, a much better room and a much better hotel than the ones I had just stayed at.  I will stay at this hotel again!  This trip was for pleasure.  I took my 13 year old son to Disneyland.  We didn't have time to check out the pool, but he was very happy with the tv and internet service.  We both thought the beds were extremely comfortable.  The room was clean and modern.  I was especially pleased with the quality of the breakfast! At first I was hesitant to book this hotel, because it is not within a reasonable walking distance to Disneyland. So I appreciated the affordable shuttle service to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great feedback from the review and we are very happy you enjoyed your stay. We will share this with the entire staff. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove resort area.

Summary: Relatively quiet facility; good buffet breakfast.  Room not as clean as I prefer.  Some garbage left on floor from previous guest, but not cleaned, behind mattress.  Shower head could not be adjusted.  At early a.m. check-out had trouble locating the front reception staff.  He was sleeping in back room.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to fill out a review regarding your recent stay with us. On behalf of our entire staff here at the Hampton Inn & Suites, we apologize for the concerns you have about your experience at this hotel. We hope you are not deterred from choosing our location in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary Heading: OK for business traveler, not so sure for vacationing family.
Summary: The hotel is a pretty standard Hampton Inn, which is fine.  It is starting to show some signs of wear and tear, but nothing crazy. But when you look at the surrounding properties, and the additional building of hotels that is going on, it is not exactly going to be the brightest star on the road.  Newer, nicer, places may well be available for the same dollar.  I think they run the risk of falling behind the competition that surrounds them.  The room itself is fine.  I was a single in a room with two beds.  I had plenty of room.  In particular the desk/workspace is well designed; large flat surface, plenty of light, outlets to recharge devices, and a comfortable work chair.  Everything was clean.  The bed was wonderfully comfortable.  But the towels were a bit on the economy end
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We appreciate the kind feedback and we truly value hearing back from our guest who stay with us.  We have recently had our lobby renovated as the rooms are next on our list to renovate. We promise to keep you up to date on any changes that come to the property in the near future. We will of course share this feedback with the management team and we hope that we see you again next time you may be visiting the resort area.

Summary: Great hotel for our Disneyland vacation.  The hotel lobby has a fun hip vibe with a great complimentary breakfast daily.  Great way to start the busy day.  The front desk staff were friendly and super helpful.  Our room was great with modern furnishings.  We could even see the fireworks at Disneyland from our room.  There is a very reasonably price shuttle service between the hotel and Disneyland which we found convenient. The hotel is also one block from Target which is great for picking up anything you might have forgotten.  We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback!!!  We really appreciate hearing from our guest who stay with us. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay , while attending the parks near the hotel. We will share this review with the staff and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The Hampton Inn was a comfortable place to lay our heads in between long days at the park.  It was affordable and conveniently located.  There is a shuttle service that picks up passengers in the complex and takes visitors directly to Disneyland without making any other stops.  The cost is $5/per person per day with discounted rates for a multiple day pass.  When I am spending so much money at the amusement parks, I appreciate the complimentary breakfast at the hotel so we all start the day with a good breakfast.  The Hampton Inn served a comprehensive breakfast with many different choices that satisfied everyone in our group.  The food was warm, the dining room was clean, and there was ample seating.  This makes an excellent choice for your Disneyland vacation if you are
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and for filing out a review of your stay with us. We really appreciate the great knowledge you passed down to fellow travelers. We hope to see you again next time you may find yourself in the area.

Summary: Very friendly, clean hotel.  Staff accommodated our special needs as soon as possible.  Great breakfast! The shuttle works well for getting back and forth, but it seemed like the stop at Disneyland was farther away from the main gate.  Age, maybe?  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback from your stay with us. We will share this with the entire staff. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: This hotel could not have worked out any better. We drove up early on a Thursday morning to go to Disney & CA on Th and Fri. We were staying here on Th night. Of course our room was not going to be ready for check in at 7:30am in the morning, but they still let us park, invited us to have breakfast and let us purchase our shuttle tickets to get over to the park for opening. At the end of a long and exhausting day in the park with two passed out toddlers, the check in was quick and efficient. We crashed, woke up and did it all over the next morning.  The facilities were great. They had a convenience shop for any snacks or toiletries you might need. The seating for the breakfast was extensive and beautiful. The food was the best complimentary breakfast bar I have ever seen. Waffle
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback, as we promise to share this with the entire staff. Thank you from all of us for staying with us and we hope for you to join us again in the future.

Summary: The room was large and had a microwave and frig. Windows that open!!  Clientele is a mix of Disney visiting family and business people.  The elevators were slow.  Lots of kids and their usual noises, heard crying, running feet and kid's laughter.  (and this was midweek)  Nothing remarkable about the hotel, check in went quickly, room was as promised.  You can walk to many restaurants.  Breakfast was very good, wide variety of fruit, baked goods, waffles, eggs and bacon. There was truly something for everyone.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of our hotel. We really appreciate hearing back form our guest who stayed with us. You included great feedback and we love hearing our guest will stay here again. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Spent 5 nights here while attending a conference. Shortly after checking in the refrigerator in my room started a defrost cycle and water was dripping inside and eventually onto the rug. Called the front desk and they responded promptly by removing the ice and wiping up the mess. Power outlets on desk lamp didn't work and asked that to be looked into but no action was taken by staff. Some of the furniture could be refreshed as there is " goop" stuck on desk and bathroom vanity that won't come off. Bed was comfortable. There was a microwave in the room that I didn't use. All in all an average property that is near restaurants and other hotels with bars.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback for filing out a review of your stay. We will share this with the management staff and keep you update don any changes. We are scheduled for a renovation and will also keep you updated on that as well. We are very sorry to hear your experiences during your stay with us and hope you decide to give us a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: I stayed 4 nights here to attend a trade show at the convention center. The room was comfortable , service good. The hotel was a pleasant walk from the convention center and close to a few restaurants. The price was quite reasonable. The free breakfast was decent on most days but could be improved.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback as we will share this with the staff. We will keep you up to date if we expand or change our offered on the house breakfast.  Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Multigeneration family weekend adventure to Disneyland. Staff at check in was helpful and we bought the shuttle passes to Disneyland - on time arrival and departure, great service. Breakfast was really good for a hotel complimentary breakfast - plentiful choices for grandparents, vegetarian daughter, 5 year old son, etc. Room was good, we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Awesome feedback!! Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My husband and I had the chance to go to Anaheim for the President's Day weekend, and our usual location to stay was booked.  We have stayed at other Hampton Inns in California, so I was good with booking at the Garden Grove location.  We had no trouble checking in, and we found our room clean and with a view towards Disneyland.  When I noticed that the bed had down pillows, the front desk was very accommodating and we were given hypo-allergenic pillows within 20 minutes.  The full breakfast was good, and the trays were kept full.  The proximity to Disneyland is great, and when we came back at night, we were thrilled to have a great view of the fireworks show.    I recommend this location: you get a good breakfast, close to Disneyland (a shuttle is available) and close to
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the kind feedback as we will share this with the whole staff. Thank you from all of us for making this your home away from home.

Summary: friendly and helpful staff. check in and out fast and efficient. bed clean and soft, carpet felt dirty barefoot. breakfast average. half of water in tub faucet goes up to shower head.  location ok. parking ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review of your stay. We wills hare the review with the staff and keep you updated on any changes to the property that occur.

Summary: Our family visits Disneyland often and always choose to stay at this Hampton Inn.  The service is excellent, we love the breakfast options, and the staff is very accommodating.  They have all the info you might need about the Disney parks, and a shuttle service that transports you to and from the park all day!  We love staying here!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback and for staying with us. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located near Disneyland. You can get a shuttle bus from the hotel to the park and purchase tickets for the park from the hotel. The rooms are generously sized with a full kitchen and plenty of separation for families. While there is only one bathroom, the bathroom is a good size. The continental breakfast was varied and good. There are plenty of food options nearby too for other meals. We experienced a clogged toliet the morning of our departure. It was not able to be fixed before we left which meant some in our party could not shower. We mentioned this issue to the front desk on our way out and they comped our room for the night. The front desk staff said they wanted us to be "100% satisifed." We were not expecting this response and were very
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback and for the awesome comments. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Decent hotel but overdue for refresh
Summary: Stayed here for 8 nights in January for a convention.  Have stayed in several different area hotels over the years, first time in this particular one.  As usual Hampton Inn fitness center and breakfast are OK, in fact that fitness center is one of the nicer and large ones I've seen in a Hampton Inn.  But, rooms are overdue for a refresh as is the lobby, which are not up to the newer Hampton Inn quality standards.  Hotel is clean enough and staff is very nice, WIFI is free and works well.  Really my own beef is that the rooms need a bit of a refurbishment to bring them up to "normal" Hampton Inn design standards.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and for filling out a review of your stay. We are due for a room renovation and will keep you up to date on any changes. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Happy place to be and perfect for a family or a long term stay for us as a couple attending a conference with the 2 room suite including full kitchen. Yes it has a cooktop as well, with full sized frig, pots and pans, and the works!! Surprise!! We were a half mile from Anaheim convention center and a couple more from Disney World. We walked mostly and enjoyed sunny California. Super friendly staff, and great complimentary breakfast!! Was super comfortable, and fun to be here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome feedback!!! We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area,

Summary: My family and I loved everything about this hotel.  At the start of our trip our flight was unexpectedly delayed and we were stuck in another city while we waited for our airline to rebook us.  This meant we would be arriving to the hotel one day later than our reservation indicated.  When I called the Hampton Inn to explain the situation they immediately modified our reservation and we didn't have to pay for that first night.  That is great customer service.  The hotel is close enough to Disney Land that you can walk, or they also offer a shuttle service.  We had a room on the 7th floor and it was very quiet.    I think the best part about this hotel is the breakfast.  It's a huge help to have free breakfast every morning. The food offerings are substantial-  waffles, sausage,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback as we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Good stay at a fair price
Summary: Enjoyed a 4 night stay here for a convention recently. Hotel is very clean and comfortable. Staff was courteous and efficient. No major problems and the daily maid service was excellent. Good location near several great restaurants and not too far from the Convention Center and Disneyland. Linens were fresh, two TV's, small fridge and microwave were great to have. Internet service and the free breakfast were acceptable.   Room included a small nook area with a day bed, beanbag and separate TV which is good for kids.   Only a couple of minor complaints... windows needed cleaning. Also I wish there was a screen on the window as sometimes I prefer to sleep with the window slightly open and without the AC on as the cold AC air can sometimes make me get sick in a small room. It's
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We really appreciate the kind comments and hope to see you again next time you are in the area.

Summary: For its location so close to Disneyland, it definitely is an outstanding price/value performance.  And the complementary breakfast is great because it is not just a continental one but a full buffet breakfast with eggs/sausage/fruits etc.  The room with two queen beds is perfect for a family of 4.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review of your stay. We really appreciated having you in house and look forward to see you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for one night on our recent CA trip as we had an early flight out of John Wayne airport, nearby.  What a nice room! We got a 1 BR suite(?) and it was SOO nice.  The BR had 2 queen beds and was so big you probably could have put 2 more rollaways in there...(or portable cribs). In the living room was a pull-out couch and a full kitchen.  Nice TV's in each room.  Everything was very clean, and quiet.   We left so early the breakfast wasn't set up yet, and they didn't have any "breakfast bags" ready, but the staff did give us a handful of granola bars.  Would definitely consider staying here if I were going to nearby Disneyland. It was super affordable, I think we paid like $134.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and for being so kind. Hopefully next time you are in town we will see you again.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Experience, Will Use Again
Summary: Great experience at this hotel and the value was excellent compared to other hotels in the area with an included breakfast.  Will be using this hotel again next time we go to Disney.  Close enough to the park to make it worth while staying there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of your stay. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: I took my daughter and two grandchildren to this hotel while visiting Disneyland and had a great stay!  The hotel was clean and well maintained.  The beds were very comfortable.  The hot breakfast that was included was excellent.  They provided many choices of hot and cold items in a large area that was easy to access.  I also loved that it was within walking distance to Disneyland.  The only problem we had was that there was a marathon the morning we went to the park, so the shuttle wasn't able to get out.  We weren't told this the previous day when I purchased shuttle tickets, so didn't know.  Since we were all ready to go, we walked.    There was also not a shuttle available at the time we wanted to return to the hotel as they only run every 30 minutes.  Since we didn't use
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and for staying with us. We hop to see you next time you are visiting the Garden Grove Area.

Summary: This hotel met all my expectations! BedRoom and bathroom are quite nice, breakfast is great and wifi is always good. Gym is very good for a hotel fitness room. Most importantly, They have very nice employees all around, everyone is always similing to you. Special thanks to Darnell and Salisu, these guys are great !!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Possibly the best hotel on the "strip"
Summary: So we stayed here for New Years for 3 nights. i got an amazing price for the time of year and simply had to book it. The reviews i read were all pretty positive so i didn't feel too nervous about staying here. I have had some pretty TERRIBLE experiences at other motels nearby and came to the conclusion that sleeping in my car was the only safe bet.  Arrival: We arrived around 12:30pm since we left our house in Northern Cali around 4am. I was afraid we would have to wait a couple hours to check in which would've been fine since they have an amazing lobby with tons of comfy and new seats and about3 flat screens, however, they had a room available for us right away which was amazing considering the time of year. The lady that checked us in was very friendly and surprisingly social
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback as we will share it with the staff. Hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Garden Grove/Anaheim Area

Summary: I was going to give this hotel a 3 but decided to go back to my original idea of a 4. You can hear people in the hall, but there are few hotels I've stayed at in which you cannot. We could hear people playing in the outdoor pool, but I knew it wouldn't last all night long.   When I checked in, they pointed out all their amenities and let me know about the free breakfast (6-10am). They also asked if I wanted a wake-up call. I refused but got one anyway (not from the hotel). Apparently the Star Wars marathon was running on Harbor Blvd. There were screaming teenage girls and a band blaring in the parking lot at 5:30am. I tried calling the front desk, but it was busy (probably from every other guest calling to complain). I used my mobile phone to call the front desk, and he informed
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and we really apologize for the noise. The band was their to cheer the runners for the marathon going on. We don't know why they decided to set up shop around are hotel however we thank you for being able to still enjoy your stay. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This is a good hotel for visiting the parks since it's not too far to drive, walk, or shuttle.   Parking spaces are tight and can get a little tricky if coming back late at night. Hampton shares a lot with Buca, Embassy, and sometimes Garden Inn so it fills up quickly. We haven't walked yet but it's a 15-20 min walk from the hotel. We've done the shuttle in the past and found it easy.   Recently the lobby has been updated and it's really nice, before they had limited breakfast space and now they opened it up so there's plenty of space. The front desk is friendly but we only interacted at check in.   The rooms are clean and comfortable. Simple decor nothing elegant but all we needed. Beds were also comfortable although I don't like the ruffle feeling on the duvet but that's
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and for the review. We always appreciate hearing back from the guest who stay with us. Hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary: Very good place to stay if visiting Disneyland. Shuttle bus (nominal fee) was great- you can ride as many times in one day as needed. Good breakfast at hotel with lots of variety. We had adjacent rooms (DBL Queen next to King Suite) which was very convenient for our family. Ask for rooms facing Disneyland to see the fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review and for staying with us. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Excellent Hotel, reasonable rates, GREAT FOOD for breakfast, perfect for families going to Disneyland, shuttle service every 1/2 hr to Disneyland, hotel staff is friendly & kind, cookies & popcorn at night.  This is our fourth time staying here.  We come every January for a convention.
Manager Response: Great comments!! thank you for taking the time to fill out a review.

Summary: We enjoyed staying here for a Disneyland visit but the rooms are in need of renovation.  The carpeting and other fixtures in the rooms and hallways seem more worn-out than the last time we were here a year ago.  The fridge was leaking water onto the carpeting of our room which caused a bad odor in the room when we first arrived.  Hotel maintenance personnel fixed the problem promptly and the odor dissipated within 24 hours.  We were on the north side of the building where unfortunately the garbage cans are located.  Why do all hotels schedule their garbage pick-up at 4-6 am??  You'd think they would care enough to schedule garbage pick-up during mid-day, but I guess they don't care if we get awakened.    On the positive side, the breakfast is good, the Disneyland shuttle service
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and for filling out a review of your stay. We will share the comments with the management team and make sure everything is brought to the correct managers attention. We are due for a room upgrade soon and will keep you updated when that takes place. Thank you for staying with us as we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful.  We absolutely loved the hot breakfast which was one of the selling points for us.  There was an excellent food selection and it was very convenient.  The shuttle bus to and from the Disney Parks was another big reason for our choice.  Shuttle times were every half hour and dropped us off and picked us up only a two minute walk from the entry gates to the Parks, better than walking from the hotels close enough to walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback as we look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Nice hotel. The breakfast was a great feature, and items were changed up a bit each day of our stay. Shuttle service was a nice feature, very convenient and it was only shared with the two other Hilton properties in the area. Hotel is clean but a bit outdated. Needs updating and removal of popcorn ceilings. Overall a good stay and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and for staying with us. We are due to be renovated int he rooms area and will keep you updated on any changes. Thank you once again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: This Hampton Inn did not meet our expectations
Summary: When we travel, we often stay at Hampton Inn as it is reliable and predictable.  Free wifi and breakfast.  We stayed here for three nights around Christmas.  We arrived late at night after driving down from the Bay Area.  I walked up to the front desk and was ignored by the front desk person for at least 15 seconds when I finally said excuse me.  He was too busy looking at his phone.  I had already check in online so all he had to do was get my name and hand me my key which he did.  No welcome to the hotel.  No thanks for being a Hilton Honors member.   The room was not quiet. We could here noise from the other rooms.  The room and bathroom need an upgrade.  Everything is worn out. The hotel needs to check the towel service.  One of our towels looked like it had been used to
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to complete a review regarding your recent stay with us. On behalf of our entire staff here at the Hampton Inn & Suites, we apologize for the concerns you have about your experience at this hotel. We appreciate the feedback and we will use it to refine our operations in the hope that upon your next visit, we will meet and exceed your expectations.

Summary: Had a wonderful stay for my girls 7th birthday trip to Disneyland.  The staff was excellent and friendly.  Upon check in we asked for a room on 1st floor and they gave us a pool front view and we had access to the pool from our room.  there was a wadding pool a regular pool and a spa, which was perfect for two of my non solo swimmers.  That was amazing and my kids LOVED it!  the breakfast staff was wonderful and stayed on top of things.  when the fridge did not work they promptly changed it out right away!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback, hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Staff was very friendly, professional and knowledgeable. Room was fresh and clean. Great Breakfast!!! Close to Disney and shopping centers. Good Wi Fi. Will definitely come back and recommend to family and friends. Five Stars!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Good place, reasonable with free breakfast
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights recently. Definitely a 'good-value' hotel. The breakfast is hot and ready to go at 6-10 am daily. Enough variety to keep you for a few days. Staff were friendly. I agree with several comments here about the necessary updates.   We've stayed at other nearby properties and none offered the same value as the Hampton Inn. We'll be back if we're ever on a 'budget-mood' again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and we will keep you updated on any changes being made to the property. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Very comfortable hotel for families, close to Disneyland. Rooms were very large and clean, beds comfortable, staff nice and friendly, breakfast decent. There are a lot restaurants also around, so we had good eating options for the kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and for filling out a review of your stay. Hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary: The staff was exceptional.  Thank you for all your kindness and support and service.  We were so pleased and enjoyed a very comfortable stay.  The breakfast was ok - not great, but the staff more than made up for it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback as we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: We  travelled as a group of 7 and stayed here for 4 nights.  After a long flight from Australia, we were very pleased to be able to check in 3 hours early to our two spacious rooms. We found everything, including the breakfast, to the usual Hampton standard, however the wifi was flaky at times and we frequently had to reconnect.  The gym was excellent and larger than others we have come across.  As usual when travelling in the US, our group never had any problems getting on the equipment.  The outdoor pool and spa were also still usable even though it was late November.  Unlike just about everyone else, we were not here to do the Disney thing but to use Anaheim as a base for other activities such as Huntington beach, the outlets at Orange, and Knott Berry Farm.  The Hampton was
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable while staying with us. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Garden Grove area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations.

Summary: I travel a lot for work, and typically stay at higher level properties. Those were booked due to a city-wide, so I stayed here. I was shocked. Rooms were so clean. Comforter's changed between guests. Staff super friendly. Breakfast was as expected, but considering the price, pretty good. Wifi speed was good. Even with a lot of kids, it was quiet enough to work in the room and lobby. Restaurants are walking distance and some deliver. Less than a mile from the Convention Center. Always (1) seda-taxi available for transfers and Uber readily available (2-3 min). I plan high-end events for a living, so I am picky. Seriously blew me away! It is not a Ritz, but for $145/night with breakfast and wifi...Can't beat it. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review, we promise to share it with the staff. Hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary: This Hampton Inn is not a BAD hotel, just not what I have come to expect from this chain compared to its locations across the country. It could use a facelift in the public spaces, update the lobby, put new drains in the tubs, put in new carpet. It's just a tired property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on the review of your stay. We have renovated the Lobby however we are due on a room renovation. We are scheduled for that in 2015. We promise to keep you updated on the status of all the new events coming. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary: Stayed for one night.  LIKES: Huge room (bigger than my first apartment) Effective HVAC system Ceiling fan in bedroom Stellar bathroom lighting, with good counter space Full kitchenette 2 televisions Courteous staff at front desk Computer desk **Outlets on nightstand to charge your phone (great when used as your alarm) Clean property  DISLIKES: (minor) Toilet had not been cleaned well Lighting in living room and kitchenette is poor 15 minutes to airport but no shuttle  SUMMARY: Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback on your stay. We always use all the feedback to refine our operations and will keep you up to date if anything changes. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We chose this hotel solely based on availability & price as we needed something between Long Beach & San Diego. Honestly, I think we were the only ones there that had no idea we were just down the street from Disneyland! Every single person on the staff gave us the nicest smiles. This really impressed us as I work at a world class resort and am always aware of the public relations in a business. The room (double beds) was very comfortable. The breakfast was well stocked with a great variety available from 6-10 a.m. We enjoyed eating out on the patio.  We walked to Disney & back. For a leisurely stroll, I recommend this. Probably about 45 minutes but we also went in enough to get brochures & schedules. One could also just walk into Downtown Disney for fun. I would not recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for all the kind and great comments as we hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the area.

Summary: First impression, turn around. It was raining today, something the locals don't see much of. Around dark the vacationers returning early from Disney swarmed, having fun but a lot of noise. Wet floor signs and towels, stacks of towels some clean some wet all over the public spaces, from the attempt to keep the floors dry. Great friendly staff. Lots of kids and rain means the wifi was overloaded!
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and for staying with us. We hope the rain did not ruin the stay as we always do our best to make sure everybody leaves 100% satisfied. We hope you decide to gives us a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at this hotel during Thanksgiving week. It is a very good hotel. We stayed four nights. Check-in and check-out were seamless. We had absolutely no problems. The room was very nice. The decor could be updated a bit. And, we loved the full, hot breakfast. It was great because the food offered changed each day. And, it was fresh. But, I would highly recommend it. In fact, we will be staying there again in January for the runDisney Stars Wars half marathon.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind and great feedback. We always love our guest visiting on special holidays. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We came down to Anaheim for a group visit to Disneyland‚Ä¶there were 28 people in our group, with 20 of them being disabled adults.  The Hampton Inn of Garden Grove made our stay run extremely smooth!  We arrived ahead of schedule and all but one of our rooms were ready, and by the time we got everyone else to their rooms, the other one was ready!  When the staff and I arrived in our room there was a very pleasant surprise of a welcome basket of goodies!  So thoughtful after a long journey down‚Ä¶great selection of snacks in the basket along with a card addressed to us personally, very nice touch!  We also always come with buses and there was ample FREE parking in the back of the hotel..we never had an issue trying to find parking which is a huge relief for our group!  The free
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback as we will share it with the staff. We always love to hear feedback good or bad. Hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: We were on honeymoon and decided staying in Anaheim because it's where Disneyland is. We loved Hampton Inn. It's near to Disneyland and most of the good stores. Also have helpful staff and the room is great!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you!! and congrats on the celebration. Hope to see you again next time you are visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: The staff here went out of their way to make us comfortable and feel special. The room was very clean and quiet with all the amenities we needed. Wireless was great. This hotel had everything we needed and more. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback as we will share it with the staff. Hope to see you again next time you visiting the area.

Summary: Shuttle service was fantastic and inexpensive with   friendly and helpful drivers. Breakfast was a good variety for all family members. Clean rooms and helpful staff.  We would have no problem staying here again for our next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback and we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel over T'giving weekend. Perhaps it was our specific room, but this hotel needs total remodel. Lobby area looks like it was last redone many years ago. Our room smelled when we arrived there. Put air on to try to get rid of it. Here's a list of our observations....carpet ripped at bathrm door, no ventilating fan in bathrm, towels and sheets very worn, window filthy, not enough elec. outlets for chg phones,etc, swing arm safety lock doesn't work....on the positive side, they accomodated our early check-in, breakfast pretty good, employees quite friendly...wouldn't stay here again...too many other options around the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback as we always use it to refine our operations. We are due for a renovation and will see one coming up in the near future. We will keep you updated on the progress. Thank you for staying with us.  We hope to given a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary Heading: Good value, good location, family-friendly hotel
Summary: This is a very good value hotel. It's outside walking distance to Disneyland but they have a shuttle bus that comes every half-hour, which you can buy from the front desk. Given that this hotel is tailored to Disneyland, it's a family-friendly hotel. The location is safe, restaurants are nearby, and free breakfast (or grab and go bag) served every morning.  The room's aren't posh class like the hotel at the corner, but the rooms are bigger and more perks are included. In addition to free breakfast, they offer free wi-fi. If you aren't seeing fireworks at Disney nighttime you can see them from some north-facing rooms or in the parking lot at back.  Staff are friendly. Pool's a bit small but you're going elsewhere so it's fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for theawesome comments and for staying with us. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.   We will make sure we share this with the entire staff.

Summary: We love Hampton Inn & Suites as our go-to hotel in almost every city we road-trip through. On our recent two week vacation, we stayed at four different hotels and only stayed at this hotel for one night. We booked this hotel near Disneyland thinking the quality we have come to expect would be consistent, however, we were sadly disappointed. We checked in late, the staff was friendly, but I was shocked to find out they charged me ~$16 for parking. I also saw a sign at the desk saying one can purchase tickets for the shuttle to Disneyland (which is only a mile away). I thought these things would be a courtesy, so be aware of these extra charges. The room we got was on the 4th floor at the end of the hall. Entering the elevator we immediately noticed poor maintenance of the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share the feedback with the management staff and review our building to make sure that everything is up to the Hilton standard. We are due for a renovation in 2015 and we promise to keep you updated on any changes. We hope this experience does not hinder you from choosing our location in the future as we would love a second chance t win your loyalty.

Summary: Used military vouchers paid for at base to purchase my room. There was a miscommunication and was charged for the room to my debit card for three nights (all my Disney spending money), all this on a Saturday when banks are usually closed. Anna D gave great and timely service and was able to call my bank to have the funds released back to me right away. She was very nice even though I might have come off as rude and stressed. Good full breakfast bar and very clean rooms too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share your kind comments with the staff and apologize for running into the billing issue. Luckily, we were able to resolve it fast for you to still enjoy the stay. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Our stay was wonderful. The hotel was clean and comfortable. And the service was outstanding! There were even plates and pots and pans in the kitchen area! I would definitely recommend Hampton to other travelers.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback as we will share it with the staff. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Great choice for a Disneyland stay!
Summary: I was worried that staying at a non Disney hotel was going to be inconvenient but this hotel (or the other Hilton hotels that share the parking lot) was a great pick.  The Hampton was clean and quiet, The breakfast was great (as usual) and the shuttle to Disney was perfect!  It cost $5 and served only the Hilton properties so it didn't make any other stops.  It was very quick and convenient and I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and for staying with us. We hope to see you again next time you visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: The hotel was very clean and the service was superior.  I did not realize that they had the free breakfast so we booked a room with the kitchen, but were very excited when we found out they had it. I would recommend staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments as we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We spent 5 nights at this property. From the first interaction with the front desk until we left 5 days later, we received the best, most friendly service from everyone! It was so refreshing! We really felt like guests instead of customers! We felt like they were our friends. They helped us plan out and execute our week at Disneyland. They helped us with transportation at a minimal cost, to the park. Every evening when we came home tired and hungry they had some form of refreshment in the lobby for us i e warm cookies, popcorn, lemonade, fruit etc.. Our rooms were very clean. Not huge, but not small! Microwave, fridge, nice tvs. Very comfortable beds!  Morning breakfast is wonderful! Full breakfast.  Waffles, omelets, bacon or sausage, pastries,  bagels, juice...all warm and
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic and awesome feedback!! We will share this with the entire team.

Summary: Bed was very uncomfortable and computers either did not work or, didn't work properly. I think the $12 a day parking is ridiculous, and this was not what I expect from a Hampton Inn at all. Will not be staying at this hotel again and should have stayed at a Hilton Garden instead. I will not be making this mistake again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share all the comments with the management team and make sure everything is back up to the Hilton standard. We also will pass on your comments to the corporate team in reference to the parking and keep you up to date on any changes. We are sorry to hear about the experience at our hotel however we would love to be given a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: I stayed for two nights with my boyfriend. We both enjoyed our stay. The staff was great! The hotel was perfect! I loved sitting on the patio and relaxing with some coffee. The hotel is close to Disneyland and as well as many restaurant options.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and for staying with us.

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel which is centrally located, just down the street from Disneyland!  The complementary breakfast is one of the best that we have had!  If you are looking for a great value for your money, you can not go wrong!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments and for staying with us. Hope to see you next time you are in town.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel, the staff were so friendly and helpful! Our room was so clean, and comfy! I especially enjoyed the bed, so comfortable! The hotel was clean and also had different snacks every night of our stay, cookies, popcorn and pizza!  We will definitely stay there next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: Great feedback and thank you!! We promise to share it with the staff. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: All of these hotels are basically the same.  The rooms here are fairly small.  The room decor has been updated.  It is in the same parking lot as Bucca di Beppo and Doubletree.  I found of the 3 hotels we stay at here in Anaheim, their beds are the least comfortable for me.   A little too soft for my liking.  The breakfast is the standard continental with a waffle iron and some kind of egg or french toast hot option.  Nothing really special or different than any other hotel that offers this kind of service.  It is a clean hotel, Once we stayed in a suite that had a full kitchen that was excellent.  We were here on business for a week, and it was nice to have the option to cook our own food in the room and not eat out for every meal.  It had a full sized refrigerator too.  This
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. Also, thank you for the awesome comments. We will share it with the staff. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: In the middle of the night, the toilet overflowed with foam and flooded the bathroom. This is after we found a cockroach in our first room. Staff was courteious and professional, but the rooms were terrible.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We always appreciate the feedback because, good or bad this helps us refine and improve our operations. We will have our chief Engineer get in the room and make sure everything is up to the Hilton standard. We truly apologize for enduring events like this however we hope this does not deter you from choosing our property in the future as we wish to one day win back your loyalty.

Summary: This was my 2nd time staying at the hotel and nothing failed. They make you feel right at home. The rooms were clean. Very close to Disneyland. Tons of restaurants in the neighborhood within walking distance. The hotel offers themed nights with free food and movies. Plenty of parking spaces. I am sure I will back at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback!! Also, thank you for being a return guest as we hope to see you again next time you are in the Resort Area.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel to visit Disneyland. We got a suite to make the occasional meal in. The suite had two rooms. The kitchen area had two burners on the stove, a full size fridge with freezer, a sink and a dishwasher. There were pots and pans, silverware, plates, a strainer, can openers, etc. Our room had a balcony, and since we faced Disneyland, we had an excellent view of the fireworks. We were on the fourth floor. The breakfast was what was expected for a Hampton Inn. The hotel staff was very courteous, and accommodating. They brought a bowl full of ketchup packs to our room for us when we asked.  The hotel sells the Bus passes to get to Disneyland. The bus stops in the hotel complex; just a 1-3 minute walk. No big deal at all. In fact the ART buses and drivers were
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This location is near to Disneyland and perfect for those driving to Disneyland. They have a variety of rooms and very accommodating to your needs. Rooms are clean and comfortable and free breakfast in the morning is a plus. They charge $12 for parking which is a negative but others are now doing the same thing. Shuttles are available but they are an easy drive away. Food locations are right across the parking lot or am easy walk away.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and we hope to see you next time you are in town.

Summary: We booked our business group of 13 into the Hampton for 5 nights, and from beginning to end, we were very well taken care of.  The front of house staff were extremely helpful with everything from incoming shipments to check in/out processes, and they went above and beyond to make sure every person in our group was happy.  The hotel itself has recently been renovated, particularly in the lobby area, and it was quite comfortable.  We will definitely be returning next year, as this Hampton met all of our needs and more.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for staying with us. Hope to see you again next time you are vacationing or business. Either way, we are happy you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: We were exhausted and tired after leaving a Disneyland Resort Hotel feeling completely frustrated with their inability to accommodate a family of 3 adults! These folks were warm and welcoming and the accommodations were exactly what we were looking for and needing. Everyone had heir own bed. Great stay, wonderful breakfast included!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for staying with us. Hope to see you again next time you are vacationing or business. Either way, we are happy you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: We've stayed in a few Hampton Inns over the last few years, but was greatly disappointed with this one.  Jesus checked us in and was quick to accommodate our request for an upper room with a view of the Disneyland fireworks.  But, oh, the outdated room and bathroom!  The queen beds were comfortable enough and so glad that the washable duvets have kicked out the old bedspreads that always felt nasty.  The bedding felt and looked clean, a big plus.  BUT, the bathroom was dismal.  Everything is so old and tacky - tile, wallpaper, tub/shower combo (yuck).  The grout is discolored (dirty?), the shower/tub very narrow and confining (I don't know how anyone over 6' can shower without ducking), the navy door trim didn't match anything - everything just looked and felt tired.  Popcorn
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We really appreciate you taking the time to apply feedback from your stay. Good or bad it‚Äôs through the guest comments on how we can learn and grow from the experience to improve our overall product. We are very sorry to hear some of the mentioned comments as we promise we will address all of them. We have escalated this to the management staff and will work diligently on improving everything that is mentioned. Thank you once again for staying with us and hope this does not deter you from staying with us in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: Breakfast was average.  Elevators appeared to be not well maintained and needed a good vacuuming.  Staff were excellent.  Pool area seemed well maintained.  Shuttle to Disneyland $7/person.  Good for families.  Not many restaurants close by.  Everything seemed a good hike away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share the comments with the management team and as always we appreciate the feedback; good or bad it always helps out to refine our operations. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay. Disneyland trip. We drove and parked. Clean rooms, comfortable beds. Pretty good breakfast included. Pool looked nice, but never got to try it. Staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for staying with us. WE will share the wonderful comments with the staff.  We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area

Summary: Our last stay was September 4th through 9th. This hotel is our first choice when staying in the Anaheim area because it has clean, comfortable, and spacious rooms. The staff is helpful and friendly, and Laurie always greets the guests with a smile. The breakfast bar has a good variety of food~eggs, potatoes, cereal, bagels, muffins, yogurt, waffles, toast, etc.~ & there is coffee/tea available all day near the lobby.   We did not use the Disneyland shuttle nor the pool during this stay, so I can't comment on those. There is a large, very clean fitness center, as well as a business center on the main floor. The in-room wifi is fast and free. The location is close to Coco's, Lucille's BBQ, Denny's, Jack in the Box, IHOP, and Buca di Beppo shares the same parking lot. Since there
Manager Response: Awesome comments!! We will share it with the entire staff. Hope you come back and visit again.

Summary: My husband and I had a great "stay-cation" recently at Hampton Inn and Suites. No complaints at all, highly recommended. The front desk staff was a pleasure to deal with. The complimentary breakfast and Neutrogena bath products were a nice touch.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. Thank yuo for the wonderful comments and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Great accommodations for the price. The daily non-stop shuttle to Disneyland was great. We did not rent a car this trip and just used shuttles. There are some good restaurants within walking distance. We had a room that faced Disneyland so we could see the fireworks from there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and for staying with is. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This locations was awesome, I rate it 10 all the way  continental breakfast was awesome, never had all the those goodies at other hotels. beyond my expectations. We had to leave early the next morning  so we did not have enough time to check out the entire hotel but I'm sure everything is good, my family loved it, and we will be back soon
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments as we will share it with the staff. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I stayed 8 nights at Hampton Inn & Suites in Garden Grove. The room was spacious, clean, and the bed was very comfortable. All the staff were friendly and helpful. The serve yourself breakfast had a wide  variety of foods--waffles, eggs, sausage, cereal, yogurt, fruit, and more.
Manager Response: Thank you for filling out a review of the stay. We thank you for the kind comments as we will share it with the staff. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Clean, comfortable, safe, and economical place to stay!  The hotel staff was very helpful.  Conveniently located for business travel and within walking distance to Disneyland if traveling on vacation or leisure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay and for the kind comments. We hope to see you again next time you visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: I stayed for 2 nights at the Hampton Inn and Suites in Garden Grove/Anaheim for a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  My room was on the 7th floor which offered an especially nice view of the city at night.  The room was fairly spacious with 2 queen beds and a large bathroom,  There's also a small coffee maker and fridge.  There was a nice sized sitting area with a desk as well.  The A/C didn't seem to cool the room to my liking even though I fiddled with the thermostat.  In the lobby area, there's a breakfast bar featuring hot and cold cereal, some hot items, and a do-it-yourself waffle station.  What's great about this hotel is it's proximity to Disneyland, the Convention Center, Angel Stadium, and many restaurants.  Overall, I
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and we hope to see you next time you are in town.

Summary: I planned on a two day get-away to Disneyland so I attempted to make reservations at the Disneyland Hotel, but they were full. They referred me to the Hampton Inn since it was only a mile away from the park. I figured since it was a referral, the Hampton Inn would be fine. I was also pleased that they provided a shuttle service to and from the park. So, I agreed to the Hampton Inn and they connected me directly. I made a reservation for a two night stay in a one bedroom suite. As I walked into the hotel, my first thought was "what did I get myself into"? It appeared as though I was entering a motel vs a hotel. The lobby was uninviting and outdated.  The personnel at the check-in desk were very nice and professional. They went over my accommodations and gave me information
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. WE always enjoy feedback good or bad as we will use it to refine our operations. We promise to address all comments to the appropriate managers and we will keep you updated on any property improvements. We just finished our lobby renovation last year and will start our room renovation the start of 2015. We don‚Äôt have a for sure start date as we will keep you posted all the way. Hope to see you again if you ever are in the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: 6 wakeup calls requested, didn't receive a single one 3 requests for maintenance to come and clear clogged sink and tub, never happened  Used points on this room and wouldn't do it again, I would say pay the extra money and go to Embassy or Hilton, not this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill a review of your stay. We are very sorry to hear about the experience that you had during your stay. We promise to address the comments and learn and grow from it to improve our service skills and refine our operations. We don‚Äôt hear much negative feedback such as this however we hope this does not deter you from choosing our location in the future as we would love for you to give us a second try.

Summary: Excellent Service, Staff & Stay for 1 night Women of Faith Conference at Honda Center, Anaheim Sales Mgr  & staff went above and beyond what I could expect for my group of 35 women. I was VERY pleased.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments as we hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Staff training needed; Property is Great
Summary: I have been a Gold/Silver Hilton Honors member for many years and have stayed at Hampton Inns across the country and this one looks, feels and acts like the trusted brand I have relied on. However, something happened here that has never happened before. I NEVER want my room made up and I ALWAYS make sure the DO NOT DISTURB sign is on the door handle when I leave. It's SOP for me for years. The first day I stayed here, I came back that night and the door hangar was replaced on the inside of my door and my room had been made up. I was quite upset at the invasion of privacy and called the front desk. The guy said he would check with housekeeping and came back on and said their records did not show that I had the door hangar out. Of course they would say that! He told me that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay.  We will share the comments with the General Manager and the Front Office to learn and grow to improve our hospitality skills. Thank you for the feedback and for staying with us. We are very sorry you had to endure a stay like this however; we will be addressing every issue. Thank you once again for choosing our location during your stay here in Anaheim/Garden Grove.

Summary: We stayed in a King suite which was roomy, clean, and quiet.  It had a balcony which was nice to sit on and enjoy the view of the city.  Our room was on the top floor.  The Disneyland shuttle was convenient, on time, and comfortable.  There is a nice outdoor patio and for eating and a good sized outdoor swimming pool. I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay.  Thank you for the kind comments as we will share them with the staff. Hope to see you again next time you are in the Disneyland Area.

Summary: We found the stay at this hotel to be just average. Whilst the service was ok whilst we there the after service left a little to be desired. The room was good, large enough and clean enough, no view or anything, but we didn't expect one. You can see the fireworks if you're on the right side of the building.  The breakfast provided is good, lots to choose from, fruit, cereal, pancakes and waffles. The shuttle was great to be able to use and is only 5 minutes away from the parks, $8 each return daily. Our dissatisfaction came after we had checked out and realised the next day that we had left some purses in a drawer in the bedside table, unfortunately they contained our passports so we were a bit panicked. Yes our stupid mistake but could have been handled better.  When we rang
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your hotel. We have shared the comments with the General Manager and the Director of Housekeeping.  Our policy is to contact the guest when we do locate lost and found. However, we will apply the feedback to the department, so we can learn and grow to improve our lost and found practices. Thank you for staying with us and hope this does not deter you from staying with us in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: Hampton inn at Garden Grove was a standard hotel. When we entered into the lobby it looked a little plain and even a bit old. We stayed on the 5th floor and when we walked into our room it looked plain and average. This hotel would be good if your staying here for about 4-5days,if your staying longer than that you wouldn't like Hampton inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We always enjoy hearing feedback from our guest good or bad. We just had the lobby renovated last year; however the room‚Äôs portion is scheduled to be renovated early next year. We will keep you updated on any changes and when that project is complete. We hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the area

Summary: Great hotel to stay at if you're going to Disneyland with kids. The included breakfast is a REAL breakfast with substantial food, e.g. eggs and sausage, waffles, yogurt, oatmeal, etc. in addition to the usual cereal and muffins. You can eat enough to fill yourself up until lunch, which is great because buying food at Disneyland adds up!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This Hotel is amazing the friendliness of the staff and the room was fantastic the bed was soooo comfortable and the free breakfast was great the best I ever had at any other Hotel the omelets were fantastic! I highly recommend staying here and a good value and very comfortable surroundings.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments as we hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel and we returned based on our last stay.  I'm happy to say that our second stay was as pleasant as our first. Both were Hilton Honors reward stays and our rooms were clean, comfortable, and quiet.  The staff is quite friendly and helpful and the breakfast has something for everyone.  Although we didn't use the pools, they looked quite nice and were pretty much empty.  Found the rooms perfect for getting a great night's sleep after a full day and night at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you !! Always great to have honors members express their stay on trip advisor. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you back for a third visit and many more!!!

Summary: I would stay here again. The free breakfast was very large and it was great to have a fridge and microwave in room. The different age pools were handy. The front staff was very helpful. Would be too far to walk to the parks from this hotel, but we had a rental car, so it didn't come up. Parking per day is steep, but it's the norm around that area. Was able to print flight tickets to go home with ease. They had little snacks at front desk that the kids loved.  For the price, it's a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for taking the time to fill out a review of our hotel. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Good Home Base for Area Travel
Summary: Stayed here August 23rd through the 27th.  Used this as a base to explore LA, Hollywood, Disneyland and Newport Beach.  Hotel staff were all very friendly, especially Scott who had great advice on the area in general.  Breakfast was decent, typical Hampton.  Tons of places to eat in easy walking distance.  Bank of America and Target across the street.  We walked on day to Disney (exactly 1 mile away) but used the shuttle the next.  Cost was $12 (2 adults and one child) for as many round trips you wanted in a day.  The lobby was recently updated and the rooms are scheduled to be updated later this year however they were fine for our needs, besides when we were in them our eyes were closed as we were out most of the day/night.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for the great feedback as we will share it with the team. We Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Overall the value received at this hotel is excellent. Not super fancy but the rooms are spacious we had a 1 bedroom suite. The free breakfast is awesome and the pool area was great. Also shuttle ran reliably and took you right to Disneyland every half hour.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feed back as we hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Resort Area.

Summary: This hotel location is great if you are working in LA market and covering the entire LA Basin - makes it easy to east west north or south.  Hotel is comfortable and has a clean format.  Be ready to deal with some traffic since down the street from Disneyland. Great choice for business pleasure to bring family and let them enjoy area while you are working.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. Hope to see you again next time you are in the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary Heading: Average hotel, not sure I'd book here again
Summary: I stay at Hamptons all over the country and this one was rather disappointing.  I am usually greeted with a warm hello and a smile and that didn't happen at this one. The building seemed rather old and tried, the lobby was nice and clean and looked like every other Hampton, but the rooms, hallways, seemed aged.  We had no shower curtain when we arrived and housekeeping had to bring it to us - what an odd thing to be missing!  Then the ice machine was not working and did not work during our entire five day stay.  Had to go to another floor every time we needed ice - which doesn't seem to be a big deal until you are back in your room for the night in your pajamas and realize you have to go down or up a floor to fill the ice bucket!  For the money they charge at this hotel, doubt
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We have shared your comments with the Housekeeping staff and the Chief Engineer. We will address every issue mentioned and on behalf of the hotel apologize for the experience you had. We use this feedback to learn and grow in an overall effort to improve our product. We hope this does not deter you from staying with us in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary Heading: Very pleased with the travel agent's recommendations
Summary: We just returned from a week in Anaheim. We were travelling with two other families and there were differences of opinion about where to stay. At the suggestion of the travel agent we decided on the Hampton Inn and Suites.   In reading the reviews on Trip Advisor, we felt fairly comfortable that this property would meet our needs. I'm pleased to say that this was very much the case.  There were so many positive aspects. We stayed in a King Suite. We chose this over a large room for only $100 extra for the week. What a bargain. The room was large compared to many others we've stayed in with a large master bedroom, separate bathroom, walk in closet, kitchenette, living area and balcony. There were two TV's and all the things you'd need in the kitchen to look after a family. The
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and the great feedback. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again next time you are in town..

Summary: We are a large family and reserved two rooms.  The hotel worked to get rooms side by side and notified us by phone prior to our stay.  All of the staff from management to the cleaning service were so kind and helpful with all of our needs, such as a spill to shopping needs.  Excellent breakfast and daily activities for families! We used all amenities, from the pool and exercise room to the computer room.  Very close to Disneyland.  We will be back!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We hope to see you again next time you are visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: We had to tent our house for termites and it was stressful, but the Hampton Inn helped ease the pain of it.  Very nice hotel, comfortable beds and rooms and the staff was excellent.  Enjoyed the complimentary breakfasts which had a great variety of foods to choose from.  We loved the Hampton Inn in Sedona so we chose this one for stay, and both were great.
Manager Response: Thank you!!! Love to hear back from our hamponteers as much as possible. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary: *Stayed only one night after a long day at Disneyland Pros: Friendly staff, the hotel is meant for Disneyland guest; allowed early morning check in and offered to hold luggage as well as giving us room keys etc after we visited the park (we returned around 1130pm), room was very clean and large, quiet, great breakfast, offers theme park tickets and shuttle ($5/person) to park; which runs all day Cons: A little under staffed for the amount of guests constantly needing to check in; but they worked hard so it wasn't an issue for us
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback and for staying with us. We hope you enjoyed everything in the area as we look forward to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, first stay at a hampton.
Summary: This was my first stay at a Hampton Inn and this one gave me a good look towards them. First of all, I came here for Disney Land, and this hotel has a cheap shuttle service to the park. The parking lot is shared with a Hilton Garden Inn and an Embassy Suites, the bus stops at the Embassy Suites which is a quick stroll down the parking lot. The furniture in the lobby was very modern and nice, the staff at the hotel were VERY friendly, they were happy to make sure your stay was good. We had a suite room on the second floor. The room was average but not super fancy, there was a full kitchen but it was not super big, with dinnerware and cookware included. The appliances worked well though the Dishwasher (made by Hotpoint) was a little loud. Beds were very cozy and were clean upon
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments and for staying with us while in town. WE love to hear feedback from our first staying at Hampton guest. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This hotel is in a nice area and safe to walk around at night.  Harbor Blvd has many hotels and lots of tourists walking around.  Hampton Inn shares a parking lot with a few other hotels plus Buca Di Beppo (Italian restaurant).  Parking is $12 a day but ALL hotels in the area have a parking fee however $12 is among the lowest.  The low parking fee, location, free wifi, and nightly rate is why I chose this hotel.  The staff was really nice and greeted everyone all the time.    The room was clean however the bathroom toilet seat was broken and wouldn't stay up.  There are self serve laundry rooms on floors 2 and 3 if you need to do laundry.  The gym is spacious with decent equipment however one of the treadmills seemed unstable.  Breakfast was fine, mostly breads, waffles, fruit,
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and for staying with us while visiting the Anaheim/ Garden Grove Resort Area. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel staff were consistently friendly and helpful. The room was clean and well maintained. The breakfast offerings included good coffee, make your own waffles, bagels, toast, yoghurt, eggs, sausages, oatmeal, cereal, fruit, and juices.
