It was about 25 minutes to walk to Disneyland which was fine in the morning, but too much for the children at night. We bought 5 day ART bus passes. The pool was clean (we saw staff testing the water) and provided plenty of towels and places to sit and relax. I would certainly stay here again with my family.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Resort Area.

Summary: It is a very nice hotel. People are friendly.  I just happen to be in a room with a mechanical failure.  The air conditioner in the room wasn't working and in the morning I woke up sweating with red heat bumps all over my face.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We are very sorry to have anybody have to experience Ac unit malfunctions. We have passed all information on to the engineering staff to make sure that room is back up to Hilton standard. We hope you feel better from the stay. Thank you once again for staying with us.

Summary: The staff were very nice.  The eating area for breakfast is always packed and closes promptly at 10 AM but has a nice variety of food.  Scrambled eggs or an omelet (they only serve one, alternate days I think), waffles you make yourself (pretty good), yogurt, cold cereals, bagels, toast, juices, milk, coffee, tea, fresh fruit.  If any tables are open grab one for your party.  Lots of guests end up taking the food to their rooms.  AC in the room worked great (a bit loud but livable.)  Hotel elevators and halls were a bit dirty but that was only because of the large number of kids in the hotel.  Get a room not facing the pool if you want to go to sleep before 10:15 or want to sleep later than 8 AM.  Shuttle service to and from Disneyland every 30 minutes from 7:15 to 1AM (6:15 on
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and for staying with us. We always appreciate hearing back from our loyal guest that stay with us. We hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: Good location, good breakfast but rate is too high, should remain below $100 for more popular choices and stay competitive.  It should also provide shuttle service to Disneyland and other local shopping without any additional fees.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We always appreciate the kind feedback and will use it to refine our operations. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: The rooms were very clean and the staff was outstandingly pleasant!  The breakfast was up to Hampton Standards - and there were a few great surprises!  Colors books for the kids and on Wednesday - they had a movie/pizza night in the lobby!  The fitness facility was outstanding and the pool was clean and well kept!  We would gladly stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you fo the great comments and the awesome feedback. We will share this with the staff, as we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This hotel was modern, comfortable, reasonable and clean. Our room was wonderful. It was spacious and very clean. The hotel staff especially the front desk were courteous, friendly, knowledgeable and efficient. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments as we wil share it with the entire staff. Hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/ Garden Grove Resort.

Summary: This Hampton Inn could really use some renovation. The lobby looks as if it has been recently renovated, however it still had a somewhat dated feel. The room smelt like someone had just smoked in or had been smoking in the room.  Who knew smoking was still allowed.The bathroom was the worst - it felt more like a cheap motel than a Hampton Inn. The location was close enough to the Angel's baseball stadium, which was our reason for the visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We just renovated the lobby area last year and the rooms are scheduled for early next year to renovate. Thank you for the great applied feedback as we use this feedback to refine our operations. Thank you once again for staying with us and we hope this does not deter you from staying with us in the future because we would love a second chance to win your loyalty.

Summary: We love the Hampton Inn & Suites Brand and for the most part we have had wonderful experiences with the quality of the hotels, the rooms and the service. This is the first Hampton Inn & Suites at which we've stayed that we have not enjoyed as much. Firstly, the building itself is old, and the rooms are dated and showing their age. We stayed in a in a 2 room suite and it all felt old and dirty. The bathroom was the worst - it felt more like a cheap motel than a Hampton Inn. The appliances in the little kitchen had obviously seen better days. The carpet felt dirty and dusty.  Part of the problem was that the quality of the Housekeeping was terrible - trash not emptied and cleaned out, cleaning rags left in the sink, rooms not vacuumed or dusted. When I complained to the front desk
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We really appreciate the feedback and will consistently use it to refine our operations. We just finished up the lobby renovation last year and are on schedule to have a room renovation next year. We stay current with Hampton and Hilton renovation plans and will continue to monitor the growing trends. Thank you for the valued feedback and if anything is scheduled to be remolded we will keep you updated. Thank you once again for staying with us and we hope that this occurrence does not deter you from staying with us n the future as we would love a second chance to win your loyalty.

Summary: I can not stop raving about this facility to friends/coworkers/and family. Everything was excellent-espescially the customer service! I can not wait to return! Lori from the front desk as well as the gentlemen who worked night audit were amazing and a wonderful asset to the hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We really appreciate the great feedback from our guest. It‚Äôs through this feedback is how we grow and learn to improve our overall product.  We will keep you updated as we are expecting to go through a room renovation soon in the upcoming months. Thank you once again for staying with us..

Summary: This Hampton In  could really use some updating in the rooms. The lobby looks as if it has been recently renovated, however it still had a somewhat dated feel to it. The guest rooms and bathrooms were old and dirty feeling. While I am sure the rooms were clean, they felt dirty. We found the beds and pillows to be hard and uncomfortable. The breakfast area was always very crowded. We have stayed at many Hampton Inn's and found this one to be in need of remodeling. The staff was always very friendly, no complaints at all about customer service. Most people who stay here, choose it for the proximity to the amusement parks, so for that it serves it's purpose.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will use share your feedback with the management staff and use it to refine our operations. We are scheduled to have a room renovation the start of 2015 and will keep you updated when the Reno is complete. Thank you once again for staying with us as we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Very helpful, friendly & courteous staff. Although we arrived much earlier than the 3pm check-in time, they were able to have our room available almost immediately. They also waived the parking fee for us. Shuttle service to Disneyland was convenient and easy. Comfortable, clean room. Very pleasant experience. Would recommend highly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. Hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: BEST BEDS (EVEN COMPARED TO DL HOTEL)
Summary: The only bad thing about staying at the hampton inn is that it is so far from the amusment parks, but their beds, breakfasts, and friendly staff make up for it in spades. I love staying here. Save the money of going to the DL hotel and come stay here instead.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and we are very happy you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Wow just wow the Hampton photos on thr website was nice but being in it was way better I recommend this hotel if your going to Disneyland. Theonly time I was ticked off was when I called the desk and said will long distance calling be added to my bill and she said no so I called my family back home and the next day I wanted to double check and she said sorry I had the wrong information and they did not bill me so my stay was worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Disneyland Area

Summary: We love the breakfast & down comforters/pillows here. The hotel lobby has been remodeled & looks decent. It was nice that they have fruit-infused water waiting right when you come in. They said this hotel is in walking distance to Disneyland, but you won't want to walk. It was a bit too far for us with strollers/kids in tow. We took advantage of the free shuttle service to/from Disneyland. That was nice, but it was sometimes frustrating to have to wait for the shuttle, especially at night when you are just anxious to get back. The pool area was OK- not very big & the bottom of the kiddy pool is rocky/scratchy. Overall though, it was nice & the price was right. We also stayed at the Best Western Park Place, so you are welcome to read that review for a comparison.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Disneyland Area

Summary: This hotel was pretty nice.  We stayed here for a family vacation because it was close to Disneyland. Breakfast was included with the cost of the hotel.  They even let us check in early when we got there and have breakfast the first morning.  They had to go breakfast sacks for people who didn't have time to stay for breakfast.  The nice thing about those was the bottled water in the bag, which was great to take into Disneyland.  They also had a coin operated washer/dryer which was nice to use if needed.  They did have a pool, a small (1foot) kiddie pool, and a hot tub.  They also provided pool towels, but they were VERY small.  Even my 8 year old needed 2 towels.    Our room was ok. It seemed like they are trying to keep up with repairs, but it was an older hotel.  Our sink kept
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We always appreciate the feedback and hope to see you again next time you are in town. We also will have our chief engineer take a look at the room you were in make sure everything is up to the Hilton standard. Once again, thank you for the feedback and hope to see you again.

Summary: What else do you need from a stay away from home property but clean, comfortable, and convenient?  The staff is gracious and accommodating, the rooms are clean and comfortable, the breakfast is terrific, and the location is convenient.    My only minor quibble is with the small parking stalls which seem designed only for a sub compact vehicle.  Perhaps re-paving plans can include parking stall striping suitable for mid-size and larger vehicles.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your most recent stay. We will pass the comments onto the parking company and keep you updated on any changes to the parking spaces. Thank you once again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Not up to the great Hampton Inn brand
Summary: The lobby was recently renovated, but the rooms have not. Our suite was ok, but it had a shabby feel to it. The shower was especially shabby. Also, the hide-a-bed for our grandson was like sleeping on bare metal coils.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback as we will use it to refine our operations and improve our product. We will keep you posted on renovation room plans and hope this experience does not deter you from staying with us in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: You can not ask for better host or a nicer cleaner hotel. My stay was fabulous. The breakfast was great. Rooms were clean and very well stocked. We did not need to ask for anything extra. The pool was clean and towels readily available.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful, kind feedback we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed here to go to Disneyland for my daughter's middle school band performance in April. The location is great-a minute away from Disneyland right down the street. The hotel was very clean with very comfortable beds and modern (not outdated decor). The breakfast was awesome with so many choices and much better than most other hotels that offer complimentary breakfast. The staff was warm and friendly and came around the breakfast area several times to clean and check on everything. The staff asked guests several times how they were doing and if they needed anything. I would definitely stay here again when I am town for our next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind feedback and we hope to see you again next time you visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: stayed at Hampton for my son's basketball tournament. Breakfast is excellent, water, tea and coffee in the lobby all day long. Check downtown Anaheim for healthier food choices (vegan "181 degrees", or "Healthy Junk")
Manager Response: Awesome feedback!  Again, hope to see you when you return back to town.

Summary: Stayed her to go to Disneyland. Rooms were nice and clean. Staff were extremely helpful and courteous. Shuttle to the park was extremely convenient.Would definitely stay here again during my next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback as we truly hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We were staying 5 nights in Hampton on our Disneyland trip , It was so surprising me the excellent  service they provide, friendly and helpful staff, It provides free WiFi all around the hotel (this is so important because it can let my kids calm down with their iPad ;-)) taste Yummy complimentary breakfast from 6am to 10 am, you can have it anytime and how many times you want not like other hotel need to present a voucher. Check this out my girl video show inside the suite   http://bit.ly/insidesuite
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments as we hope to see you again next time you decide to visit us in the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: Stayed here while attending a three day conference. Rooms were clean and even though it was busy with families I was able to enjoy some peace and quiet! Breakfast was yummy and well stocked. Close to Disney restaurants and stores. Staff was very friendly and helpful! Will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for choosing our location to stay in while visiting the conference centers. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Really friendly staff and clean environment.  Lots of families on vacation going to Disneyland.  Very close to the park but far enough away to feel like you are getting a break from the crowds.  Fun place to be!
Manager Response: Awesome comments and thank you for staying with us. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn from 4th May til 10th May, reception staff were always very courteous and helpful especially Jesus who was very patient with our many questions. Our room was on the 2nd floor, was very clean and spacious. The lobby area was nice since the renovations and never had to wait long for the elevators. The shuttle to Disneyland was efficient and it is shared with the Embassy Suites hotel next door which isn't a problem, however the bus does fill up quickly at morning rush time. The location we found excellent with Target nearby and many places to eat within walking distance. The Hampton has now become my preferred choice of hotel when coming to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments as we will share it with the entire staff.  Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Had an awful experience at this hotel.  I arrived at 2am due to plane delay and the front desk guy was very rude.  Gave the guy in front of me water but offered me nothing.  The room was dirty and not what I expected.  This was my first and last time at this hotel.   I have stayed at Hampton Inn often and usually have good experiences.  This was the worst.  I checked out the next morning.  They also overcharged me.
Manager Response: We are very sorry to hear you had an experience like that. We strive at all times to make sure the guest satisfaction is met at all times. We will share this with the staff and use it as a tool to improve our overall product. Thank you for staying with us and we truly hope you decide to give us a second chance and serve you better in the future.

Summary: I have stayed in various hotels in the area but this is the place I would recommend. Great value for the cost and service stands out. Staff was wonderful. The location is a central location with basic close shops for amenities and good places to eat. I stayed on my own but had family staying at hotel too. We all had a good time and enjoyed our stay. Thank you for the hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback as we will share it with the entire staff. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Great hotel, wonderful staff, clean rooms and overall great property. Nice breakfast and lobby. Very convenient location to disneyland. Stayed here two years in a row for my birthday! Love this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments and for staying with us. We hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: We had a great time! At first our suite way up high and had a few things off, but the staff was kind and changed our room. We had a balcony looking over the HEATED pool and Jacuzzi. The kids LOVED this. They even had a kids pool but it was colder than the others. We were there in February so this was really nice. We drove to disney the first day. MISTAKE. It cost around $20.00 and took forever, not realizing that the shuttle lanes take you there in like 5 minutes! Do not drive. Take the shuttle. We had to drive and then take a shuttle anyways packed with people. We paid for a hassle. Thats it. When my daughter and I went back at night to disney, we got on the shuttle and the bus driver drove quickly so we could check out the fireworks on the way from an awesome view. Very nice
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments and great to hear the stay went good. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Great place, walking distance from Disney
Summary: My check in expirence was terrible but after that the hotel was perfect!  I recommend calling in advance to see if your room is available before you leave the park to check in as I waited over and hour and a half in the lobby with my tired kids and heat exhausted in laws.  The room is great, and the breakfast is perfect!  The staff is average from my expirence but I didn't really need much hand holding, I have no problems asking questions about the amenities and times for the workout room, pool, and breakfast.  Oh and the Wifi is free!!  Parking is 12 which is pretty low for southern cali so that is a benefit too!
Manager Response: Thank you for a great review about your stay with us. We will work closely with our Front Office crew to ensure a great check in from the applied feedback. WE hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay from start to finish.  Front desk staff was friendly and helpful.  Was nice to have breakfast right here, with kids it is one less stop of getting in and out of the car.  The pool area was very clean and of course a favorite for the grandkids. Can walk to Disneyland if you choose.  Would definitely stay at this property again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments and for staying with us, hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This is an excellent hotel, in a great location near Disneyland.  The staff is incredibly friendly and they keep the hotel extremely clean.  I very highly recommended staying here whether for business or leisure.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments as we will share it with the staff. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Upon entering the lobby it s very sheek and well appointed for a Hampton Inn.  Traffic flow is nice and the staff are very friendly which you expect in a resort area.  The elevators and the room showed some wear..but the pool and outside areas were as good as could be expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback and for staying with us. We hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove resort Area.

Summary: friendly staff, free breakfast, quiet room good value for the $ Shuttle bus to Disney worked well for a small price. Free shuttle to Orange County outlet stores.  Within walking distance to Target, Red Robin restaurant & Outback Steak House.  Restaurants in area catered to food allergies in an excellent manner
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We love to hear back from our loyal guests who stay with us. We hope to see you again next time you are on town.

Summary: Overall, this is a great hotel!  It had everything needed to make my families stay comfortable and fun.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The location was great.  Breakfast was great, a large variety of things to choose from.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of the hotel stay. WE always love to hear back from the guest that stayed with us. We really appreciate the kind feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Do not book this hotel! Busy, old and outdated.
Summary: I have to apologize because I am the biggest fan of Hampton inn's all over the US.  This is definitely the worst Hampton Inn even worse than the one in Albuquerque that was converted from an old Motel 6. I checked in very late and because of my travel agent, had two reservations in which the nice front desk guy cancelled with no issues. Gold star!  I am a Hilton gold member and look forward to my vitamin water and trail mix which I was offered. I traveled for business here and it was a very busy hotel since it was close to disneyland. The elevator was dirty, old and broken, the buttons were broken and hanging by a wire to my floor. My room was so outdated I didn't want to touch anything and I couldn't get the air to circulate. The bed was fine and I was only there for a few
Manager Response: Thank you for filing out our survey. We will use it to refine our overall product. We will share the comments with the management team and relay any new information back to you on updates.  We are due for a room remodel in the upcoming months however we will definitely keep you up to date on any news as it comes.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn & Suites Anaheim/Garden Grove, CA.
Summary: Outstanding accommodations! The entire staff does an excellent job of welcoming me and making me feel to home! I like how they recognize their staff for the good work they do, on all shifts of operations! I have stayed at this facility many times and have come to know many of the staff. Traveling for my job can be very stressful, but I look forward to going to my home away from home in the evenings. Many families stay here for vacations while visiting Disney and they always seem very satisfied with their stay, I know this by meeting several at the Ho Tub in the evenings.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback and for filing out a review of the stay. We hope to see you again when you make it back to the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: This trip was to visit with the family of my wife's late younger brother who died unexpectedly. While most of the guests were there for the local attractions and amusement park, ours was a somber one. The staff went to great lengths to make our stay comfortable once they found out the nature of our trip. If I ever return to the Garden Grove/Santa Ana area - this would be the first place I would consider!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback as we are sorry to hear of your family passing. We please let us know if we can do anything more.

Summary: The hotel was very nicely decorated and up to date. Their was a good variety of food for breakfast, plenty of seating room. Appreciated the staffs help in getting my room ready for my stay with my requests.
Manager Response: Thank you for filing out a review and for the awesome feedback. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: I would say that this hotel is fine for families and folks that are on a strict budget. The hotel I stayed in in Garden Grove, California was away from the hustle and bustle of the Disneyland traffic and since I drove to Garden Grove from my home in Burbank, California it afforded handy easily accessible parking. The food at the complimentary breakfast was fine and varied. Coffee was good and the pastries were fresh. You pretty much are on your own at this hotel since there are no bellhops and parking attendants. The swimming pool, however, was on the ground floor. In most high rise hotels the pool is usually on the roof or away from the front part of the hotel. The pool in this hotel is located to the left of the entrance but faraway and hidden to be okay. The hotel does not
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and filling out a review of your trip. WE always love to get all the feedback we can as we constantly strive to improve our product. We hope to see you again if you decide to make it out for business or leisure. Again, thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Well okay...sorta. I booked this hotel thinking I would be closer to a training venue. My bad. Looks like closer to the airport would heve been wiser. That said, clean, safe and usual Hampton standards. Nice room, close to Disneyland (no we didn't...it was a business trip). Close to dining, easy walk. If you travel to the Southland, be advised that driving is an experience similar to Baltimore, Atlanta, Acapulco...in other words belt up and stay to the right. Service was freindly, had a shuttle to the parks and all in all, quite satisfactory.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of the stay. We hope to see you again in the future. Thank you once again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Stay in hotel near Disney, Anaheim
Summary: We picked this hotel based on previous good reviews we had seen on trip advisor. We found the hotel to be very good with very high standards of cleanliness and service. We were on the fifth floor, facing Disney and were able to see the fireworks from the window. The decor in the rooms could do with being brightened up a bit but they were very clean, comfortable and quiet. We expected to be able to walk to Disney but it was further away than expected so chose to use the hotel's shuttle bus for a charge of $5 per person per day.  We were very pleased with this service; the buses arrived on time and the drivers did their best to squeeze everyone on when necessary.  Complimentary breakfast was quite good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review. We hope you enjoyed your complete stay here at the Hampton as we look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Good location.  Redeemed HiltonHonors points for room..good experience.  7 floors...room was quiet.. New decor in hallways...room was worn and showed signs of lots o' traffic...front desk was older...lobby was clean and new looking..was charged a parking fee...most Hamptons do NOT charge...maybe in the Disney resort area??  Good standard Hampton breakfast... To go bags available if wanted one..  Loved Mickey Mouse in the lobby..
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing a review of your most recent stay. We do have a parking charge for the resort area , however we will share your comments with the management staff and keep you updated on any changes. Thank you once again for staying with us as we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Very good stay for family of 5.  Room with 2 queen beds was big enough for the 5 of us.  Convenient to Disneyland (small fee for shuttle, runs every 30 minutes from embassy suites just next door). Clean.  Could see Disney fireworks from window (we were on the 5th floor).  Only negative (which was very minor) was that the elevators were slow so there was sometimes a noticeable wait (was probably only 2 or 3 minutes but seemed like longer).  Very good value (a little over $100 with free breakfast).
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments and for visiting us during you trip out to the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area. We hope to see you again next time you are in town. We will have our engineer take a peek at our elevators and keep you updated on any changes.

Summary: The hotel had excellent amenities.  The exercise room had a wide variety of equipment.  It was open 24 hours a day for the convenience of the guests.  The hotel's breakfast bar was excellent.  The choices include hot and cold items and a variety of fruits.  Any of the hotel staff, I encountered, were friendly and very helpful.  The hotel lobby has a water cooler with fruit sliced up in ice water.  It was always refreshing at the end of a long day.  Each afternoon the hotel provide popcorn and cookies.  Overall, staying at this hotel was a very pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your most recent stay.  We will share your comments with the staff as we hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: Friendly staff.  I was greeted each time I entered or left the building.  Hotel was neat, clean and tidy.  Hotel rooms was comfortable.  I had not slept so well in weeks.  It was also informative to receive a letter under my door when the room was not made up due to me having the do not disturb sign on the door.  Also, the breakfast was really good each morning.  It was hot, fresh and certain pieces.  Great location, Great accommodations.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback as we ill share it with the team. Thank you for filling out a review of your most recent stay here at our property. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Everything was great at this hotel - cleanliness, service, amenities, etc. I would recommend this hotel for business folks, families and leisure as well.  It is in close proximity to many restaurants, shops and Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome comments as we will share it with the whole staff. Thank you for staying with us as we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: The Hampton Inn at Anaheim/Disneyland offered my family the ability to have a relaxing and enjoyable experience while traveling. The hotel staff was helpful and courteous. The room was clean and spacious. The breakfast was geared to get our troop out the door quickly. I would recommend this hotel for families or travelers who need a little more space and enjoy the ability to have kitchen.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments about our staff and the facilty as we will share it with the entire staff. Thank you for staying with us while visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: We stayed here as a large family reunion and loved the room options.  We were able to get a mini-suite with a separate area with TV and bed for kids while others in the group had larger suites.  The staff was great and the full breakfast is nice with a large renovated dining area.  We even brought "home" some takeout and ate it in the breakfast seating area for dinner one night and the staff was great to accommodate us.  The kids loved the popcorn and cookie snacks when we returned each night from Disneyland.  You have to pay for parking and the shuttle service but both are very affordable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of our hotel. Thank you so much for the wonderful comments as we look forward to seeing you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Great for families hitting the theme parks
Summary: Stayed here using points with a family of 5. Put pillows between beds to accommodate bed for fifth person. Breakfast is great - lots of options for different family tastes. Proximity close to Disneyland is excellent, but too far to walk. With the size of my family, it was cheaper and more convenient to pay for parking there ($16/day) vs. the hotel shuttle. Staff was very friendly, hotel very clean, room was quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for making our hotel the choice your family made while visiting the resort area. We will share your experience with the staff. We truly thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again next time your family is in town.

Summary: This is our favorite hotel in the Disneyland area, because of the cleanliness of the rooms, the customer service, the breakfast, and the shuttle that gets you to/from Disneyland (for additional fee). For the money, we haven't found a better value, and once we experienced this hotel we stopped looking.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments as we will share this review with the entire staff. We hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Resort Area.

Summary: We arrived and the decor in the lobby is nice and modern the man that checked us in was ok not too friendly as soon as you get in the elevator it started making noises I seriously thought we were going to get stuck. The room was ok the phone didnt work and there was a little hole in the wall by the door the kids and I went down to the pool through the stairs this time they enjoyed it there is also a hottub which I enjoyed we left for dinner but when we came back there was no parking it literally took us half an hour of driving around to find a spot the parking lot in conjoined with a resturaunt and another hotel so that was another problem however it was an average stay I wouldnt be back
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We will share your comments with the management team in an overall effort to improve our product. We hope this stay does not deter you from deciding to stay with us in the future as we would love a second chance to win back your loyalty.

Summary: This hotel is one of the nicer Hampton Inns I have stayed in. I only have 2 complaints. 1. Children are allowed to run amuck at the breakfast bar. 2. $1100.00 + for 6 nights puts this hotel out of reach for many families.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review or your most recent stay at our hotel. We hope you enjoyed your time with us. We here at the Hampton understand its our duty to see that our guest get the most out of a trip. We strive at every chance to make sure you feel at home when your away from home. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Stayed here in a King Suite this past week. The room was a little bit outdated, but I enjoyed my stay. The free breakfast in the morning is nice. The location is great, very close to Disneyland and Angel Stadium. Scott at the front desk was very nice and helpful. Overall, I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments as we will share this with Scott and the entire staff. We thank you for filling out a review of your stay and giving us such great feedback. We hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: Was at Hampton Inn for a five day stay.  Had a 1 bedroom suite which was well designed, lots of space.  The living area was a bit tired, but the kitchen had a full fridge (a nice feature).  The room was on the 6th floor and also had a balcony facing Disneyland park so we got to catch the fireworks when we didn't manage to stay at the park till closing.  A couple of features worth mentioning for families; a clean, well designed personal laundry area on 2 floors (4 of each machine), and a very pleasant pool.  Breakfast was good, though not untypical.  Pleasant helpful breakfast service staff.  Liked the outdoor eating area.  Elevators were slow, and accessible stairs down a long hall.  Best feature was the Hilton specific shuttle that goes directly to Disneyland.  Serving only the
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments as we are sorry you had to feel an earthquake while staying with us. We will share the wonderful comments with the staff and hope to see you again next time you are town.

Summary: I did have a bit of difficulty on arrival, make sure that if there are people arriving from your party before you in a pre-paid room that you contact the hotel staff so you can make arrangements so they will not have to wait in the parking lot for you to arrive. staff was ALWAYS very friendly and helpful rooms were neat and clean
Manager Response: Thank you for your most valued feedback and we are very happy you enjoyed the stay although with the troubles at check in. We hope this did not deter you from staying with us in the future as we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Great Location , Great Staff , Good Morning Breakfast
Summary: This location is nice, Close to Disneyland and what is included is worth every penny/ Fridge , Microwave and amazing waffle makers which get you going in the morning. The staff is always helpful and makes  the stay very enjoyable.  / If you have any problem there quick to solve and fix and ask you how your day was going . The smalls thing that make you trip better.  - I will be staying at this location again. and recommend it if you have your family with you or just want a get away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your most recent stay with us. It is always wonderful to be able to share with the staff the wonderful comments that we hear from our guest. Thank you very much for staying with us.

Summary: Really like the "kids room" within our room.  We were together yet apart.  New breakfast area was nice and roomy.  Friendly staff makes the stay more enjoyable.  Always a good spot to stay when going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are very glad you enjoyed the hotel during your trip to the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area. We can't wait to see you next time you decide to visit the area.

Summary: Breakfast area - FOUR waffle makers!  The area was kept clean and well-stocked and the fruit very fresh.  Typical Hampton Inn breakfast otherwise.  Our king-size bed room was clean and comfortable.  All the staff was top-notch in attitude and service.  We liked that the three Hilton brand hotels (sharing the same large parking lot) have their own Disneyland shuttle.  The more days used, the better the daily rate.  We paid $8 per adult for two days of unlimited use.  Shuttle times start early (before the parks open) with the last run one an hour after the parks close ‚Äì runs on the half-hour.  The bus used is the size of a city bus ‚Äì generally full but not crowded and always on time!  I understand the shuttle will also take passengers to the nearby Anaheim Garden Walk where there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your most recent stay. We will share your wonderful comments with the entire staff. Hope to see you again next time you are town.

Summary: This is one of my favorite hotels, for the value, in Anaheim.  The staff is unbelievable.  Everyone is so friendly and helpful.  The hotel is always clean and the location is ideal.  Close to many restaurants, Disney Land, Convention Center, and Shopping. Compared to other hotels in the area, this is one of the best for the value.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful comments. We hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn and suites in Anahiem CA
Summary: We've stayed at this hotel for 5 or 6 years now and our stay is always a positive one. The complimentary breakfast is outstanding and the hotel staff and rooms couldn't be better. It's close to restaurants and some shopping and not to mention 10 minutes from Disneyland. Great hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for all the great comments. Thank you for staying with us as we look forward to seeing you again next time you come see Disney Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: Hilton's Hampton Suites in Anaheim was convenient and comfortable lodging while attending the annual R. E. Convention. The complimentary breakfast was good and saved time.  It is about a brisk 20-minutes walk from the convention center and about half the price of the Hilton Towers where I have previously stayed more than 10 years for the same convention.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments. We will share this with the staff. We hope to see you again when the convention is back again next year. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Close to Disneyland, Restaurants and shops. Clean Rooms, Tasty Breakfast. The Caring Staff is more like Family, as they ensure you and your family have everything you need. Hampton Staff understand that the Disney Trip starts in their Lobby. Earn Points and Have a Great Night Sleep, I would stay here once again for Vacation 2015.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay, Hope to see you again.

Summary: STAFF WAS GREAT!!  The shuttle was convenient and always on time.  I wish it was closer to shopping & a drug store.  The lobby was nice and the beds were comfortable.  The hallway smelt bad & needed to be renovated.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We will share the comments with the management team. We of course, will keep you updated on any of the efforts to improve our overall product. We hope this does not deter you from staying with us in the future as we would love a second chance to win your loyalty.

Summary: We attended a Religious Education Congress in Anaheim. The Hampton Inn and Suites on Harbor Blvd. was close and clean. We enjoyed the stay and the breakfast provided each day was sufficient to keep us going! Great location and amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing comments and hope to see you next conference.

Summary: Hotel was great, very accommodating for a group of three families...Quiet, clean, and secure.  Staff was extremely nice.  Breakfast was good, different foods each day.  Have to question the front desk recommendations on take-out pizza, though.  The recommended pizzeria was absolutely terrible (not Hampton's fault).  Shuttle to D-Land was also a good deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for all the great comments and hope you have a better experience with the dinning choices we recommend next time you decide to stay with us

Summary Heading: My Experience staying at Hampton's Inn
Summary: I stayed there for business.  Even though the distances to my business destination was 15+miles, the hotel was easily accessible with very good service. Room was clean, sheets were clean and area was spotless.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments on filing out a review of your previous stay with us. We hope to see you again if you decide to make it out to the Anaheim/Garden grove area in the future. Thank you again for all your comments as we wish you the best of luck on all your travels.

Summary: Great location for Disney with shuttle service right to the park!  Fun food in the evening's and great breakfast....staff was helpful and welcomed us with open     arms!  Beds as always are perfect....a good reason to stay at Hampton! .
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments. We truly enjoyed having you in house and hope to see you again in the near future. We will share all of your comments to the staff.

Summary Heading: Great stay at Hampton Inn Garden Grove
Summary: We stayed at Hampton Inn Garden Grove Feb 28- March 5th, but the hotel might as well be in Anaheim. The hotel is a very short drive to Disneyland ( a few blocks to one of Disney's parking lots on Harbor Blvd)) and is 5 minute drive.  The hotel was clean and attractive and our room was reasonably large. The queen beds were comfortable.   Furniture was in fairly good shape, but the carpet was frayed by the bathroom door.  Bathroom was clean and up to date with adequate toiletries provided.  There is no bathroom fan so it gets fogged up quickly.  Room has a compact refrigerator.  Houskeeping service was good.  Free WiFi in the room was good.We got this hotel on Hotels.com for $80/ night which was a very good rate.  Parking is $12 / day.  Complementary breakfast is served 6 am- 10
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share your kind comments with the staff and hope to see you again next time you visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary Heading: Very Good Option in Anaheim - Disney Area
Summary: Very good hotel, standard Hampton Inn & Suites. Only issue is that they do not inform you have to pay for parking until they bill your check-out and that you have to carry your luggage on into and out of the carts. Breakfast is a bit outdated, they should improve things like they continuously do on the Embassy Suites and on the Homewood Suites.  I actually stayed on February 2013.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your most recent stay. We will share your comments onto our General Manager and keep you updated on any parking changes. We will keep you updated on any changes. Thank you once again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: A good value if you can get a deal
Summary: The staff are very helpful and friendly. They go out of their way to help, even though the place is packed. The breakfast was hot and fresh everyday unlike some other Hampton Inns. The rooms are clean and A/C works fine. It offers good service.  But the property was at par with Holiday Inn. The renovated lobby did not look much better than before. The WiFi was not steady. We were dropped and locked out several times during terminal service.   We've got a good price via Expedia on last minute deals otherwise we would not have chosen this property.   I would recommend this hotel, if you can find a good price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review from your stay. We appreciate all the feedback and will use it to always increase the experience at our property. Thank you once again for visiting us during your time here around the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary: Very poor breakfast.  VERY poor.  No meat.  And often messy public areas due to lack of good house keeping and lots of families.   Our room had a funky odor due to a leaking wall air conditioning unit and the management did make amends to that but the hotel price and value seemed out of line.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We always appreciate the feedback because this is how we learn and grow to in turn improve on our overall product. We will address the issues mentioned with the entiremanagement staff and keep you updated on any changes. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great staff, great breakfast.
Summary: We stayed here two nights and at the Anabella Hotel for one night. Wish we had of spent all three nights at The Hampton Inn. Considering how many families stay at this hotel you could hear a pin drop in our room. The front desk was awesome, the clerk (who I wish I remembered her name) even went as far as purchasing my Disney tickets online and printing them for me because they don't supply the ones I requested. The five dollar per day shuttle service was great and always on time and the room was spotless and beds super comfortable. You also could not have a better hotel breakfast buffet, they have everything and as soon as you finish they are there to clean your table. They even do lttle things like breath mints at the front desk. They really do make you feel special. The only
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: We stayed here on our first trip to Disneyland at the end of January. It was nice to be a few blocks away from all the tourism craziness.  We had a 1 bedroom suite facing the park on the 7th floor and we could watch the fireworks from our patio. Beds were comfortable and our room was clean. Staff was friendly and helpful. We used the pool area which was nice and quiet. The hot tub feels good after a long day at Disney. I did laundry twice using the guest facilities located on the 2nd and 3rd floors. That was very convenient. The shuttle bus to Disneyland was great. The front desk staff didn't seem to know the schedule and gave us the wrong info so ask the bus driver directly. Breakfast was decent with a big seating area. My only suggestions would be to add more seating in the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We will share your comments with the entire staff as we can always learn and grow from the feedback we get. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This Hampton Inn is geared towards families visiting Disneyland and it is very busy. That said, the staff seems to do a good job of keeping the facility clean. Our room was comfortable and clean. And, I was impressed that a staff member actually came by just hours after we'd checked in to make sure the extra towels and washclothes I'd requested when making our reservation on-line were in place (they were)! The complimentary breakfast is pretty standard, but well tended. Our only complaint was that our room would get pretty "stuffy" at night. But, running the A/C unit did help with that small issue.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time fill out a review of your most recent stay with us. Also, thank you for your kind comments as we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: 1st time to Disneyland. From the time we arrived to when we left the staff was very friendly & helpful.  The free breakfast was great, big selection which included waffels, muffins, bagels, eggs, cereal, hot oatmeal & more.  Shuttle bus (for a fee) to Disneyland was 10 mins ride, running very 30mins. Rooms clean.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We also thank you for your kind comments and for choosing our location for your location of choice while visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area. We hope to see you again when you travel to this area in the future.

Summary: Clean, friendly and reasonably priced! Lots of choices for breakfast and can always can find something to do for free.  Trolly service, fitness gym and the spa and pool area were private and clean! Staff was very helpful with getting any information I was needing or interested in finding out.
Manager Response: Thank you for all the kind feedback. We look forward to seeing you again next time you visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: We don't normally stay overnight in Anaheim other than at Disney hotels; this was a last-minute decision and we wanted to get something within our budget on Super Bowl weekend.  Very impressed with everything!  Top-notch customer service by Jesus at the front desk (he checked us in and out the next morning).  Loved the 7th floor room - a lot of people dislike street view but I found it very nice to watch cars go by from our bed :)  Room equipped with microwave, and there's a little cabinet above it to store dry food, mini fridge (good size for a "mini"), spacious bath area with great amenities by Neutrogena -- supplies like shower cap and mouthwash can be obtained from the front desk.  Breakfast truly a great spread!  Muffins, cereals, waffles, scrambled eggs, bacon (it was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your most recent stay with us. We are very delighted to hear your comments as we will share it with our entire staff. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Great staff; major facilities- pool, spa, gym, quality free breakfast; quiet rooms and very clean; hi def tv; excellent location-walk toDisneyland and Convention center, best selection of restaurants in Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback and for filling out a review of our hotel. We hope to see you again next time you visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Resort Area.

Summary: We love this hotel!  For the past decade we have celebrated Christmas with a Disneyland vacation, and this Hampton Inn is a critical part of that happiness.  So much credit for that goes to management and the entire staff for realizing that a warm smile, a friendly greeting and continual offers to help guests makes all the difference.  They truly understand what being in the hospitality business means.       Lori who checked us in was both professional and friendly, and Mike, Jesus, Lyla and the other very nice people at the front desk (whose names, unfortunately, we did not get) were all unfailingly welcoming, friendly and helpful.  We always look forward to seeing Erica, Reservations Coordinator, whose warmth, conscientious attention to every detail and over-and-above
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments and for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us.  We will share your review with the entire staff.  We hope to see you again next time you decide to visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a good part of town and offers the California State Employee hotel rate
Summary: The hotel stay was wonderful. The room and amenities were very nice and the staff was very courteous. We would really like to thank Erica Guerra for helping us to cancel 3 rooms without penalty, even though we were past the deadline to make changes. That was very nice of her. We did not see those changes coming when the deadline came.  Our only complaint is the deadline by which to make changes to reservations of 10+ rooms. You are only given until 3 weeks prior to arrival to make changes/cancellations to your reservation, whereas other hotels allow you to make changes/cancellations up to 48 hours prior to arrival.
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome feedback and for staying with us when you were in the area. We hope to see you again next time you are in town. Hope the New Year is going well.

Summary: Went for one night before visiting Disneyland.  Was surprised by the quietness of the room, this is a busy area and noise was a problem in few other hotels, but not this one. Got complimentary upgrade to two-room suite, which was really nice (including full kitchen).
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback! Hope to see you again in town when you decide to come back to the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn & Suites for 4 days in December during the Christmas week. The hotel stay was comfortable, rooms were clean and more importantly the staff was very responsive to our requests as we were a group of 2 families travelling with small children.   Easy access to Disneyland and restaurants. The breakfast buffet was wonderful. Kid friendly.   Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for filling out a review of your most recent stay and we are glad you enjoyed your time with us. Please let us know if we can do anything more as we look forward to seeing you next time you are in town.

Summary: This is a terrific place to stay when you are visiting Disneyland. The hotel is always clean and fresh. Lots of cute little perks throughout. Like popcorn and movie night in the lobby. We have stayed here many times and we stayed initially because it met a few of our traveling requirements. MUST BE CLEAN, and it is, always. FREE FULL BREAKFAST, and it is yummy, everything you could want. Healthy or sinful, its good. POOL & JACUZZI, yep, nice and fuzzy towels available as well. GIFT SHOP/OOPS I FORGOT MY ----- STORE, Yep, in the lobby, late night Ben N Jerrys or whatever you may need. PROXIMITY TO DLAND- pretty darn close. Just ride about one mile WEST to the Toy Story Parking lot and ride the Dland bus in. NOT TOO PRICY, nope its not. The staff here really makes the place.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great feedback of your most recent stay here in the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area. We will share your comments with the entire staff. We hope to see you again next time you are in town. Also, thank you for filling out a review of our hotel. Have a happy new year.

Summary: My family has stayed at this hotel a couple of times when going on a family vacation to Disneyland.  It was very nice, good clean rooms, wonderful breakfast (saves families money), connection to a Disneyland trolley, and the kids enjoyed the swimming pool a lot.  It is close to restaurants (both fast-food and sit down).  As I mentioned, we have done this multiple times and would use it again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback and for taking the time to also fill out a review of your most recent stay. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: My son and I were very happy with the comfort the hotel gave us. It's nice to stay somewhere and not have any problems. Easy access to everywhere we needed to go. Parking was no problem. Breakfast was good enough that you didn't need to go anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and for taking the time to fill out a review of your most recent stay. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: This was a great hotel, the pool and hot tub were a hit with the kids, the breakfast was good it was located close to Disneyland, and the hotel appearance was appealing and clean. I would stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your most recent stay at our hotel. We cannot thank you enough as we love hear back from our guest who stay with us. Thank you for choosing our hotel when visiting the Anaheim/Garden Grove Area.

Summary Heading: Not as good as it used to be
Summary: Stayed at this hotel as the usual hotel we stay at was booked.  Got a King family room.  Room was clean.  Breakfast was the usual egg product and sausage with your waffles and cereals etc.  Had to ask for extra towels everyday as the housekeeping staff just crumpled my note and threw it in the trash. Check in was easy as was check out.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of our hotel. We are sorry to hear feedback such as this as we will relay this onto our housekeeping manager. Please let us know as we can do anything more as we look forward to serving you better in the future.

Summary Heading: Would have given 4 stars - but gross linen issues
Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. Nice breakfast each morning and we could even see the fireworks from our room!  The room was clean -and they did forget to clean our room on our last night.  When my husband called to ask for more towels they said housekeeping said our "Do not disturb" sign was up.  It was not.   The reason I knocked the stars down however, is after giving my toddler a bath and was using a towel on him, I noticed small blood stains on the towels that were obviously not from him.  Being thoroughly grossed out, I threw it to the side and grabbed another.  Well, after they replaced our towels for the next day, I saw another light blood spot on a new clean towel.  Once, isn't a big deal, but twice!  Definitely check your towels carefully.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your hotel stay. We will pass your information on to the General Manager and the director of housekeeping. We will keep you updated on any changes that occur from your most valued input. We are sorry to hear comments such as this however we will reexamine our towels and bath room amenities and make sure it meets our upmost standards. Thank you once again as we will keep you updated on our progress.

Summary: This hotel offers a nice stay not far from Disneyland. The staff is very helpful and welcoming. However, the hotel needs some upgrades like new carpet and fresh paint. Although the breakfast is a plus, offering additional items or alternative choices is lacking. It would have been a plus if the hotel offers free of charge shuttle to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your hotel stay, We love to hear feedback from our guest on how their hotel stay went. We will keep you updated as with any changes or renovations due to our hotel. We wish you a happy new year.

Summary: While the distance to Disneyland was good, this is not the best hotel in Hilton's chain.  The room keys didn't work, the cable was out, the duvet/sheets had spots on them, and at 5:45am some type of construction or garbage thing was going on.  Will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay with us here in the Anaheim/Garden Grove District. We will share all your comments with our Management team as we look forward to addressing all of the concerns mentioned. Thank you for staying with us as we hope to get a chance to serve you better in the future.

Summary: Great polite smiley staff, very comfortable hotel with big room, big bathroom, , complimentary breakfast and coffee, free Wi Fi. Great parking area, close to Disney with shuttle service. Don't miss it..
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our hotel and for choosing us as your hotel of choice for the Anaheim/Garden Grove Resort Area. We love to hear all the comments we can about how our guest feel about their stay inside our hotel. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Hotel was nice and clean. We really liked the shuttle service to and from Disney. Only negative was the Family King room was not enough sleeping space for a family of four, one more bed would have been great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to fill out a review of our hotel. We will  pass all of your great feedback onto the staff as we always like a chance to refine our hotel and improve our overall product.

Summary Heading: Great staff, good breakfast, room quality based on number...
Summary: As I walked into the Hampton Inn and Suites with my family of four, we were greeted very politely, and checking in was absolutely no problem. Simply, very nice staff. The elevator for me, was pretty slow, slower than an average hotel elevator, but not by far.  As I slipped my card in and entered the hotel, I crashed on the bed and switched on the television, but it was very blurry and hardly watchable. This was what costed me a point rating. As for the beds, they were true to their word when they said the "duvets and sheets were cleaned for our arrival". They were absolutely clean and comfortable and wonderful. As for housekeeping, it was very fast and well cleaned. But on occasion, housekeeping took about an hour, or even longer. This was another point off.  When we went for
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for staying with us. We appreciate also for you taking the time to fill out a review on your most recent stay. We will share your comments with the entire staff in hopes of learning and growing to improve our overall product. We hope those occurrences mention does not deter you from staying with us in the future. We hope to see you again next time you are in town with the family.

Summary: Very comfortable hotel with accomodating staff.  Breakfast a zoo if you come down late, as well as being out of some things.  Plenty of restaurants in the area for other options.  Watched the Disney fireworks from the 5th floor room which was rather nice.  Adult pool and whirlpool comfortable temps, kiddie pool pretty cold - but it was December!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your most recent stay with us. We always appreciate getting feedback such as yours because in turn we can use it to refine our hotel. We hope to see you again next year or when you come back in to town.

Summary: We had a suite, room was excellent, complimentary breakfast was great, shuttle service to Disneyland was so convenient  Would highly recommend this hotel if your going to Disneyland or the other parks in the area.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our guest!  Thank you for the great comments on the review you did of your recent stay at our property. We look forward to seeing you next time you find yourself in the Disneyland resort area.

Summary: After looking at several hotels we went with this one.  Was not disappointed.  Staff was very friendly, rooms were clean, bed was a little uncomfortable.  Did enjoy the queen suite since we have two teenagers.  Price was affordable.  Not too long of a walk to Disneyland and restaurants close by.  Only con was having to pay for parking at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you again for expressing your stay and filling out a review of the hotel. We love to hear back from our guest good or bad. We hope to see you again stay with us and wish you the best luck on th rest of the travels through the holiday season.

Summary: very close to disney,price is go0d,rooms very nice,free breakfast is great,5 dollar shuttle to disney but you can walk about 3/4 of a mile.downside is that there is a 12 dollar parking fee .big gym and pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review on your recent visit. We truly love the feedback we get from our guest who stay with us. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Nice Stay, Good Breakfast, But Maintenance Takes Forever!
Summary: We usually stay at the Homewood Suites Garden Grove during our visits to Disneyland, but there was a decent rate for the Hampton Inn - and the reviews were good - so we decided to give it a try.  The common area is clean, and it's nice to have coffee, tea and hot chocolate available all the time. Popcorn and cookies were a bonus when we arrived early enough after the parks. The staff overall is very friendly.  The hallways look a little worn, but the room was light and clean. We liked the free internet and the small refrigerator in the room.  Breakfast is actually better than most hotels we've been to. There are 2-3 hot dishes, along with muffins, whole fruit, make-your-own waffles and other options. The staff here was great too.   Where the hotel need work is maintenance. We
Manager Response: Thank you for all your feedback and for staying with us. We will relay it back to all of the management staff as a way of learning and growing to improve our overall product. We always enjoy hearing back from every guest that enters our doors and we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Great staff ! Great Breakfast ! Everything is soooo great at this hotel !
Summary: We booked this hotel from Australia, for its location. Were in a rush, did not really spend time reviewing the comments. Now that we are here, we have been impressed everyday by the friendly staff - the front desk staff, the kitchen staff, the cleaners, EVERYone !!!! The kitchen staff is soooo unbelievably friendly, especially Carmen who has made us feel so at home with her sunny smile, caring and friendly manners. We even missed the hotel when we went on tour and could not wait to check back in !!! We would certainly stay here again on our next trip to the US !!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments and we are glad you had a fantastic stay. We will share your comments with the entire staff. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Since we've stayed here in previous years, we were pleasantly surprised to see the newly remodeled lobby/breakfast area. The breakfasts are better than they used to be, including a couple of hot items that change from day to day, make-them-yourself waffles, cereal, hard-boiled eggs, juice, coffee, tea, and fruit. I never left hungry. The 2-queen room was clean (duvet covers & sheets washed for every new arrival). It did take us a while to figure out the thermostat (it was quite chilly outside during our stay), but we were finally able to master it. Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) picks up at the lobby door, plus Disney parking is only a couple of blocks away, if you'd rather. The biggest downside to this hotel is that the parking spaces are quite small.
Manager Response: Thank you again for staying with us and yes the parking spaces are a little challenging however we are working with the city to get them larger. We will follow up with our progress. Thank you so much for staying with us and being part of the Hampton team!

Summary: We were there 4 days with a large group and didn't have any problems...the rooms were clean, staff was great and friendly and it was a good stay!  I would stay there again for sure.  The complimentary breakfast has quite a few options and I was very impressed with the staff as that is a very thankless job.  The staff was quick to help and responded well even when guests were being quite rude to them.  I was impressed with how well the hotel was run as a whole.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your great comments as we will share this with the whole team. We are always glad to see another very happy guest leave our doors. We hope to see you again!

Summary: I feel that the housekeeping could do a better job in making sure the rooms are clean.  They had post it on the bed that said the comforter/duvet was cleaned for our arrival, but there was dried blood on it.  It would also help if they understood English better so that they (housekeeping) understood what you needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. we will research the room you stayed in and always apply feedback to you on. We are very sorry to hear comments such as this however we will relay this to the General Manager and the housekeeping staff to make sure our linen is clean every time it goes out. Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: Convenient walking distance from all the fun attractions and restaurants, but not so close that you are overwhelmed with the tourist crowd.  I was there for business, so happy that their fitness center was open 24 hours.  In addition, very pleased that breakfast was available as early as 6 a.m.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments and for staying with us. Hope to see you again

Summary: The hotel was clean, and the staff was nice. Don't forget to add the 12 dollar a day parking fee to your budget. It was close to the airport which was nice. It was close to restaraunts, also a gas station was near by to fill up before going to the airport. TV was a little smaller that the Hampton inn I stayed at in Temecula, but over all not bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for applying a review of our property. Although we do have a aprking charge we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I don't have a lot to complain about here, it's a nice hotel, and the staff was very friendly. I did have to wait a few minutes for my room to be ready, checking in around 3:30. I got a room on a low floor, near the elevator, which is pretty much the opposite of what I hope for, but it was quiet enough, so that worked out fine. Microwave and a fairly substantially-sized mini-fridge are provided. Large bathroom, though the shower/tub felt a bit cramped, and also seemed to slant a bit to one side, but that could be my imagination. Parking was adequate. Breakfast was what I expected from a Hampton Inn. A sign promised strawberry waffles on Saturday, but I saw no strawberries, though I arrived near the end of the breakfast serving time, so you snooze, you lose, I suppose. Pre-made
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback as well as staying with us. We always love to hear how our guest feel when they stay at our property because its though these comments on how we learn and grow as a team to improve our overall product.  We will do our best to track down what room you had and see if we can attention some of the occurrences you mentioned in your review. Once again thank you for staying with us and we hope this did not detour you from staying with us in the near future as we would love a second chance to show you how our hospitality is one worth a second try.

Summary: Great location for Disneyland. Clean but "tired". If you don't care about clipped paint and nicked furniture then this is a great hotel. Have the usual "free" breakfast but if you have food allergies you might find it difficult to have a filling meal. I only stay at Hampton Inn's and having said all of that I might stay here again if it were convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay. We will share your comments with the General Manager and the management staff in an overall effort to improve our breakfast items. We don't hear much feedback however we always bring to light any words that we can get back from our guest. We will keep you posted if any changes occur. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We usually stay at the Hyatt just a few doors down, decided to try this property out this year. We had a wonderful stay, everyone was so friendly. We had a minor room issue when we checked in and the front desk quickly found us a new room with no hassle what so ever.  Great stay we will be sure to return.
Manager Response: Awesome comments and thank you for filing out a review of our hotel as we hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Great hotel which is convenient to Disney. Easy shuttle service to Disney (costs extra, but you buy the tickets at the hotel) leaves from the parking lot every 30 minutes, with a quick trip of about 10 minutes and you're at the park. The rooms were clean and quiet, with a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker.  The breakfast in the morning was standard hotel breakfast fare, with a little bit of something for everyone. They did change the hot item daily.  But what really makes this hotel stand out was the friendly staff!!! From check-in, talking with the maids, and check-out, everyone smiled and was happy to help.  As we were waiting for our van after checking out, a woman was getting into her car, when she realized she left her walking stick in her room. Suddenly, a maid came
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome comments as we will share them with the entire staff. We hope to see you you again when you are in town.

Summary: Very nice hotel. Convenient to Disney.  Shuttle bids to Disney from hotel parking lot.  Wide variety of restaurants in the area.  Buca di BeppI adjacent to the hotel.  Exceptional hotel staff.  At breakfast my mother asked if there was sugar free hot chocolate available.  The staffer looked found they didn't have any and told my mother she'd pink some up later in the day.  When we returned that afternoon, my mother found a box of sugar free hot chocolate in a gift bag wIth a more from the staffer in her room.  Customer service doesn't get much better than that.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments as we will share it with the entire staff. Also, thank you for staying with us as we look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: Excellent facility, and staff along with the amenities. The breakfast was great with different menu types along with a brief description of the major items offered for the week. Great services and staff too!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you, it was great having you in house.Hopefully we get to see you again on your next trip out to the Anaheim/ Garden Grove area

Summary: I was in the Anaheim area to attend Disneyland and this hotel is very close by and a great deal.  The rooms are nice with a fridge and microwave and the daily happy hour snacks and free parking were an added bonus.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review as we look forward to seeing you again when you are in town.

Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel.  We stayed here on a family trip to Disneyland with our two younger children.  It was super clean and comfortable.  The breakfast was great with a large selection.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  I found our room perfect for our needs.  This hotel helped make our trip a good one.
Manager Response: Awesome, we are always excited to hear great comments about us and thank you for taking the time to fill out a survey of your hotel experience. We Hope to see you next time you are in town.

Summary: My son and I stayed here while he was in a basketball tournament in Orange County (I think we were the only guests not going to Disneyland).  Check in was quick and easy.  The parking lot was kind of full (it was a Sat. night) but we went around the back and there were spots in back.  Free WiFi, breakfast included...good lots of choices.  We stayed in the King family room...there was a king sized bed and a wall on the window side of the room.  On the other side of the wall was a twin, a beanbag chair and another t.v.  Perfect for my son and I or a couple and one kid.  Fridge and microwave a nice bonus.  Really for the money it was all good.  Clean and comfortable.  I would stay here again.  We walked to dinner (several choices nearby).
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments and we can't wait to see you in town next year.

Summary: Great price, clean rooms, very friendly staff.  With free wifi and complementary breakfast, you end up saving quite a bit.  Only a 15 min walk to Disney.  Close to shopping.  Perfect location.  Fridge and Microwave were definately very useful
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review and for all the kind words. We hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Exceptional service and value for money
Summary: The staff of this hotel provided exceptional service. They are friendly and go out of their way to make you feel comfortable. This hotel provided excellent value for money - free WiFi, very generous complimentary hot breakfast, pop-corn & cookies and a 24-hour complimentary business center with free printing! Highly recommend this hotel.
